  • [I1703295760]/[CARDS-54055]

    • Changed behaviour: when the EXTR_CHANNEL tag is defined in a contract subtype, a transaction can be routed to external systems.

    Application management

  • [CARDS-51521]

    • Advanced Applications R2: is is now possible to activate a Preview instalment plan and to cancel early repayment.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51887]

    • Supported creation of COMBO_Cards by applications.

  • [CARDS-52064]

    • "Device Parm Ctrl" and "Merchant Management" additional info types are now supported in Advanced Applications R2 for contract additional information.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf] [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52315]

    • In Advanced Applications R2, application accept has been downgraded to approve in secondary nodes for NoWorkflow mode if such behaviour is not refused by the global parameter APPL_NON_SAFE_ON_SECONDARY=DECLINE.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52451]

    • Advanced Applications R2 supports now Conversion tariff personalisation.

  • [CARDS-52781]

    • Added a new field, "WF Operation" to "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Workflow Configuration\Activities" to define application workflow status after performing an activity: "To Closed" or "To Open". For a standard strategy it's recommended to set this field to "To Closed" for "Accept" and "Decline" activities and to "To Open" for "Approve" and "Capture and Edit Application" activities. "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Close Posted Applications" allows workflow to be closed for all posted and declined applications when the workflow configuration is changed.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52908]

    • The "Tariff Role" field has been added to Advanced Application R2 monitoring forms.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53171]

    • Supported work with applications for a multi-level contract hierarchy with different clients in application types. One application can contain several client sections and each client section can have its own subsections for addresses, classifiers, etc. If the client section is not mandatory, verification of client data is supported - at least one of the identifiers must be specified: reg_number, client_number, social_number, itn. When empty, the application sub-tree is ignored. The client section can also be the top one in the application for the contract: ObjectFor = Contract - the case of new client creation with its contract as a sub-contract for the specified one. In both cases, application type is required to have a contract section under such a client section at the next level with ActionType = Add.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53369]

    • Supported uniqueness of client individual taxpayer number (ITN field). It's only checked if the field is not empty and the global parameter "UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_ITN" for the financial institution is not set to "N" (No). The default parameter value is "Y" (Yes) and ITN uniqueness is checked.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53407]

    • Added a new menu "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Imported & Loaded XML Applications Management" that makes it possible to open unposted applications loaded from XML files or online XML requests with all details and manage them.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53449]

    • Advanced Application R2 forms for contract and client classifiers have been extended by the "Date From", "Date To" and "Comment" fields.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53456]

    • "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Appl Type" now allows the TARIFF_CODE_EXT tag to be used in Tariff sections for setting a tariff code.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53475]

    • The "Custom Parms" new button has been added to the "Contract Preferred" form (OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Cardholder Input & Update by Applications) to pack/unpack the "Custom Parms" tagged field. A section with the "Preferred" object type is supported for applications created manually according to the application types.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53554]

    • Advanced Applications R2 can skip Product status verification during contract application approval if the new global parameter APPL_ALLOW_NOT_READY is set to "Y". Application accept will check this status anyway.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [UFX-331]

    • Added SOA UFX support of the SocialNumber field in the ClientInfo section in Application Management. SocialNumber also can used in ClientIDT to identify a client.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf] Application Managment | xml_appl_schema.chm

  • [UFX-382]

    • Support of a new "Conversion" Tariff Role has been added to UFX Applications R2.

    Updated Manuals: Application Managment | xml_appl_schema.chm

  • [UFX-383]

    • Added support of Area and AreaClassifierType fields in Preferred and Usage Applications R2 and information requests.

    Updated Manuals: Application Managment | xml_appl_schema.chm

  • [UFX-394]

    • Application loading with additional info types for "Device Parm Ctrl", "Device Parm to Doc" and "Merchant Management" (appl_info_type.for_whom='S', 'D','M') has been added for the ContractAddInfo object type in Application R2 and Information Requests.

  • [UFX-442]

    • Added new menu item: "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Applications No Workflow\Applications Export (No WF)". This item exports applications with application workflow disabled and is useful for exporting applications that were created without workflow.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf]

  • [UFX-484]

    • Changed type of W4T_Officer/GroupIDT from W4D_Code to W4D_Name in OfficerApplications.

  • [UFX-502]

    • Supported Preferred fields TimeInterval, WeekDays, WorkDay for Application and Contract Information requests.

  • [UFX-549]

    • Added new menu item: "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Applications No Workflow\Applications Export (No WF)". This item exports applications with application workflow disabled and is useful for exporting applications that were created without workflow.

  • [I1704120504]/[CARDS-53120]

    • Changed behaviour when online requests based on Advanced Applications R2 for urgent operations such as contract status change, contract event posting, classifier setting, PIN attempts clearing are accepted in NoWF mode and cannot be performed immediately due to contract unavailability on the node (Response Code 2288) or a Deadlock (Response Code 2270), the application will be declined and a warning message will be returned as an error. Behaviour for non-urgent operations, offline application accept and workflow application processing hasn't been changed. In this case, applications will be processed by the next automatic accept process.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52701]

    • The ability to activate users has been added to the form "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Workflow Configuration\User Management\Users".

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52774]

    • Client AddOrUpdate Application R2 checks the existence of a client in accordance with the additional global parameters UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_NUMBER and UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_REG_NUMBER.

  • [CARDS-53185]

    • Resolved issue: now Advanced Applications R1 for AuthMethod modification does not take into account closed authentication schemes.

  • [CARDS-54005]

    • Fixed issue: now an empty record in the Contract/Client Extra Info application section is not processed and doesn't cause an error if this section is not mandatory.

  • [CARDS-54341]

    • Changed how the "RBS Number" and "MemberID" fields are filled in Advanced Application R2 for contract modification. Field values are now inherited from the parent contract if they are empty.

  • [CARDS-54956]

    • Fixed an issue occurring on the Product Inspector WAY4 Manager screen when the "Application" button is pressed.

  • [CARDS-55388]

    • Corrected Advanced Application R2 for contract counterparty creation by a predefined application type to avoid "Counterparty is not found" errors.

  • [CARDS-55711]

    • Added the possibility to create ContractAddInfo or ClientAddInfo application section with the ActionType defined in the application type.

  • [CARDS-56644]

    • Improved the ClientAdditionalInfo and ContractAdditionalInfo applications in the Advanced Applications R2 module. Now tags in the "AddInfoXX" fields can be processed separately.

  • [CARDS-56773]

    • Fixed an issue with processing of device status from the Advanced Applications R2 application for an affiliated hierarchy of the acquiring and device contracts.

  • [CARDS-58179]

    • Fixed an issue with setting a classifier for the closed contract in Application R2.

  • [UFX-359]

    • XML Applications Overall Response pipe behavior has been aligned with the manual: extension is padded with zeros to be exactly three digits long.

  • [UFX-380]

    • Officer Import without FileLabel works correctly. "OFFICER.IMPORT.RESPONSE" FileLabel has been added to response.

  • [UFX-407]

    • Fixed length of Application RegNumber and OrigAppNumber in UFX schema. They now have the same maximum length of 64 characters.

  • [I1702210692]/[CARDS-52621]

    • Fixed issue: now Advanced Application R2 to change the client for a contract doesn't inherit the client type from the new client if it belongs to another financial institution.

  • [I1703249728]/[CARDS-52849]

    • Resolved issue with missing base relation for a new non-product based related contract during accept of an advanced application R2.

  • [I1704247540]/[UFX-401]

    • Fixed processing of special *#N value for clearing the client base address fields in UFX Applications.

  • [I1707259086]/[UFX-424]

    • Fixed an issue that could lead to removal of the "Last Name" field instead of the "Company Name" field while importing advanced application R2.

  • [I1805146590]/[UFX-551]

    • Fixed an issue with export of an application R2 response if checkValue is empty.

    Authentication management

  • [CARDS-52836]

    • Authentication schemes are now created with consideration of the SCOPE parameter value.

  • [CARDS-54813]

    • Modify TD package, to allow return additional scheme parameters as DATE_FROM, DATE_TO

  • [CARDS-56511]

    • Added support for providing WAY4 Cards merchant details required for TS mVisa service.

  • [I1703038914, I1705100344]/[CARDS-53096]

    • Authentication domain option added: ACCESS_LOG=N to suppress unwanted process log messages on authentication result. NB: audit log records will be present anyway.

  • [CARDS-51780]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of long values for parameters of the procedure used by Authentication Server when the High Availability solution is not used.

  • [CARDS-52093]

    • Fixed "Failed to calculate DP routing, use default routing" warning for Authentication Server Context operations.

  • [CARDS-52154]

    • User must change password if it was reset by admin and parameter DEF_PW_CHANGE is set to Y.

  • [CARDS-52915]

    • The "OFFICER" scope has been added to validation conditions for an authentication scheme linked to a consumer record.

  • [CARDS-53936]

    • Authentication services domain parameters are now read through the cache now to avoid performance issues.

  • [CARDS-54512]

    • Fixed error in processing of prefix "##" for authentication method parameter pattern which can lead to empty result value.

  • [CARDS-54619]

    • Fixed error which can lead to "ORA-06502: PL/SQL: numeric or value error: NULL index table key value" exception in authentication message processing.

  • [I1610259005]/[CARDS-50820]

    • High Availability deferred apply can now process authentications log.

  • [I1709216051]/[CARDS-54938]

    • Restored ability to fill several links (client, contract, consumer) in one authentication scheme record.

  • [I1710039923]/[CARDS-55036]

    • Corrected the procedure to search for authentication schemes for methods with the SCOPE parameter.

    Automated routines

  • [CARDS-52795]

    • The Standard Evening Contract Daily Update process has been renamed from "Contr Daily Update2" to "Contr Daily Update Evening". In the Upgrade procedure, process parameters are automatically updated for "Contr Daily Update Evening" in the form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Process Parameters.

  • [I1611302204]/[CARDS-51502]

    • The error message "Invalid contract hierarchy" will appear during the Contracts Daily Update procedure and contract closure process to avoid an infinite loop when a contract is linked to itself as the parent contract.

  • [CARDS-52153]

    • Filter for standard Timezone Contract Daily Update (CDU) menu items has been changed; now the liab_category field is used instead of liab_contract.

  • [CARDS-55142]

    • Fixed the error message ORA-06502 "Numeric or value error: character string buffer too small" for ageing account templates, when the "Template Details" field contains more than 255 symbols.

  • [I1702225223]/[CARDS-52304]

    • The Approve procedure can be be called for sub-products. If the main product is not ready, Approve will be executed for the entire hierarchy; if the main product is ready, only the sub-product will be approved. A new form has been added, OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products (No Hierarchy), for viewing all products without hierarchy.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [I1707067590]/[CARDS-57195]

    • Fixed inconsistent contract data generation when the Apply Service Packs Changes process intersects with other processes which change a contract record.

  • [I1802073554]/[CARDS-57188]

    • Changed error message text which occurs if process stack is invalid on closing.

    Bill payments

  • [CARDS-51850]

    • It is now possible to clear the ServiceComment and License fields of a PaymentType using mBilling request.

  • [CARDS-52015]

    • Biller Management: ATM Retail contracts are now created with consideration of the requested channel.

  • [CARDS-52339]

    • Added support for configuring requestor account types, added the SECTION_WITH_ICONS flag to the menu.

  • [CARDS-53130]

    • Changed layout of add_info_* tags for biller contracts.

  • [CARDS-53361]

    • Device contracts in invalid statuses are now ignored when creating ATM Retail.

  • [CARDS-53696]

    • Supported OTP_SMS templates per CP service.

  • [CARDS-52492]

    • Corrected visibility of payment type properties. Payment type properties created via mBilling request are now visible.

  • [CARDS-53364]

    • Biller Management: fixed an error that randomly occurred when adding or updating payment type group.

  • [I1710121607, I1801159509]/[CARDS-56874]

    • Supported transaction Processing Code conversion from Online Retail to Clearing Unique for MCCs specified in MasterCard "IPM Clearing Formats" manual. In WAY4Cards (according to transaction type, message code) transactions remain Retail, but for IRD calculation and in clearing file they are Unique. Pipe affected: IPM Outward.

  • [I1712227712]/[CARDS-56335]

    • Added creation of a historical record in sy_handbook table when IssFeeCode is updated with a ProvidePaymentReceiverDetailsRequest.

    CB Gate

  • [CARDS-51676]

    • Utility Payment message routing to bank system rule selection algorithm has been corrected.

  • [CARDS-51859]

    • Fixed reversal message routing to core banking system for utility payments.

  • [CARDS-52762]

    • Fixed BerTLV buffers parsing in Application Interface.

  • [CARDS-52821]

    • Fixed incorrect document posting status when the fee is waived by the CBS.

  • [CARDS-53860]

    • Corrected processing of credit transactions for cards with CBS accounts in TS. AuthCode is now also filled for Auth Advice.

  • [CARDS-55279]

    • Corrected the algorithm for determining the need to redirect an advice message to the core banking system when its processing finished with rejection.

  • [I1705099074]/[CARDS-53246]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of CBGate balance loading when the last transaction linked to the balance was delivered to CBS by SAF.

  • [I1706274643]/[CARDS-53891]

    • Fixed balance update algorithm to not update a balance if the account is closed.

  • [I1711090861]/[CARDS-56412]

    • Fixed exception "com.openwaygroup.pkgj.cliint.IStnd is undefined in the context" in cb_gate_balance_load pipe.

  • [I1712116966]/[CARDS-56170]

    • Fixed incorrect CBS Stand-in processing of several independent authorization requests received within a timeout interval.

  • [I1803204099]/[CARDS-57166]

    • Fixed the inability to run cb_gate_balance_load pipe by a clerk with a password containing characters that are not allowed in XML.

  • [I1805159709]/[CARDS-57878]

    • Fixed an issue with deadlocks that appear when several incoming files are loaded by the cb_gate_balance_load pipe simultaneously.

  • [CARDS-57296]

    • Changed the CHANNEL_ID parameter description (configuration file conf\ init\ h2h_rbs.xml). (CB_Gate_TS_Setup.pdf) Changed the "safServiceID" parameter description of the SaF service configuration file for the Transaction Switch H2H adapter. (CB_Gate_TS_Setup.pdf)

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\cb_gate\CB_Gate_Functional_Specification.pdf] [core_banking_interface\cb_gate\CB_Gate_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53597]

    • Added a default value (1000) for the commit_interval parameter of the cb_gate_balance_load pipe.

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\cb_gate\CB_Gate_Setup.pdf]

    Case management

  • [CARDS-51472]

    • The "Period Condition" field in the Strategy Rule screen has been renamed to "Rule Process Condition" with 2 possible values: 'Always' and 'Excess Count In Period'. The listbox for the "Rule Category" field has been extended by the 'On Scan Case' value.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51577]

    • "Last Activity Name" field has been added to "Open Cases" screens in Case Management menus.

  • [CARDS-51578]

    • The "Delete File" button to delete a case object has been added to the "Files" tab of the case details screen.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52402]

    • Added the ability to search for cases by Contract Number in all case lists in the "Operations" menu for all Case Management categories.

  • [CARDS-52897]

    • Added Scheduled and Deadline Dates configuration verification into Case Management Activity approval process.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53243]

    • Changed the "CM.Operations.All Docs" form in the "CM Risk Management" and "Dispute Assistant" menu items. Removed the [TARGET_AMOUNT] and [TARGET_AMOUNT_FEE] computed fields. Added a new link [Srvc/Fee] to view all financial flows from all macrotransactions.

  • [CARDS-56169]

    • Excluded use of a bank account contract as a case contract when a new case for a document is created in a domain with the "Acquiring" category.

    Updated Manuals: [dispute_assistant\Dispute_Assistant_Operation_Guide.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56682]

    • Supported a new case parameter based on a classifier type changed by a client or contract application.

  • [CARDS-52155]

    • Fixed issue. Now in Product Inspector test scripts, the case domain set in the "Set Domain" step is not used for cases created by an event.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52540]

    • The activity to move an object from one case to another has been extended to work with case files. A new object role, "File" ("F") has been added to the system's standard configuration for all domain categories (OpenWay/Case Management/OpenWay Settings/Case Object Roles).

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52556]

    • The Case Management activity "Create sub case" also stores an activity comment as a new case description when an application sub-case is created.

  • [CARDS-52729]

    • Issue when a document was not added to an existing Financial case for the same contract has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-53244]

    • Added a "Currency" column which reflects the currency of "Amount" and "Fee" fields to the "All Docs" tab in Case Management screens.

  • [CARDS-53794]

    • It is no longer necessary to register the "Case Management" menu for the clerk user group to allow clerk users to perform an activity in "Dispute Assistant CM" and other Case Management operation screens.

  • [CARDS-54043]

    • Changed how the activity checks user competence. For dispute cases, an activity for which a document is not specified checks user competence against the maximum absolute amount among the active financial documents attached to the case, not against the summary of document amounts as for financial cases. This amount is calculated by the entries for the case contract accounts, not for the document target contract.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-58080]

    • Changed Frequency display value from "Single" to "Unique" for Case Event Type. Added "Single" value (see CARDS-45657 for details).

  • [I1609198831]/[CARDS-51029]

    • The amnd-history record was not created when the document was released for housekeeping

  • [I1610314143]/[CARDS-52065]

    • Optimized "Contract" tab performance in the Case Details screen.

  • [I1707171415]/[CARDS-54190]

    • Resolved issue with empty case status when two "New Activity" windows are opened and processed.

  • [I1709019529]/[CARDS-54579]

    • Fixed trace messages processing issue in Case Management.

  • [I1711089440]/[CARDS-55897]

    • Fixed an issue with CM_USER table export using "export.bat" script.

  • [I1712183916]/[CARDS-56115]

    • Changed sub-case creation when moving a document from one financial case to another. Now it calls the activity to create a new sub-case for the document for the target case if there is no such sub-case for the source case. Otherwise, the sub-case will be re-subordinated for the target case.

  • [I1801086398]/[CARDS-56431]

    • Changed the "Select Case" form for moving an object to another case: the "Contract" field has been removed, case selection is performed by case identifier in a lookup selection dialog.

  • [I1802154371]/[CARDS-57877]

    • Fixed cached rules validation when performing an activity.

  • [I1804119098]/[CARDS-57800]

    • Added a check that the CODE field has been filled in for Case Parameters, Activity Reasons, Strategy Step, and Strategy. It is now mandatory to fill in the field. Also fixed the Duplicate Strategy procedure.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53781]

    • In the Case_Management_Configuration.pdf document, a chapter has been added that contains information about global parameters, including the CM_<DomainCat>_AUTOCREATE_USER parameter. Information about this parameter has also been added to the Global_Parameters.pdf document.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

    Configuration Management Tool

  • [DBK-3275]

    • Deleted Metainformation menu from Copy Configuration folder. Same menu items could be reached at OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\!!! STAFF ONLY !!!\Metainformation

    Configuration inspector

  • [DBK-2476]

    • Added automatic filtering by Record State for Datamart dimensions on configuration export.

  • [DBK-2479]

    • Configuration inspector now informs officers of warnings the occurred during data creation, merge and import.

  • [DBK-2634]

    • Introduced new parameter PRESERVE_ID in OpenWay\Copy Configuration\Copy Configuration Export Screen "Parm List" form for internal purposes. For all configuration exports created by users it should be set to "N" (default value). Setting this parameter to "Y" should always be approved by the vendor as it may lead to incorrect configuration merging in target system. It is strongly recommended to verify additionally if a file should be imported in target system if it contains setup with the parameter value "Y".

  • [CARDS-53842]

    • For deleted records from sic_group_tree and area_tree tables, history records have been added.

  • [DBK-2354]

    • Set of fields and tables exported and merged by configuration inspector not depends on Institution parameter anymore (is it filled or not). This could cause issues on importing configuration data exported on previous versions.

  • [DBK-2424]

    • Fixed importing records with default column values. Buffered messages mode is used for the import process to preserve the import log in the case of a fatal exception.

  • [DBK-2429]

    • Fixed long value trimming on configuration export.

  • [DBK-2461]

    • Added the ability to transfer Sy. Configuration mapping for Datamart dimension tables.

  • [DBK-2650]

    • Import of merged data has been optimized. A record is updated in a single expression, not by one field at a time. For unchanged parent records, "Is Ready" status update is done once when loading subordinate records.

  • [DBK-2785]

    • Corrected merging of MP_ETL_PARM table records using Configuration Inspector: now the records are identified by scope and value_type fields, not only scope

  • [DBK-3131]

    • Excluded personal tariffs from Configuration Inspector export in ALL and ALL_BY_DATE modes. Personal tariffs are already skipped if collected as child objects of tariff domains.

  • [DBK-3132]

    • Skipped INSTITUTION parameter value and no error is shown during export of Datamart configuration by Configuration Inspector

  • [DBK-3167]

    • Fixed problem with Configuration Inspector which did not allow insertion of records into configuration tables after running "OpenWay\Copy Configuration\Copy Configuration Import Screen" -> [Data]-> [Import merged data] on WAY4 03.45.30.

  • [DBK-3308]

    • Corrected export of Datamart configuration (MP Payment Scheme Identification table).

  • [DBK-3569]

    • Optimised the "Create Standard" process for preparation of configuration export.

  • [DBK-3625]

    • Corrected export configuration of the WAY4 Case Management platform. Now all the tables (main and subordinate) with configuration data are exported, except CM_USER as it directly depends on the OFFICER table. The fields with references to OFFICER or CM_USER are skipped.

  • [I1702039456]/[DBK-2558]

    • Fixed error during export of FX Scheme configuration by Configuration Inspector.

    Core

  • [CARDS-51950]

    • Partner management registration forms have been developed.

  • [CARDS-50541]

    • Renamed the "ConfGroup" button to "Mapping" in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\User Classifiers".

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51204]

    • New forms Acnt Balance History Turnover.srd have been added to show account balance turnover for calculated contract parameters.

  • [CARDS-51205]

    • Trace information for calculated contract parameters calculation has been added.

  • [CARDS-51207]

    • New actions for balance recalculation, that can be initiated using the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts" have been added: Balance Turnover Initialization for Contract and Balance Turnover Initialization for Product.

  • [CARDS-51477]

    • The same Result Event can now be a trigger for any change of classifier value.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-51493]

    • New actions to recalculate contract functional dates have been added to the CSS screen OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service -> [Contr.Dates] form.

    Updated Manuals: [] [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51607]

    • Extended IF_CS_TYPE_FOR, IF_PARM_FOR to check source/target contracts for a document.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51642]

    • The ("Custom" = "?") value has been added for Charge Event and Event Order domains for use in Fee Types and Standing Orders forms.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51976]

    • SRC_FX_TRF/TGT_FX_TRF tags are now always written into macrotransaction additional information, when the corresponding FX tariffs were used for macrotransaction Source/Target amount calculation accordingly.

  • [CARDS-52029]

    • Contract balance refreshing functionality called from the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts" has been optimized.

  • [CARDS-52158]

    • The KEEP_CONTRACT_ID tag is set in a Misc Service (Service Details) or transaction subtype (Fee Algorithm). When a Misc document is created, the contract identifier is specified in add_info.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description]

  • [CARDS-52634]

    • Added a new menu item, "OpenWay\Full\Daily Procedures\Consistency Points". In the standard configuration it makes it possible to trace calls of the standard "Close GL Entries" process. This is important as all GL entries generated on the previous banking day after closing GL will be registered in "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\GL\GL Trace Exceptions". In configurations with the Datamart interface this menu item will also show Datamart-related consistency points.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\WAY4_Accounting.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52904]

    • A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() - with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available. - with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeAllCreditHistory and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns only records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available.

  • [CARDS-53001]

    • New data have been added for gathering CMS statistics: - in the "CONTRACT_GROUP" group added new tags: "IS_RELATED" and "REL_TYPE". - added a new group, "REL_TYPES".

  • [CARDS-53203]

    • The SEND_REVERSE tag can now be set in a document to allow a reversal to be sent to the payment system before an advice has been sent.

    Updated Manuals: [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53282]

    • Unused CUST_GL_TRANSFER procedure has been dropped

  • [CARDS-53433]

    • In API acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with call mode AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin added a filter: API returns records from credit_history with service_class from list: Balance Inquiry, Top Up, Online Payment, External Payment, Online Statement, Verification, Additional Online Service.

  • [CARDS-53470]

    • A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth, AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllWithNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history which did not change balances and/or an account's Amount Available.

  • [CARDS-53515]

    • Existing records in the VISIBLE_CLASSIFIER_TYPES handbook are marked as "Customer Service Workbench" records. New records can now be created indicating their relation to Customer or Merchant workbenches.

  • [CARDS-53849]

    • Interbranch Fee Order can now be used for Misc documents created by usages. The tag FEE_INTERBRANCH=ORDER; should be used in Misc service details. See details in Documentation.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53878]

    • Interbranch Fee Order can now be used for Misc documents created by usages. The tag FEE_INTERBRANCH=ORDER; should be used in Misc service details. See details in Documentation.

  • [CARDS-54474]

    • Implemented flexible redefinition of Effective Contract for Balance Type posting.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-54551]

    • A new parameter "P_LIAB_TOP_SQL" has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement.rdf" report. The length is varchar2(4096). The default value for this parameter is "select a.id from client c, acnt_contract a where c.amnd_state = 'A' and a.client__id = c.id and a.amnd_state = 'A' and a.liab_contract is null and a.acnt_contract__oid is null". The new parameter allows the report to be run in batch mode together with the P_LIAB_CAT_LIST parameter.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54662]

    • Added a new parameter, "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(3). The default value is "Y". This is an internal technical parameter for DB Manager/WAY4 Manager/WAY4 Web client. Added a new parameter, "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Cardholder_Contract_Statement", "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(1). The default value is "Y". The parameter makes it possible to change the ability to read report parameter values from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table . The "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" and "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" parameters work as a pair. Only if both parameters are "Y" and the "P_CONNID" parameter is not null, report parameter values will be read from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Merchant_Statements.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54959]

    • Supported FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT mode for custom fees. Other values of the FROM_AUTH tag are not supported. If the blocked Fee Amount currency differs from the posting Fee Amount currency, conversion is made according to custom fee Service rules.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56062]

    • Additional tracing messages for ExtraLimNorm process have been added.

  • [CARDS-56763]

    • Improved matching for the DOC_TAG tag: added LIST_WITH instruction for checking many-to-many values. For example: DOC_TAG=TAG_NAME;DOC_TAG_VALUE=LIST_WITH:Value1,Value2,Value3,Value4;

  • [CARDS-56959]

    • Supported 3 logging modes for the CS_DECISION_LOG table. Default behaviour has been changed.

  • [CARDS-57249]

    • Improved entry description in the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details" report. Entry description is now taken from the record of the approved Service that was current at the time of transaction so that later Service updates won't corrupt the entry description.

  • [CARDS-57623]

    • Implemented a new ability to apply several tariffs for fee amount calculation. The number of tariffs applied can range from zero to "N". Each tariff is calculated independently, and the total fee amount is posted once. To use this feature, a service project needs to be started. Contact OpenWay Support with a detailed description of the business functionality that is required.

  • [I1504289193, I1505264242]/[CARDS-51640]

    • The "Active Tariffs" form in OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf has been enhanced. Tariffs specified in the account scheme, account templates, services, standing orders and date schemes are shown with the "Yes" value in the "Used In Cfg" field of the form.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [I1511236778]/[CARDS-51787]

    • When removing a contract that was created by mistake (OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Issuing Contracts Remove), its account numbers will be cleared for proper housekeeping.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [I1708224441]/[CARDS-54611]

    • Added a new parameter, "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(3). The default value is "Y". This is an internal technical parameter for DB Manager/WAY4 Manager/WAY4 Web client. Added a new parameter, "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Cardholder_Contract_Statement", "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(1). The default value is "Y". The parameter makes it possible to change the ability to read report parameter values from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table . The "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" and "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" parameters work as a pair. Only if both parameters are "Y" and the "P_CONNID" parameter is not null, report parameter values will be read from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Merchant_Statements.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51277]

    • Mirroring to Classifier for contract parameters with "Location of Current Vvalue" = Client configuration has been fixed.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51494]

    • Excessive processing of unmatched usage limiters in document posting is skipped if this has already been done by the authorization module.

  • [CARDS-51504]

    • A new form, Acnt Saved Limits.srd has been added to show MIN/MAX values for balances with the SAVE_LIMITS tag.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51518]

    • Balance Turnover initialization with Liability Sub contracts is supported.

  • [CARDS-51535]

    • Changing of hardcoded balances for contracts has been optimised.

  • [CARDS-51571]

    • Fixed calculation of the "PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME" statistic parameter.

  • [CARDS-51621]

    • Record generation for the DICT table were excluded from the action initiated by the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Message Dictionary".

  • [CARDS-51629]

    • The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51641]

    • Added the [Saved Limits] link to the "Acnt Balance" form. It allows saved limits to be viewed for balance types without History mode and with the USAGE=BALANCE; parameter in the "Posting Details" field.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51689]

    • MIN_BILLING parameter default behaviour has been changed.

  • [CARDS-51701]

    • Additional checks have been added to Client Type: client type code and name should be unique within one financial institution.

  • [CARDS-51710]

    • The BILLING_DAY contract parameter has now the highest priority for calculating Billing Date for Monthly billing.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51725]

    • To copy a Billing Date from the top contract to Sub-liab contracts when the Billing Date is recalculated for the top contract, the tag value RECALC_BILLING=COPY_TO_LIAB_SUBS; should be used.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51796]

    • Added creation of a Process Log when the "Recalc ALL" action is started from the OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Billing Cycle form.

  • [CARDS-51839]

    • Validation for billing interval type in Account Scheme and in Date Scheme has been added.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51876]

    • Increased performance for the menu "OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Quarterly Contract Groups Update".

  • [CARDS-51921]

    • For OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types, the "Delete" action has been enhanced with additional checks before removal.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Events.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51981]

    • Problem with setting version attribute and INT_TRF tag for an Accounting Scheme has been corrected in situations when there are no contracts and normalization orders for this scheme.

  • [CARDS-51986]

    • Fixed bug that caused an "Account Scheme" to be approved even if it had not changed (if the "Account Scheme" uses accounts for which the "Send Debit To" or "Send Credit To" field in the account type is not null).

  • [CARDS-52039]

    • Balance type recalculation for liability contract hierarchy has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52041]

    • Additional validation has been added for NSPK report parameters in "Financial Institutions" .

  • [CARDS-52164]

    • Display of balance amounts after performing the balance prediction procedure has been corrected in WAY4 Web. Cache clearing has been added.

  • [CARDS-52352]

    • BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52368]

    • Liability device contracts can now be created from the standard form (OpenWay\Acquiring\Acquiring Contracts\Acquiring Contracts).

  • [CARDS-52384]

    • A new API has been added, acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT_EXT. The API extends acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT with the ClientCategory input parameter. Both APIs acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT(_EXT) now have different RetCode/RetMsg error values: 1/Client not found 2/Too many Clients were found 3/Client number conversion error 100/Internal error ORA-xxxxxx For the old acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT API, search results have changed. If more than one client was found, the API returns null as ClientID and an error in RetCode.

  • [CARDS-52528]

    • Creation of transit macrotransactions has been fixed for 3-level financial institution hierarchies and the global parameter NEW_INTERBRANCH_ROUTING=Y.

  • [CARDS-52536]

    • The "Liab Category" field has been made available for editing in the Device Contract form. On contract Approve, if the value in the "Liab Category" field from the Product and the value from the current contract are different, the corresponding message with the text "Switch Liability Category to <>" will be generated in the Process Log for this contract.

  • [CARDS-52662]

    • Reversal transactions have been excluded from the XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf report.

    Updated Manuals: [rf_reporting\250\Form_250.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52766]

    • Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.

  • [CARDS-52815]

    • Fixed lengthy execution of the approve process for related acquiring contracts.

  • [CARDS-52893]

    • New tags MIN_BAL_TYPE_SIGN/MAX_BAL_TYPE_SIGN have been supported for use together with MIN_BAL_TYPE/MAX_BAL_TYPE and LIMIT_AMOUNT tags.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52909]

    • The extra letter "E" has been removed from combined error messages.

  • [CARDS-53036]

    • Behaviour of the FIRST_BILLING and MIN_BILLING=C tags has been enhanced.

  • [CARDS-53039]

    • Problem when no changes occurred after using the "Change" button in the "Attached Tariff Domains" form has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-53106]

    • Temporary Credit Limits now are closed in the order in which they were opened.

  • [CARDS-53283]

    • Each ITEM_DUE is now processed separately in Acquiring products configuration. Previously, using a Due Type other then Value Days Due could cause a collapse of several ITEM_DUE with different signs, leading to incorrect information in Merchant Statement reports.

  • [CARDS-53693]

    • Corrected fee amount calculation for authorizations when an additional fee is taken by a limiter.

  • [CARDS-53710]

    • Masked document tags containing sensitive data when viewing them through the [All Tags] link. Custom tags can be configured to be masked in the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\System Utilities\Tagged Data Objects".

  • [CARDS-53716]

    • Remove checking duration type for Events with the CLS code.

  • [CARDS-53774]

    • Fixed balance amount calculation for Balance Type with BY_CURR tag specified in Standing Order.

  • [CARDS-53809]

    • Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54097]

    • A new custom procedure, CUST_RECALC_BILLING has been added for custom actions after changing the billing date for the main contract.

  • [CARDS-54249]

    • Added a new check in the Product approve procedure. Now all accounting contracts for a multi-currency Product should have a default priority specified. If the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y is set in the top Product, accounting sub-products should have the SIBLING_PRIORITY tag filled.

  • [CARDS-54486]

    • Fixed system behaviour for balance type with history mode: after using backdated processing functionality, MAX amount counter calculation has been corrected.

  • [CARDS-54539]

    • Corrected system behaviour for balance type with history mode = Billing when saving history records if billing falls on the second day of the year and the first day is a holiday.

  • [CARDS-54626]

    • During the Financial Institution Init Settings (Copy) process, references to products are restored after copying all the products.

  • [CARDS-55111]

    • Corrected Oracle hint for API acnt_api.LEAVE_LAST_N_RECORDS().

  • [CARDS-55727]

    • Deleted some obsolete objects to prevent undesirable use of unsupported functionality. This has been done for future compatibility with the new Contract Parameter approach.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56305]

    • Fixed the error message ORA-06502 when reading the INT_GROUP tag from the "Template Details" field

  • [CARDS-56478]

    • Extended collecting information about System Instances into statistic CMS group "PARMS", node "INSTANCE_ROLE" with current schema name and schema roles.

  • [CARDS-56706]

    • Corrected custom fee amount inheritance from an authorization document for adjustment documents in SMS mode, when "FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT;" tag is used in the corresponding custom fee.

  • [CARDS-56774]

    • Fixed creation of Interbranch Routing records between source and target financial institutions when copying Interbranch Routing from the source institution to the target institution.

  • [CARDS-57378]

    • Fixed error which can lead to "ORA-06531: Reference to uninitialized collection".

  • [CARDS-58439]

    • Changed algorithm of contract redefinition by Contract Role. Actual Contract Role defined on each contract level or its product level is used now for both Main-Sub and Liability hierarchies. Previously, only contract level role was used only for liability hierarchy. Refers to keywords like CONTRACT_FOR, FEE_CONTRACT, IF_CS_TYPE_FOR, IF_PARM_FOR etc. with the value - "CONTRACT_ROLE". Simplified keywords for contract redefinition in different places, like CONTRACT_FOR, FEE_CONTRACT, IF_CS_TYPE_FOR, IF_PARM_FOR etc. For contract redefinition by contract roles, composite tag value should be used instead of using of two separate tags. For example tag value "CONTRACT_FOR=CONTRACT_ROLE:ROLE1;" should be used instead of two tags "CONTRACT_FOR=CONTRACT_ROLE;CONTRACT_ROLE=ROLE1;". For contract redefinition by liability categories, composite tag value should be used instead of using of two separate tags. For example tag value "CONTRACT_FOR=LIABILITY_CATEGORY:N;" should be used instead of two tags "CONTRACT_FOR=LIAB_CATEGORY;LIAB_CATEGORY=N;"

  • [CARDS-58695]

    • Supported handling of WRONG_APPLY_ORDER exception on primary node syncronization in distributed processing configuration during standard parallel processes.

  • [I1502035325]/[CARDS-53566]

    • "Service Approved" form for WAY4 Manager has been fixed.

  • [I1610179670]/[CARDS-50722]

    • Added reset of environment variables (global parameters, cached data when posting events, contracts, etc.) when a session is initialized.

  • [I1611249741]/[CARDS-52334]

    • FX rate definition for multicurrency limit normalization has been fixed according to corresponding Posting Date.

  • [I1612046735]/[CARDS-52303]

    • For the "test script import" pipe, search for a CLIENT_TYPE value for the APPL_CLIENT.CLT tag has been modified, now only financial institution is checked.

  • [I1701109043]/[CARDS-56360]

    • Fixed rounding of "BASE_RATE" and "FX_MARKUP_PCT" tag values in DCC Info Inquire documents when default DCC conversion mode "IPS" is used.

  • [I1702061012]/[CARDS-52491]

    • Character buffer overflow error message generation when approving Service Packages with long name values has been fixed.

  • [I1703017366]/[CARDS-52374]

    • When an event is posted for a contract, the last CDU date is not checked for events that change contract status.

  • [I1703024740]/[CARDS-52378]

    • Standing order amount calculation has been fixed for cases when an order's posting date is earlier than the current banking date, and when the order's minimum and maximum amount currency differs from the account currency.

  • [I1704037380]/[CARDS-53331]

    • If the "Current Grace Date" is requested via the bal_log.CURRENT_GRACE_DATE function, the system returns the value of the contract date "Full Payment Date" (FP_DATE, stored in ACNT_LOG.trg_date_5). To override the returned value for the bal_log.CURRENT_GRACE_DATE function, store the required value in the trg_date_4 field of the ACNT_LOG table.

  • [I1704121197]/[CARDS-52967]

    • Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created on February 28 of any non-leap year has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.

  • [I1704189347]/[CARDS-52998]

    • Fixed double fee charging in issuing contracts for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT is used in basic transaction service setup) when the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.

  • [I1704206572]/[CARDS-52902]

    • Fixed excessive creation of subcontracts on contract approve when a sub-product is configured with "# of contracts" greater than zero and filled relation fields.

  • [I1704207687]/[CARDS-52889]

    • Performance of the Renew Account Scheme Changes procedure has been improved when the system validates the payment priority algorithm for an upper limit template.

  • [I1704281513]/[CARDS-53814]

    • Supplementary order processing has been enhanced.

  • [I1705264265]/[CARDS-54295]

    • Fixed first cycle history initialization for balance types with History Mode = "Billing (After Close)" and "Billing (Before closing)". Corrected system behaviour when saving history records if billing falls on the first day of year.

  • [I1705317060]/[CARDS-53408]

    • Intermediate commits have been added to contract subtype and contract type check processes. The commit interval can be configured using process parameters. The default commit interval is 100 records.

  • [I1706260734]/[CARDS-54119]

    • To consolidate positive and negative Due Amounts from several Due Items for an acquiring product's accounts, the REFRESH_DUE tag should be set in the corresponding account templates. This tag should not be used for templates involved in per-transaction Merchant Payment Statements. By default, Due Amounts are never consolidated into one Due Normalization for acquiring products.

  • [I1709067810]/[CARDS-55097]

    • Restored the initial the behaviour of cards_reports.GET_ACC_GL_BAL() API. Now it returns GL turnover amounts from gl_transfer without the order_status filter.

  • [I1710173941]/[CARDS-55199]

    • Fixed issue. Now in "Balance Prediction" functionality, interest that has already been paid is excluded from the resulting amount for prediction on the current cycle date.

  • [I1710257336]/[CARDS-55494]

    • Fixed incorrect system behaviour: when using the "Duplicate" action in the Service screen, the amendment reference for the new record was not updated.

  • [I1711139617]/[CARDS-55559]

    • Increased the size of the copied account name in an account template to 200 symbols when adding a settlement currency (in the "FX Scheme" screen).

  • [I1801164595]/[CARDS-56775]

    • Enhanced GL closure process.

  • [I1801214843]/[CARDS-56662]

    • Fixed Oracle error "numeric overflow" on Service Pack Approval.

  • [I1803134990]/[CARDS-57133]

    • Corrected Interest Calculation for Interest Scheme = "-360" and Interest Delay = Yes when turnover is present for the last day of February.

  • [I1804102146]/[CARDS-57429]

    • Restored default behaviour for regular standing payment orders and regular fees with the tag CALENDAR_TYPE=<Special Calendar Type>;. The problem appeared for Daily Upgrade\Downgrade Orders, posted from the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Daily Procedures\Start of Day Step By Step\Daily Standing Payment Orders", and for those regular orders and fees that should be posted on Evening Contracts Daily Update.

  • [NET-133]/[CARDS-56568]

    • Fixed incorrect calculation of the active address for temporary addresses with the same start or end period date.

  • [NP-82, I1804115426]/[CARDS-57607]

    • Corrected situation with fatal error "Trace stack overflow" generation on CDU when DEBUG_LEVEL=TRACE is used.

  • [CARDS-51495]

    • Reports XLS_CB_f250_1.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf: - Added count of contactless cards, transactions and devices. - Supported consolidated report for all financial organization branches. - Supported counting of cards with only 2 groups: debit/credit.

    Updated Manuals: [rf_reporting\250\Form_250.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53819]

    • Currency overrides are supported in the standard form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\Currency_Conversion.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54686]

    • Currency Table: Exponent for Chilean Peso and Uganda Shilling has been changed from 2 to 0 in the standard configuration.

  • [CARDS-54712]

    • Sending information about account closing to IPS has been added to the card contract status change procedure. Contract status codes should be configured in the ABU_CONTR_CLOSED_CODES global parameter (can be configured for a financial institution) to trigger information sending when the appropriate status is set. Information is only sent for contracts that have the ABU=Y tag configured in the contract subtype.

    Updated Manuals: [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55466]

    • Added IPS MCX (Multicaixa). Added "MCX" channels with the "N" character and "Our MCX Cards" with the "n" character.

  • [CARDS-56814]

    • Implemented message sending about card enrolment in the ABU service by changing the "ABU" classifier value from "N" to "Y".

  • [I1704204444]/[CARDS-53062]

    • A new message channel with "Z" code has been registered for BELKART payment system and a message channel with "z" code has been registered for Our BELKART Cards. BELKART has been added to the Standard Handbook PAYMENT_SYSTEM list. BELKART card products have been added to the IPS product list.

    Core banking interface

  • [CARDS-53805]

    • The necessary privilege to execute CARDS_PIPES package procedures has been added for RBS. Payments Import pipe.

  • [CARDS-54450]

    • Fixed ORA-01747 error during "empty" Assignment menu subitem execution in Scheduler.

  • [CARDS-56560]

    • Fixed error processing for zero rates loading. Added a new error category "Insert FX Error" for inserting error messages. RBS FX Rates Import, RBS FX Rates Import for future.

  • [CARDS-56871]

    • Supported contract number masking with the MASK_PAN parameter. Possible values are Y/N ("Y" = mask PAN. The default value is "N").

  • [I1609226977]/[CARDS-51687]

    • RBS Document Import: fixed response file for import file after previous unsuccessful import.

  • [I1703209597]/[CARDS-52654]

    • Pipe RBS. Transactions Export (Batching): Fixed generation of duplicate empty files for a future date.

  • [I1705113768]/[CARDS-53779]

    • Supported Misc Fee data export in plain and UFX file formats for bank branches.

  • [I1707179843]/[CARDS-54270]

    • FPLP: Fixed Batch Approve result processing. Now Warnings are not processed as errors during FPLP process. Added tracing for FPLP.

  • [I1710189537]/[CARDS-55554]

    • RBS. Documents Export: Added checking length of transaction code.

  • [PRIOR-120]/[CARDS-57550]

    • Fixed an issue when a dispute macrotransaction was processed by the IC Documents Export pipe as non-dispute if the account code was not "D"', but this was actually a dispute account (category = "Dispute").

  • [PRIOR-79]/[CARDS-57583]

    • Fixed error when "IC Document Export" pipe does not export some messages if "NUM_DOCS_PER_FILE" and "INCREMENTAL_EXPORT"=Y pipe parameters are set and two messages, which corresponds to one document, are splitted between outgoing files.

  • [CARDS-55190]

    • Old RBS. Documents Import, Old RBS. Payments Import, Old RBS. Transaction Slips Import. Added pipe parameter DAYS_BETWEEN. This is the max number of days between File Creation Date and current date. Old files will be rejected.

  • [CARDS-56701]

    • Adjusted CBS Document Import/Export pipes for reason_code extension. Reason code part before the first comma in the field or up to the 4 first digits is used.

    Customer profile

  • [CARDS-53839]

    • Fixed issue. Now the "Client Template Details" form in the "Customer Profile\Operations" menu shows sensitive attributes as masked and non-editable. To comply with PA-DSS requirements, a service attribute which can contain PAN should inherit its value from a sensitive dynamic handbook parameter or be directly marked as sensitive by the SENSITIVE=Y tag in the Additional Data field.

    Updated Manuals: [customer_profile\Configuring_WAY4_Customer_Profile.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55880]

    • Changed behaviour. Now Customer Profile Handbook checks that the filtering item code exists. An error message will be returned if this code does not exist in the filtering handbook.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56101]

    • Corrected wrong activation date calculation for recurrent templates after editing.

    Customer service workbench

  • [CARDS-52038]

    • A new CLIENT_ADDRESSES view has been created to show all addresses for a client and its contracts. The old CLIENT_ADDRESS_DATA view should be replaced in all customizations and Web Services. It will be removed in future versions.

  • [CARDS-56896]

    • Fixed incorrect default attribute names used for client context search.

    Customer/account management

  • [CARDS-57738]

    • Added the ability to reissue supplementary cards together with the main card if the product line was changed. Refer to manuals for required configuration changes.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-43148]

    • Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details.rdf" report for using the report with Way4Web.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Merchant_Statements.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51408]

    • In the "Contract_Analytic_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports an option has been added to show purchases made using loyalty bonuses in the separate section.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51963]

    • Added a new procedure cust_cms_stat() for gathering custom statistical information in the gather CMS statistics process.

  • [CARDS-51973]

    • Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" and "Merchant Contract Statement" reports for using these reports with Way4Web.

  • [CARDS-52075]

    • "Currency", "Available", "Blocked", "Credit limit" fields have been added to the "OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service-> [Related] form.

  • [CARDS-53024]

    • The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad: -%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N indicating sibling order transaction. -%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53235]

    • Authorization requests for cards with multiple relations will be rejected if no contract exists with the specified relation and the SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT global parameter is set to 'N'. Authorization advices and financial presentments will be processed for the default relation contract.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53732]

    • In a multiple relation configuration, if no relation is specified in an authorization document, the default contract will be chosen even if the global parameter SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT is set to 'N'.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [I111106223]/[CARDS-29382]

    • A new parameter has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" report: P_HIDE_FEE_CONDITION, varchar(4000). The default value is "1=2". The parameter only works if P_SHOW_CUSTOM_FEE=Y. Use the parameter to hide fee amounts (convert fee amount to zero) in the transactions section.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50683]

    • Fixed an issue in which clients remained not approved after running contract hierarchy approval in structures with top liability and sub-liability contracts. Clients for all subordinate contracts are checked when approving a contract.

  • [CARDS-51517]

    • Amounts for reversal and adjustment operations in report "Cardholder Account Statement" have now been changed: amounts of these operations are similar to the amounts of Cardholder Contract Statement report.

  • [CARDS-52263]

    • Standard CUST_STATE_STR_TO_LOG procedure has been changed: duplication of records during contract balance prediction logging has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-57851]

    • Corrected check for active authentication schemes before erasure of client personal data.

  • [CARDS-58041]

    • GDPR: Added a check that a valid period is configured for closing clients with a closed contract before starting the process. If parameters are not valid, the process will not be launched.

  • [CARDS-58552]

    • In report Cardholder_Contract_Statement increased dimension from 10 to 30 numbers for amount fields.

  • [I1611104436]/[CARDS-51596]

    • Increased the precision of reading FX rates for macrotransactions to 12 digits for use in screen forms and reports.

  • [I1704055286]/[CARDS-52802]

    • In the customer service "CSS.Client" form, which can be called from OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service -> [Client], the "Service Group" field from the contract has been replaced with the "Service Group" field from the client.

  • [I1704129756]/[CARDS-54082]

    • Optimized WAY4Manager Customer Support Screen to decrease tab opening time.

  • [I1707314157]/[CARDS-54433]

    • Fixed string buffer overflow in API - acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0.

  • [I1708219196]/[CARDS-54566]

    • WAY4Manager form for Memo Messages have been synchronized with DBM form.

  • [NET-140]/[CARDS-57867]

    • Changed the algorithm for creating client/contract address lists and logic for transliterating addresses so that addresses are no longer shown multiple times in WAY4 Web screens and in DB Manager/WAY4 Manager forms. See Client Upgrade Notes for additional information.

    DB kernel

  • [DBK-3011]

    • Added support of filling dm_record_lf collections with SingleSql mode. See more details in the manuals.

    Updated Manuals: [housekeeping\housekeeping.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51885]

    • Chip card data processing has been optimised for partitioned storage.

  • [I1704191220]/[DBK-2741]

    • Eliminated TX index contention in the DM_RECORD table by introducing hash partitioning for the PK_DM_RECORD index. To get the index rebuilt, the DM_RECORD table has to be redefined using the WAY4 Redefinition tool.

  • [I1705030523]/[DBK-2733]

    • Eliminated cluster waits on selecting from SY_HANDBOOK.

  • [CARDS-52983]

    • Fixed the possibility of infinite loop on BER-TLV tag parsing.

  • [CARDS-55436]

    • Fixed WAY4Web client context data synchronisation process problem which could lead to deadlocks in documents posting process.

  • [DBK-1945]

    • Fixed TRACEFILE_IDENTIFIER process parameter. It now works correctly with parallel jobs.

  • [DBK-2466]

    • Fixed bug in which parallel jobs were removed when a node of Oracle RAC that was used to start jobs was stopped. Now the jobs can be automatically restarted on another node of Oracle RAC if an appropriate service is configured.

  • [DBK-2644]

    • All java classes running within Oracle JVM will be recompiled in order to avoid internal Oracle JVM exceptions.

  • [DBK-2836]

    • Corrected work of functions SUBTRACT_LIST_ITEMS_D, ADD_LIST_ITEMS_D in sy_convert package with delimiters other than ";".

  • [DBK-3012]

    • IPM Inward Processing. Removed DE55 format error messages from Process Log.

  • [DBK-3332]

    • Added a new global parameter, DM_ID_CACHE_LEN. This parameter defines the size of cache of dm_record.id values. The default value is 20. Increase this value if row lock contention on num_seq_range occurs during high volume of inserting into dm_record.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [DBK-3466]

    • Removed unnecessary "enabling constraints" step for Secondary node upgrade procedure.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\ha_cluster\HA_Cluster_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\Stand-in\Stand-In_operation.pdf]

  • [I1612278687]/[DBK-2428]

    • Non-periodic parallel process now processes Suspend and Resume correctly.

  • [I1705101042]/[CARDS-53222]

    • Fixed event messages display in the "Messages" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types).

  • [I1804302340]/[DBK-3816]

    • Fixed incorrect record reprocessing on exceptions in parallel processes.

  • [CARDS-51765]

    • Updated Main Technical Requirements: minimum hardware requirements for running Reports software have been updated to 2 CPU, 4 Gb RAM. A new manual, system/ows_OracleReports12Setup.html has been added.

    Updated Manuals: DB Kernel | Cards Technical Requirements

  • [CARDS-53785]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Disk Encryption section has been added (disk encryption is used when there is no Oracle Advanced Security option).

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

  • [DBK-3208]

    • Changed the pipe com.openwaygroup.pipe.write_audit_log_file.jar output to syslog (rfc5424) format.

    DB manager

  • [DBK-3021]

    • Migrated DB Manager to a new PowerBuilder version.

  • [CARDS-52991]

    • DDDW domain with name "tariff_group__l" has been renamed to "tariff_group__lf". DBManager does not support work with non-unique codes of tariff types.

  • [CARDS-53163]

    • Fixed inability to add elements to several Exception Lists (OpenWay\Risk Based Assessment\Exception lists) without reopening the sub-form.

  • [DBK-2442]

    • Fixed misspelling in the "Terminate Jobs" action name in the "Process Log" form.

  • [I1710042561]/[DBK-3192]

    • Fixed issue with VISA BaseII/MasterCard IPM/AMEX GNS Inward: now all uncritical format errors are not logged in Process Log.

  • [I1802198432]/[DBK-3570]

    • Changed behaviour. Now the Batch Report engine doesn't transfer the P_CONNID parameter to Oracle Report Server.

    DB migration

  • [DBK-1512]

    • Fixed Redefinition tool GUI.

    Data preparation and card personalization

  • [CARDS-51365]

    • Amex Express Pay supported in Data Preparation.

  • [CARDS-51655]

    • A new option, "ICC Key Generation Mode" is supported in Security Calculation and ICC Keys Pregeneration.

  • [CARDS-51809]

    • Pregenerated ICC Keys encrypted under transport key KEK can be stored now in the corresponding common Perso Bureau ICC Keys Pool.

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52253]

    • Perso Bureau entity is supported in PIN Management. Transport keys (KEK and PEK) can be specified under the new Perso Bureau entity.

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\administrator_manuals\Card_Production_Setup.pdf] [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52601]

    • Data standard configuration for MIR contactless cards was updated.

  • [PMPIPES-78]

    • Added support to generate 3DES keys in Thales Keyblock format for the "DES Key management" pipe.

  • [I108057036]/[PMPIPES-54]

    • Added information about type of LMK for the "Test HSM" feature. Added support to migrate keys from Thales Variant LMK encoding to Thales Keyblock LMK encoding. Added a new storage form, "HSM / Host / Keyblock Hex".

  • [CARDS-48517]

    • Views V_PREGEN_KEY_TOTALS and V_PERGEN_KEYS_SETUP have been added to work with pre-generated keys.

  • [CARDS-49646]

    • The RSA EMV Key Management pipe no longer shows the Folder Selection dialog. Instead, the pipe shows a File Selection dialog with a list of all suitable files (if the SOURCE_DIR parameter is set) or selects the first suitable file from DEFAULT_PATH (if DEFAULT_PATH is set and SOURCE_DIR is not set).

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51891]

    • All pregenerated ICC keys will now be stored in separate tables.

  • [CARDS-52510]

    • BF09 format has been changed in Chip Scheme Template "NSPC MIR Generic" for MIR Contactless support.

  • [CARDS-52653]

    • The CHCVV option is supported for all CVV encoding methods.

  • [CARDS-52715]

    • TRACK1_DDF and TRACK2_DDF default values have been added for UPI/CUP cards.

  • [CARDS-53585]

    • The menu item "OpenWay\EMV Smart Cards\Card Production\RSA ICC keys PRE-generation\RSA ICC keys PRE-generation" has been updated to show new ICC key pregeneration form.

  • [CARDS-53998]

    • Views V_PREGEN_KEY_TOTALS and V_PERGEN_KEYS_SETUP have been added to work with pre-generated keys.

  • [CARDS-54627]

    • Added new Contactless IAC parameters (tags 9F0D / 9F0E / 9F0F) to the "NSPC MIR Generic" chip scheme template.

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54866]

    • Added EMV categories: 'UPI additional' and 'EMV contactless'.

  • [CARDS-54867]

    • New "Issuer Script Parameter Types" have been added for Contactless IAC (tags 9F0D / 9F0E / 9F0F) definition.

  • [CARDS-54868]

    • Added new Contactless IAC parameters (tags 9F0D / 9F0E / 9F0F) to the "NSPC MIR Generic" chip scheme template.

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55929]

    • Added new categorised parameters to the "MCHIP 4 Generic with PayPass" and "MCHIP Advance Generic CVR 1.x" Chip Scheme templates.

  • [PMPIPES-52]

    • Added the ability to support different values for tags 9F0E, 9F0D, 9F0F on contact and contactless interfaces for MIR Contactless

  • [PMPIPES-64]

    • Added validation for Chip Scheme Parameter values. If the value does not correspond to the defined format, a warning message will be stored in the Process Log. Pipe operation will be interrupted.

  • [CARDS-52214]

    • Changed Guice configuration in "Cryptogram Validation" pipe.

  • [CARDS-54319]

    • Redesigned the algorithm for defining a hierarchy of applications for loading into one plastic. Now a hierarchy of applications with different expiry dates and sequence numbers can be joined in one plastic.

  • [PMPIPES-56]

    • Pm_Parms in the 'Not Ready' state will be skipped from processing by the "PM RSA ICC Keys Pre Generator" pipe with the corresponding warning message in the Process Log.

  • [I1701174900]/[CARDS-52797]

    • Corrected behaviour when the system wasn't able to upload DF3C and DF3D tags to a personalization file.

  • [I1704265122]/[CARDS-53279]

    • DF32, DF33, DF34, DF36, DF3A tags definition added to Chip Scheme Parameters Usability.

  • [I1804195273]/[PMPIPES-89]

    • Disabled counting of ICC keys expected for card production. Warning messages about ICC pre-generated keys absence have been disabled.

  • [I1806017418]/[PMPIPES-103]

    • ADD_INFO_* parameters length verification is added for pipe "PM File Export". Result value length of parameter substitution must be less or equal to 255 symbols.

  • [CARDS-52785]

    • Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "List of Third-Party Software Used, System Services and Protocols Used" has been changed. Added a warning that the mod_security component is an essential part of the application with regard to security.

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

  • [CARDS-57311]

    • Changed the licenses list for EMV card production.

    Updated Manuals: Data preparation and card personalization | Requirements

  • [CARDS-54089]

    • Global ICC Key Pools have been supported in the PIN Management module.

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54090]

    • Support for working with different Perso Bureaus has been introduced in the PIN Management module.

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\administrator_manuals\Card_Production_Setup.pdf] [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\emv_smart_cards\EMV_Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

    • Export MasterCard PayPass MagStripe CVC3 Validation Key suppored in MC OBKM pipe.
