    Datamart

  • [CARDS-50363]

    • Added a new configuration group with the "LIMIT" code (OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Configuration Groups) for all classifiers related to DWF_CONTRACT_LIMIT mapping.

  • [CARDS-51888]

    • A new form, "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been created for the new table, mp_ps_member_bin; a link to "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been added to the "Mp Payment Scheme Identification" form.

    Updated Manuals: Datamart | Datamart_WAY4_Settings.pdf [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52308]

    • In WAY4 Datamart version 03.45.10, new FI Group Load functionality for performing several loads to Datamart (ETLs) for one banking date has been supported. The fi_load_group tag should be put in f_i.special_parms to configure financial institution groups to be loaded during a certain ETL. The mp_fi_load_group table and forms for filling in the fi_load_group tag in f_i.special_parms has been added from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30.

    Updated Manuals: [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_Administration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52356]

    • Created the following menu items in the WAY4 Cards menu "OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping" and removed them from the file "\db\scripts\oracle\dwh\opt_cards_objects\HEAD\client\menu\DWH_WAY4_objects_mapping.UPG": "Products Mapping Step by Step", "Account Mapping Step by Step", "Account Types", "Datamart Scope Mapping Update".

  • [CARDS-52554]

    • Corrected Process Messages for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type. They no longer mention WAY4 Datamart. Starting from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30, the POINT_TYPE tag in the mp_consist_type.add_info field is expected to differentiate consistency points used by WAY4 Datamart (POINT_TYPE tag with the "DM" value) and those used by WAY4 Cards (POINT_TYPE tag has the "C" value). For WAY4 Cards version 03.44.30, mention of WAY4 Datamart has been excluded for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type.

    Updated Manuals: [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_Administration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52561]

    • Drop-down list sources have been modified for Payment scheme identification (Payment scheme list) and Payment scheme member BINs (Card category code) forms.

  • [CARDS-52597]

    • Added Datamart-related menu items OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\FI Load Groups\FI Load Groups (list of FI groups and their consistency points) and OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\FI Load Groups\Set DM Load Group for FI (set FI group for FI).

    Updated Manuals: [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_Administration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53141]

    • The Consistency Types form for ETL to Datamart has now an editable option for loading by financial institution groups.

    Updated Manuals: [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_Administration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53600]

    • Added functions containing standard DWD_CARD_BRAND and DWD_CARD_CTEGORY mapping logic to the DWH_MAPPING package.

  • [DBK-2539]

    • Excluded tables with predefined name prefix "two or three letters, two underscore symbols" from checksum calculation.

  • [CARDS-52160]

    • Description of mp_etl_parm for parameter with value_type = 'GATHER' and scope 'STAT' in mp_etl_parm has been changed.

  • [CARDS-52722]

    • The following menu items have been renamed: OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Lock DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Lock Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Release DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Release Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Lock DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Lock Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Release DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Release Datamart Mapping The OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface menu branch is only provided to customers with the corresponding license. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact changes" section for more details.

    Updated Manuals: Datamart | Datamart_WAY4_Settings.pdf

  • [CARDS-54604]

    • Now adding consistency points after manual editing consistency types (and thus producing new historical records in mp_consist_type) works correctly.

  • [CARDS-58387]

    • Fixed Card Category and Card Brand standard mapping logic to avoid creation of duplicate records in case Product is already manually mapped.

  • [I1803025962]/[DBK-3798]

    • Corrected the query in the [Processes] link of the "Scheduler Monitor" form to improve performance.

  • [CARDS-54963]

    • DCI IPSE Export: fixed negative transaction amounts export in Transaction File. Now F111 (Transaction Amount) always contains unsigned value. The sign is defined in F127 (Debit/Credit Flag).

  • [CARDS-55123]

  • [CARDS-55128]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed balances calculation. Now the pipe considers only "Amount Available" accounts.

  • [CARDS-55215]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of the "Record Type" field for an Account File if the pipe parameter ACC_LVL_FOR_BAL is set.

  • [CARDS-55418]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of "SIC Code" and "Merchant Specific Code" fields in TRA file. Now if SIC code has a value between 3000 and 3999, it is put in the "Merchant Specific Code" field, otherwise in the "SIC Code" field.

  • [CARDS-55433]

    • Fixed processing ARN filter for historical data import. DCI Clearing Import, DCI Inward Processing.

  • [CARDS-57001]

    • Added the LOAD_CLR parameter (default value is "Y") for the com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing.jar pipe run by the menu item "OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Issuer Detail File Inward Processing". The parameter prevents loading clearing documents when its value is "N".

    • DCI Outward: Fixed duplicate batch trailer export.

  • [CARDS-53713]

    Updated Manuals: [diners_club_interface\Diners_Interface.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53769]

    • Supported processing DCI Card Production Confirmation file and storing information from this file in the process log.

  • [CARDS-54266]

    • DCI MPE Import, CPF Acquirer Import. Supported DCI Card Products codes C and D in default value for pipe parameters PRODUCT2AFS_MAP and PRODUCT2PTI_MAP.

  • [CARDS-54413]

    • DCI IPSE Export. Fixed filling "Information Products File Name" field in the Control file.

  • [CARDS-54636]

    • Implemented loading of historical data. Three new parameters have been added to the pipes com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.clearing_import.jar and com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing: - HISTORY_MODE=Y/N (the default value is "N") - pipe's mode of operation. If HISTORY_MODE=Y, data from an incoming file are loaded without addendums and with outward status="History" . - HIST_ARN_LIST - ARN filter (list of ARN with commas as delimiters) for historical documents. The parameter only works if HISTORY_MODE=Y. If the ARN of a processed document is included in this list, the document is downloaded. If HIST_ARN_LIST is empty and HISTORY_MODE =Y, all documents from the incoming file are downloaded as historical documents. - HISTORY_POSTING=Y/N (the default value is "N"). If HISTORY_POSTING=Y, an attempt to post a downloadable document is made.

  • [CARDS-54752]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization point for "Last Billing Date" field in Accounts File.

  • [CARDS-54754]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization point for "Expiration Date" field in Accounts File.

  • [CARDS-54769]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization point for "Last Purchase Date", "Last Payment Date", and "Last Payment Amount" fields in Balance File.

  • [CARDS-54941]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Supported filling Transaction File fields "Record of Charge/Ticket No." and "Supplemental Information" from Airline Addendum.

  • [CARDS-54962]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization points for Account Number fields in Accounts and Balance files. Added the ACC_CONNECT_BY parameter for additional account filtration.

  • [CARDS-55113]

    • Removed CARD_CONTRACT_TYPE pipe parameter as deprecated.

  • [CARDS-56453]

    • Removed EMPTY field from Recap Header Message (rollbacked issue CARDS-42749). DCI Outwards Processing, DCI Clearing Import.

  • [I1704129157]/[CARDS-52876]

    • DCI MPE (Sys Ops XML File) Import: Supported loading Product Id, Account Funding Source and Product Category fields in BIN Table. Added DCI products to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).

    Updated Manuals: [diners_club_interface\Diners_Interface.pdf]

    Dispute assistant

    • The "Dispute Assistant" menu has been renamed to "Dispute Assistant R1 OBSOLETE". The "Dispute Assistant CM"/"CM Dispute Assistant" menu has been renamed to "Dispute Assistant R2".

    • Dispute Assistant v2. Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain.

    • Fixed posting of secondary documents, now when an optional document is reversed, the previous document status is not restored.

  • [CARDS-53060]

    • Supported processing of a Retrieval Request with zero Transaction Amount.

  • [CARDS-53484]

    • Dispute Assistant v2: Suppressed Automatic Final Write-Off for zero summary balances.

  • [CARDS-53800]

    • Enhanced dispute documents matching. When a duplicate dispute document is processed, the DSP_DUPL=Y tag is set in the document. Matching of reclassified chargebacks will check the mandatory reason code change, and can be turned off for different payment systems using the global parameter DSP_RECLASSIFIED_CBKS_% with the "N" value, where % is the channel code. A document with the DSP_DUPL=Y tag will initiate a separate case in Dispute Assistant.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] Dispute Management

  • [CARDS-54197]

    • DA R2: Fixed invalid case amounts when a Credit Reversal is processed.

  • [CARDS-54246]

    • DA R2. Fixed duplicate call procedure to calculate amounts for secondary documents if they are opened to edit several times.

  • [CARDS-54393]

    • Dispute Assistant R2: Fixed wrong bank balance and representment amount calculation on acquirer side when there is a first presentment reversal before chargeback.

  • [CARDS-54644]

    • Dispute Assistant R2: Added menu "ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Setup" for access to Case Management setup.

  • [CARDS-54711]

    • The "Add Info" field has been added to the W4M "Reply Doc" form opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Cbk/Rpr" and "Doc-Brief ->Pt Cbk/Rpr", and to the W4M "Reversal Doc" form, opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Reverse".

  • [CARDS-55547]

    • DA R2. Fixed function to check Fraud Counter. Now this is performed only for Issuing contracts.

  • [CARDS-57278]

    • Fixed an Oracle error appearing in DA R2 when the incoming financial document should be attached to some DA case or initiate a case creation, but this case turns out to be in an invalid state.

  • [CARDS-57425]

    • Removed the WAY4Manager data forms and tasks related to the ADDENDUM_DATA table that is not present in 03.45.30.

  • [CARDS-57541]

    • Fixed the Oracle SQL Error if a transaction Reason Code's length is more than 4 symbols. Note that DA R1 does not support VISA VCR.

  • [CARDS-57786]

    • Fixed an issue when sending of a new document is blocked if a rejected VROL RTSI message document exists under the case. Now rejected VROL RTSI message documents are not taken into consideration during this check.

  • [03.45.30.22]/[CARDS-56660]

    • Fixed processing of a duplicate chargeback document when a presentment reversal was declined. Duplicate chargeback documents are no longer declined in such situations.

  • [I1408182397]/[CARDS-51748]

    • Dispute Assistant v1, v2: Changed MasterCard default type of rate for amount conversion from MDB to MDM.

  • [I1512231114]/[CARDS-53570]

    • Fixed an issue with filling in the "Trans Date" field for Reimbursements. Now the database system date is used for the "Trans Date" field and can be redefined when using the Product Inspector.

  • [I1609086162]/[CARDS-52526]

    • DA v2. Fixed Reimbursement Transaction Amount processing if a reimbursement is created manually.

  • [I1701125638]/[CARDS-53582]

    • Resolved issue: Now dispute documents with fee return can be processed even if the original document's services have been deleted by Housekeeping. If the FEE_RETURN=ALL option is configured, a fee will be returned; in other cases, a document will be processed without fee return.

  • [I1702080846]/[CARDS-52354]

    • DA v2. Fixed settlement amount calculation for credit Second Presentments.

  • [I1702105338]/[CARDS-52777]

    • Fixed creation of duplicate Retail Reimbursements in DA R2: For write-off of a dispute case with a presentment for "No Such Card", if a reimbursement (in this case, write-off of the presentment) is created manually, it won't be created automatically by the standard dispute case write-off procedure.

  • [I1702225414:ISMP 2075322 : MC International CBK are all rejected since MC Release 16.2]/[CARDS-52243]

    • DA v1: Restored channel M (MasterCard International Channel) processing. Only for DA v1!!!

  • [I1703145086]/[CARDS-52516]

    • Changed Target Member Id filling in DA v2. Now Target Member Id is not pre-filled in a created Fee Collection. It is filled during routing search.

  • [I1703175143]/[CARDS-52525]

    • "CM Dispute Assistant" menu item distribution process has been fixed. Now it is uploaded to customers who have a license for Dispute Assistant functionality.

  • [I1703281144]/[CARDS-53100]

    • DA v2: Added checking that data in the document add_info field is properly terminated with a semicolon for documents that are manually edited. If not, a semicolon will be added to the end of the add_info field.

  • [I1704057277]/[CARDS-56472]

    • Added a check for the Object Roles in the Dispute domain ('MAIN', 'ADD_DOC', 'WO_DOC', 'FWO_DOC', 'SAFE_DOC', 'FC_DOC', 'FILE', 'CONTRACT', 'CLIENT', 'IMG_DOC', 'MSG_DOC', and 'SUB_DOC') which are configured via menu item "ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Setup\OpenWay Settings\Case Object Roles" to check the correctness and completeness of a dispute configuration (menu item "ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Dispute Configuration\Check Dispute Configuration").

  • [I1707055765]/[CARDS-54206]

    • Fixed an issue with calculating (predicting) an amount for Partial Second Presentment to prevent an empty result in the amount fields. The calculation algorithm has not been changed.

  • [I1707289866]/[CARDS-55300]

    • DA R2: Fixed reversal processing for No Such Card case. Now reversals will be added under the case. If a reversal is not matched with the first presentment, a new case will be created.

  • [I1709135169]/[CARDS-55245]

    • DA R2: Fixed document "Requirement" field filling for MasterCard Fulfillment - Fee Collection. Now DA sets "Requirement" to "ER1" instead of "1".

  • [I1710100883, I1710100829]/[CARDS-55210]

    • DA R2. Fixed Outgoing Fee Collection processing: added setting tag OUR_CARD in the add_info field of the doc table.

  • [I1801022871]/[CARDS-56471]

    • Disabled the check of a Financial Institution template for the Final Write-Off amounts configuration (ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Dispute Configuration\Dispute Amount Type).

  • [I1801241324]/[CARDS-57194]

    • Added case amounts recalculation to move documents using the "Move Document to another Case" activity in the Dispute Assistant R2 module. Now Dispute Assistant recalculates balances of the source case, so it can be closed without errors.

  • [I1802085465]/[CARDS-56750]

    • Fixed VCR chargebacks processing. Now such chargebacks are added to existing cases regardless of a value of the additional global parameter DSP_CASE_CREATION_MODE.

  • [I1804119057]/[CARDS-57770]

    • Fixed an issue when an incoming chargeback/representment partial reversal does not call the corresponding system activity in DA R2. Now an incoming chargeback partial reversal initiates the "Accepted Chargeback Reversal" activity, and an incoming representment partial reversal initiates the "Accepted Representment Reversal" activity.

  • [I1804124081]/[CARDS-57501]

    • Changed the condition to detect advices (notifications) on dispute documents sent by the payment system on behalf of a client. Now this condition in DA R2 is based on the value of the SENT_BY_TGT=Y; tag set by a particular inward channel module.

  • [I1805315072]/[CARDS-58132]

    • Fixed an error caused by the attempt to create a reimbursement/recovering document in DA R2 for a case without first presentment (e.g. for a case created by the duplicated inward dispute document). Now creating a reimbursement/recovering document for such cases is prohibited, and the proper error message returns.

  • [I1806042330]/[CARDS-58208]

    • Now inline parameters in the activities' ProgramCode do not prevent their correct parsing in the Dispute Assistant R2 module.

  • [I403199808]/[CARDS-52506]

    • Restored the original conditions (that were used before DA v2 was developed) to call DA v1.

  • [CARDS-51624]

    • MasterCard Transaction Management. A warning message and opening a "CHBK_FRAUD_COUNTER" Event have be added for cases when the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded. DA v2. Create Chargeback activity can't be performed if the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded.

  • [CARDS-52048]

    • DA v2: Supported processing of a duplicate secondary document if is matched with an original document.

  • [CARDS-52341]

    • Added a new field EXT_CASE_IDT to all cases in Case Management Dispute Assistant. The field stores the IPS case identifier (e.g. VROL Case Number for VISA). The field can be filled during manual creation of a dispute case or later in the dispute case screen.

  • [CARDS-54531]

    • DA R2: Added use of Trusted Amount in amount pre-calculation for a final chargeback if the first chargeback is for the full transaction amount.

  • [CARDS-54810]

    • Transaction Management: Removed Documentation Indicator check for VISA VCR secondary documents.

  • [CARDS-54855]

    • Supported new Activities in DA R2 which are performed in the VCR Chargeback, Chargeback Reversal, Representment, and Representment Reversal Notification documents posting process. Now these documents are added to the appropriate cases and processed.

    Updated Manuals: [dispute_assistant\Dispute_Assistant_Case_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55026]

    • Supported transaction to case matching for Visa by VROL Case Number. Now if an incoming Visa document must be attached to a case and the case is not found, one more attempt to find the corresponding case is made based on VROL Case Number.

  • [CARDS-56273]

    • Added the "Added Objects" tab for the "Activities" tab in the "CM.DSP.Case.form.xml" form of the Dispute Assistant R2 module.

  • [CARDS-56941]

    • Supported creation of a dispute case by VISA Chargeback Notification (incoming VROL-financials TC33) on the Issuer side if additional global parameter DSP_CASE_CREATION_MODE=AUTO.

  • [CARDS-57375]

    • Changed the way how the "Addendum Type" column is displayed in the "Addendum Data List" and "Addendum Data List Edit" forms in the Dispute Assistant R2 module. Now NAME is displayed instead of CODE for an addendum type.

    Distributed processing

  • [CARDS-49883]

    • Added support of running authorisations in the secondary and back-office in the primary at the same time.

  • [CARDS-51498]

    • Replication Loop for distributed processing is supported in Advanced Applications R2.

  • [DBK-2692]

    • The ability has been added to migrate HA services between nodes in force mode.

    Updated Manuals: [db_kernel\db_replication\DB_Replication_Monitoring.pdf] [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_operation.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51584]

    • Contract state check on contract daily update loop is supported for Distributed Processing configuration.

  • [CARDS-52572]

    • Processing of replicated authorization repeat documents has been enhanced to improve synchronization of contract balances on both nodes in a High Availability Distributed Processing solution.

  • [DBK-1766]

    • Eliminated deadlocks in W4R.Apply sy_proc_aux.

  • [DBK-2532]

    • Added logging of forced deferred apply actions to process_mess.

  • [DBK-2914]

    • Added the ability to not deactivate reserve services at the same time as the main service with the global parameter SW_UCHK_DEACTIVATE_RESERVE=N.

  • [DBK-3023]

    • Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.

  • [DBK-3108]

    • Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.

  • [DBK-3310]

    • Added logging of copy_dt (new column in 3.46.30+ and COPY_DT tag in action_details in previous versions) and inst_id, dbms_specific, sid, serial_number in si_conn_src values (3.46.30+ only) to si_log_dst table.

  • [DBK-3320]

    • Added logging of copy_dt (new column in 3.46.30+ and COPY_DT tag in action_details in previous versions) and inst_id, dbms_specific, sid, serial_number in si_conn_src values (3.46.30+ only) to si_log_dst table.

  • [CARDS-51868]

    • Fixed incorrect document applying in an HA solution primary node when original processing did not modify static data.

  • [CARDS-52111]

    • Fixed incorrect authorisation document replication processing which led to inconsistency of data between primary and secondary nodes.

  • [CARDS-52358]

    • Fixed error "Data are not consistent" after timeout.

  • [CARDS-52602]

    • Fixed error an occurring on Authentication Server with the Distributed Processing configuration.

  • [CARDS-52704]

    • Restored menu entry OpenWay\Distributed Processing\Configuration Setup\Primary Node Routing Check

  • [CARDS-53077]

    • Fixed chip card requests processing on a High Availability primary node after authorization processing was switched to a secondary node.

  • [CARDS-53210]

    • Removed unexpected call of document reprocessing when routing a message in the Distributed Processing solution.

  • [CARDS-54255]

    • Backward document replication (document reprocessing) now updates the Application Transaction Counter (ATC) value for declined authorizations.

  • [CARDS-54608]

    • Fixed chip data processing when authorization and information requests (i.e. ministatement) are received on different nodes of a distributed processing solution within a short time gap.

  • [CARDS-54673]

    • The issue when a declined transaction on a secondary node was blocking money on the primary node has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-54861]

    • Fixed note acceptance documents reprocessing on High Availability primary node.

  • [CARDS-54862]

    • Fixed error in deferred apply of tokenization document when a rejected document without addendum cannot be successfully applied on the primary node.

  • [CARDS-54890]

    • Fixed processing of replicated documents created by first transaction for newly produced plastic.

  • [CARDS-54989]

    • Added a new global parameter, CREDIT_REPEAT_PENDING for processing repeated credit messages from a secondary node. To increase available funds, the parameter value must be set to "Y". The default value is "N".

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55584]

    • Fixed Declined authorisation message processing to avoid situations when increment of an authorisation code counter lead to an exception on a non-home node of a WAY4 HA Distributed Processing solution.

  • [CARDS-55799]

    • Added routing IDT propagation for contract subordinate tables on contract approve if routing IDT is changed.

  • [CARDS-56690]

    • Postponed accept of financial document if the corresponding authorization is loaded from a secondary node and not yet processed.

  • [CARDS-56727]

    • Corrected filling doc.change_version for rejected documents on HA secondary node

  • [CARDS-56811]

    • Implemented additional validation of FX sequence for Secondary node of Distributed Processing when FX sequence is searching on Issuing Authorization. If last FX sequence was not found or has invalid state, the last valid FX Sequence will be used in Authorization.

  • [DBK-2605]

    • Fixed issue when operations with services other than default failed before the in-flight time.

  • [DBK-2672]

    • Fixed high concurrency on synch_proc_instance_log while running High Availability deferred apply with a lot of parallel threads.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [DBK-2676]

    • Error when High Availability service was not always switched to active nodes after in-flight time has been fixed.

  • [DBK-2822]

    • Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.

  • [DBK-2888]

    • Some static tables were not populated with the new change version during Deferred Apply.

  • [DBK-2939]

    • Transaction Switch will now repeat operations on primary node that failed due to "Replication Loop" data inconsistency.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_replication_loop\HA_Replication_Loop.pdf]

  • [DBK-3019]

    • Fixed Incorrect Transaction Switch delay time with replication loop related exceptions.

  • [DBK-3300]

    • Added additional logging for high DELAY_MS value exception messages in TS Log.

  • [DBK-3325]

    • Added the ability to eliminate high concurrency for sw_node_action when TS switches between nodes.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [DBK-3369]

    • Fixed the error "A record has been changed without creating a doc" on Primary.

  • [DBK-3417]

    • Fixed an error when deferred apply did not skip tasks if WAY4 Replication was late.

  • [DBK-3575]

    • Fixed big latency in WAY4 Replication process in case of 'unique constraint violated' exceptions

  • [DBK-3642]

    • Fixed incorrect activation of default service on the primary node after the node has been set to unavailable from a secondary node.

  • [I1707312971]/[CARDS-54205]

    • Corrected contract identifier calculation for putting a document in the apply queue after replication from an HA solution secondary node.

  • [WFCKF-2636, WFCKF-2637, WFCKF-2710(DUP)]/[CARDS-54449]

    • Local/remote versions were not updated for chip authorization documents rejected on a secondary node of the WAY4 Distributed Processing solution.

  • [WFCKF-2637]/[CARDS-54518]

    • Declined transactions on secondary now increment the version number of the main contract.

  • [WFCKF-2658]/[CARDS-54568]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of replicated documents created on an HA distributed processing secondary node by a repeat SMS request.

  • [WFCKF-2687,WFCKF-2707(DUP)]/[CARDS-54603]

    • Fixed incorrect reprocessing of replicated documents for PIN change on HA primary node.

  • [WFCKF-2713,WFCKF-2714(DUP)]/[CARDS-54617]

    • Fixed incorrect reprocessing of declined documents after replication from HA secondary node.

  • [WFCKF-2733]/[DBK-3038]

    • Fixed activating services on both nodes at the same time after double switching. Set Available, Set Unavailable, Migrate Service, Restore Default actions are now allowed only after In-Flight time after previous switch-over.

  • [WFCKF-2740]/[CARDS-54689]

    • Fixed issue with distributed processing replication of AuthCheck documents.

  • [WFCKF-2870 WFCKF-2843]/[CARDS-54958]

    • Corrected re-processing of documents transferred from a secondary node of the HA solution to improve repeating values of the auth_seq_n field in contract records affected by the document.

  • [WFCKF-4001]/[CARDS-57391]

    • Corrected processing of the HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY parameter. The default value ("N") is used in all cases.

    Fast track upgrade

  • [DBK-2438]

    • For LOCK/UNLOCK/KILL_SESSION actions, the optional procedure Sys.OWS_ADMINISTER_USER no longer checks that the user account being processed has system privileges. Otherwise, it would not be able to manage the HSK Owner user. These privileges continue to be checked for other actions with user accounts. Note that this is an insignificant reduction in security in the new version of the procedure.

    Fee Prediction

  • [CARDS-54576]

    • The Fee Prediction configuration has been added to support VISA Bahrain Domestic IRF.

  • [CARDS-54714]

    • The Fee Prediction configuration has been added to support VISA Jordan Domestic IRF.

  • [CARDS-51673]

    • MasterCard MPE Import. Supported loading amount restriction from MPE for a particular IRD by tag in the configuration. Now the configuration supports loading amount restriction for Spain IRD 75 and 85 for retail transactions.

  • [CARDS-51894]

    • MasterCard IRD configuration has been modified for Europe region: transaction condition "All Face To Face (Group)" has been replaced by "All Cardholder, Card (Group)" for IRD S2.

  • [CARDS-52707]

    • The RewardsBusiness product has been added in RA configuration for Interregional jurisdiction.

  • [CARDS-52798]

    • UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed the channel in the OpenWay\UPI Fee Prediction\UPI IRF Criteria form.

  • [CARDS-54160]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation. Supported setting conditions by DE40 (Service Code) and DE22 (Point Of Service Data Code) in one scope.

  • [CARDS-54298]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation: Added check of "Active" records to all selects from MPE tables.

  • [CARDS-54961]

    • VISA Fee Prediction: added a restriction for Prepaid card category to the IS_NON-SEC_PP fee descriptor for Iceland.

  • [CARDS-54986]

    • Fixed IRD 47 definition for Europe Region. MasterCard IRD Calculation.

  • [CARDS-55276]

    • Fixed an issue with applying the appropriate interchange rules (VISA RA calculation when the additional global parameter VISA_CALC_RA is set to "Y"). Now if no domestic (intra-country) interchange rules exist, the system finds another rule (i.e. regional interchange rule).

  • [CARDS-57627]

    • Added the "JCB" value to the "Data Source" field in the "Bin Table Data Source", "BIN Table - All", and "BIN Table" forms.

  • [CARDS-58393]

    • Modified timeline criteria for the NONAUTHND_MRCH and AUTHENTICTD_SEC fee descriptors in Europe-Brazil.

  • [C1711131332]/[CARDS-58530]

    • Fixed "Paypass Enabled Ind" condition processing for IRD calculation. Now if "Paypass Enabled Ind" is equal to "N" it doesn't prevent selection of this IRD for PayPass cards.

  • [I1703025952]/[CARDS-52595]

    • IRD PE configuration has been modified for Interregional and Intra-LAC region transactions.

  • [I1704192981. Wrong IC for new visa B2B Virtual Payments (ICFEE-178)]/[CARDS-52895]

    • Modified RA configuration for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).

  • [I1704245616]/[CARDS-53038]

    • IRD criteria of contactless transactions have been revised in the MEA region according to the MasterCard Interchange manual.

  • [I1706151492]/[CARDS-54192]

    • Modified VISA RA configuration for the EU region.

  • [I1710012034]/[CARDS-55015]

    • VISA Fee Prediction: Changed the default rate type for amount conversion to VDM (VISA Daily Middle). It can be changed by the additional global parameter IF_FX_TYPE_VISA.

  • [I1710101072]/[CARDS-55146]

    • Modified interchange tariffs for EEA, Malta and Portugal.

  • [I1801102213]/[CARDS-58568]

    • Changed Fee Program Areas for Fee Prediction functionality according to VISA manual "VISA Intra-Europe Consumer cards IC in Turkey & Israel update 1 April 2018".

  • [ICFEE- 107]/[CARDS-52986]

    • RA configuration has been modified for fallback transactions in Europe.

    Fleet cards

  • [CARDS-49861]

    • Implemented database API for user interface Fleet document screens.

  • [CARDS-52379]

    • Supported new Fleet BERTLV request tags: EA.FFXX.DB - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DC - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DD - Total item discount for client calculated by third-party device.

  • [CARDS-53296]

    • New tags have been added to Fleet BERTLV response message: EA.FFXX.D6 - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D7 - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D8 - Total item discount for client calculated by issuer.

  • [CARDS-53399]

    • A new ability for reposting fleet documents has been implemented. Now the process can match goods using an internal goods codes stored in the item document instead of a terminal goods code. The Doc - Brief form [->Repost] button has been renamed to [->Edit] for Fleet documents. A new [->Repost] button has been added to start the new reposting process.

  • [CARDS-53471]

    • Fleet transactions reposting by selection has been implemented in the OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Documents Troubleshooting\Documents - Repost by Selection form.

  • [CARDS-55005]

    • FeeMin, FeeMax tariff attributes has been supported for fleet cards fee calculation process. Only applicable to fees defined as transaction price percent.

  • [CARDS-51826]

    • Displayed "Discount Amount" value sign has been changed for authorization documents.

  • [CARDS-51914]

    • Fixed an issue with simultaneous display of authorisation and financial documents for the same transaction on Fleet Transaction Screen.

  • [CARDS-53670]

    • Updated the discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option. A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.

  • [CARDS-54039]

    • Fixed an issue with inheritance of the Trans_Country, Trans_State, Trans_City, Trans_Details, Merchant_Id, Sic_Code attributes from the main transaction document to line item documents.

  • [CARDS-54300]

    • IC Documents Import/Export (pipes) : fixed error "Document with id xx not our document or wrong Message Sequence Number." when exporting the response for a batch document which was imported in DETAIL_DOC=Y mode.

  • [CARDS-54633]

    • Fixed an issue with fleet transactions report related to documents with empty doc__orig__id field value (Standing Orders). Additional conditions have been added to exclude such document records.

  • [CARDS-54671]

    • Fleet Operator Workbench: Oracle index for cards search by last digits has been renamed from OPT_ANCT_CONTRACT_REV to OPT_ACNT_CONTRACT_REV.

  • [CARDS-55162]

    • Fixed duplicated line item document rows (if multiple macrotransactions were created) in statement reports.

  • [CARDS-55324]

    • Fixed fleet clearing documents transaction amount validation rounding issue.

  • [CARDS-56473]

    • Improved Fleet bertlv message content returned to terminal in the case of an acquiring processing error. Item response codes values added.

  • [I1706056722]/[CARDS-53767]

    • Fixed adjustment amounts rounding issue in the end of month fee recalculation procedure.

  • [I1709071752]/[CARDS-55179]

    • Fixed appearance of retail line item documents in the "Posted" state but without any m_transactions linked to them.

  • [I1711038051]/[CARDS-55878]

    • Fixed incorrect fleet target fee resulting from the end-of-month fee recalculation procedure for a document chain with two adjustments.

    Health Monitoring

  • [DBK-2556]

    • "Node availability" status supported.

  • [DBK-2550]

    • Only processes that can be activated in the current node are monitored.

  • [CARDS-53916]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Health Monitoring section has been added.

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

    High availability

  • [DBK-2410]

    • WAY4 Cards upgrade in High Availability solutions no longer requires recreation of a secondary node. The new upgrade procedure for HA solutions is supported only if the current version is 03.44. Upgrade from version 03.43 to 03.45 should be done the old way.

  • [DBK-2708]

    • DB HA service statuses and node availability are now replicated across all HA nodes by DB Connection Pool of Transaction Switch in addition to WAY4 Replication. This functionality can be activated/deactivated by a Transaction Switch parameter. Please consult the setup manual of the appropriate High Availability solution. The corresponding Transaction Switch version should be installed; please contact Customer Support.

  • [DBK-2736]

    • Added an alternative way to clone Primary node through export/import as well as full copy.

  • [CARDS-51643]

    • Authorisation document request category is now inherited from a secondary node.

  • [DBK-2303]

    • Special technical one-node services with the name of the node code are created for use as a default service for modules which are connected to only one node of an HA solution.

    Updated Manuals: HA Cluster | Setup [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_setup.pdf] [ultimate_ha\Stand-in\Stand-In_setup.pdf]

  • [DBK-2337]

    • Added action 'Restore defaults' for recovering from state when a service is active on both nodes

    Updated Manuals: [db_kernel\db_replication\DB_Replication_Monitoring.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_cluster\HA_Cluster_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\Stand-in\Stand-In_operation.pdf]

  • [DBK-2594]

    • Automated SI_LOG* data cleaning in order to support Oracle Standard Edition.

    Updated Manuals: [db_kernel\way4_replication\WAY4Replication_Settings.pdf]

  • [DBK-2649]

    • Secondary node detach process cannot be started if all data has not been synchronized to the Primary node.

  • [DBK-2657]

    • Supported real-time displaying of critical services status on DB Replication Console. See DB Replication Console documentation for additional information.

    Updated Manuals: DB Replication Console

  • [DBK-2658]

    • WAY4 Cards upgrade cannot be started if any critical services are not active.

  • [DBK-2712]

    • Added an additional check during synch process start to check that the node is attached.

  • [DBK-2847]

    • Supported real-time displaying of critical services status on DB Replication Console. See DB Replication Console documentation for additional information.

    Updated Manuals: DB Replication Console

  • [WFCKF-3469]/[CARDS-51788]

    • Fixed differences between synched ACCOUNT table in Primary and Secondary nodes.

  • [CARDS-51452]

    • Added deferred authorisation processing to financial document accept procedure.

  • [CARDS-51716]

    • Fixed behaviour. All error and warning messages that are inserted while processing rejected authorizations transferred from Secondary to Primary get the "Error Info" and "Warning Info" message types. If the original authorization was successful in Secondary, the message type remains "Error" or "Warning".

  • [CARDS-51739]

    • Fixed typo in code of HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY and HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY_DELAY global parameters.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53396]

    • SAF forwarding works on HA secondary node.

  • [CARDS-54998]

    • Fixed document reprocessing for documents created by IRouter on a High Availability secondary node.

  • [CARDS-55070]

    • Fixed reprocessing of IPS negative advice received on HA secondary node.

  • [CARDS-56679]

    • Corrected reprocessing of replicated reversals when the original financial document was already processed on the primary node of an HA solution.

  • [CARDS-56684]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of messages for the CBS on a secondary node of a WAY4 HA Cluster solution.

  • [CARDS-56862]

    • Fixed error which lead to incorrect standing order transfer replication from a secondary to primary node of a WAY4 HA Cluster solution.

  • [DBK-2090]

    • Fixed WAY4R latency calculation if the time was out of synch in the source and the destination node.

  • [DBK-2433]

    • Copying officer privileges now processes only roles prefixed with OWS_Owner name (i.e. WAY4 roles) and ignores others (Oracle or custom roles, if any).

  • [DBK-2491]

    • Eliminated differences in num_seq_range between nodes.

  • [DBK-2592]

    • Fixed incorrect HA services switching when WAY4R has a big latency.

  • [DBK-2604]

    • Fixed issue when a High-Availability service returned to an active state at the secondary node after the node became unavailable.

  • [DBK-2624]

    • "Upgrade the Online1 Node" procedure now requires using Forced switch, as described in section "Emergency Mode" for HA-Switch Solution.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_operation.pdf]

  • [DBK-2668]

    • Update grants for WAY4R console user no longer hangs if WAY4R is running.

  • [DBK-2704]

    • Improved "Kill all processes" DB Replication console operation for stopping all WAY4 replication processes correctly.

  • [DBK-2728]

    • Added more debug information in process_mess when an exception occurs in the WAY4 Replication Copy process.

  • [DBK-2729]

    • Eliminated large latency in WAY4R when 'unique constraint violated'.

  • [DBK-2855]

    • Services are not activated on primary after setting Partial Secondary unavailable.

  • [DBK-3009]

    • Fixed issue: now transactions uncommitted at the time of the "prepare" action are populated into an attached node.

  • [DBK-3193]

    • Fixed incorrect determining of new routing in switching between HA nodes.

  • [DBK-3230]

    • Activating services in a node is always properly replicated to another nodes

  • [DBK-3242]

    • Fixed insufficient grants for WAY4 HA autoswitchover monitoring.

  • [DBK-3271]

    • Fixed periodical switching HA services on and off in Autoswitchover.

  • [DBK-3547]

    • Fixed an issue with markup synchronisation from a secondary to primary node of a WAY4 HA solution after WAY4 Cards upgrade.

  • [DBK-3716]

    • Fixed an issue when "Unique Constraint Violation" exceptions in WAY4 Replication process were considered as "failed changes" and not rejected.

  • [I1612293501]/[CARDS-51620]

    • Incorrect PostingStatus values are no longer assigned to documents moved from a secondary HA node when deferred processing takes these records in a different order than the original one.

  • [I1705286645]/[DBK-2552]

    • Password verify function is supported for "Recreate Links" in HA console.

  • [CARDS-55122]

    • Added information to documentation that describes enabling an additional mechanism for replicating the state of nodes and services. For more information, see the Setup Manual for the appropriate High Availability solution.

    Updated Manuals: HA Cluster | Setup [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_setup.pdf] [ultimate_ha\Stand-in\Stand-In_setup.pdf]

    Host card emulation

  • [CARDS-56695]

    • Fixed inability to process of documents received after MDES/VDEP token deactivation

    • Added the ability to set the AUTH_TOKEN_ADDR_TYPE parameter on the financial institution level.

  • [CARDS-50856]

    • Deactivated, Suspended, Active and Inactive statuses for tokens have been added. Processing logic for the token parameter F_ENABLED has been changed. See documentation for details.

  • [CARDS-57678]

    • Added analysis for Final Tokenization Decision on tokenization complete message (TCN) for MIR tokenization.

    Host2Host interface

  • [CARDS-57934]

    • Supported export transactions in SmartVista backoffice IPM format.

  • [CARDS-52890]

    • IC Documents Export: added a new pipe parameter, "USE_EXT_FILE_COUNTER". When the "Y" value is set (default value is "N"), a sequence generated by the DB is used for file numbering.

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48158]

    • If acquirer parameters are not found by member ID, a search is made for default acquirer parameters by the "default" member id.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51586]

    • IRouter: Removed unnecessary incorrect PIN tries processing in routing contract.

  • [CARDS-51983]

    • TMID value is inherited from the original document when a secondary document is posted in routing transit authorisation messages.

  • [CARDS-53476]

    • Removed unnecessary transaction amount validation for transit authorization reversals.

  • [CARDS-54161]

    • A Transit Reversal or Adjustment message will sent to a target member even if the message contains different data from the original message, if the target channel is not included in the list defined by the global parameter AUTH_REV.REJ_FRAUD_FOR. Forwarded document will contain the 'SUSP_REV_FRAUD;' tag in the add_info field.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54358]

    • UFX Documents Import (pipe): if FROM_TRANSIT=Y pipe parameter is set but "Originator\TransitId" element is absent then doc.source_member is filled with "Originator\MemberId" element value.

  • [CARDS-55465]

    • Fixed menu item "OpenWay\WAY4 UFX Interchange\File Management\UFX Reset Outward File Counter". Changed counter name.

  • [CARDS-55733]

    • Fixed an issue with the "TOKEN" transaction attribute missing for affiliate transactions according to the bin_table settings.

  • [CARDS-55742]

    • Fixed "ORA-06502" error when "USE_EXT_FILE_COUNTER" IC Document Export pipe parameter has the "Y" value.

  • [CARDS-56676]

    • Supported check of filling the first 16 symbols of the TC05TCR3 Data Content field for an affiliate's downloaded documents when this TCR3 is not used for an addendum (no tag AT). A warning message is written to the process log. Pipe affected: Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing.cpp

  • [CARDS-57023]

    • Added the ability to convert incoming payments to notifications for selected channels only in the UFX Documents Import pipe in "H2H" mode.

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [CARDS-57123]

    • Supported sending stop list messages to MasterCard via Host2Host channel.

  • [CARDS-57162]

    • Corrected the warning message about the wrong TCR3 format in VISA and Affiliated BASE II Inward pipes. New message text: "Incorrect TCR3 format. First 16 symbols of Data Content field must be space filled". Pipes affected: VISA BASEII Generic Inward Processing.hpp VISA BASEII Inw History Processing.cpp VISA BASEII Inward Processing.cpp (pipe versions 03.45.30.01 and 03.46.30.05)

  • [CARDS-57270]

    • Fixed "DEV" document tag creation from a message loaded by the Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing pipe when the "DEV" tag is absent in the incoming file. This makes it possible to export such documents to MasterCard interface more accurately.

  • [I1509142952]/[CARDS-51531]

    • IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import. The "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter has been added to IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import pipes, making it possible to exclude export/import of the specified tags from/to doc.add_info.

  • [I1612096107]/[CARDS-52844]

    • IC Document Export: fixed "An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x1a) was found" error when exporting a document containing special characters. Invalid symbols are replaced with the "?" character in an outgoing file.

  • [I1704246960]/[CARDS-54064]

    • Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing (pipe) : Fixed "Illegal BaseII message length" error when exporting transaction with incomplete "AI" addendum.

  • [I1705264283]/[CARDS-53576]

    • IC Documents Import (pipe): removed incorrect check of DocRefSet/DRN element length.

  • [I1707067331]/[CARDS-53986]

    • Affiliated BII Outward Processing: fixed "Message Format Failed" error.

  • [I1708094567]/[CARDS-54400]

    • IC Documents Export (pipe): fixed the sign of the amount in the "Billing" element for "H2H" mode and when the "USE_MTRANSACTION"="Y" parameter is set. Now only a positive amount will be exported.

  • [I1710031301]/[CARDS-54988]

    • Fixed incorrect creation of advice in cases when processing of a transit request for a foreign member's card is rejected.

  • [I1802068851]/[CARDS-56852]

    • Added the ability to convert incoming "fast funds" payments to notifications in UFX Import pipe in "H2H" mode.

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [I1803284279]/[CARDS-57392]

    • Fixed incorrect Irouter routing of auto-reversal if the interchange online channel is different from the routing contract channel.

  • [I1804104166]/[CARDS-57411]

    • Fixed issue when a tag from an incoming file was not imported by the "IC Documents Import" pipe into the add_info field of the document if the tag's name was a part (a substring) of any tag listed in the "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter value.

  • [I1804250887]/[CARDS-57845]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of advice messages when the global parameter NO_ALT_AUTH_MATCHING_FOR is used.

  • [I1806067957]/[CARDS-58379]

    • Changed application status of Physical channels to Signed Off after failed echo test messages.

    • Added a description of the USE_DOC_DATA; tag to the standard system manual "Documents".

  • [CARDS-49061]

    • NSPK Inward, Affiliated Base II interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.

  • [CARDS-54129]

    • IRouter stored procedures: Added ownership property for NextChannel in ON_US_CH tag of NextAddData parameter. Values are Own(Y)/Affiliated(A)/Foreign(N).

  • [CARDS-54375]
