    Housekeeping

  • [DBK-2305]

    • Added support of two new modes for the "Save" action: Single Sql which uses insert with append and nologging in the corresponding table and Custom mode which allows building custom Save procedures.

  • [CARDS-52085]

    • In order to make housekeeping for Cases - relations between CM_CASE_ACTIV and CM_CASE_OBJ are switched off for the Housekeeping process in the standard Housekeeping setting. "Import Standard Settings" must be performed after upgrade.

  • [I1612280158]/[DBK-2533]

    • Included "Date To" in Housekeeping reports. All data between "Date From" 0 hours 0 minutes and "Date To" 23 hours 59 minutes 59 seconds will be shown.

  • [CARDS-53989]

    • Removed the unused report in the Reporting.Spending Reports form (OpenWay\Corporate Reporting\Corporate Reports\Spending Reports). Removed the "OWS.Corporate Reporting.Spending.Exceptions Report" menu item. Removed the Exceptions.rdf report template.

  • [DBK-2839]

    • Added deallocate unused extents of an archived table after failed "Single Sql/Custom Save" Housekeeping step.

  • [DBK-2840]

    • Support of parallel dml has been added for Custom Sql Step.

  • [DBK-2912]

    • Fixed SQL error on saving tables with CLOB or BLOB columns.

  • [I1701242013]/[CARDS-51955]

    • Housekeeping now also deletes rows from td_auth_sch table with amnd_state not equal to 'A'.

  • [I1708020600]/[CARDS-54968]

    • "When available" and "when credit" documents amendment fields will be refreshed before posting to prevent untimely housekeeping.

  • [I1712122265]/[DBK-3363]

    • Fixed issue: now Housekeeping deletes Addendum Doc data related to expired Doc.

    Instalment management

  • [CARDS-51948]

    • Special instalment options can be configured for our card transactions made on a partner's devices acquired in different banks. Partner is identified by a pair of Member ID and Merchant IDs which should be configured in the Instalment Partners handbook. Special configuration of a service is also required.

  • [CARDS-52073]

    • New menu "OpenWay\Partner Management" has been added to create and manage partner contracts.

  • [CARDS-57763]

    • Added the ability to use a non-zero interest rate for an instalment plan's free period. The interest rate for the free period can be specified in an Instalment Scheme, tariff (in a new field, "Free Period Rate") or passed as the document tag INST_IRATE_FREE. The latter is only possible if the main interest rate is also specified as a document tag (INST_IRATE). The portion amount for the free period may differ from the portion amount for the main part of the plan (after the free period has ended). To enable this feature, the FREE_PERIOD_OWN_AMOUNT tag should be specified in the Instalment Scheme's special parameters. The feature can only be enabled if an interest calculation scheme that does not depend on days is used. This new algorithm is compatible only with the following options for 'Shift Fee Charge Mode': Charge Fees Every Month, Do Not Charge Shift Fees. Another values can not be set for such interest calculation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51411]

    • Added the ability to process instalment daily interest accrual. To enable the feature, instalment fee codes that need daily interest accrual should be specified in the INST_DAILY_INTEREST_CODES global parameter (can be redefined in the financial institution), and invoice events to make financial transfers should be configured.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51511]

    • Instalment plan recalculation is now automatically called when contract Billing Date or Due Date is changed.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51604]

    • Simulated instalment plan save mode has been added. Plans can be saved in full mode ("F" - default), partial ("P"), minimum ("M"), or not saved at all ("N"). Save mode is determined by the INST_SIM_SAVE global parameter which can be redefined by the same tag in Service special parameters.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-51755]

    • An instalment fee configured as a "Portion fee" will now be taken in the full amount for one portion on full early repayment. On partial repayment no fee is taken.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52083]

    • Added the ability to perform early repayment of an instalment transaction. The Service should be configured with the INVOICE_ACTION=EARLY_REPAYMENT tag in service details. The document's additional data field can contain the INST_PLAN_IDT tag with the idt of the instalment plan for which early repayment is being performed. If no tag is present in the document, all instalment plans will be paid one by one in the order of creation. Early repayment keep mode can be specified using the INST_ER_KEEP tag with the values "T" - keep tenor, "P" - keep portion amount.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52124]

    • Instalments with "Monthly Interest" configuration have been simplified. The "Next Working Day" and "Previous Working Day" values are converted into a single value, "Split Interest". The split invoice effective date will no longer be shifted. At the end of the month, the dates of transfers generated by fee invoice opening will depend on the contract's Accounting Scheme EOM configuration.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52733]

    • The ability to postpone the first payment for an instalment plan up to a certain date has been added. This date should be specified as the value of the SHIFT_DATE tag in document tags, instalment scheme special parameters, or instalment tariff special parameters in YYMMDD format. The first payment will be scheduled according to instalment scheme date configuration but not earlier than the specified date.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53044]

    • Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.

  • [CARDS-53053]

    • Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.

  • [CARDS-53551]

    • The ability to configure an instalment fee to waive all not opened fee invoices on full early repayment has been added. To enable this mode, the WAIVE_ON_FER tag should be specified in special parameters for the fee in the instalment scheme.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53564]

    • The INST_PLAN_ID tag is set in documents created for invoice event fees. Additional tags can be inherited from an instalment plan into a document created by an invoice event or invoice event fee. The list of tags should be configured in the INST_EVENT_INHERIT_TAGS global parameter (can be specified for a financial institution).

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53575]

    • Special type of fee - Merchant Fee with amortization is supported for instalment plans. The fee is configured in fees for an instalment scheme. Invoices for merchant fee are not included in portion amount and total plan amount, they could not be paid (never become Open). Invoice events should be configured with one of two new amount types, Merchant Fee or Total Merchant Fee. The source document contract can be used to get a tariff for an instalment scheme and instalment scheme fee - the USE_CONTRA_TRF tag should be set in the instalment scheme or specific fee for the instalment scheme

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53845]

    • A new instalment payment scheme, "Fees First" has been introduced. In this scheme, the entire fee amount is planned in first portions, principal payment is planned after the entire fee has paid. Only fees that are not interest-based (Annual Fee, Flat Fee, Portion Fee) can be used with the Fees First payment scheme, early repayments are not allowed.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53874]

    • A new instalment payment scheme, "Fees First" has been introduced. In this scheme, the entire fee amount is planned in first portions, principal payment is planned after the entire fee has paid. Only fees that are not interest-based (Annual Fee, Flat Fee, Portion Fee) can be used with the Fees First payment scheme, early repayments are not allowed.

  • [CARDS-54201]

    • A new instalment limit type, "Total Principal Amount", has been added. The limit amount used depends on the total principal amount (without interest and fees) of active instalment plans. A limit is only restored when the plan is totally paid or closed.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54261]

    • The AUTO_ER_KEEP contract parameter can now be used to configure keeping either the tenor or portion amount in instalment plan recalculation when billing date is changed. If the contract parameter is not configured, behaviour depends on the INST_RENEW_RATES global parameter. If INST_RENEW_RATES=Y, tenor is kept; in other cases, portion amount is kept.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54302]

    • Fee calculation from transaction date is supported for instalments created by a service. To enable calculation from transaction date, the INST_FROM_TRANS_DATE tag should be set in service details or in the transaction subtype. If the billing cycle with the transaction date is already closed when document posting is performed, plan dates will depend on the instalment scheme's "Dates mode". If dates mode is billing-based, plan dates will be calculated starting from the current billing cycle. If dates mode is transaction-based, the dates will be based on transaction date and if no plan shift is configured, the first portion may be created with overdue status.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-54365]

    • The ability to configure different invoice events for manual and automatic instalment plan closure / partial and full early repayment has been added. The IS_MANUAL tag with "Y" or "N" values can be configured in the invoice_event "Add Condition" field; in this case, the invoice event will only be triggered if instalment action is either manual or automatic, respectively.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54366]

    • Fee charging options can now be selected when manually closing an instalment plan. The INST_ADV_FEE_WAIVE_ON_CLOSE global parameter has been enhanced with two new values: "A" - Charge unbilled fees for the whole plan, and "1" - Charge unbilled fees for one portion.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54833]

    • A new custom procedure, CUST_INSTL_AUTO_ER has been added. In this procedure, the default order for automatic early repayment of instalment plans can be redefined.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55222]

    • Included markup fee in principal amount when creating an instalment plan for a transaction.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55311]

    • Added the ability to configure last instalment portion threshold for instalments with portion amount specified. A threshold tariff code should be specified as the value of LAST_PORTION_THRESHOLD tag in the instalment scheme's special parameters. The tariff value can be configured as an amount or as a percentage of portion amount. If the last portion (or several last portions) amount is less than the threshold amount, these last portions will not be created and the remaining amount will be added to the previous portion.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-55551]

    • Added the ability to take an instalment fee amount from a custom fee. The tag SERVICE_FEE=<list of fee codes> should be added to instalment fee special parameters. If the fee should be taken from a contra service, the additional tag CONTRA_SERVICE should be also set. Only an instalment fee with a flat fee calculation scheme can be based on a service, however it can be of any fee category (ordinary fee, merchant fee, extra fee and so on).

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56311]

    • Enhanced the partial early repayment algorithm for the instalment plans with a flat fee. By default, when a partial early repayment is made in a portion, the principal amount of a loan is repaid first, and then the portion fee is repaid. The "PRIORITY" tag makes it possible to repay the "Flat Fee" fee of the portion before the principal amount. By default (if the tag is not set), the fee priority is "101", and the principal amount priority is always "100". The lesser value has the higher priority (i.e., by default, the principal amount is repaid first). The principal amount priority must not be changed. To repay the "Flat Fee" fee before the principal amount, the "PRIORITY" tag with the value less than "100" must be specified (for example, PRIORITY=90). If several "Flat Fee" fees are used, the priority must be specified for each fee.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56506]

    • Added the possibility to redefine the INST_INTEREST_TO_DUE global parameter for a financial institution. It can also be redefined in an Instalment Scheme as a value of the INT_TO_DUE tag in the "Special Parms" field. If the parameter is defined in an Instalment Scheme, it will be inherited in a plan, and if the "Change Instalment Terms" action applies to a new Instalment Scheme, initial parameter value will be preserved for a secondary plan.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56507]

    • Supported the new behavior of the "Payment Holidays" action. If the "INST_HOLIDAYS_FOR_OPEN" global parameter is set to "N" (could be redefined on the Financial Institution level), the partially paid and overdue portions of an instalment plan are not shifted to the future periods when the "Payment Holidays" action is performed. If the parameter has the "Y" value (default), then old behavior is used, and the overdue principal amount is recalculated to be paid in the future.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [core\multiple_financial_institutions\Financial_Institutions.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56876]

    • Added the ability to charge a fee from a partner contract when creating or activating an instalment plan. The partner fee should be configured in the instalment scheme with a fee code equal to the Message Type code that corresponds to the required misc fee transaction type.

  • [CARDS-56969]

    • Added a new "Extra Fee from Principal" instalment fee type. A fee amount is subtracted from the principal amount and is included in the first portion of the plan. The fee rate and amount can be specified as the INST_EXTRAF_FRATE and INST_EXTRAF_FTOTAL document tags.

  • [CARDS-57907]

    • Added a new interest calculation scheme to configure an instalment scheme: "Interest with USE_MONTH_WEIGHT = B". In this configuration, interest for the first instalment portion is calculated for the whole month regardless of a number of days left to the end of the month. In case of early repayment, no advance interest is taken.

  • [CARDS-58256]

    • Added ability to change Due Date of invoice-based instalment plan. Maximum period from current date to new due date could be restricted using global parameter INST_MAX_DUE_DATE_GAP where number of days should be specified (could be redefined on FI)

  • [I1802071449]/[CARDS-56715]

    • Added the INST_BILLING_HISTORY global parameter (could be redefined on Financial Institution level) to regulate saving of instalment plan states during billing. The parameter's default value is "Y". An instalment plan state saved to the INVOICE_LOG_HISTORY table during billing is used in statement generation. To disable saving this data, the parameter should be set to "N".

  • [CARDS-51426]

    • Added the "Confirm Payment Holidays" item to the "Actions..." context menu in the "Instalment For Approval" form.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51965]

    • Instalment fee code is now taken from an Instalment Scheme even if the fee rate is passed in document tags. Previous system behaviour was to use "FEE" as a fee code value regardless of Instalment Scheme settings.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52133]

    • Instalment Event = "Plan Closed", according to which an Instalment Event Fee is charged is no longer generated when an instalment plan in preview or inactive status is closed.

  • [CARDS-52170]

    • Corrected instalment plan recalculation when fee capitalization is used.

  • [CARDS-52361]

    • Corrected information portion status in an instalment plan after "Change Instalment Terms".

  • [CARDS-52686]

    • Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual instalment actions using DB Manager.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53113]

    • Fixed parsing of the "E2.E1 BERTLV" tag that contains an instalment interest rate.

  • [CARDS-53394]

    • Filtering out of recalculated entries added on instalment creation.

  • [CARDS-53733]

    • Corrected the process for converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an instalment. Now transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.

  • [CARDS-53823]

    • Corrected fee processing when closing an instalment plan if a flat fee is used.

  • [CARDS-53918]

    • Original document tags are now not skipped on instalment plan recalculation.

  • [CARDS-53919]

    • It is not recommended to use the same fee type for Instalment Event Fees and other Misc Fees as this may affect reversal processing.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53983]

    • Instalment Payment holidays portion amount calculation has been corrected for the "Keep Tenor" option.

  • [CARDS-54144]

    • Corrected an issue with filling in the "INST_FDATE" and "INST_FAMNT" tags when capitalization is used. Now the capitalization portions are skipped and data from the first real portion are used.

  • [CARDS-54357]

    • The amount of an unused instalment limit for posting to accounts is now calculated without the amount used by inactive instalment plans. The available instalment limit for plan creation still takes inactive plans into account. If an instalment plan created on authorization should not affect posted instalment limits, INST_AUTH_ACTION=CREATE_INACTIVE should be configured in the service or using the global parameter.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54359]

    • Matching of simulated instalment plans will now depend on the INST_VER tag of a financial document (E2.CF bertlv tag). If the tag value is MC_INST, MasterCard specification for instalment plan mandatory fields for matching will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_INF_RATE, INST_FEE, EFF_RATE, INST_TYPE. In other cases, OpenWay notation for mandatory fields will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_AMNT, INST_TOTAL.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54372]

    • Corrected the "Last Updated" field value for the PAYMENT type invoices during test script run in the Product Inspector: now emulated banking date is set instead of the system date.

  • [CARDS-54415]

    • Fixed the calculation algorithm for a value of funds available for early repayment that is shown during the "Early Repayment" actions. Now balance types configuration in global parameters or in account scheme is considered.

  • [CARDS-54448]

    • Supported a timezone configuration when processing the instalment event fees.

  • [CARDS-54456]

    • Corrected tenor calculation for instalments with fee capitalization.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54482]

    • When an instalment plan is created with interest capitalization and specified portion amount, the calculated tenor is rounded to the nearest integer, instead of rounding up as done in other cases.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54618]

    • Added a new shift mode, "Instalment Start Date" to define the posting date for an Instalment Event Fee. When a transaction from a previous billing cycle is converted to an instalment (using the backdated processing module), an Instalment Event Fee with the specified shift mode is processed with a posting date equal to the current banking date, not the date of the original transaction.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54703]

    • Corrected the fatal error when calculating an instalment plan if billing date shift is configured to the previous working day.

  • [CARDS-54718]

    • Reapplication of Instalment Event Fee with "Instalment Start Date" posting date shift mode has been corrected on subsequent backdated processing.

  • [CARDS-54788]

    • Generation of unnecessary transfers during instalment early repayment has been corrected when instalment limit decrease on payment is used.

  • [CARDS-54812]

    • Corrected filling of the "E2.CB" tag for instalment simulation in a transaction.

  • [CARDS-54878]

    • Corrected filling of the "CB" tag and the "C1", "C2", "C4", "CE", and "D4" tags when annual rate is fractional in the instalment simulation bertlv data.

  • [CARDS-54902]

    • Enhanced filling of the "E2.CB" tag. Now, it is always returned in the bertlv data for a Mastercard authorisation request from a terminal capable of processing an instalment even if no instalment simulation was done. Together with the "E2.D6" tag, they form the correct answer for a terminal capable of processing an instalment.

  • [CARDS-54932]

    • Fixed the instalment simulation behaviour for authorisation request if no instalment plans were simulated due to configuration issues: a warning message is created for a document and an instalment simulation answer is registered in the bertlv tags E2.CB and E2.D6 for a payment without instalments.

  • [CARDS-55085]

    • Corrected instalment plan recalculation on billing change when interest capitalization is used and interest for an additional first period shift has not yet been paid or capitalized.

  • [CARDS-55443]

    • Corrected generation of the chain identifier for an instalment plan converted from a transaction in previous cycles if another plan was created and closed for the same transaction.

  • [CARDS-56129]

    • Corrected a flat fee calculation for the "Payment Holidays" action if the current plan has overdue portions.

  • [CARDS-56292]

    • Fixed the fatal error occurring when a long instalment plan was saved to a document addendum.

  • [CARDS-56542]

    • Corrected the "E2.CB" bertlv tag format containing an instalment type in authorisation response.

  • [CARDS-56666]

    • Enhanced instalment plan creation in financial document: now if global parameter or service is configured with the instalment action ACTIVATE_RECALC, an instalment plan created on financial document will keep the same CHAIN_IDT as the plan created in authorisation.

  • [CARDS-56964]

    • Corrected filling of "Due Date" in instalment plans, now this date will correspond to "Due Date" of the latest portion in the plan.

  • [CARDS-57363]

    • Fixed extra instalment fees behaviour: the Instalment Partner Fee and other extra instalment fees are now posted as supplementary macrotransactions together with the main macrotransaction.

  • [CARDS-57388]

    • Corrected calculation of principal amount paid on instalment partial early repayment if the flat fee is used in instalment plan and causes doubling of instalment event fees.

  • [CARDS-57399]

    • Corrected partial early repayment of instalment plans with a flat fee if the whole principal amount is paid on early repayment and only the fee is left unpaid.

  • [CARDS-57401]

    • Corrected the flat fee calculation during instalment early repayment if the fee rate was passed as document tag.

  • [CARDS-57467]

    • Corrected the instalment simulation data format, values are padded according to the specified length.

  • [CARDS-57577]

    • Corrected the check of instalment limit when the system processes an adjustment document.

  • [CARDS-57605]

    • Corrected Instalment fee processing during partial early repayment. Now Instalment fee with the "Extra Fee Immediate" category will be paid in full on such activity.

  • [CARDS-57885]

    • Corrected the transaction conversion into an instalment when the INST_APPROVE_PLANS global parameter has the "N" value. Now transfers are generated as separate documents, and not as macrotransactions under the document that has been already posted.

  • [CARDS-57960]

    • Corrected invoice events processing on early repayment of instalment plans with flat fee if INST_APPROVE_PLANS=N.

  • [CARDS-58063]

    • Corrected early repayment of instalment plans with the "Extra Fee Immediate" fees.

  • [CARDS-58214]

    • Corrected the error in portion amount calculation if zero fee rate is specified for free period along with the FREE_PERIOD_OWN_AMOUNT tag in instalment scheme.

  • [I1805299059]/[CARDS-58249]

    • Corrected processing of fatal error during Instalment plan recalculation if the billing date has been changed. Added clearing of invoice process stack to prevent incorrect processing of Instalment plan creation.

    Invoice management

  • [CARDS-51647]

    • Overdue substate restore procedure has been fixed for invoice payment reject.

  • [CARDS-52323]

    • Fixed error when cross-balance macrotransactions created by a standing order were not linked to the document.

  • [I1703249552]/[CARDS-52604]

    • Calculation of due date during invoice resend has been fixed.

    Issuing

  • [CARDS-51370]

    • New chip scheme template with contactless limits added: "AEIPS Generic with Express Pay". Issuer Scripts adding postponed until the exact AEIPS specification version becomes known.

  • [CARDS-51847]

    • Added the ability to define transaction conditions to unlock a new plastic and other conditions to close the previous one. See documentation for details or contact Customer Support.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52806]

    • "MIR" Contactless cards issuing is supported in WAY4.

  • [CARDS-52280]

    • The internal procedure for creating a duplicate contract no longer "forces" approval of the contract if it was duplicated because it is linked with another contract, for example, in the case of combo-cards.

  • [CARDS-52290]

    • Added ability to enter INHERIT_LOST_CARD_EXPIRE=Y; in card subtype properties.

  • [CARDS-52973]

    • The U_PBT_BY_TOKEN=N parameter should be added to disable unlocking renewed plastic by authorisations initiated by a token.

  • [CARDS-55159]

    • Improved masking for e-mail in TAR messages. Mask format is n##e@g#####.com.

  • [I1603049137]/[CARDS-52810]

    • Added the tags DF1A "MCA Cnt1 Ctrl Contact", DF1E "MCA Cnt2 Ctrl C-less", DF1D "MCA Cnt2 Ctrl Contact", and DF1B "MCA Cnt1 Ctrl C-less" to the chip scheme template "MCHIP Advance Generic CVR 1.x".

  • [CARDS-48909]

    • Removed the [Cr Log Flds] button from the "OpenWay\Full\Online Monitoring\Online Docs\ -> Online Message" form. Log records are still available in "Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Emergency Report\Online Log - Not Safe" and "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Interchange\All Docs Not Safe -> Online Log" forms.

  • [CARDS-52050]

    • Fixed full scan in ROOT.OpenWay.Customer Service.Customer Service -> Related.

  • [CARDS-52848]

    • Fixed use of the P_IS_IMPERSONAL parameter for the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.

  • [CARDS-53012]

    • In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report, default values are calculated for the P_FORALLCURR, P_LANGUAGE, and P_AMOUNTS_SIGN parameters even if the P_CONNID parameter is not set.

  • [CARDS-53799]

    • Corrected the status of the link for a card related to an account when the card was reissued as Lost or Stolen.

  • [CARDS-54060]

    • If changes in the "Embossing" field group were made for a client, the changes are inherited to the client's contracts during the "Check" activity. If parameters were redefined earlier in a contract, the new values are not inherited to these contracts.

  • [CARDS-54100]

    • Corrected processing of applet-related card data records when marking a card contract for production and selecting the record for incoming messages.

  • [CARDS-54310]

    • CARDS-53799 has been redesigned. Relations with invalid cards are excluded from the "Related Cards" screen form.

  • [CARDS-55033]

    • On card replacement with same product, product init events are not repeated.

  • [CARDS-55212]

    • Added grants on INST_LIMIT_TYPE view and STORNO_CORRECTION and STORNO_CASE tables for the Cardholder Contract Statement report to fix issue with insufficient privileges on Cardholder Statement generation.

  • [CARDS-55899]

    • Added a form to set "DateFrom" and "DateTo" parameters as the first subitem to the standard menu item (OWS.Processing Status Report), which calls the Processing Status Report report (ROOT.OpenWay.Full.Daily Procedures.Processing Status Report).

  • [CARDS-57565]

    • Fixed error which lead to inability to lock additional application card_info record for cobadge card when card production response loaded.

  • [I1704173799]/[CARDS-53010]

    • Added a new parameter, P_HINT_Q5, varchar2(255), to the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report. The default value is "/*+rule*/". The parameter makes it possible to change the hint instruction for Q_5 query used for selecting acnt_contracts.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [I1704204444]/[CARDS-52880]

    • Fixed definition of IPS Product for MasterCard subtypes.

  • [I1705301217]/[CARDS-53533]

    • Improved processing of Application for usage limiter deletion. Fixed issue with incorrect processing when Usage Template was closed and Usage Template Approved remains active.

  • [I1706072562]/[CARDS-53673]

    • Corrected calculation of previous card expiry date in unmarking procedure.

  • [CARDS-52786]

    • Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "Specifying Sensitive Data" has been changed. Added a warning that the system cannot function normally without the PVV and Encrypted PIN fields.

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

  • [CARDS-54561]

    • New functionality - VAU & MABU support for issuers - has been implemented. See manuals. The service makes it possible for issuers to send international payment systems up-to-date information about reissued cards. This information will be used by international payment systems to respond to requests by merchants where these cards are used for recurring transactions.

    Updated Manuals: [abu_acquiring\visa_account_updater\Interacting_with_VAU_Acquiring.pdf] [abu_issuing\ABU_Functional_Specification_Issuing.pdf] [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf] [abu_issuing\visa_account_updater\Interacting_with_VAU_Issuing.pdf] [abu_acquiring\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Acquiring.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55073]

    • Disabled the SET_CREDIT_LIMIT_MODE global parameter.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [help system - acquiring\main_lng.chm and issuing\main_lng.chm] [help system - acquiring\main_lng.chm and issuing\main_lng.chm] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51360]

    • Pan reference identifier, Token reference identifier and Token requestor identifier have been added as document and authentication scheme tags.

  • [CARDS-52167]

    • Consumer's Activation Method Preference for MDES transactions has been added to doc.add_info.

  • [CARDS-53715]

    • If contract_subtype.add_parms contains the WSP_ADD_PERS_DATA_B64 tag, the tag value will be sent to the response for a token creation request as "Additional Personalization Data". The tag value must contain data in base64 format.

  • [CARDS-54087]

    • If the parameter AUTH_REQ_TOKEN_CHECK is set to "Y" or is not set (the default value is "Y"), its value can be changed in a financial institution or contract subtype. If the parameter contains a comma-separated list of token service providers, no checking for these providers will be performed. If the list of service providers is empty, checking for all service providers is disabled (prohibited).

    Issuing authorisation

  • [CARDS-52586]

    • Supported inheritance of currency conversion rate from an authorisation check document into the corresponding advice if the advice is received less than 24 hours after the check request.

  • [CARDS-50719]

    • Issuer scripts creation is supported for cards permanently working in a secondary node.

  • [CARDS-51001]

    • It is possible to create Tokens in Stand-In mode.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51611]

    • TAR processing for VDEP has been added.

  • [CARDS-51727]

    • Primary Account Number Unique Reference has been added to doc.add_info.

  • [CARDS-51851]

    • Added support for external management of transaction value date by sending the Posting Date parameter in IssFundsTransfer, IssPaymentFromContract, IssPaymentToContract web services when working in SMS mode. Requires the appropriate version of W4W.

  • [CARDS-52018]

    • Tokenization activation code stored under a document has been masked.

  • [CARDS-52197]

    • Data from field 112 have been parsed on Purchase token operation.

  • [CARDS-52299]

    • VDEP (Visa Digital Enablement Program) service API, including token creation and additional VDEP token information checking on authorization operations has been implemented.

  • [CARDS-52398]

    • Modified auth.PUT_REQUEST parameter processing so it is possible to process authorization check requests for StandingOrderPayment to get data for issuer fees.

  • [CARDS-52539]

    • Payment with IBAN routing has been added. Now payment can be routed to different CBS interfaces with IBAN only.

  • [CARDS-52671]

    • Added the ability to redefine LOCKED_CARD_RC for a financial institution. The actual value should be assigned by the LOCKED_CARD_RC=<RC>; tag in the special_parms field of the corresponding F_I table record.

  • [CARDS-52782]

    • "Credit_History.closed" field value is now equal to sysdate for declined authorization documents.

  • [CARDS-52825]

    • Added funds transfer transaction for core banking system (payments with IBAN can be sent to the CBS interface).

  • [CARDS-52841]

    • Added the "Authentication Domains" and "Authentication Types" forms to the menu branch "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products" and the "Authentication for cards" form to "OpenWay\Issuing\Contracts Input & Update".

  • [CARDS-52858]

    • Corrected Message Type codes for authorisation check messages for the Transaction Switch IRouter service.

  • [CARDS-52937]

    • Added the ability to set the "SKIP_AUTH_EVNT;" tag in the ServiceInfo field of the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Merchant Device Setup\Additional Online Services -> [Full Info]" to suppress standard notification event generation.

  • [CARDS-53014]

    • An online credit repeat message will not increase the amount available when it is received on an HA solution secondary node.

  • [CARDS-54452]

    • Added the ability to set the AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD parameter on the financial institution level.

  • [CARDS-54859]

    • Added saving tokenization data to a document's "Add Info" field for rejected enrolment messages.

  • [CARDS-55790]

    • Added device name (WSP_DEVNAME), device ID (WSP_DEVID) and last four digits of mobile phone number (WSP_L4DIG) saving in the database as token parameters on MDES / VTS enrolment.

  • [CARDS-57926]

    • Fixed the PIN validation data search algorithm for card applets. If there is no data in the applet card_info row, data from the parent card_info row will be used.

  • [I1503163267]/[CARDS-52030]

    • Added the ability to log missing ATC values to a document's additional information. A new global parameter, LOG_MISSING_ATC_TO_DOC=Y activates this feature.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description]

  • [I1612121917]/[CARDS-51820]

    • "No Check" Auth scenario has been removed from forms as obsolete. The additional global parameter ENABLE_NO_CHECK is no longer supported.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51435]

    • Fixed incorrect "PIN change" processing on TS IRouter when request to an external system is required.

  • [CARDS-51774]

    • Error in formatting activation methods in TKN_VERIFICATION messages has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51930]

    • Error in TKN_VERIFICATION method has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51941]

    • Error in BERTLV data format in retail MDES transactions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52074]

    • Fixed incorrect inheritance of the return code from an original document when a repeat message is received.

  • [CARDS-52142]

    • Error using three delimiters ('|') instead of two when answering TAR messages during MDES transactions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52278]

    • Fixed incorrect redefinition of message settlement date on IRouter authorisation.

  • [CARDS-52534]

    • IRouter authorisation procedures have been corrected to suppress mistaken error messages.

  • [CARDS-52535]

    • The authorisation code generation algorithm has been restored to a contract counter-based one when the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter is not set.

  • [CARDS-52547]

    • Fixed incorrect selection of message code for Core banking system. IRouter.

  • [CARDS-52752]

    • When a PIN is changed after marking a card for reproduction but before receiving a reproduction results file, the new PIN value is also written to the new plastic record.

  • [CARDS-52771]

    • Fixed frequent rereading of ADD_GLOBAL_PARMS on authorisation.

  • [CARDS-52877]

    • Fixed incorrect chip request processing on a High Availability secondary node when the response contains empty issuer script.

  • [CARDS-52990]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of new authentication data elements for schemes that were created before authentication type modification.

  • [CARDS-53031]

    • Corrected CHANGE_PIN processing on IRouter for combo-cards

  • [CARDS-53221]

    • Decreased possibility of deadlock when several authorization requests for one card are received at the same time.

  • [CARDS-53251]

    • Changed behaviour: now processing of authorization documents with service class Transaction, Online Payment or External Payment will change a contract's counter for authorization code generation independently of the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter value.

  • [CARDS-53291]

    • Fixed the inability to redefine the PARTIAL_APPROVAL_ENABLE property in Services or transaction subtypes.

  • [CARDS-53434]

    • Corrected behaviour: now an IPS STIP negative advice message (0120) creates a reversal document when it is received after posting an original request which was received in single-message mode.

  • [CARDS-53685]

    • Corrected secondary online messages routing when online and clearing channels are different.

  • [CARDS-53780]

    • Removed the CARDHOLDER transaction attribute from the <<All Contactless (Group)>> group transaction condition. Transaction Processing.

  • [CARDS-53788]

    • Corrected process information message for deactivated or absent token.

  • [CARDS-53822]

    • Tokens for Incontrol requests aren't checked as MDES/VDEP tokens.

  • [CARDS-53988]

    • Fixed processing of RC on IRouter. Negative RC Usage is now processed at the end of transaction processing.

  • [CARDS-54145]

    • Suppressed sending the corresponding message to the IPS when completion of a PIN change attempt is unsuccessful.

  • [CARDS-54245]

    • Incorrect Response Code 85 on TAR / TER for products without the MDES_TYPE tag has been changed to 05.

  • [CARDS-54268]

    • Added consideration of more scenarios for sequences for receiving financial and authorization messages to avoid unnecessary holds on cardholder funds which could occur if a financial document arrived earlier than an authorization. Improved processing performance.

  • [CARDS-54325]

    • Corrected filling document is_authorisation field for transit reversals

  • [CARDS-54419]

    • MDES: Changed RC to "00" for Tokenization Event Notification messages with Tokenization Event Indicator = 8.

  • [CARDS-54546]

    • Added the global parameter DETECT_FIN_PRESENTMENT_EARLIER_AUTH_ADVICE for incoming authorisation advice processing. This parameter's "N" value deactivates additional searching for previously processed financial advices.

  • [CARDS-54710]

    • Transit authorization reversal processing has been fixed. Previously reversals were rejected with RC 91 - "Autonomus mode disabled".

  • [CARDS-54897]

    • Fixed processing of transaction reversal messages for own cards on IRouter when communication with an external system is required (for example Risk or Banking).

  • [CARDS-54905]

    • Supported Activation Code Notification (ACN) transactions without token.

  • [CARDS-55079]

    • Corrected transit rejected message processing by IRouter to avoid to inserting unnecessary credit_history records.

  • [CARDS-55308]

    • Corrected reversal fraud prevention validation condition to avoid rejection of payment reversals.

  • [CARDS-55355]

    • Eliminated the ability to generate an authorisation code value unsuitable to VISA restrictions.

  • [CARDS-55387]

    • Restored processing of cases when a reversal transaction message is received before the authorization request. Added limit on the period for stopping attempts to search for reversals preceding the corresponding request. By default the search is performed within 24 hours. This period can be redefined with the global parameter UNM_AUTH_REV_FLASHBACK_DAYS.

  • [CARDS-55426]

    • Added check of received card data values on IRouter even if security values are absent in the message.

  • [CARDS-55507]

    • Corrected processing of authorization requests in SMS mode if a reversal message was received earlier.

  • [CARDS-55782]

    • Corrected the condition for creating notification messages about authorization request processing results. Now they can be generated not only for card contracts.

  • [CARDS-55810]

    • Added a new button, [Chain Log], to the "Stored Messages" form (menu: \OpenWay\Full\Online Monitoring\Logical Channels & SAF) The button opens a form showing ComsLog records related to the corresponding document chain.

  • [CARDS-56250]

    • Fixed incorrect document reprocessing after replication to HA solution primary node when request and reversal was received in wrong order.

  • [CARDS-56686]

    • Changed algorithm for message code parsing and generation. Now it considers message direction.

  • [CARDS-56799]

    • Changed the currency conversion processing algorithm for issuing authorizations. The required FX rates are obtained at the start of the operation and their values are frozen for the entire process to avoid cases when updated values are used in different steps of authorization.

  • [CARDS-56923]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of PIN_CHANGE message without security values on IRouter service.

  • [CARDS-57212]

    • Corrected the procedure for unlocking plastic for co-badge cards. An active status is set for all records associated with applications that are personalised on the card.

  • [CARDS-57404]

    • Fixed inability to use some tagged data on additional service transactions.

  • [I1611299904]/[CARDS-51699]

    • Added transfer destination identification type to the procedure for creating a document by a payment order to allow the use of other contract identifiers in addition to PAN.

  • [I1701111004]/[CARDS-51791]

    • Corrected processing of repeat messages for partial approved requests.

  • [I1701270697]/[CARDS-52291]

    • Fixed incorrect currency conversion rate use in issuer authorization after return from Stand-in.

  • [I1702160876, I1704098675]/[CARDS-52727]

    • Fixed Member Id definition for online routing. The change affects instances which route online messages by Member Id on NetServer/Transaction Switch.

  • [I1704076220]/[CARDS-52730]

    • Change PIN procedure has been corrected to avoid the possibility of falling into an infinite loop.

  • [I1704109597]/[CARDS-52737]

    • Feature implemented by CARDS-50877 has been revoked (financial document inherits MCC from authorisation on DirectP2P transactions) and previous behaviour has been restored.

  • [I1704243534]/[CARDS-52916]

    • Fixed "No Data Found" error during authorisation processing if contr_subtype.bin_record is invalid.

  • [I1705038641]/[CARDS-53109]

    • Eliminated the possibility for incorrect rejection of reversal for a partial approved request due to a different transaction amount.

  • [I1706151932]/[CARDS-53649]

    • Corrected processing of IPS STIP authorisation advices so that funds are not held when an online message is received after a clearing file.

  • [I1706200082]/[CARDS-53694]

    • Changed temporary variable declaration to avoid overflow.

  • [I1706305190]/[CARDS-53937]

    • Transit authorizations created by IRouter and rejected with negative RC aren't increasing usage limiter counters now.

  • [I1707247431]/[CARDS-54180]

    • Adjustment and Reversal financial documents that exceed the presentment amount are now posted to a dispute account with "Decline Service" posting status.

  • [I1707313211]/[CARDS-54296]

    • The Currency field of usage limiter templates with adaptive algorithms for calculating amount thresholds must be filled in. A usage limiter's Currency field value is saved every time the limiter is updated.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Usage_Limiters.pdf]

  • [I1708067216, I1710023006, I1801126919]/[CARDS-56400]

    • Corrected processing of timeout reversals with unexpected transaction id (ps_ref_number).

  • [I1708303819]/[CARDS-54590]

    • Fixed incorrect Usage Limiter processing when a product configuration uses one service package for related contracts with different currencies.

  • [I1709072151, I1711087480]/[CARDS-55725]

    • Excluded the possibility to route an authorization document to the source channel.

  • [I1709204499, I1709299082]/[CARDS-55117]

    • Corrected partial approval amount calculation to avoid reject when the request currency is more expensive than the card account currency.

  • [I1709297428]/[CARDS-55104]

    • Fixed repeat message processing when a CBS response to an original request has not yet been received.

  • [I1710022917]/[CARDS-55047]

    • Fixed authorization advice processing by issuers when messages are routed by a dedicated online service - AFF_AUTH or IRouter.

  • [I1710135034]/[CARDS-55135]

    • Corrected handling of transit financial advice when the message target is maintained in the same processing center.

  • [I1710135034]/[CARDS-55198]

    • Corrected handling of transit financial advice on NetServer when the message target is maintained in the same processing center.

  • [I1710259099]/[CARDS-55431]

    • Fixed issue. Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [I1711138024]/[CARDS-55916]

    • Corrected behaviour: now a reversal message is forwarded to the next member even when the response for processing the primary message has not yet been received.

  • [I1712288846]/[CARDS-56343]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation requests. An authorisation will no longer be rejected if two similar Warning messages occurred.

  • [I1802098715]/[CARDS-56742]

    • Corrected issuer EMV script generation procedure to avoid the possibility of deadlock when several requests for one card are received within a very short time.

  • [I1805236493]/[CARDS-58671]

    • Fixed error in authorization adjustment processing which can lead to extra funds holding when original document already accepted but not posted yet.

  • [PRIOR-67]/[CARDS-55710]

    • Disabled sensitive data storage for EMV cards.

  • [WFCKF-2846]/[CARDS-54843]

    • Corrected single message processing when a repeat was received on a High Availability secondary node.

  • [CARDS-51933]

    • Supported configuration of "Product Configuration ID" as contract subtype tag for MDES / VTS.

  • [CARDS-52080]

    • The TAR response code for VISA authorizations has been changed from 5 to the real response code of the transaction.

  • [CARDS-52104]

    • VDEP Active account management velocity checking result and Device identifier tags have been added to document.

  • [CARDS-52166]

    • Tokenization correlation identifier and device type for MDES transactions have been added to doc.add_info.

  • [CARDS-52180]

    • Primary account number source and Device type fields have been added under authentication scheme.

  • [CARDS-52198]

    • Final tokenization decision tag has been added to TNK_ACTIVATION message.

  • [CARDS-53714]

    • Added the ability to specify the AUTH_TOKEN_ANSW tag in Service details.

  • [CARDS-55064]

    • Tokenization Event Notification (TVN) message with Event Indicator 8 (exception) is allowed regardless of token number presence in a request. This TVN message doesn't change token status in the system (if present).

  • [CARDS-56291]

    • Added Merchant Initiated Transaction (MIT) validation to support NSPK MIR release 2018.1 article B-16 requirements.

    Updated Manuals: [ips_releases\20XX_XX_NSPK_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-57079]

    • Added processing of partial approval responses for transit authorisations. The approved amount is now stored in a document.

  • [I1804163563]/[CARDS-58380]

    • ATC validation rules has been changed according to Visa requirements. For Mass Transit Transactions (MTT or deferred KFT. SIC codes: 4111,4112,4131 or defined in the global parameter MTT_SIC_LIST ) with contactless cards incorrect ATC received will not result in decline transaction.

    JCB interface

  • [CARDS-51579]

    • JCB Variable Outward: fixed ARN field 31 subfield 2 filling. Now it matches PDE3901.2. Removed DE14 filling for non ICC transactions.

  • [CARDS-52320]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed incorrect creation of settlement documents with zero amount.

  • [CARDS-52365]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed rejected Interchange Message processing.

  • [CARDS-53216]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed "Settlement Data doesn't contain settlement amounts" error.

  • [CARDS-53558]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed filling of "transaction date" field for incoming S2 documents.

  • [CARDS-53579]

    • JCB Outward Processing.dll (pipe) : fixed size of letters for filling "Merchant Name" and "City Name" fields.

  • [CARDS-57532]

    • Fixed PDE3605 processing in JCB ISO Inward Processing and JCB ISO Outward Processing pipes. Fixed error when JCB ISO Inward Processing stops working on parsing unknown/incorrect subfields that are not used in processing.

  • [CARDS-57573]

    • Fixed "Mandatory field 30 of reference message (mtid 1240) is absent" error when exporting "Retrieval Request" message by "JCB ISO Outward Processing" pipe.

  • [CARDS-51481]

    • JCB ISO Outward (variable): added the "EXT_CURR_EXP" parameter for changing the currency exponent on transaction export.

  • [CARDS-52210]

    • JCB Rel Apr 17: supported IIN file format changes.

  • [CARDS-52399]

    • JCB ISO Outward Processing (pipe): improved DE4 and DE49 function for dispute transactions. If a document's reconciliation currency does not match the 1st presentment currency, the document's transaction amount/currency will be exported instead.

  • [CARDS-52832]

    • Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:JCB. Outward Processing.cpp).

  • [CARDS-53268]

    • JCB Outward: for all chip read transactions the "C" value is exported in 22.7 subfield.

  • [CARDS-53336]

    • JCB: Added message codes ("RjP-----","RJP-----","RmP-----","RmR-----") for reject processing.

  • [CARDS-53379]

    • JCB ISO. Added the "OWS.Accept Clearing" subitem to the menu item "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing".

  • [CARDS-53510]

    • JCB Outward Processing, JCB ISO Outward processing (pipes): added the ability to set up start sequence numbers for outgoing file numbering. If needed, the new "START_FILE_SEQ" pipe parameter must be set with the desired number.

  • [CARDS-53771]

    • JCB ISO Inward (pipe): added the ability to charge a cardholder using Cardholder Billing Amount (BIT 6) instead of Reconciliation Amount (BIT 5). "ACP_<memberid>"="Y" new pipe parameter must be set to use this functionality for a specific member.

  • [CARDS-53853]

    • JCB: Added menu items "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Outward Rejected" and "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Rejects".

  • [CARDS-53926]

    • [JCB Release 17.2] BIT54 is inherited now in chargebacks. No additional action is required.

  • [CARDS-53928]

    • [JCB Release 17.2] changed BIT 22.5 filling according to new documentation. The "JCB_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to enable this functionality.

  • [CARDS-56155]

    • Changed JCB BIN Table Import pipe. Supported loading of new values from the "Card Product" field. Information about a consumer/commercial is stored in the "bin_table.product_category" database field in MasterCard notation ("1"-consumer, "2"-commercial, "4"-other). Also, the bin_table.licensed_product_id database field is filled with a 3-symbol product code (see the PDSE3001 field in the BIG manual for the list of possible values).

  • [CARDS-56156]

    • Supported new ATM Access Fee functionality in JCB clearing inward and outward pipes pursuant to JCB April 2018 release.

  • [CARDS-56363]

    • Added JCB products.

  • [I1702212586]/[CARDS-52413]

    • JCB Interface fixed format (pipes): supported contactless PEM.

    MasterCard interface

  • [CARDS-53384]

    • MasterCard Automatic Billing Updater (MABU) and Visa Account Updater (VAU) are supported in issuing. VAU/MABU files are generated based on events for card issuing, reissuing and/or closing to be sent to the corresponding payment system.

  • [CARDS-50183]

    • Tariff Structure and Data Import: Added the parameter DATE_CHECK_MODE=ANY_DATE to the standard menu item for VISA and MasterCard.

  • [CARDS-55251]

    • Added a new parameter for the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report: P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The parameter defines an additional condition for showing transactions made on affiliate devices. Default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)".

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55728]

    • Supported Enhanced Value and Product Graduation MasterCard ALM programs.

  • [CARDS-56716]

    • Added a new parameter for the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report: P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The parameter defines an additional condition for showing transactions made on affiliate devices. Default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)".

  • [CARDS-56863]

    • Added a new action, "Rollback" (code "R") to Standard Handbook Type REMOTE_FILE_REQUEST__ACTION for VISA VAU functionality.

    Updated Manuals: [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf] [abu_issuing\visa_account_updater\Interacting_with_VAU_Issuing.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56864]

    • Supported export of records with new reason codes "X"—"Updates to new accounts" and "Y"—"Updates to old accounts" in "Account Change Data File" for the MasterCard ABU Issuer Service.

    Updated Manuals: [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48154]

    • Supported resubmitting a MasterCard DCC First Presentment without DCC if the acquirer gets a First Chargeback for the full amount with Reason Code 4846.

  • [CARDS-48323]

    • IRD configuration has been modified for Spain.

  • [CARDS-51489]

    • MasterCard CDF Export. Enhanced customization.

  • [CARDS-51752]

    • IRD configuration has been modified for IRD PW in EU.

  • [CARDS-51762]

    • Error in sending additional data for MDES TAR response has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51824]

    • IPS Products: Removed duplicated records for MasterCard.

  • [CARDS-51867]

    • MasterCard IPM Outward: Now PDS158 sf4 (IRD) for a second presentment is inherited from the presentment, not from the chargeback.

  • [CARDS-52448]

    • MasterCard PVV/PIN Export: Fixed record selection to satisfy "Full file replace" mode.

  • [CARDS-52606]

    • XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Merchants" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts. Calculation of the following rows has been updated: - Number of Mastercard Merchants - Number of new Merchants added this quarter - Number of Merchants lost this quarter

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52632]

    • Fixed incorrect value of "SubMerchantID" element in output xml file.

  • [CARDS-52658]

    • Bug fixed (incorrect status input Request).

  • [CARDS-52714]

    • MasterCard IPM Outward: Added trimming tag values for PDS0670.

  • [CARDS-53164]

    • MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed TOKEN_BIN tag filling in BIN Table.

  • [CARDS-53700]

    • MasterCard PIN PVV Offset Export. Added sorting by ID.

  • [CARDS-53759]

    • The XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business and XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business reports now show account balances in the "Delinquent Outstanding" section at the end of the last reporting period day.

  • [CARDS-54177]

    • IRD configuration has been modified for Interregional, LAC, AP and MEA regions.

  • [CARDS-54299]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing. Rollbacked issue CARDS-52613. Changed CH Payment transaction processing if Fast Funds option is used (the value of the global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS is Y).

  • [CARDS-54316]

    • MasterCard Inward: If pipe parameter USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION=N, Cardholder Payment transactions will not be converted to Notifications (Fast Funds mode).

  • [CARDS-54417]

    • Added new statistic attributes "Contract Group: AMEX Card Brand" (AMEX_BRAND), "Contract Group: MC Card Brand" (MC_BRAND), "Contract Group: VISA Card Brand" (VISA_BRAND) to enhance statistics gathering on transactions performed on account contract level data if a client's account contract can have several valid cards (card contracts) for different payment systems. In this case, the new MC_BRAND or VISA_BRAND values should be set for the P_ATTR_PS_CONTRACT_NAME parameter for the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Busines" reports, respectively. No changes in report parameter settings are required to support current report behaviour.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54465]

    • Safe Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of the "Chargeback Indicator" field for "Acquirer Loss" and "Issuer Loss" records.

  • [CARDS-54523]

    • IPM ONUS Outward Processing (pipe): added support for PDS0207 ("Wallet Identifier").

  • [CARDS-54612]

    • Enhanced calculation for "Number Of Issued Chip Cards", "of which are only Contact", "of which are Contact and Contactless", "of which are only Contactless", "of which are micro tags", "Number Of Active Cards (at least one transaction)", "Number Of Active Cards (at least one Contactless transaction)", "Number of Accounts", and "Number of Active Accounts" fields in the "Card Issuance" section of the "Visa Statistics Issuing Business" report. Now only contracts/accounts with valid statuses are included in calculations of the values listed above. Contract status history can be taken into account. For the "Accounts and Cards" section of the"MC Statistics Issuing Business" report: Enhanced calculation for the "Accounts at beginning of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), "Accounts at end of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), "Cards at beginning of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), and "Cards at end of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total) fields. Now the values listed above are calculated based on contract/account status validity where contract status history can be taken into account. Renamed the "Of which are MasterCard contactless" field to "Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled". Corrected calculation for "Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued". Now all valid cards enabled to perform contactless transactions are calculated; previously only active cards were calculated.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54750]

    • MasterCard IRD Configuration loading from MPE. Fixed checking of Full MPE IRD Configuration presence when loading Daily MPE files.

  • [CARDS-54928]

    • MasterCard CDF Export: Fixed "Country is not specified!" error. Now the pipe doesn't ignore the custom value of the "CountryCode" field.

  • [CARDS-54984]

    • MasterCard MPE Import: Fixed error "Absent or empty MPE table(s) IP0105T1,IP0106T1! Incorrect MPE Full file."

  • [CARDS-55014]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation and Fee Prediction: Removed dependency on USE_OWN_FX parameter. Added additional global parameter IF_FX_TYPE_MC to override default rate type.

  • [CARDS-55066]

    • Improved performance of XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report.

  • [CARDS-55161]

    • MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed loading table IP0053T1 (Interchange Fee Type).

  • [CARDS-55164]

    • Resolved an issue with the Delinquent Outstanding section in the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" reports when they do not contain data for account contracts having both the Credit and Charge card contracts attached.

  • [CARDS-55501]

    • Fixed an issue when ABU messages were wrongly selected and sent to IPS online by Transaction Switch DBFileUpdate.

  • [CARDS-55614]

    • MasterCard CDF Export: fixed processing of the "CustomIdentifierType" field defined in the ADD_FIELDS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTION_5000 pipe parameter. The "CustomIdentifierType" field was erroneously filled with the "CustomIdentifier" custom tag value instead of the "CustomIdentifierType" custom tag value. Also fixed "CustomIdentifier" field processing - it is cut if length is greater than allowed by the format.

  • [CARDS-55628]

    • Fixed the customized fields processing for MasterCard CDF Export process. If a customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters had [null] value, non-customized value was used for export. Now standard value is used only when there is no customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters. Otherwise, a customized value is used even if it has [null] value.

  • [CARDS-56438]

    • Added mapping Ethiopia country code 230 to 231. Included the country Myanmar in "MC: Asia Pacific (C)" region. MasterCard Fee Prediction.

  • [CARDS-56444]

    • Added MasterCard product "Prepaid Maestro Consumer Reloadable Card" with Licence Product Id OLR to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).

  • [CARDS-56459]

    • Fixed loading files containing "eof" symbol. MABU Issuer Response File Import.

    Updated Manuals: [abu_issuing\mastercard_automatic_billing_updater\Interacting_with_MABU_Issuing.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56616]

    • Supported database currencies overrides for the MasterCard CDF interface.

  • [CARDS-56654]

    • Fixed an issue when an inappropriate original_doc was selected for preparing an outward message in SAFE Outward Processing pipe.

  • [CARDS-56671]

    • Added the ability to skip export of unchanged corporations for the MasterCard CDF Export interface.

  • [CARDS-56867]

    • Added saving of FAST_FUNDS=Y; document tag for incoming payments loaded by IPM Inward Processing pipe, this should help to forward such documents to affiliates more accurately.

  • [CARDS-57038]

    • Removed erroneous saving of FAST_FUNDS=Y; document tag for incoming payments loaded by IPM Inward Processing pipe .

  • [CARDS-57146]

    • Fixed DE11 and DE120.4 fields filling for MC ALM Export pipe according to MasterCard engineer comments. DE11 is filled sequentially and starts with 1 now. DE120.4 is filled with spaces in records with the "Delete" action.

  • [CARDS-57153]

    • Fixed DE54 cashback amount filling for Chargebacks and 2nd Presentments exported by the IPM Outward Processing pipe.

  • [CARDS-57725]

    • Fixed grants for INSERT into the "ADDENDUM_DOC" table for the "IPM Inward Processing" pipe.

  • [CARDS-57739]

    • Supported the ability to edit suspended ABU requests. Added checking for MasterCard Issuer ABU Replace requests.

  • [I1512213945]/[CARDS-51668]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing: fixed FILE_MASK parameter processing in silent mode.

  • [I1608222937]/[CARDS-52329]

    • For reports: XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf improved counting of cards reissued with different PANs.

  • [I1610186701]/[CARDS-50947]

    • MasterCard SAFE: Suppported Fraud Negative Reporting Record Reject processing.

  • [I1611016818]/[CARDS-56436]

    • Fixed CAB condition processing for IRD calculation. Previously CABs were loaded by the MPE Import pipe in SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB. Now the MPE Import pipe doesn't load/update SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB and the IRD Calculation process gets CAB directly from the MPE_IP0075T1 table. To see the MCC-CAB relation, use the menu items "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. IRD Configuration\MC MCC CAB Groups" or "OpenWay\MasterCard Fee Prediction\MC MCC CAB Groups".

  • [I1611305517]/[CARDS-51501]

    • Interchange tariffs have been modified for EU (Intra-Western) in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Manual.

  • [I1612200174]/[CARDS-51505]

    • MasterCard IPM Outward: Now we don't send DE54 Cashback amount in chargebacks.

  • [I1701112611]/[CARDS-52396]

    • A new parameter has been added to the "MC Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. The default value has been changed for the P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 - checks by group_channel are extended by analysis of card_brand for support of affiliated transactions - " trans.chain_type in ('U') and target.card_brand like 'E_%' ".

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [I1702012564]/[CARDS-51961]

    • MasterCard MPE Import: excluded the IP0036T1 table from checking for presence.

  • [I1703022929]/[CARDS-52560]

    • MasterCard Transaction Processing: Added message codes for Retrieval Request Reversal.

  • [I1703138261]/[CARDS-52801]

    • MasterCard IPM Outward: Now documents with an invalid Approval Code will be suspended. MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward: Now if a document has an invalid Approval Code, this Approval Code won't be exported.

  • [I1703287643]/[CARDS-52613]

    • MasterCard IPM Inward: Now MoneySend transactions are converted to Notifications (by the additional global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS=Y) only for programs (PDS0043) C07, C52, C53, C54, C55, C56, C57 and C67.

  • [I1703308844]/[CARDS-52624]

    • The file name parameter in CC files has been fixed.

  • [I1704041217]/[CARDS-53192]

    • MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward. The pipe no longer fills DE93.

  • [I1705100654]/[CARDS-53824]

    • IPM Inward Processing (pipe) added grant on select from vec_history.

  • [I1705154150]/[CARDS-53184]

    • MasterCard PVV Offset Export. Fixed error if no data to export.

  • [I1705222395]/[CARDS-53347]

    • MC IPM Outward. Now the pipe doesn't fill DE38 (Approval Code) for non-intracountry transactions in Offline Chip Card Data Input Mode.

  • [I1705263934]/[CARDS-53784]

    • IPM Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing when DE43.2 contains incorrect symbols.

  • [I1706022663]/[CARDS-53682]

    • NSPK MPE Loading: fixed situation when not all issuer records for one MasterCard range are copied to NSPK BIN group.

  • [I1706200311, I1709199952]/[CARDS-54930]

    • Corrected IPM Outward Processing behaviour: to avoid rejects for 2nd Presentments and Arbitration Chargebacks when previous incoming message contains incorrect fields, fields and PDS from the original document (1st presentment) are used for inheritance when generating an outgoing message.

  • [I1707037614]/[CARDS-53871]

    • IPM Inward Processing: fixed "Length = [1] data elements is out of Allowed Range = [3-3] for Variable Length Field 407" error.

  • [I1708302783]/[CARDS-54684]

    • MC MPE Import: Now pipe doesn't load MPE table IP0017T1 (currency). Currency table must be updated manually.

  • [I1710098485]/[CARDS-55125]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation. Fixed IRD PT definition: added condition for requirement "The card cannot be a contactless card".

  • [I1710103681]/[CARDS-58005]

    • Fixed "ORA-01000: maximum open cursors exceeded" error. Added grants for CM_CASE_FILE and CM_CASE_OBJ tables. Affected pipe: com.openwaygroup.pipe.mc.mastercom_import.jar.

  • [I1710137253]/[CARDS-55184]

    • IPM Inward Processing: fixed error when processing file with reconciliation message which contains "000" currency code.

  • [I1711137893]/[CARDS-55724]

    • Fixed the calculation algorithm for the PS_TRN_NAME statistic attribute in all statistics reports. The algorithm uses the document's source and target channel codes to define a transaction Payment Scheme. Added the priority to choose a channel code for calculation: On-Us channels have the highest priority, then Affiliated channels are taken into account, and other channels have the lowest priority in the algorithm. Without such prioritization, the PS_TRN_NAME attribute could have an incorrect value for transactions processed in the channels other than On-Us and Affiliated channels.

  • [I1711236209]/[CARDS-55890]

    • Corrected getting default values for report fields in MasterCard report "Location Administration Tool (LAT)" (OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Reports\ATM Location). If the proper parameter value is not set in the device contract, default values from sy_handbook (with filter: group_code="MC_LAT_ATM") are used. Refer to OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_ATM_Location_Report.pdf for details.

  • [I1712120116]/[CARDS-56552]

    • Fixed filling the SAFE_DOC.CARD_TYPE database field for incoming SAFE documents loaded by the "SAFE Inward Processing" pipe. Now it is filled with null value instead of spaces when the "Card Type" field is empty in the incoming message.

  • [I1712214237]/[CARDS-56547]

    • Fixed "Chip Data not present" error when exporting Chip Credit (Purchase Return) transaction without EMV data available.

  • [I1801178161]/[CARDS-57872]

    • Fixed the issue when currency conversion cross rate was not used for creation of the MasterCard 2nd Presentment.

  • [I1803203744]/[CARDS-57167]

    • Fixed an issue when Maestro card transactions were erroneously exported by the IPM Outward Processing pipe with DE 03.1 filled with the value "18" (unique transaction).

  • [I1804266823]/[CARDS-57720]

    • Fixed DE22.SF7 filling for key entry transactions when exporting documents by "IPM Outward Processing" pipe.

  • [I1805013208]/[CARDS-58202]

    • Added a check in the IRD calculation process that amount conversion (when it happens) is successful.

  • [I1805087350]/[CARDS-58130]

    • Fixed "ORA-01031: insufficient privileges" error on "com.openwaygroup.pipe.mc.mastercom_import.jar" pipe execution by adding grant select for the CM_CASE table.

  • [I1805303476]/[CARDS-58050]

    • Fixed DE22.7 filling for offline contactless M/Chip transactions when exporting to MasterCard using the "IPM Outward Processing" pipe.

  • [I1807169810, I1807149196, I1807169369, I1807169291, I1807169328]/[CARDS-58526]

  • [NEO-65]/[CARDS-57474]

  • [CARDS-56150]

    • Supported AN 1097 enhancement pursuant to MasterCard 18.Q2 release. Now information from PDSs 0397, 0398, 0399 (Extended Decimal Precision amounts) is used instead of 0392,0393,0395 if the USE_EXT_PRECIS_FEE=Y pipe parameter is set and EDP PDSs are present in incoming Financial Position Detail/1644 or Settlement Position Detail/1644 message.

    • Changed MasterCard IRD SA configuration according to the article AN 1103.

  • [CARDS-56371]

  • [CARDS-56372]

    • Unmasked licensed product MWP (MasterCard World Prepaid) from MCW (World MasterCard Card). Added new products WPD (World Prepaid Debit) and ACS (Digital Debit) according to MasterCard release 18.Q2 articles AN 1043 and AN 1056.

    • Changed MasterCard services according to article AN 1064.

  • [CARDS-56567]

  • [CARDS-56650]

    • Changed MasterCard IRDs SA, IRD 43 (for Europe acquirers only), and IRD 79 (for Europe acquirers only) configuration according to Article AN 1103 dated 06.02.2018.

  • [CARDS-56652]

  • [CARDS-56782]
