    • Messenger banking: a requirement for the value of the session_expiry_sec parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "300" in accordance with PA-DSS.

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

  • [CARDS-54409]

    • Renamed "WAY4 PCI DSS Implementation Guide" document to "WAY4 PA-DSS Implementation Guide". The document has been supplemented by the following requirements: prohibit automatic creation of Heap Dump; encryption of the connection from the client browser to the IIS web server; hide wsruntime debugging information; mandatory setup of application authorization using client certificates.

    Updated Manuals: [security_and_key_management\PA-DSS_Implementation_Guide.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55259]

    • Updated document: key size requirement has been changed (112 bits for 3DES, 128 bits for AES, and least 2048 bits for RSA algorithm).

    Updated Manuals: [security_and_key_management\PA-DSS_Implementation_Guide.pdf]

  • [I1703036213]/[CARDS-52262]

    • Changed incorrect reference to nscipher.exe to the correct <APP_SERVER>\appserver\bin\tools\nscipher.exe in "PA DSS Implementation Guide".

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

    Statistical Reports

  • [CARDS-52728]

    • Added grouping of totals by regions in the "BILLINGS & FEES" section of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56485]

    • Added a new parameter to the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report: P_FILTER_3, varchar2(4000), the default value is "1=1" The parameter should be used to filter ATM devices when calculating "Total ATM" and "Total EMV Compliant ATM" values in the "ATM Statistics" report section.

  • [CARDS-56949]

    • Added a new parameter P_IF_ACTIVE_STMT (varchar2(1), the default value is "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report. The parameter defines how to calculate the "Number of Statements Mailed" value - by valid cards (=Y) or by all account contracts (=N). Changed the P_REPORT_TYPE parameter processing to support writing SQL statements in it.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-57645]

    • Added a new parameter P_IF_ACTIVE_STMT (varchar2(1), the default value is "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report. The parameter defines how to calculate the "Number of Statements Mailed" value - by valid cards (=Y) or by all account contracts (=N). Changed the P_REPORT_TYPE parameter processing to support writing SQL statements in it.

  • [CARDS-57890]

    • Added in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report for Europe (P_CEMEA=N): - New report section "Cross Border Acquiring Data". - New report parameters: 1) P_SHOW_CROSS_BORDER (varchar2(1), default value is "Y"). The parameter turns on/off the new section "Cross Border Acquiring Data". 2) P_ACQ_OWN_COUNTRY (varchar2(3), default value is null). The parameter defines the merchant's homeland(3-symbol country code, like 'RUS', 'JPN' and etc) to determine cross border transactions in the "Cross Border Acquiring Data" section.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [I1608314406]/[CARDS-56470]

    • Added a new parameter to the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report: P_FILTER_3, varchar2(4000), the default value is "1=1" The parameter should be used to filter ATM devices when calculating "Total ATM" and "Total EMV Compliant ATM" values in the "ATM Statistics" report section.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52656]

    • In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report for Visa Europe region (P_CEMEA=N) supported split of transactions into groups: "Immediate Debit" and "Credit & deferred Debit". Please refer to Chapter 1 "General Settings", "Card Category Classification" paragraph of the OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf manual for configuration details.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52860]

    • The "Account Balances" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report has been corrected: - Corrected calculation of 'Credit Outstanding Balance Total' and 'Current Credit Outstanding Balance' amount when the P_MIRROR_OVD parameter value is 'Y'. - Changed row order to fit AMEX specification requirements. - Delinquency group's rows are shown with zero values if there are no corresponding data.

  • [CARDS-56135]

    • Excluded balance duplicates in the "Account Balances" section of the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56158]

    • Corrected calculation of "Interest Rates" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56313]

    • Corrected splitting by currency in the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report in accordance with AMEX specification requirements. If the P_FX_CUR parameter is left empty, the "Billings by Industry", "Account Balances", and "Interest Rates" sections are grouped by card contract currency whereas before they were grouped by settlement currency.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56362]

    • Corrected calculation MEMBER_ID while gathering statistics for Quarterly IPS Reports.

  • [CARDS-56601]

    • Corrected the logic for checking contract groups for a case when an acquiring MEMBER_ID changed during the reporting period. Now transactions are split into two groups by MEMBER_ID. This may downgrade performance of statistics collecting.

  • [CARDS-56746]

    • Deleted report form 'Trial Balance.rdf' as obsolete.

  • [CARDS-56747]

    • Changed the P_TITLE parameter default values: "Account Trial GL Balance" for the "GL_Trial_Balance.rdf" report. "Account Trial Balance" for the "Trial Balance.rdf" report. "Trial Account Balance" for the "Trial_Balance.rdf" report.

  • [CARDS-57002]

    • Added process messages for process "Fill Contract Groups Update", use parameter DEBUG='Y'

  • [CARDS-57085]

    • Enhanced determination of the IPS Member Identifier (MEMBER_ID stat attribute) for acquiring contracts (statistical contract groups for acquiring contracts): now "Payment Scheme Identification" (OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Payment Scheme Identification) can be configured to specify the correct MEMBER_ID.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-57566]

    • Supported the ability to configure additional groups in the SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Billing by Industry for ..." sections.

  • [CARDS-57625]

    • Enhanced logic for 'Cards at end of quarter' field in report "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" - exclude blocked cards.

  • [CARDS-57640]

    • Corrected 'Number Of Active Cards' for XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.

  • [CARDS-57690]

    • Enhanced contract cache in gathering statistics for performance reasons.

  • [CARDS-57970]

    • Added a new parameter P_PAYMENT_SCHEME (varchar2(255), default value is "W") for the "XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" and "XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices" reports. The parameter defines payment schemes which should be present in the report.

    Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-58382]

    • Added a new parameter P_ADDRESS_LINE for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report (varchar2(255), default value is "to_char(c.billing_contract) || ad.address_line_1") for customising calculation of merchant outlets.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-58383]

    • Changed logic for 'New Cards Obtained During the Quarter' field in 'XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business'

  • [I1608314406]/[CARDS-54562]

    • Enhanced calculation of VISA_MEMBER_ID, AMEX_MEMBER_ID, MC_MEMBER_ID statistical attributes in order to correct transactions fetching of certain IPS in XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf reports.

  • [I1608314406]/[CARDS-54939]

    • Improved performance of XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.

  • [I1701094565]/[CARDS-52846]

    • Improved performance of Quarterly IPS Reporting by caching statistic attribute values when the report runs. The improvement affects Issuing and Acquiring reports for AmEx, MasterCard and Visa.

  • [I1701130003]/[CARDS-55936]

    • Corrected calculation of "Balance loaded onto cards during the quarter" value in the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now it is not multiplied by number of related contracts.

  • [I1705170227]/[CARDS-53896]

    • New parameters have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: - P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. - P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 and P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 have been added for filtering transactions. The default value for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 is "trans.chain_type in ('U')"; for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 it is "1=2". - P_HIDE_REPOST. The default value is "Y". Used to hide reversal and repost operations. - P_FX_RATE. The default value is empty. - P_FX_DATE. The default value is empty. - P_FX_CURR. The default value is empty. New sections have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: - Discount Business Summary - POS Billing Detail By Industry

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [I1805161998]/[CARDS-57912]

    • Improved the performance of statistics gathering for Quarterly IPS reporting.

  • [I1805161998]/[CARDS-58129]

    • Added a new parameter P_CACHE_MTR (varchar2(1), default value is = "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf" report. The parameter makes it possible to use temporary tables to cache useful data to improve performance in the "Card Issuance" report section.

  • [I1805163324]/[CARDS-58079]

    • Corrected parameter name P_TRN_BALANCE_TRASFER -> P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Defined the default value for parameter P_TRN_BALANCE_TRANSFER = "Balance Transfers". Changed the default value for parameter P_TRN_PAYMENT from "CH Payment" to "Payments".

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [I1805174949]/[CARDS-57853]

    • Fixed calculation algorithm for the following values in the"MC Statistics Issuing Business" report: - Breakout of EMV-compliant Chip-enabled Cards - Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled - Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued - Total MasterCard contactless enabled Phones issued - Total MasterCard contactless enabled alternative form factors. Now a contract is counted if it is valid at the end of the report period. Previously, the validity of the contract was checked at the beginning of the period.

  • [I1805174949]/[CARDS-58073]

    • Changed counting of contracts that are shown in HDR section of the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report: -Breakout of EMV-compliant Chip-enabled Cards -Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled -Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued -Total MasterCard contactless enabled Phones issued -Total MasterCard contactless enabled alternative form factors. Now only valid and blocked contracts as of the end of the billing period are counted (previously only valid contracts were counted).

  • [I1805174949]/[CARDS-58245]

    • In report "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" added number formatting for section "Transactions Feature Details" for "Cards at beginning of quarter" exclude blocked cards, as for "Cards at end of quarter"

  • [I1807269792]/[CARDS-58682]

    • Modified the "Account Charges and Fees" section of the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now CustomFees that only exist as GL_TRACE records can also be included in calculations without fee counts limit.

  • [I1711091288]/[CARDS-56053]

    • Supported MasterCard requirements Q1 2018 in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report. Transaction data is reported in two separate forms: acquiring debit, acquiring credit.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

    Tariff management

  • [CARDS-51648]

    • Calculation of service fees depending on different tariffs for portions of one transaction amount has been implemented.

  • [CARDS-50515]

    • On code level supported uniqueness for tariffs by the "Tariff Code" and "Tariff Role" fields.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51097]

    • Tariff personalization forms have been enhanced. A separate form, "Tariff By Contract" that can be viewed at OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf shows contract tariffs that are available for personalization and makes it possible to personalize the product/template tariff or to restore the default value. Personalization can be performed by defining new tariff values, all other data is copied from the template/global tariff with the same "Tariff Code Ext" value.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51721]

    • A new Tariff Role, "Conversion" has been supported to define FX Rate markup. These tariffs are used in multi-currency acquiring Products to support an acquirer conversion margin over the bank's internal or external FX rates and merchant reimbursement in a currency other than the transaction settlement currency.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53359]

    • Forms and actions for managing Product Tariff Campaigns have been implemented. A separate license is required. A manual for Product Tariff Campaigns has been created: [loyalty\loyalty_discounts\Tariff_Campaign.pdf].

    Updated Manuals: Loyalty | Tariff Campaign

  • [CARDS-56465]

    • Implemented the ability to set the "BASE_TARIFF" tag for tariffs that are Base Tariffs themselves.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [UFX-363]

    • The Tariff Import pipe now supports importing a subdomain without its parent domain.

  • [UFX-373]

    • Support of a new "Conversion" Tariff Role has been added to tariff import/export pipes.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\export_import\xml_tariff_schema.chm]

  • [I1612147610]/[CARDS-51483]

    • The "Duplicate with Data" activity is now available for tariff subdomains. The result of "Duplicate with Data" is that all "Is Ready" status tariff data values are duplicated in the same "Is Ready" status.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51486]

    • Additional validation for global tariff data input has been added. When "Start Date" is not specified, the ability to set the tariff from the current banking date will be validated. When it is prohibited, the error message "Tariff Start Date Missing" will be returned.

  • [CARDS-51674]

    • Contract parameters with "Location of Current Value = TARIFF" configuration can be used now in Standing Orders and Event Types as tag values to redefine fixed amounts/counters with tariff data values.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51836]

    • Optimized load of personal tariffs for large contract hierarchies.

  • [CARDS-52302]

    • Corrected loyalty action limit restriction if bonus service is configured for another contract using the CONTRACT_FOR tag.

  • [CARDS-53170]

    • Service limit tariffs with preference based on Issuer country (Area) can now be used for source services.

  • [CARDS-53182]

    • To apply a Tax Tariff according to its own Date From instead of an Interest Tariff apply mode's From Billing Start, set the tag TAX_APPLY_MODE=OWN; in the Tax Tariff apply rules.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\Interests_Accrual.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54016]

    • For domains with the ATTACH SUBS tag, only subdomains with the same category will be attached.

  • [CARDS-54126]

    • When approving a personal tariff, Tariff Start Date will be checked by the date of the contract's financial institution.

  • [CARDS-54287]

    • Ageing reclassification behaviour has been enhanced. Threshold amount "WAIVED_PD" can now be compared according to the following rule: account balance less than or equal to "WAIVED_PD" amount. By default, account balance should be less than "WAIVED_PD". To use the comparison rule "less than or equal to", set the parameter "WAIVED_PD_MODE" to "<=" on the financial institution level, or in additional Global Parameters.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [core\multiple_financial_institutions\Financial_Institutions.pdf] [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-58094]

    • Implemented ability to redefine Due Period for End Cycle Due accounts via tariffs. Previously it was not supported for End Cycle Due accounts.

  • [UFX-314]

    • Creation of file_info records has been fixed for the tariff_import pipe.

  • [UFX-370]

    • Corrected UFX schema for tariffs to allow simultaneous presence of TariffTypeExt with TariffCode or TariffCodeExt elements.

  • [I1611102688]/[CARDS-52306]

    • Added check of "Value Days" field length for "Service Value Days" tariff.

  • [I1701271032]/[CARDS-51919]

    • Changing Interest Tariff Apply Mode without changing interest rates has been enhanced.

  • [I1704245840]/[CARDS-52943]

    • The "No data found" exception error has been fixed during Advanced Application R1 file processing for Personal Usage Activation, in case of Limit Tariff in usage template.

  • [I1802213751]/[CARDS-57066]

    • Corrected account interest rate definition from an interest tariff for account templates with the INT_RATE_MODE in cases when the tariff domain was changed for the contract right before the contract's closing.

  • [NET-203]/[CARDS-58649]

    • Added check of "Due Period" and "Grace Period" field length for the "Ageing" tariff.

    Third-party batch interface

  • [I1701316576]/[CARDS-52274]

    • RBS. Outward Processing: Added logging amounts: Total Amount from DB, Total File Amount, Total Source Amount.

    Tokenization

  • [CARDS-55119]

    • Added token scheme parameters T_STATUS, WSP_DEVNAME, WSP_DEVID, and WSP_L4DIG.

    Transaction management

  • [CARDS-52529]

    • Enhanced inheritance of document tags, transaction conditions and attributes to a financial presentment from an authorization document. In addition to inheritance for documents from our devices, attributes are inherited for our issuing documents and sponsor for acquirer documents. Sponsor document inheritance can be turned off by using the COND_INH_FOR_AFF global parameter where "Y" allows attribute inheritance and "N" disables it. The document tag with same values can also be used.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51462]

    • The [Check] button has been added to the form OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\!!! STAFF ONLY !!!\Main Dictionaries\Transaction Conditions. To make sure that transactions are processed according to Transaction Conditions setup, please verify that the check procedure finished successfully.

  • [CARDS-53097]

    • A document's posting date is used instead of transaction date to calculate ARN.

  • [CARDS-53117]

    • Filling Invoice Party Name for Direct Credit from the RCEIVR_NAME document tag has been supported.

  • [CARDS-54573]

    • Global parameters AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT and AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL which specify allowed difference percentage between authorization and financial presentment can now be set on Transaction Subtype (highest priority) and Financial Institution level. The parameter values could be set in two ways: as a number or tag name. If the parameter value is set with a tag name, percentage value should be set with this tag in the target contract product.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [core\multiple_financial_institutions\Financial_Institutions.pdf] [tags description] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56452]

    • Supported matching of financial and authorization documents for tokenized transactions when detokenization is done by own acquiring. Matching is done by credit history for the target contract which should be the same in both documents.

  • [CARDS-49686]

    • The WAY4Manager form "GL Transfer No Edit.dataform.xml" now displays the "Extracted" value instead of the code "E" for the GL Entry status field.

  • [CARDS-51300]

    • Import of historic acquiring transactions has been fixed to support source contract custom search by Merchant ID (if the terminal ID is not present in WAY4). This functionality is only used during migration from legacy platforms to WAY4.

  • [CARDS-51496]

    • Now we collect multiple authorizations for one presentment only if ps_ref_number (TREF) are equal.

  • [CARDS-51569]

    • Non tariff-dependent conditions for usage limiters with tariffs are checked before tariff search to minimize database load.

  • [CARDS-51783]

    • Matching procedure for Transit (Affiliated) Authorization and Financial documents has been fixed in cases when a transaction from an Affiliated Acquirer is addressed to an Issuer located on the same WAY4 host as the Affiliated Acquirer through connection to Payment Systems because there is no direct settlement (no interbranch routing setup) between such Affiliated Acquirer and Issuer Institutions. In such configuration WAY4 system logs two pairs of authorization and financial documents (from Affiliated Acquirer to Payment System and from Payment System to own Issuer).

  • [CARDS-51960]

    • Country Table: Revised record for Madagascar. Code (3 bytes) must be "MDG", Code (2 bytes) must be "MG", Code (Numeric) must be "450", Curr Name must be "MALAGASY ARIARY", Curr Code must be "MGA", N Curr Code must be "969". No impact on transaction processing.

  • [CARDS-52027]

    • A financial document will not be matched with an authorization that has a different "PS Reference Number".

  • [CARDS-52229]

    • Conditions for the "Message" link in the ROOT\OpenWay\MasterCard\MC\ File Management\MC Message To Member form and the "Errors" link in the OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Doc - General Form\All Docs form have been changed: filtering by the Object Type field has been added.

  • [CARDS-52395]

    • Functionality missing in 03.44 for linking a financial document to a matched preauthorization document has been restored. If a financial document received in back-office from an OnUs source, is matched with a preauthorization document during the document processing procedure, the preauthorization document's identifier is stored in the financial document's add_info field as the value of the "PREAUTH_ID" tag. System identifiers that a document was received from an OnUs source when at least one of the following conditions is met: 1. A document Source Channel is indicated with the parameter IsOnUs=Yes or IsOnUs=null in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Message Channels". 2. A document Source Member Id value is null or is marked in the BIN Table with the "CAN_BE_ONUS;" tag or the value is registered as "Acq BIN" in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Bank Acquiring Parameters" used for own acquiring configuration, or a financial institution is registered for this Member ID value in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Financial Institutions".

  • [CARDS-52692]

    • Document processing behaviour when secondary documents had a higher priority in the financial documents matching procedure than original documents has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52768]

    • Document Processing has been fixed to support matching between Financial and Auhtorization/Transit Authorization documents received from different sources.

  • [CARDS-52803]

    • A new global parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL has been added. The new parameter is used for all transactions except those with hotel, car rental or airline MCC codes, for which the existing parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT is used. This parameter can set the maximum difference between authorization and financial presentment amounts as a percentage. If the difference is below this value, the whole blocked amount will be unblocked, otherwise only the financial amount will be unblocked.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52809]

    • Fixed funds unblocking when multiple presentments for one authorization are posted in an order different from accept order.

  • [CARDS-52833]

    • Fixed definition of terminal category to search for target dispute contract in posting history documents.

  • [CARDS-52868]

    • Fixed funds unblocking in the case of multiple authorizations with multiple presentments.

  • [CARDS-52934]

    • Fixed error on adjustment document posting if the original authorization was deleted by the Housekeeping process.

  • [CARDS-53023]

    • Fixed matching of a transit authorization with a financial presentment from an external channel on the sponsor side.

  • [CARDS-53187]

    • The document processing procedure has been improved to support Sales Completion documents matching by shipment identifier (stored in the document add_info field as a value of the PACKAGE_ID tag) for Multiple Capture (Split Shipment) transactions for aggregators.

  • [CARDS-53193]

    • Correct funds unblocking is supported for multiple financial presentments and multiple authorizations in different currencies for one transaction chain. In this case, the new pending amount is calculated as the difference between all authorizations pending (without fees) and the financial presentment settlement amount converted into the contract currency. Then it is accumulated under the first matched authorization. The pending value for the initial authorization is stored in the document add_info tags BLK_BASE, BLK_FEE, BLK_CURR.

  • [CARDS-53214]

    • Fixed incorrect filling of source and target number fields for chargeback documents if the message contains EMV cryptogram data.

  • [CARDS-53373]

    • Transaction conditions and attributes inheritance from authorization document is supported for tokenized transactions.

  • [CARDS-53548]

    • Card Expire information will not be inherited from an authorization if it is already filled in the financial document.

  • [CARDS-53572]

    • Filling of merchant information for Batch Header documents added on document accept.

  • [CARDS-53736]

    • A new global parameter AUTH_SKIP_TAGS_INHERIT has been added. This parameter makes it possible to skip inheritance of special tags from an authorization to a financial document; these tags should be listed in the parameter value. The online tags ACQ_USG,ONLINE and OPID are always skipped.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54066]

    • Now the system does not search for transit authorization documents during financial document processing if the document was created in SMS mode (the initial authorization document was converted to financial during issuing authorization processing). If no transit authorizations are created at all due to system configuration, the global parameter SKIP_TRANSIT_AUTH_SEARCH with the "Y" value can be set to omit transit authorization search.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54105]

    • Eliminated unnecessary search for a transit authorization during financial document accept if WAY4 online acquiring was used and the card is an "own" card ("OnUs"). A new value has been added for the SKIP_TRANSIT_AUTH_SEARCH global parameter: in addition to "Y" and "N", a comma-delimited list of channel codes can be specified. No transit authorization search will be made for financial documents from these channels.

  • [CARDS-54313]

    • Notification Credit Item is converted into a financial document with CH Payment transaction type if the corresponding financial document could not be found and FF_SRC_CODE is present in document info.

  • [CARDS-54426]

    • When a financial presentment is created by online processes and the PREAUTH_ID tag is present, a check for duplicate presentments is skipped on this document accept. For partial shipments, documents created by the online module are not checked for duplication.

  • [CARDS-54429]

    • Added new API in trans_api package: GET_MTR_ACC_CURR_EXT() - returns account currency for transaction GET_MTR_DUE_STATUS_EXT() - returns due status from item_due for transaction GET_MTR_DUE_DATE_EXT() - returns due date from item_due for transaction

  • [CARDS-54469]

    • Transaction Conditions: Changed defaults for tokenized base TC to corresponding non-tokenized TC.

  • [CARDS-54501]

    • Fixed the algorithm for custom non-group transaction condition code processing. Previously the code had been trimmed to 4 digits.

  • [CARDS-54720]

    • Transaction Processing. Now the attributes CARD (if no NO_CARD attribute) and CARDHOLDER (if no NO_CARDHOLDER attribute) are added to the transaction attribute list if the MPOS attribute is present .

  • [CARDS-55666]

    • Changed usage change amount definition on financial document posting when USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=F. If no account for the contract exists in the transaction currency, the settlement amount will be used for usage.

  • [CARDS-55708]

    • Added additional check of amnd_state in document accept process to prevent situations when documents selected for processing have been deleted in a parallel session.

  • [CARDS-56047]

    • Optimized financial document check if authorization was not found. No checks are performed if a document was created by the acquiring authorization procedure and processed for an external target. In other cases, search for a presentment with the same authorization code is limited to 10 days from the transaction date.

  • [CARDS-56309]

    • Added the ability for documents from "Hotel", "Airline" and "Car rental" SIC groups to be excluded from consideration as multi-clearing/multi-authorisation transactions by setting the global parameter MULTI_AUTH_STRICT=Y (default value is "N"). In this case, if a transaction is not specified as multi-clearing it will be considered as a normal transaction, with no additional processing for multi-capture/multi-authorisations. The AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL parameter will be used to define the possible difference between an authorisation and financial presentment for total funds unblocking instead of the AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT parameter used for multiple mode transactions.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56462]

    • Removed confusing message "Presentment and Presentment reversal has been matched" if the Dispute Assistant module is not used.

  • [CARDS-56492]

    • Removed trace messages on routing search that were written even if trace was off.

  • [CARDS-56672]

    • Fixed interchange routing search on repost of an incoming document when routing by forwarding member is used.

  • [CARDS-57117]

    • Fixed an incorrect detection of time when thresholds for usage limiter with the sliding periods of aggregation must be recalculated.

  • [CARDS-57228]

    • Optimised contract search on document accept.

  • [CARDS-57371]

    • Eliminated the possibility of incorrect recalculation of a merchant's and bank's sliding usage limiter thresholds on Contract Daily Update.

  • [CARDS-58520]

    • Eliminated attempts to fill BIN record reference on document accept and other card related checks for non-card contracts. The target contract's contract category is now checked instead of the transaction type's contract category.

  • [I1603095080]/[CARDS-54062]

    • Added transaction type category check when matching secondary financial documents. Only documents with the same category will be matched in the chain.

  • [I1610077363,I1702062338]/[CARDS-54159]

    • Enhanced the "Lost Authorizations" form to show authorizations with the "Inactive" posting status that remain active due to partial financial clearing. The currently blocked amount is now shown as a separate column.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Special_Contract_Utilities.pdf]

  • [I1611117990]/[CARDS-51595]

    • Fixed fee collection processing if both source and target BINs have the CAN_BE_ONUS tag.

  • [I1611140592]/[CARDS-51760]

    • Fixed saving of customized transaction details for misc documents.

  • [I1612227997]/[CARDS-51672]

    • Fixed usage limiter counter calculation for partial reversals.

  • [I1701227932]/[CARDS-52611]

    • The algorithm for matching Retrieval Request and First Presentment documents has been improved for cases when a secondary document had been already processed and had changed the First Presentment posting status to "InActive".

  • [I1701241115]/[CARDS-52853]

    • Optimized search for authorization documents when multiple authorizations are allowed.

  • [I1701242974]/[CARDS-51980]

    • Corrected contract status check - no reversals are allowed for a closed contract even if there is a valid contract status with code 14.

  • [I1702157314]/[CARDS-52313]

    • When validating a contract subtype, the BIN record is checked even if it is already filled.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [I1702208476]/[CARDS-52312]

    • Added a new response type, "Transaction Confirmed", to "Safe Doc" forms.

  • [I1703275173]/[CARDS-52555]

    • Performance of the procedure for matching financial and authorization documents during the document accept process has been optimized for the following cases: 1. Matching a financial document from an external (Off-Us) Acquirer and multiple authorization documents. 2. Matching a financial document and an authorization document according to RRN.

  • [I1704088231]/[CARDS-52726]

    • Fixed matching of authorization and financial documents when they have different source channels or source members.

  • [I1704121217, I1704192844]/[CARDS-52867]

    • Optimised the procedure for posting macrotransactions for reversal and adjustment documents if the value of the additional global parameter PATCH_REVERSE_INTEREST is set to "Y".

  • [I1704135142]/[CARDS-52903]

    • A financial document will not be matched with an authorization of a different transaction type even if the reference numbers are the same.

    Updated Manuals: [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [I1704174163]/[CARDS-52971]

    • Fixed reversed advice macrotransaction status if reversal is processed for a transaction that has not been posted and the value of the global parameter POST_REVERSED_MTR is 'N'.

  • [I1704188903]/[CARDS-52865]

    • Fixed incorrect matching between Authorization and Financial documents that have the same Transaction Amount and no PS Ref Number reference specified, from merchants who support multiple authorization processing.

  • [I1704211939]/[CARDS-53054]

    • PS Ref Number equality is no longer mandatory for matching an authorization with a financial presentment, it is only used to define priority if several authorizations are found.

  • [I1704264344]/[CARDS-52981]

    • When searching for an authorization document for a financial presentment by RRN, no time period limitations are applied. In other search cases, the period is extended to 10 days.

  • [I1705030725]/[CARDS-53058]

    • When an authorization and financial presentment have different transaction types, the transaction direction is additionally checked. If the direction differs, documents are not matched.

  • [I1706056360]/[CARDS-53789]

    • Added new modes, SERVICE_TGT and SERVICE_SRC that allow services to be inherited for source or target only, unlike the SERVICE mode which can be configured in the FROM_AUTH tag to inherit services from an authorization document for both source and target.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [I1706057036]/[CARDS-53523]

    • Generation of the "Trace stack overflow" error message during the document processing procedure has been fixed for transactions processed in WAY4 Cards by Interchange Payment System exchange rates (for example, Dynamic Currency Conversion transactions) if Trace message logging was switched on.

  • [I1706133880]/[CARDS-54098]

    • Fixed issue. Now the posting process doesn't recalculate document parameters like ARN for rejected secondary documents that have been sent again.

  • [I1706238241]/[CARDS-54542]

    • Extended PAN mask format with Card Category [:C] for variables (like %CONTRACT_NUMBER[:NXM]%): %CONTRACT_NUMBER:NXM[:K][:C]%, where: <N> - number of visible digits at the beginning of the number. <X> - filler symbol for the hidden part of the number. <M> - number of visible digits at the end of the number. <K> - number of filler symbols; this parameter is not mandatory. <C> - contract category code; only contract numbers belonging to this category will be masked. By default, these are card contracts. The possible values are: "C" - card contracts; "B" - bank contracts; "A" - account contracts and "M" - device contracts; this is not a mandatory parameter, "C" is the default value. Contract Number for card contracts (with PAN) will always be masked, even if "contract category code" does not contain "C".

    Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

  • [I1707121917]/[CARDS-54188]

    • Corrected matching of a financial document with a transit authorization when WAY4 is used as the sponsor for both acquirer and issuer.

  • [I1708020600]/[CARDS-55665]

    • Fixed issue. Now "When Available" and "When Credit" misc fee documents amendment fields will be refreshed before posting to prevent untimely housekeeping.

  • [I1708033522]/[CARDS-54471]

    • Now "When Available" and "When Credit" transactions for bank accounting contracts are processed without funds blocking. Consequently, if a target contract is closed and as a result redefined by a dispute contract, funds will not be blocked.

  • [I1708111332]/[CARDS-54401]

    • Corrected behaviour when the period of a funds block was extended on partial completion. A new partial block is now created with the same closing date as the initial block.

  • [I1709135528]/[CARDS-54734]

    • When a transit authorization and financial presentment have different transaction types, the transaction direction is additionally checked. Documents are not matched if the direction differs. The funds unblock procedure is no longer called for a transit authorization document if direction is the same.

  • [I1710122282]/[CARDS-55304]

    • Changed conditions for the "Message" link in the "Mess To Mbr Incoming" form and the "Errors" link in the "Doc - Grid" form: messages with an empty Object Type are no longer displayed.

  • [I1710194662]/[CARDS-55224]

    • Corrected incorrect routing search for incoming documents if ROUTE_BY_FORWARDING_MEMBER_FOR_CHANNELS global parameter is set.

  • [I1712053530]/[CARDS-56461]

    • Corrected behaviour. Now DEV, MPD, VPD, UPD, APD, and JPD tag values are always inherited to a financial document from a matched authorisation.

  • [I1802153361]/[CARDS-56998]

    • Fixed incorrect filling of settlement amount/settlement currency fields for DCC transaction "Retrieval Request" documents. The fields are now inherited from the previous document during the Accept process.

  • [I1803178046]/[CARDS-57186]

    • Fixed trace stack overflow on routing search which caused fatal error.

  • [I1803227875]/[CARDS-57191]

    • Corrected usage limiter last record date calculation to decrease time of opening GUI forms which display this data.

  • [I1804182070]/[CARDS-57824]

    • Corrected a subroutine used in the contract approval process to minimize performance degradation after multiple runs.

  • [I1805150611]/[CARDS-58082]

    • Corrected resending of a rejected document if a postauthorisation document exists for a presentment.

  • [I1806042411]/[CARDS-58296]

    • Corrected matching of duplicate chargebacks after presentment reversal - now these documents successfully matched as duplicates.

  • [I1806096201]/[CARDS-58329]

    • Corrected accept of a second adjustment received from VCR by the acquirer; the document will not be declined with an error that the previous adjustment is closed.

  • [CARDS-54454]

  • [CARDS-50996]

    • The "TOKEN" transaction attribute has been set for acquiring transactions according to bin_table settings.

  • [CARDS-54329]

    • Transaction Attributes. Added the SBT_EMV attribute (Signature by CVM Results).

  • [CARDS-55082]

    • Now during the document processing procedure on the acquiring side, the error message "Invalid capture currency" is generated for Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) transactions only if DCC Financial document POI Currency differs from preauthorization transaction currency.

  • [CARDS-55740]

    • Increased the length of the fields DOC.REASON_CODE, DSP_REASON.CODE, REASON_CODE.CODE, REASON_ACTION.TGT_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.REASON_CODE, CM_CASE_DOC.REASON_CODE from 4 to 32 symbols.

    • VISA SMS: Fixed case when Transaction Switch sends duplicate Reversals.

  • [CARDS-54917]

  • [CARDS-54735]

    VISA interface

  • [CARDS-49605]

    • Card Member ID is sent to the controller depending on Target ONUS criteria: if the Target channel is not ONUS, send_member_id, otherwise target_member_id.

  • [CARDS-51897]

    • VISA BII Outward: supported grouping multiple clearing messages: such messages with the same transaction identifier are in sequence and in the same batch.

  • [CARDS-52013]

    • A new parameter (FI) has been added for package opt_classify functions (used for statistics reports). The CLASSIFY_DWD_CARD_CATEGORY() and PACKAGED_MAPPING() parameters will be used by regression tests.

  • [CARDS-52237]

    • A new classifier "ACQ_LEVEL_MARKER" with the "ACQ_MERCHANTS" value has been added to the "OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Configuration Groups" menu for the "DWH_CONF" group.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52265]

    • XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Member and Merchant Data" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts. Calculation of the following rows has been updated: Number of Merchants: of which are acquiring MOTO transactions of which are acquiring E-Commerce transactions

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52562]

    • New sy_conf_group_rec records automatically created during opt_classify.CLASSIFY_CARD_BRANDS() execution are now marked with the AUTO=Y; tag in the add_info field.

  • [CARDS-53201]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe): added the ability to redefine card numbers for some accounts on export for mixed company structure. The prefixes of these accounts must be listed in the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" pipe parameter value, separated by commas. The new pipe parameter, "CUST_GET_CARD_NUMBER" must contain an SQL expression which returns the redefined card number value.

  • [CARDS-53329]

    • VISA Prepared Outward Processing: supported "single authorization multiple capture" specific for the "VISA Outward Files Completing" procedure. If the "MULTI_CLR"="Y" parameter is set, multiclearing messages will be sorted and exported in separate batches/files.

  • [CARDS-56146]

    • Enhanced determination of the IPS Member Identifier (Member_ID) for account contracts (statistical contract groups for account contracts). Now Member_ID is calculated as Member_ID of the card contracts subordinate to the account contract while before Member_ID was calculated based on the interchange routing settings. Supported an optional IPS Member Identifier set up for reporting purposes: - The ability to define Acquiring/Issuing Member ID by IPS. - The ability to aggregate reporting data that belong to different financial institutions under the same Member ID. - The ability to report financial institution data with the different Member IDs by Issuing BINs. Added the new menu item OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Payment Scheme Identification. For more details, please refer to the OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf, OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf, OW_HOME\manuals\language\AMEX_statistical_reports\AMEX_statistical_reports.pdf.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_User_Manual.pdf] [mastercard_statistical_reports\quarterly_mastercard_reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-57599]

    • Supported filling Acquirer Business ID field (TC05-07/TCR0/pos 50-57) in VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. Added the new pipe parameter ABID (numeric, 8 digits) for the value of Acquirer Business ID . Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.dll, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll, Visa Base II Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll.

  • [I1610257970]/[CARDS-52219]

    • XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Member and Merchant Data" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts. Calculation of the following rows has been updated: Number of Merchants: of which are acquiring MOTO transactions of which are acquiring E-Commerce transactions

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [I1612082576]/[CARDS-52928]

    • VISA BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): changed the logic for filling the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168). Now the default value of the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is "Y" instead of "N". If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "Y", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) will be filled with doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE field, if doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE is null, this field will be filled automatically by the pipe itself. Please review VISA services settings or if Fee Prediction is used, set up WAY4 according to the "VISA_RA_Configuration" manual. If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "N", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) is always calculated by the pipe itself. If the latter behaviour is needed, the parameter REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE = "N" should be set in the pipe.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\VISA_Interface.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49243]

    • An equal condition is used to count the number of accounts in the "Total Outstanding" line of the "Aged Analysis of Total Outstanding" section, and "Number of Accounts" line of the "Card Issuance" section in the "QMR VISA Statistics Issuing" report.

  • [CARDS-50195]

    • In the "Outgoing Files Logic.srd", "Outgoing Files Resp.srd", and "Outgoing Files.srd" forms, the "Sended By" label has been changed to "Sent by". In the "Incoming Files Logic.srd" and "Incoming Files.srd" forms, the "Received By" label has been changed to "Received by".

  • [CARDS-50884]

    • Fixed an issue with recognition of the parameter EXCLUDE_PRODUCT_ID in VISA BIN Table Import. Pipe affected : com.openwaygroup.pipe.visa.bin_table_import.jar

  • [CARDS-50922]

    • Fixed VISA BIN Table record update when the same record is loaded several times by the "com.openwaygroup.pipe.visa.bin_table_import.jar" pipe. The "Card Organisation" field is set to the default value "V" for acquirer BINs.

    • Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report. Now "Number of Statements Mailed" and "Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges" are gathered only for card categories with the parent value of card programme = "CREDIT" (DWD_CARD_CATEGORY classifier values with the "Parent value"="CREDIT") and multiplied on billing cycles number. Added new parameters: - P_FILTER_11 - P_FILTER_12

  • [CARDS-55177]

    • Visa Base II Outward: fixed "Authorization Code contains wrong characters in doc" error when exporting documents with an authorization code that contains the "q" character.

    • Improved performance of Quarterly IPS Reporting by using account.current_balance and account.on_date_balance in "Total Outstanding" sections for the following reports: XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business

  • [CARDS-55534]

    • XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business: fixed amount balance available calculation algorithm in the "Prepaid cards" section, line "Balance available/remaining at end of quarter". Now: if there are several Prepaid cards related to the same accounting contract in a main-sub hierarchy, its account balance will be included in the report only once. Before: it used to be multiplied by the number of cards.

  • [CARDS-55569]

    • Fixed issue in the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now the value "Of which are only Contact" in the "Card Issuance" block is calculated as "Number of issued Chip cards" minus "Of which are only Contactless" and "Of which are Contact and Contactless".

  • [CARDS-55914]

    • Excluded access to transaction attributes in VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. The VISA_TA tag is used instead. Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.cpp, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp, Visa Base II Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp.

  • [CARDS-55967]

    • Corrected currency conversion when calculating the "Payments Received" field value in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report and the "Interest Rates" field value in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.

  • [CARDS-55968]

    • VISA VCF Export 1) Modified period ID calculation: if the PERIOD_ID_FORMAT pipe parameter is set to "L", current period ID equals the last day of the previous period for all record types. 2) Added the new pipe parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT with the default value "N". If this parameter is set to "Y", verify that duplicate T4 Cardholder records are disabled.

    • Fixed the "Invalid value of numeric left-padded field F315_Reason_Code" error caused by incorrect processing of a reason code for non-VCR documents.
