  • [CARDS-54137]

    • Supported VISA Account Updater (VAU) functionality for Acquirers.

    Updated Manuals: [abu_acquiring\ABU_Functional_Specification_Acquiring.pdf] [abu_acquiring\Interacting_with_Merchants_in_ABU_Acquiring.pdf] [abu_acquiring\visa_account_updater\Interacting_with_VAU_Acquiring.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56605]

    • Supported Visa Claim Resolution (VCR) mandatory update on Base II and SMS interfaces.

  • [CARDS-51631]

    • IPS Product Definition: Changed name for VISA product "X" from "Reserved" to "B2B Virtual Payments".

  • [CARDS-51636]

    • [VISA REL] Apr17-340 2.1 Processing Requirements for Staged Digital Wallet Transactions. Supported a new value, "WT" for Business Application ID field in AI,AN,CA,FL,LG TCR3 records.

  • [CARDS-51637]

    • [VISA REL] Apr17-376 4.5: supported new "Payment Account Reference" field in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in an incoming transaction it is stored in the "PAR" tag in the document.

  • [CARDS-51639]

    • [VISA REL] Apr17-364 3.9 : supported Enhanced TC33 Acquirer Capture file format changes.

  • [CARDS-51649]

    • For the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report: - added a new block "MERCHANT ACQUIRING TOTAL" with sums of regional volumes. - calculation of "Sales - of which Electron" subsection in the transaction section has been supported. - the sections "No. of terminals installed at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals installed at merchants" have been renamed to "No. of terminals active at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals active at merchants". These sections contain information about terminals on which at least one transaction was made during the report period.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51660]

    • VISA Interface: added support of Merchant Initiated Transactions.

  • [CARDS-51662]

    • [VISA REL] Apr17-341 2.2 : Added new Commercial Product ID 'X' to the default value of the 'COMMERCIAL_PRODUCT_ID' pipe parameter.

  • [CARDS-51693]

    • VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File Import (pipe): the value of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC33 CP01 TCR1 pos 45-69) is stored in the document's "PURCH_ID" tag instead of in the "CS_PURCH_ID" tag used earlier. VISA BASE II Outward pipe: supported export of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC05 TCR1 pos 133-157) from the "PURCH_ID" tag.

  • [CARDS-51776]

    • VISA Stop List: Added action codes (request codes) 14 and 54 to the Standard Handbook.

  • [CARDS-51784]

    • VISA BII ONUS Outward Processing: added new "PAN_FROM_TKN" parameter, if set to 'Y' and the "D_TKN" tag is not null, the "D_TKN" tag value will be exported in TCR0 pos 05-23 Account Number field instead of the "doc.TARGET_NUMBER" value.

  • [CARDS-51808]

    • [VISA REL] Apr17-390 2.14 : supported new "Token Requestor ID" field in "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in the incoming transaction it is stored in the "WSP_REQ_ID" tag of the document.

  • [CARDS-51831]

    • VISA Outward: export of TCR3 record for AFT transactions is supported.

  • [CARDS-51869]

    • TKN_ACTIVATION and TKN_VERIFICATION requests are connected with Lifecycle identifier. TKN_VERIFICATION and TKN_ACTIVATION_CODE requests are connected with Token reference identifier.

  • [CARDS-51909]

    • Card metadata element in Check Eligibility Response has been set for Visa tokenization transactions.

  • [CARDS-52046]

    • VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File Import pipe: added filling doc.settlement_amount and currency with Original Price Amount and Original Price Currency Code values from incoming file for DCC transactions.

  • [CARDS-52169]

    • VISA Enhanced TC33 Acquirer Capture import pipe: "Total Authorization Amount" field is stored in the document for further export.

  • [CARDS-52188]

    • VISA VCF Export: additional customization points have been added.

  • [CARDS-52189]

    • VISA VCF Export: added the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" parameter to define the first symbols of accounts for special processing. Default value is "CH".

  • [CARDS-52190]

    • VISA VCF Export: added "REPORT_TO_LINK_T10" and "PARENT_LINK_T10" parameters which make it possible to override "REPORT_TO_LINK" and "PARENT_LINK" parameters for T10 records. Added "TWO_LEVEL_STRUCTURE"="Y"/"N"(default) parameter. If "Y" it is allowed to set the parent link for card directly to a corporate contract.

  • [CARDS-52234]

    • VISA Fee Prediction: Added Fee Program Areas for Visa Gold purchase and credit voucher transactions for Japan issuers.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52236]

    • RA configuration has been modified for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52239]

    • VISA Release Apr17-341: Added SIC Group "Global B2B Virtual Payments Fee Program" with code VISA_GL_B2B.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52321]

    • VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture file Import: added JCB specific for further export ECI (PDE3009) to JCB.

  • [CARDS-52343]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added the "FIN_TRANS_SPLIT" parameter which allows a fee transaction to be exported separately from the main transaction. Added the "ADD_FIELDS_T5_FEE" parameter to redefine T5 record fields for fee transactions. Added the "FIN_ADD_FIELD" parameter for customizing transactions select.

  • [CARDS-52344]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added "PAN_LENGTH_19" pipe parameter which allows account number fields with a length of 19 digits to be exported. Leading zeroes are added if necessary.

  • [CARDS-52345]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe): added "T1_FOR_T5" = Y/N(default) pipe parameter which allows export of T1 records when T5 records exist even if the billing period is not being closed.

  • [CARDS-52346]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe): additional customization points for T1 Last Payment Amount ( F292 ) and T1 Last Payment Date (F308 ) have been added.

  • [CARDS-52373]

    • VISA Prepare Outward Files (procedure): added the "COMMIT_BY" parameter to control intermediate commits. Possible values: BATCH/FILE/PROCESS(default).

  • [CARDS-52375]

    • A new section "Configuring a New Product B2B Virtual Payments Program" has been added to the 2017_04_VISA_Requirements.pdf document.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52394]

    • [VISA REL] Apr17-340 2.1 Processing Requirements for Staged Digital Wallet Transactions. TCR3 record type "CR" is exported for SDWO transactions if this transaction doesn't contain industry specific TCR3.

  • [CARDS-52412]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added customization points.

  • [CARDS-52431]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe) : improved export of transactions which do not have a document.

  • [CARDS-52513]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-510: supported outward (in "client-financials" mode) and inward VCR dispute financials.

  • [CARDS-52571]

    • VISA VCR: Added new Reason Codes. Contact Support for details.

  • [CARDS-52651]

    • Added Message Channels "Q" and "q" for IPS Mercury. Added Mercury Premium and Mercury Non-Premium products to IPS Products.

  • [CARDS-53131]

    • VISA BII Inward Processing: supported custom processing for TCRD records. If a TCRD record is present in an incoming transaction, it can be processed by the CUST_INS_DOC procedure.

  • [CARDS-53425]

    • VISA BASEII Inward Processing: supported import of new TC33 BASE II Dispute Financial Status Advice messages.

  • [CARDS-53426]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. "Authorization Source Code" field in outgoing BASE II presentments is filled according to new rules described in the article. The global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set. From VISA release 17.4 and later, the global parameter VISA_PRC_TA will become obsolete.

  • [CARDS-53427]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-517 Global Optional 4.2. Implemented changes to allow issuers to receive a new data element "recipient name" in BASE II clearing records for OCT transactions. This field is stored in the "RPNA" tag.

  • [CARDS-53549]

    • VISA Release Oct17-522 CEMEA Mandatory 8.2.1: interchange reimbursement fees (IRF) for staged digital wallet transactions in Russia have been supported.

  • [CARDS-53567]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe): added new "GET_CARDS_HINT", "GET_CARDS_IDS_HINT", "GET_CARDHOLDERS_HINT" pipe parameters to define Oracle hints for appropriate query optimization. If parameters are set, values must contain the entire hint including comment symbols, for example GET_CARDS_HINT=/*+cardinality(card 20)*/

  • [CARDS-53972]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-513 Global Mandatory 2.14, VISA BASEII Inward Processing (pipe): new "PAYMENT ACCOUNT REFERENCE" field is stored in the database field "safe_doc.details" if it is present in an incoming TC40 message.

  • [CARDS-53973]

    • Supported changes to the enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File. Added new fields and new values and changed existing fields to existing TCR records. Implemented Money Transfer Data processing for original credit transactions(OCTs)

  • [CARDS-54031]

    • [VISA REL v.2] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. Field "Authorization Source Code" in outgoing BII presentments is filled according to new rules, described in article. Global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set.

  • [CARDS-54073]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-588 has been supported. Updating personalization data of tokens in 3730 message has been added.

  • [CARDS-54107]

    • VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes. Changed description for reason code 0150 to "Recovered card handling fees or rewards and ATM BI acquiring direct fee returns". Also revised all Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54114]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-558 Global Optional 4.3. VISA Outward Processing (pipe): for transactions with TAVV, but without CAVV, the "7" value is exported in the "Mail/Phone/Electronic Commerce and Payment Indicator" field.

  • [CARDS-54120]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface (clearing): supported database currencies overrides. "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54148]

    • VISA: Added subregion CISSEE according to Release 17.4 article Oct17-600 (8.2.2).

  • [CARDS-54204]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface: "VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File" and "VISA Loading SMS Acknowledgments" pipes now support database currency overrides. The "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.

  • [CARDS-54307]

    • VISA BASEII Inward Processing, Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing (pipes): Original Credit Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "VISA_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter and "Fast Funds Indicator" field in an incoming transaction. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by DataBase if necessary.

  • [CARDS-54443]

    • Implemented service to export Initial Data load files and subsequent Update files from issuer to VAU.

  • [CARDS-54481]

    • Added support of new Initial and Update Data Load Response files import for Visa Account Updater service.

  • [CARDS-54515]

    • VAU/MABU: Added workflow to correct sent or rejected Issuer messages.

  • [CARDS-54834]

    • [VISA REL v.3] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. "Authorization Source Code" field in outgoing BASE II presentments is filled according to new rules described in the article. The global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set. From VISA release 17.4 and later, the global parameter VISA_PRC_TA will become obsolete.

  • [CARDS-54882]

    • VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File : [VISA REL v.3] Oct 17-582 Global Mandatory by Participation 3.15 Changes to the Enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File. Added new fields and new values and changed existing fields to existing TCR records. Implemented Money Transfer Data processing for original credit transactions (OCTs).

  • [CARDS-54945]

    • VISA VCF Export: Added condition: if pipe parameters ADD_FIELDS_4, ADD_FIELDS_6 contain tags F72, F92, F12, the mandatory fields client First Name, Last Name, and Company Name can be omitted in uploaded records.

  • [CARDS-54996]

    • Added the new pipe parameter TEST_MODE=Y (valid values: "Y"/"N"(default)) to enable the test mode for debugging uploaded data in VCF Export.

  • [CARDS-55069]

    • VISA VCF Export: added pipe parameter PERIOD_ID_FORMAT. Valid values: F, L. F (default value) - period ID is calculated from the beginning of the current billing period. L - period ID is calculated from the end of the previous billing period.

  • [CARDS-55203]

    • Updated VISA SMS: when posting a Fee Collections document, the system adds now the NETWORK_ID tag with proper value "0004" or "0002" to the document add_info field. The value is then used to fill in F63.1.

  • [CARDS-55263]

    • Renamed "Number of Active Cards" field to "Number of Active Cards (at least one transaction)" in "Card Issuance" section of XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report and added new "Number of Active Cards (at least one Contactless transaction)" field.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55807]

    • VISA Acquirer Capture Import: supported import of Multiple Clearing Sequence Number and Multiple Clearing Count into the CLR_SEQ_NUM and CLR_SEQ_COUNT tags.

  • [CARDS-55885]

    • Improved the conditions for detecting the VCR documents by the first digits of their Reason Codes. Fixed an issue of encoding and decoding the VCR-specific "Dispute Condition" field in TC33.TCR1 and TCx5-x7.TCR4 messages.

    Updated Manuals: [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]

  • [CARDS-55912]

    • Added a check of the additional global parameter DEBUG_LEVEL value before outputting debug messages to the process log in VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. Now all debug messages are written to the process log only if DEBUG_LEVEL ="DEBUG" or DEBUG_LEVEL ="ALL". Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.cpp, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp, Visa Base II Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp

  • [CARDS-55951]

    • Added the ability to process (import and export) VCR status advices via the UFX H2H interface.

    Updated Manuals: [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]

  • [CARDS-56090]

    • Added a new parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT for the VISA VCF Export pipe. Valid values are "Y" and "N" (default). If this parameter is set to "Y", verification of T4 Cardholder records duplication is disabled.

  • [CARDS-56111]

    • Added a new currency with Full Name "DOBRA", Name "STN", Code "930" and Exponent "2". The old currency DOBRA has been renamed to "DOBRA (old)". Changed currency codes for the country "Sao Tome And Principe".

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56126]

    • Added new SICs 3834, 3835, 3836 according to VISA Release Apr18-783 Global Mandatory Changes to Merchant Category Codes.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56203]

    • Checked filling BAI in Account Funding Transactions (AFT). Added the "TU" value for BAI in AFT documents with SIC_CODE=6051. [VISA REL v.2] Apr18-746 (2.3) Global Mandates for Account Funding Transactions.

  • [CARDS-56240]

    • Implemented new fields (Destination Amount, Destination Currency Code) for BASE II, TC 33, TCR 1 Record for VCR Financial Transactions. [VISA REL v.2] Apr18-722(3.1) Changes to Visa Claims Resolution.

  • [CARDS-56249]

    • Added field CP01 TCR7 MC/AMEX Discover Data Codes pursuant to Apr18-795(3.17) Changes to the Enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File.

  • [CARDS-56557]

    • Added the TOTAL_TRN_NUM tag for VSS120 documents. The tag has the value from the "First Count" field (TC46 TCR 1 Report Subgroup = 4). VISA BASEII Inward processing.

  • [CARDS-56736]

    • Added tag SENT_BY_TGT=Y for incoming TC33 VCR advices where Originator Recipient Indicator = "O" (for "outgoing" transactions).

  • [CARDS-57005]

    • Changed SIC (MCC) 3835 name from "3835 Dolce" to "3835 Dolce Hotels and Resorts".

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-57094]

    • Added new fraud report types: "Incorrect processing" and "Account or credentials takeover" to the Standard Handbook for the type "SAFE_DOC__FRAUD_TYPE".

  • [CARDS-57096]

    • Supported loading V.I.P. Full Service Dispute Financial Status Advice in VISA inward pipes. Added a new pipe parameter SMS_CHANNEL. This parameter enables downloading V.I.P. Full Service Dispute Financial Status Advice and must contain VISA SMS channel code. Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing.dll VISA BASEII Inward Processing.dll (inward pipe ver-03.45.30.01,03.46.30.05)

  • [CARDS-57205]

    • Supported new VCR incoming dispute messages "0422 Dispute financial request", "0422 Dispute financial reversal request", "0282 Dispute response financial status advice", "0282 Dispute response financial reversal status advice" in the "VISA SMS Inward Processing" pipe.

  • [CARDS-58023]

    • Restored currency BOLIVAR FUERTE for Venezuela.

  • [CARDS-58141]

    • Supported conversion of incoming VCR 0282 dispute advices with Processing Code 02 or 22 to adjustments in VISA BASE II inward pipes. Debit adjustments are created with a negative amount. Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII Inward Processing.dll

  • [CARDS-58277]

    • Supported exporting Quasi-Cash transactions as Retail if the "VPC=00;" tag is specified in the add_info field. Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.cpp, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp, Visa Base II Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp.

  • [I1612120086]/[CARDS-51705]

    • In the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report, added new parameter P_CEMEA for grouping "Acquirer Data" and "MOTO (Mail and Telephone Order) Data" sections by regional tiers.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [I1612213707]/[CARDS-51675]

    • RA configuration and interchange tariffs have been modified for Portugal.

  • [I1612266331]/[CARDS-51667]

    • RA configuration has been modified for Interregional transactions.

  • [I1702080176]/[CARDS-54790]

    • Added display of VISA FRS Reject/Warning codes. These codes are saved in the SAFE_DOC.detail field. Format: RC1=<code 1>;RC2=<code2>;

  • [I1703091921]/[CARDS-52543]

    • Modified RA configuration and IC tariffs for Ireland according to VISA requirements published on 2 March 2017.

  • [I1710317086]/[CARDS-56502]

    • Changed the VISA_FAST_FUNDS additional global parameter default value from the existing value "Y" to a new value "A". If VISA_FAST_FUNDS is set to "A", all original credit transactions will be converted into notifications regardless of the Fast Funds Indicator value. For all other transactions, the processing logic remains unchanged. The changes affect the VISA Base II Inward Processing and Affiliated Base II Inward Processing pipes. Please see CUN for required additional actions.

  • [I1711030543, I1711172189]/[CARDS-55721]

    • Added the configuration to calculate VISA Reimbursement Attribute for Ukraine.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\VISA_RA_Configuration.pdf]

  • [I1712121578]/[CARDS-57298]

    • Added "Ext Tags" link and removed the "Add Info" field in the "Reply Doc" and "Reply Doc Part" forms to input external data for VCR.

  • [I1804096805]/[CARDS-58148]

    • Modified VISA Fee Descriptors for the EU region and interchange tariffs for ATM interregional transactions according to the Interregional Interchange Guide version 1.5.

    WAY4 Web

  • [DBK-2455]

    • Pipes for import/export of W4W custom layouts have been added.

  • [DBK-2697]

    • Checking W4Web components privileges has been changes. See manuals.

    Updated Manuals: [W4W\doc\Web_Client\Language\System_Core\Officers_and_Grants.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51549]

    • Duplication of Response Code in Voice Authorisation Response messages has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52573]

    • 1.Application processing error in Delete Usage action has been fixed. 2. Application processing of tagged fields has been restored.

  • [CARDS-52808]

    • In WAY4 Web added check of client privileges to access uploaded files and merchant tree contracts.

  • [DBK-2900]

    • Fixed W4W grants incorrect behaviour (to exclude situations when access to a component is denied, but it is visible in the UI).

  • [DBK-2974]

    • WAY4Web layout import pipe behaviour has changed: existing wx_scheme layouts are NOT deleted by default now.

  • [DBK-3410]

    • Improved WAY4Web logout process which previously could lead to ORA-20000 error on Distributed Processing / HA configuration.

  • [I1708301443]/[CARDS-54853]

    • Fixed calculation of W4Web grants in officer groups using local variables.

  • [CARDS-53009]

    • WAY4 Web: a requirement for the value of the EnableDeveloperInfo parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

  • [CARDS-53083]

    • Password complexity requirements can now be added as parameters for WAY4Web user authentication scheme.

    WAY4 manager

  • [WM-2982]

    • Dynamic (scripted) edit mask is supported both at Domain and Dataform Column (redefinition) levels.

    Updated Manuals: [way4_manager\WAY4_Manager_Form_Editor.pdf]

  • [WM-3083]

    • Oracle table name is no longer available for Clerks via Design > Information.

  • [WM-3093]

    • New option SHOW_ERROR_STACK_TRACE has been supported in OW_WORK\DB.ini. It allows error stack traces to be shown/hidden from Clerk users.

  • [WM-3094]

    • Oracle table name is no longer available for Clerks via Design > Information.

  • [I1703314633]/[WM-3049]

    • MessageBox menu item step has been switched to OPW message formatting protocol.

  • [I1704039532]/[WM-3064]

    • Master-details interface behaviour has been fixed: master selection change causes correct details view content update.

  • [I1704055962, I1704055907]/[WM-3035]

    • Menu Item editor has been fixed: <parameter> inclusions can be used in Parameters and Name fields.

  • [I1706133104]/[WM-3066]

    • [Design/Open data form] context popup menu action is no longer available for modal forms.

  • [I1706209051]/[WM-3063]

    • Cyclic behaviour has been restored for the tree search tool: if the search is over downwards/upwards it is immediately restarted from top down/bottom up.

  • [I1709140818]/[WM-3097]

    • Custom filter dialog's behavoiur has been restored to normal.

  • [I1712209189]/[WM-3140]

    • Fixed password changing procedure to cover Oracle password expiration case.

  • [I1801176554]/[WM-3157]

    • Changed default name assignment for menu items.

  • [I1803229475]/[WM-3178]

    • Fixed behaviour which can lead to a duplicate call of an action for the first record if the action must be executed for a group of records.

  • [I1804097350]/[WM-3190]

    • Changed logic for enabling actions and links by conditions when an evaluation error occurs: when script evaluation fails with an exception, dependent actions and links become disabled (previously, an error in script evaluation led to enabled dependent actions/links).

  • [I1807174091]/[WM-3228]

    • fixed error of visibility condition evaluation for computed field fixed logic of using editable condition for visibility ( "visible when disabled" attribute) in case when form is in read-only mode

    Web banking

  • [CARDS-55283]

    • Optimised Customer Profile handbook to reduce execution time.

  • [CARDS-53176]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Lifestyle Banking section has been updated (information about play.id and %padss.application.mode=prod has been added).

    Updated Manuals: Security &amp; key management | PCI DSS Implementation Guide

    Web services

  • [CARDS-50689]

    • A new menu item to configure available contract statuses for web services has been added to the "OpenWay\Web Services\Configuration Setup" menu.

  • [I1604135487]/[CARDS-51664]

    • New menu branches have been added: OpenWay\Web Services and OpenWay\Way4Web. The "WS Users & Grants" menu branch has been moved from OpenWay\System\DB Administrator Utilities to these new menu branches; the linked menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\WS Users & Grants has been removed. For more details, see the section "Client Upgrade Notes on Impact changes".

    e-Commerce acquiring

  • [CARDS-57230]

    • Added the ability to get Merchant MCC from a POS terminal for further use when generating transaction details.

  • [CARDS-52843]

    • Added index for TD_DOC table.

  • [CARDS-58194]

    • Implemented support of BAI Code C52.

    e-Commerce issuing

  • [CARDS-51828]

    • Added the ability to enter several comma-separated values for the HB_CODE and HB_PARM tags. See documentation for details.

  • [I305034578]/[CARDS-42548]

    • Added the ability to find information for a 3DS authentication related to a given authorisation record.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing_authorisation\Authorisation_system.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53387]

    • Discontinued saving of unnecessary data in td_doc.posting_details for RBA request processing.

  • [I1705026827]/[CARDS-53413]

    • Fixed incorrect counter value calculation for RBA rules.

    Changes Grouped by Releases

    Change types:

    • Added New Feature
    • Changed Feature
    • Fixed Bug
    • New Task
    • Sub-task
    • Support of Payment System Release Requirements
    • Standard Configuration Update
    • Backporting
    • Information Note

    Cards

    • 03.45.30.84
      • I1807283554 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-58795] Fixed "NullPointerException" error when message, being imported by "DCI Clearing Import" pipe, does not contain "CPANSQN" field in Chip Card Additional Detail Record.
      • [CARDS-58194] Implemented support of BAI Code C52.
      • [CARDS-58641] Supported redefinition of the global parameter SYNC_ENTRY_GL_TRANS_CODE on Financial Institution level. If this parameter is set to "Y", "Trans Code" in Entry will be synchronised with "Trans Code" in GL.
      • [CARDS-58779] Supported ability to use preferred by Area for secondary transactions.
      • I1807269792 [CARDS-58682] Modified the "Account Charges and Fees" section of the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now CustomFees that only exist as GL_TRACE records can also be included in calculations without fee counts limit.
      • I1807174091 [WM-3228] fixed error of visibility condition evaluation for computed field fixed logic of using editable condition for visibility ( "visible when disabled" attribute) in case when form is in read-only mode
      • [CARDS-57988] Supported new "3" ("mPOS Software-based PIN Entry Capability") value for the DE22.2 field for incoming MasterCard IPM messages. It is processed like "1" ("PIN entry capability") value.
    • 03.45.30.83
      • CARDS-57890 [Statistical Reports] Added in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report for Europe (P_CEMEA=N): - New report section "Cross Border Acquiring Data". - New report parameters: 1) P_SHOW_CROSS_BORDER (varchar2(1), default value is "Y"). The parameter turns on/off the new section "Cross Border Acquiring Data". 2) P_ACQ_OWN_COUNTRY (varchar2(3), default value is null). The parameter defines the merchant's homeland(3-symbol country code, like 'RUS', 'JPN' and etc) to determine cross border transactions in the "Cross Border Acquiring Data" section.

      • I1807096765 [CARDS-58630] Corrected behaviour when backdated processing increased the WAIT_CYCLE counter of a suspended billing event that was created before the correction date.

      • [CARDS-57926] Fixed the PIN validation data search algorithm for card applets. If there is no data in the applet card_info row, data from the parent card_info row will be used.
      • [CARDS-58256] Added ability to change Due Date of invoice-based instalment plan. Maximum period from current date to new due date could be restricted using global parameter INST_MAX_DUE_DATE_GAP where number of days should be specified (could be redefined on FI)
      • [CARDS-58294] Added message to process_mess including information on number of clients whose personal data was erased by processes of erasing personal data by request and for closed contracts.
      • [CARDS-58483] Supported the inheritance of a card production event from the main card to supplementary cards during product upgrade.
      • [CARDS-57960] Corrected invoice events processing on early repayment of instalment plans with flat fee if INST_APPROVE_PLANS=N.
      • [CARDS-58094] Implemented ability to redefine Due Period for End Cycle Due accounts via tariffs. Previously it was not supported for End Cycle Due accounts.
      • [CARDS-58299] Fixed td_auth_sch row selection logic. Previously, a closed record could be chosen if the "Date To" of this record was equal to the "Approve" date. Now an active record is chosen.
      • [CARDS-58387] Fixed Card Category and Card Brand standard mapping logic to avoid creation of duplicate records in case Product is already manually mapped.
      • [CARDS-58439] Changed algorithm of contract redefinition by Contract Role. Actual Contract Role defined on each contract level or its product level is used now for both Main-Sub and Liability hierarchies. Previously, only contract level role was used only for liability hierarchy. Refers to keywords like CONTRACT_FOR, FEE_CONTRACT, IF_CS_TYPE_FOR, IF_PARM_FOR etc. with the value - "CONTRACT_ROLE". Simplified keywords for contract redefinition in different places, like CONTRACT_FOR, FEE_CONTRACT, IF_CS_TYPE_FOR, IF_PARM_FOR etc. For contract redefinition by contract roles, composite tag value should be used instead of using of two separate tags. For example tag value "CONTRACT_FOR=CONTRACT_ROLE:ROLE1;" should be used instead of two tags "CONTRACT_FOR=CONTRACT_ROLE;CONTRACT_ROLE=ROLE1;". For contract redefinition by liability categories, composite tag value should be used instead of using of two separate tags. For example tag value "CONTRACT_FOR=LIABILITY_CATEGORY:N;" should be used instead of two tags "CONTRACT_FOR=LIAB_CATEGORY;LIAB_CATEGORY=N;"
      • C1711131332 [CARDS-58530] Fixed "Paypass Enabled Ind" condition processing for IRD calculation. Now if "Paypass Enabled Ind" is equal to "N" it doesn't prevent selection of this IRD for PayPass cards.
      • I1805161998 [CARDS-58129] Added a new parameter P_CACHE_MTR (varchar2(1), default value is = "Y") for the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf" report. The parameter makes it possible to use temporary tables to cache useful data to improve performance in the "Card Issuance" report section.

These can be one or two different decisions that are checked for main and supplementary cards accordingly.

      • [CARDS-57934] Supported export transactions in SmartVista backoffice IPM format.
      • [CARDS-57907] Added a new interest calculation scheme to configure an instalment scheme: "Interest with USE_MONTH_WEIGHT = B". In this configuration, interest for the first instalment portion is calculated for the whole month regardless of a number of days left to the end of the month. In case of early repayment, no advance interest is taken.

    • 03.45.30.77
      • CARDS-50884 [VISA interface] Fixed an issue with recognition of the parameter EXCLUDE_PRODUCT_ID in VISA BIN Table Import. Pipe affected : com.openwaygroup.pipe.visa.bin_table_import.jar
      • CARDS-50922 [VISA interface] Fixed VISA BIN Table record update when the same record is loaded several times by the "com.openwaygroup.pipe.visa.bin_table_import.jar" pipe. The "Card Organisation" field is set to the default value "V" for acquirer BINs.
      • CARDS-57836 [MasterCard interface] Added currency VENEZUELA BOLIVAR SOBERANO to the currency table.
      • I1805146590 [UFX-551] Fixed an issue with export of an application R2 response if checkValue is empty.
      • [CARDS-57738] Added the ability to reissue supplementary cards together with the main card if the product line was changed. Refer to manuals for required configuration changes.
      • [CARDS-57763] Added the ability to use a non-zero interest rate for an instalment plan's free period. The interest rate for the free period can be specified in an Instalment Scheme, tariff (in a new field, "Free Period Rate") or passed as the document tag INST_IRATE_FREE. The latter is only possible if the main interest rate is also specified as a document tag (INST_IRATE). The portion amount for the free period may differ from the portion amount for the main part of the plan (after the free period has ended). To enable this feature, the FREE_PERIOD_OWN_AMOUNT tag should be specified in the Instalment Scheme's special parameters. The feature can only be enabled if an interest calculation scheme that does not depend on days is used. This new algorithm is compatible only with the following options for 'Shift Fee Charge Mode': Charge Fees Every Month, Do Not Charge Shift Fees. Another values can not be set for such interest calculation.
      • [CARDS-57786] Fixed an issue when sending of a new document is blocked if a rejected VROL RTSI message document exists under the case. Now rejected VROL RTSI message documents are not taken into consideration during this check.
      • I1804119098 [CARDS-57800] Added a check that the CODE field has been filled in for Case Parameters, Activity Reasons, Strategy Step, and Strategy. It is now mandatory to fill in the field. Also fixed the Duplicate Strategy procedure.
      • I1804182070 [CARDS-57824] Corrected a subroutine used in the contract approval process to minimize performance degradation after multiple runs.
      • [CARDS-57811] Supported exporting Bank Merchant ID in Financial Submission File. Affected pipe: com.openwaygroup.pipe.amex.fsf_export.jar.
      • I1804097350 [WM-3190] Changed logic for enabling actions and links by conditions when an evaluation error occurs: when script evaluation fails with an exception, dependent actions and links become disabled (previously, an error in script evaluation led to enabled dependent actions/links).
    • 03.45.30.76
      • CARDS-57740 [Personal Data Management] Enhanced standard personal data clearing process. Added obfuscation of personal data in the "Contract" and "Card Info" tables.
      • CARDS-54612 [MasterCard interface] Enhanced calculation for "Number Of Issued Chip Cards", "of which are only Contact", "of which are Contact and Contactless", "of which are only Contactless", "of which are micro tags", "Number Of Active Cards (at least one transaction)", "Number Of Active Cards (at least one Contactless transaction)", "Number of Accounts", and "Number of Active Accounts" fields in the "Card Issuance" section of the "Visa Statistics Issuing Business" report. Now only contracts/accounts with valid statuses are included in calculations of the values listed above. Contract status history can be taken into account. For the "Accounts and Cards" section of the"MC Statistics Issuing Business" report: Enhanced calculation for the "Accounts at beginning of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), "Accounts at end of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), "Cards at beginning of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total), and "Cards at end of quarter" (Open/Blocked/Total) fields. Now the values listed above are calculated based on contract/account status validity where contract status history can be taken into account. Renamed the "Of which are MasterCard contactless" field to "Of which are MasterCard contactless enabled". Corrected calculation for "Total MasterCard contactless Cards issued". Now all valid cards enabled to perform contactless transactions are calculated; previously only active cards were calculated.
      • CARDS-57636 [NSPK interface] Added an additional check to verify the DE22.SF5 field when transactions are exported. If the DE22.SF5 field contains a value that is not supported by NSPK, the transaction is suspended.
      • CARDS-57640 [Statistical Reports] Corrected 'Number Of Active Cards' for XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • CARDS-57646 [Diners Club interface] Fixed loading outward Fee Collections/Funds Disbursements. Affected pipes: com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing.jar.
      • [UFX-442] Added new menu item: "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Applications No Workflow\Applications Export (No WF)". This item exports applications with application workflow disabled and is useful for exporting applications that were created without workflow.
      • [CARDS-57344] Supported erasure of personal data on client request.
      • [CARDS-57623] Implemented a new ability to apply several tariffs for fee amount calculation. The number of tariffs applied can range from zero to "N". Each tariff is calculated independently, and the total fee amount is posted once. To use this feature, a service project needs to be started. Contact OpenWay Support with a detailed description of the business functionality that is required.
      • [CARDS-57638] Fixed an issue with filling in DE22 field for P2P Credit transaction export by NSPK Outward Processing pipe.
      • [CARDS-57677] Corrected PAN range check for card stop lists.
      • [CARDS-57690] Enhanced contract cache in gathering statistics for performance reasons.
      • [CARDS-57758] Fixed processing of POS Enviroment in VISA_TA tag.
      • I1804117663 [CARDS-57718] Changed a search rule for Interbranch Orders. In Way4Cards 03.45.30 minor versions, Interbranch Orders had to be configured for accounts specified in the "Fee Account" service field regardless of an account to which the document is actually posted in case of Active/Passive pair. Starting from version 03.45.30, supported a search for Interbranch Orders in both accounts of Active/Passive pair if one of these accounts is set as "Fee Account" in a service.
      • I1804119057 [CARDS-57770] Fixed an issue when an incoming chargeback/representment partial reversal does not call the corresponding system activity in DA R2. Now an incoming chargeback partial reversal initiates the "Accepted Chargeback Reversal" activity, and an incoming representment partial reversal initiates the "Accepted Representment Reversal" activity.
      • I1804266823 [CARDS-57720] Fixed DE22.SF7 filling for key entry transactions when exporting documents by "IPM Outward Processing" pipe.
      • [CARDS-57385] Supported CIT and MIT transactions for the NSPK ODPT Clearing interface.
      • [CARDS-57468] Added a new message channel (letter "f") for MIR SMS.
      • [CARDS-57728] Supported transmitting Merchant-Initiated and Consumer-Initiated transactions via Affiliated BASEII interface for further export to NSPK.
      • [CARDS-57599] Supported filling Acquirer Business ID field (TC05-07/TCR0/pos 50-57) in VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. Added the new pipe parameter ABID (numeric, 8 digits) for the value of Acquirer Business ID . Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.dll, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll, Visa Base II Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll.

      • I1803229475 [WM-3178] Fixed behaviour which can lead to a duplicate call of an action for the first record if the action must be executed for a group of records.
      • [DBK-3716] Fixed an issue when "Unique Constraint Violation" exceptions in WAY4 Replication process were considered as "failed changes" and not rejected.
      • [CARDS-57230] Added the ability to get Merchant MCC from a POS terminal for further use when generating transaction details.
      • [CARDS-56452] Supported matching of financial and authorization documents for tokenized transactions when detokenization is done by own acquiring. Matching is done by credit history for the target contract which should be the same in both documents.
      • [CARDS-57249] Improved entry description in the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details" report. Entry description is now taken from the record of the approved Service that was current at the time of transaction so that later Service updates won't corrupt the entry description.
      • [CARDS-56811] Implemented additional validation of FX sequence for Secondary node of Distributed Processing when FX sequence is searching on Issuing Authorization. If last FX sequence was not found or has invalid state, the last valid FX Sequence will be used in Authorization.
      • [CARDS-57270] Fixed "DEV" document tag creation from a message loaded by the Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing pipe when the "DEV" tag is absent in the incoming file. This makes it possible to export such documents to MasterCard interface more accurately.
      • [CARDS-57278] Fixed an Oracle error appearing in DA R2 when the incoming financial document should be attached to some DA case or initiate a case creation, but this case turns out to be in an invalid state.
      • [CARDS-57363] Fixed extra instalment fees behaviour: the Instalment Partner Fee and other extra instalment fees are now posted as supplementary macrotransactions together with the main macrotransaction.
      • [CARDS-57378] Fixed error which can lead to "ORA-06531: Reference to uninitialized collection".
      • [CARDS-57388] Corrected calculation of principal amount paid on instalment partial early repayment if the flat fee is used in instalment plan and causes doubling of instalment event fees.
      • [CARDS-57399] Corrected partial early repayment of instalment plans with a flat fee if the whole principal amount is paid on early repayment and only the fee is left unpaid.
      • [CARDS-57401] Corrected the flat fee calculation during instalment early repayment if the fee rate was passed as document tag.

      • [CARDS-57467] Corrected the instalment simulation data format, values are padded according to the specified length.

      • [CARDS-57203] Added workaround for bug Oracle Solaris SPARC 64-bit, 11.2.0.4 (Bug 21659726 - Library cache lock waits for sys.jox_cbrls_lock object after upgrade to 12.1.0.2 in Java (Doc ID 21659726.8)). The workaround is to avoid using the Java function to convert a number to a string and use the pl/sql function to_char() to number conversions. The workaround is enabled by global configuration with the code "MSG_DEFAULT_AMOUNT_FORMAT" and value "999G999G999G990D00".

In WAY4Cards (according to transaction type, message code) transactions remain Retail, but for IRD calculation and in clearing file they are Unique. Pipe affected: IPM Outward.

      • [DBK-3625] Corrected export configuration of the WAY4 Case Management platform. Now all the tables (main and subordinate) with configuration data are exported, except CM_USER as it directly depends on the OFFICER table. The fields with references to OFFICER or CM_USER are skipped.
      • [DBK-3642] Fixed incorrect activation of default service on the primary node after the node has been set to unavailable from a secondary node.
      • [CARDS-56876] Added the ability to charge a fee from a partner contract when creating or activating an instalment plan. The partner fee should be configured in the instalment scheme with a fee code equal to the Message Type code that corresponds to the required misc fee transaction type.
      • [CARDS-55914] Excluded access to transaction attributes in VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. The VISA_TA tag is used instead. Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.cpp, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp, Visa Base II Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp.
      • [CARDS-56992] Supported Terminal Composite Keys (MemberID+MerchantID+TerminalID) matching in Product Inspector tests. Added a new Product Inspector Step tag PI_DEVICE_CKEY.
      • [CARDS-57085] Enhanced determination of the IPS Member Identifier (MEMBER_ID stat attribute) for acquiring contracts (statistical contract groups for acquiring contracts): now "Payment Scheme Identification" (OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Payment Scheme Identification) can be configured to specify the correct MEMBER_ID.
      • I1708111332 [CARDS-54401] Corrected behaviour when the period of a funds block was extended on partial completion. A new partial block is now created with the same closing date as the initial block.
      • I1802213751 [CARDS-57066] Corrected account interest rate definition from an interest tariff for account templates with the INT_RATE_MODE in cases when the tariff domain was changed for the contract right before the contract's closing.
    • 03.45.30.62

      • I1802068851 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-56852] Added the ability to convert incoming "fast funds" payments to notifications in UFX Import pipe in "H2H" mode.

    • 03.45.30.60
      • CARDS-49646 [Data preparation and card personalization] The RSA EMV Key Management pipe no longer shows the Folder Selection dialog. Instead, the pipe shows a File Selection dialog with a list of all suitable files (if the SOURCE_DIR parameter is set) or selects the first suitable file from DEFAULT_PATH (if DEFAULT_PATH is set and SOURCE_DIR is not set).

If last FX sequence was not found or has invalid state, the last valid FX Sequence will be used in Authorization.

      • [CARDS-56654] Fixed an issue when an inappropriate original_doc was selected for preparing an outward message in SAFE Outward Processing pipe.

      • [CARDS-56595] Added additional trace messages for Week Days verification on Preferred search.
      • [CARDS-56653] Added the "OpenWay\QR Payments" menu branch to configure and support mVisa functionality.
      • [CARDS-56682] Supported a new case parameter based on a classifier type changed by a client or contract application.

      • I1608314406 [CARDS-56470] Added a new parameter to the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report: P_FILTER_3, varchar2(4000), the default value is "1=1" The parameter should be used to filter ATM devices when calculating "Total ATM" and "Total EMV Compliant ATM" values in the "ATM Statistics" report section.
      • I1802071449 [CARDS-56715] Added the INST_BILLING_HISTORY global parameter (could be redefined on Financial Institution level) to regulate saving of instalment plan states during billing. The parameter's default value is "Y". An instalment plan state saved to the INVOICE_LOG_HISTORY table during billing is used in statement generation. To disable saving this data, the parameter should be set to "N".
      • [CARDS-48154] Supported resubmitting a MasterCard DCC First Presentment without DCC if the acquirer gets a First Chargeback for the full amount with Reason Code 4846.
      • [CARDS-54105] Eliminated unnecessary search for a transit authorization during financial document accept if WAY4 online acquiring was used and the card is an "own" card ("OnUs"). A new value has been added for the SKIP_TRANSIT_AUTH_SEARCH global parameter: in addition to "Y" and "N", a comma-delimited list of channel codes can be specified. No transit authorization search will be made for financial documents from these channels.
      • [CARDS-54470] Modified the "Account Charges and Fees" section of the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now CustomFees that only exist as GL_TRACE records can also be included in calculations.
      • [CARDS-54717] Changed the result of a value returned by the %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% variable. Now it returns the whole text from the doc.reason_details field instead of text from doc.add_info.
      • [CARDS-56047] Optimized financial document check if authorization was not found. No checks are performed if a document was created by the acquiring authorization procedure and processed for an external target. In other cases, search for a presentment with the same authorization code is limited to 10 days from the transaction date.
      • [CARDS-56684] Fixed incorrect processing of messages for the CBS on a secondary node of a WAY4 HA Cluster solution.
      • [CARDS-56686] Changed algorithm for message code parsing and generation. Now it considers message direction.
      • [CARDS-56690] Postponed accept of financial document if the corresponding authorization is loaded from a secondary node and not yet processed.
      • [CARDS-56694] Restored translation of the %TRANS_TYPE% calculated variable to the language defined in the client record in client notification message templates. The problem with this variable was only observed in versions 03.44.31.06-07, 03.45.30.53-56, 03.46.30.05-08.
      • [CARDS-56695] Fixed inability to process of documents received after MDES/VDEP token deactivation
      • [CARDS-56706] Corrected custom fee amount inheritance from an authorization document for adjustment documents in SMS mode, when "FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT;" tag is used in the corresponding custom fee.
      • [CARDS-56727] Corrected filling doc.change_version for rejected documents on HA secondary node
      • [CARDS-56749] Corrected handling of events with Duration Type = "Billing" in backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-56753] Added a new variable for client message notifications: %DFLT_TRANS_TYPE% It returns Transaction Name value from mess_dict without language translations.
      • [CARDS-56773] Fixed an issue with processing of device status from the Advanced Applications R2 application for an affiliated hierarchy of the acquiring and device contracts.
      • [CARDS-56774] Fixed creation of Interbranch Routing records between source and target financial institutions when copying Interbranch Routing from the source institution to the target institution.
      • [CARDS-56799] Changed the currency conversion processing algorithm for issuing authorizations. The required FX rates are obtained at the start of the operation and their values are frozen for the entire process to avoid cases when updated values are used in different steps of authorization.
      • [CARDS-56809] Corrected behaviour of the SAVE_PAYMENT_FROM tag when there is a small underpayment for a card contract.
      • [CARDS-56862] Fixed error which lead to incorrect standing order transfer replication from a secondary to primary node of a WAY4 HA Cluster solution.
      • [CARDS-56868] Corrected item intersection if backdated processing is done after account scheme changes have been applied.
      • I1802085465 [CARDS-56750] Fixed VCR chargebacks processing. Now such chargebacks are added to existing cases regardless of a value of the additional global parameter DSP_CASE_CREATION_MODE.
      • I1802098715 [CARDS-56742] Corrected issuer EMV script generation procedure to avoid the possibility of deadlock when several requests for one card are received within a very short time.
      • [CARDS-54517] Supported UPI P2P transactions for acquiring.
      • [CARDS-55923] Added inheritance of members from previous document for documents loaded from VCR to allow forwarding to affiliated channels.

    • 03.45.30.56
      • CARDS-56616 [MasterCard interface] Supported database currencies overrides for the MasterCard CDF interface.
      • CARDS-56645 [VISA interface] Added VISA Fee Descriptors (BUS EMV, Parking/Vending) for Hungary.
      • CARDS-56671 [MasterCard interface] Added the ability to skip export of unchanged corporations for the MasterCard CDF Export interface.
      • I1801165374 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-56538] Corrected behaviour for DCI Clearing Import and DCI Inward Processing. Now ATM Service Fee transactions are processed as special Misc transactions. Previously they were processed as general ATM transactions.
      • CARDS-56729 [NSPK interface] Supported MIR Single Message interface.
      • [CARDS-56102] Added a DB procedure for the AMEX GNS Inward pipe to insert documents. Deferred Payment Plan (9240/9340) Addendum now can be processed by cust_ins_doc procedure.
      • I1801291030 [CARDS-56617] Now if the AMEX GNS Outward pipe parameter MERCHANT_FEE_CODE is specified but there are no special Merchant Fee tags in a document, the pipe exports this document as a document without Merchant Fee.
      • [CARDS-56311] Enhanced the partial early repayment algorithm for the instalment plans with a flat fee. By default, when a partial early repayment is made in a portion, the principal amount of a loan is repaid first, and then the portion fee is repaid. The "PRIORITY" tag makes it possible to repay the "Flat Fee" fee of the portion before the principal amount. By default (if the tag is not set), the fee priority is "101", and the principal amount priority is always "100". The lesser value has the higher priority (i.e., by default, the principal amount is repaid first). The principal amount priority must not be changed. To repay the "Flat Fee" fee before the principal amount, the "PRIORITY" tag with the value less than "100" must be specified (for example, PRIORITY=90). If several "Flat Fee" fees are used, the priority must be specified for each fee.
      • [CARDS-56465] Implemented the ability to set the "BASE_TARIFF" tag for tariffs that are Base Tariffs themselves.
      • [CARDS-56507] Supported the new behavior of the "Payment Holidays" action. If the "INST_HOLIDAYS_FOR_OPEN" global parameter is set to "N" (could be redefined on the Financial Institution level), the partially paid and overdue portions of an instalment plan are not shifted to the future periods when the "Payment Holidays" action is performed. If the parameter has the "Y" value (default), then old behavior is used, and the overdue principal amount is recalculated to be paid in the future.
      • [CARDS-56511] Added support for providing WAY4 Cards merchant details required for TS mVisa service.
      • [CARDS-55426] Added check of received card data values on IRouter even if security values are absent in the message.
      • [CARDS-56588] Corrected handling of suspended events created in current billing cycle in backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-56601] Corrected the logic for checking contract groups for a case when an acquiring MEMBER_ID changed during the reporting period. Now transactions are split into two groups by MEMBER_ID. This may downgrade performance of statistics collecting.
      • [CARDS-56622] Optimized preparation of data for merchant screens with transactions when only last records should be shown.
      • [CARDS-56644] Improved the ClientAdditionalInfo and ContractAdditionalInfo applications in the Advanced Applications R2 module. Now tags in the "AddInfoXX" fields can be processed separately.
      • [CARDS-56666] Enhanced instalment plan creation in financial document: now if global parameter or service is configured with the instalment action ACTIVATE_RECALC, an instalment plan created on financial document will keep the same CHAIN_IDT as the plan created in authorisation.
      • [CARDS-56679] Corrected reprocessing of replicated reversals when the original financial document was already processed on the primary node of an HA solution.
      • 03.45.30.22 [CARDS-56660] Fixed processing of a duplicate chargeback document when a presentment reversal was declined. Duplicate chargeback documents are no longer declined in such situations.
      • I1710090102 [CARDS-56487] Added using data prepared before running the report in 'XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report' for performance reasons.
      • I1801214843 [CARDS-56662] Fixed Oracle error "numeric overflow" on Service Pack Approval.
      • [CARDS-56567] Supported import of IP0048T1 and IP0050T1 tables from MasterCard MPE file.
      • I1712120116 [CARDS-56552] Fixed filling the SAFE_DOC.CARD_TYPE database field for incoming SAFE documents loaded by the "SAFE Inward Processing" pipe. Now it is filled with null value instead of spaces when the "Card Type" field is empty in the incoming message.
      • [DBK-3466] Removed unnecessary "enabling constraints" step for Secondary node upgrade procedure.

      • [CARDS-56506] Added the possibility to redefine the INST_INTEREST_TO_DUE global parameter for a financial institution. It can also be redefined in an Instalment Scheme as a value of the INT_TO_DUE tag in the "Special Parms" field. If the parameter is defined in an Instalment Scheme, it will be inherited in a plan, and if the "Change Instalment Terms" action applies to a new Instalment Scheme, initial parameter value will be preserved for a secondary plan.

    • 03.45.30.52
      • I1708224441 [Core] [CARDS-54611] Added a new parameter, "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(3). The default value is "Y". This is an internal technical parameter for DB Manager/WAY4 Manager/WAY4 Web client. Added a new parameter, "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Cardholder_Contract_Statement", "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(1). The default value is "Y". The parameter makes it possible to change the ability to read report parameter values from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table . The "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" and "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" parameters work as a pair. Only if both parameters are "Y" and the "P_CONNID" parameter is not null, report parameter values will be read from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table.

      • I1710317086 [CARDS-56502] Changed the VISA_FAST_FUNDS additional global parameter default value from the existing value "Y" to a new value "A". If VISA_FAST_FUNDS is set to "A", all original credit transactions will be converted into notifications regardless of the Fast Funds Indicator value. For all other transactions, the processing logic remains unchanged. The changes affect the VISA Base II Inward Processing and Affiliated Base II Inward Processing pipes. Please see CUN for required additional actions.

      • [CARDS-56437] DA R2: Supported Bundled Chargeback creation.
      • [CARDS-56021] Added the ability to post a Product's Start Event only when the Product for the Contract changes, without posting on contract creation. The tag value PROD_CHANGE_RULE=OPEN,CHANGE_ONLY; should be used in the "Custom Rules" field of the Product's Start Event or in the "Special Parameters" field of the corresponding Event Type.
      • [CARDS-56473] Improved Fleet bertlv message content returned to terminal in the case of an acquiring processing error. Item response codes values added.
