      • [CARDS-56492] Removed trace messages on routing search that were written even if trace was off.
      • [CARDS-56493] Fixed instalment plan recalculation for billing day change in backdated processing if an instalment has no interest-based fees.
      • I1704057277 [CARDS-56472] Added a check for the Object Roles in the Dispute domain ('MAIN', 'ADD_DOC', 'WO_DOC', 'FWO_DOC', 'SAFE_DOC', 'FC_DOC', 'FILE', 'CONTRACT', 'CLIENT', 'IMG_DOC', 'MSG_DOC', and 'SUB_DOC') which are configured via menu item "ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Setup\OpenWay Settings\Case Object Roles" to check the correctness and completeness of a dispute configuration (menu item "ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Dispute Configuration\Check Dispute Configuration").
      • I1801022871 [CARDS-56471] Disabled the check of a Financial Institution template for the Final Write-Off amounts configuration (ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Dispute Configuration\Dispute Amount Type).
      • I1801189477 [CARDS-56519] Corrected response processing on IRouter to stop sending unnecessary reversal when RC=91 is received.
      • I1801224994 [CARDS-56482] Corrected inheritance of custom fee amount from authorisation document if amount calculated on authorisation was zero.
      • [CARDS-55901] Supported new ODPT DE22.6 (Pos Entry Mode subfield) "10" value for incoming clearing messages according to B-16 NSPK Release article. Also changed processing for DE22.6="82" value on import. NSPK_RELEASE=18.1 additional global parameter must be set for new processing.
      • [CARDS-55904] Changed processing for DE22.5="4" value according to B-16 NSPK 18.1 release article for import files. NSPK_RELEASE=18.1 additional global parameter must be set for new processing.
    • 03.45.30.51
      • CARDS-56298 [QR Payments] Implemented import of Alipay clearing files.
      • CARDS-56197 [Diners Club interface] Fixed processing transaction type for historical data. DCI Clearing Import, DCI Inward Processing.
      • CARDS-56199 [Diners Club interface] Fixed processing of historical data. DCI Clearing Import, DCI Inward Processing.
      • CARDS-56200 [Diners Club interface] Fixed processing ARN filter for historical data import. DCI Clearing Import, DCI Inward Processing.
      • CARDS-56408 [Product management] Corrected the WAY4 Manager "CS.Set Client Classifier" form: now it is synchronised with the similar DB Manager form.
      • CARDS-56444 [MasterCard interface] Added MasterCard product "Prepaid Maestro Consumer Reloadable Card" with Licence Product Id OLR to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).
      • CARDS-56459 [MasterCard interface] Fixed loading files containing "eof" symbol. MABU Issuer Response File Import.
      • CARDS-56126 [VISA interface] Added new SICs 3834, 3835, 3836 according to VISA Release Apr18-783 Global Mandatory Changes to Merchant Category Codes.
      • CARDS-56155 [JCB interface] Changed JCB BIN Table Import pipe. Supported loading of new values from the "Card Product" field. Information about a consumer/commercial is stored in the "bin_table.product_category" database field in MasterCard notation ("1"-consumer, "2"-commercial, "4"-other). Also, the bin_table.licensed_product_id database field is filled with a 3-symbol product code (see the PDSE3001 field in the BIG manual for the list of possible values).
      • CARDS-56156 [JCB interface] Supported new ATM Access Fee functionality in JCB clearing inward and outward pipes pursuant to JCB April 2018 release.
      • CARDS-56363 [JCB interface] Added JCB products.
      • CARDS-56370 [MasterCard interface] Changed MasterCard IRD SA configuration according to the article AN 1103.
      • CARDS-56371 [MasterCard interface] Added new Interbank Reason Code "7827 EDP Adjustment Amount" according to MasterCard release 18.Q2 article AN 1097.
      • CARDS-56372 [MasterCard interface] Unmasked licensed product MWP (MasterCard World Prepaid) from MCW (World MasterCard Card). Added new products WPD (World Prepaid Debit) and ACS (Digital Debit) according to MasterCard release 18.Q2 articles AN 1043 and AN 1056.
      • CARDS-56374 [MasterCard interface] Revised MasterCard Reject Error Messages according to MasterCard release 18.Q2 articles AN 1041, AN 1074, AN 1102, and AN 1103.
      • CARDS-56375 [MasterCard interface] Added filling MPE_IP0040T1.MEAL_VOUCHER_IND and MPE_IP0040T1.NON_RELOADABLE_PREPAID_SW fields according to MasterCard release 18.Q2 articles AN 1037 and AN 1092 when loading MPE file .
      • CARDS-56378 [MasterCard interface] Changed MasterCard services according to article AN 1064.
      • CARDS-56414 [Fee Prediction] Updated domestic commercial interchange fees in Malta according to VISA bulletin on 14 September 2017.
      • CARDS-56425 [MasterCard interface] Modified IRD configuration according to MasterCard 18Q1 Release requirements.
      • CARDS-56441 [QR Payments] Added the menu "OpenWay\Alipay".
      • CARDS-56453 [Diners Club interface] Removed EMPTY field from Recap Header Message (rollbacked issue CARDS-42749). DCI Outwards Processing, DCI Clearing Import.
      • I1711091288 [Statistical Reports] [CARDS-56053] Supported MasterCard requirements Q1 2018 in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report. Transaction data is reported in two separate forms: acquiring debit, acquiring credit.
      • I1801149454 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-56347] Modified domestic V PAY and Visa Immediate Debit interchange fees in Switzerland according to VISA bulletin on 11 January 2018.
      • I1706200311, I1709199952 [CARDS-54930] Corrected IPM Outward Processing behaviour: to avoid rejects for 2nd Presentments and Arbitration Chargebacks when previous incoming message contains incorrect fields, fields and PDS from the original document (1st presentment) are used for inheritance when generating an outgoing message.
      • [CARDS-56000] Supported the new "10" value for DE 22 (Point of Service Entry Mode), subfield 1 (POS Terminal PAN Entry Mode) in the MDS Batch Import pipe (250-byte file). Pursuant to [MC REL] 18.Q2 AN 1103 - Introduction of the Credential on File Indicator MDS 250-byte Batch Data File.
      • [CARDS-56150] Supported AN 1097 enhancement pursuant to MasterCard 18.Q2 release. Now information from PDSs 0397, 0398, 0399 (Extended Decimal Precision amounts) is used instead of 0392,0393,0395 if the USE_EXT_PRECIS_FEE=Y pipe parameter is set and EDP PDSs are present in incoming Financial Position Detail/1644 or Settlement Position Detail/1644 message.
      • [CARDS-56401] Supported new "C58" and "C59" PDS0043 (payment type indicator) values in clearing files, pursuant to MasterCard AN 1069.
      • [DBK-3417] Fixed an error when deferred apply did not skip tasks if WAY4 Replication was late.
      • [CARDS-55930] Supported IF_DATE/IF_DATE_VALUE tags for flexible date checking in different processes.
      • [CARDS-53873] Added the ability to stop regular fee charging when a card is expired. The STOP_AFTER_CARD_EXPIRE; tag should be used in the transaction subtype Fee Algorithm or in Service details.
      • [CARDS-56062] Additional tracing messages for ExtraLimNorm process have been added.
      • [CARDS-56074] Implemented the ability to check Active Plastic for a card contract. The tag IF_DATE=CONTRACT.ACTIVE_CARD_EXPIRE; and appropriate IF_DATE_VALUE should be used in any check strings or apply rules.
      • [CARDS-56338] Automatic backdated processing now checks the USE_AUTO_STORNO document tag with values. The same values as in Transaction Subtypes are used. The tag value is inherited into secondary documents (adjustment, reversal), so if backdated processing for presentments is disabled using the USE_AUTO_STORNO=N tag, backdated processing will be disabled for all secondary documents in this document chain as well. The USE_AUTO_STORNO tag without a value still can be used, but it will not be inherited into secondary documents.
      • [CARDS-56204] Corrected 'Number of active cards' value for 'XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared' report.
      • [CARDS-56362] Corrected calculation MEMBER_ID while gathering statistics for Quarterly IPS Reports.
      • [CARDS-56367] Increased maximum length for MoneyTransfers bertlv message FF04.C2 tag.
      • [CARDS-56419] Corrected lines grouping in ''NSPK Cards, Part 2 (Cards and Territory)" statistical report.
      • [CARDS-56429] Corrected export of GL corrections when backdated processing is performed several times for the same period and the global parameter STORNO_AUTO_HIDE_GL_CORRECTION=Y is set.
      • [CARDS-56432] Added a new value "XF Entry" for the DDDW "Entry Type"
      • [CARDS-56433] Supported the High Precision transfers in the "Full \ Documents Input & Update \ Doc - General Form \ All Docs \ [Srvc / Fees]" form.
      • [CARDS-56438] Added mapping Ethiopia country code 230 to 231. Included the country Myanmar in "MC: Asia Pacific (C)" region. MasterCard Fee Prediction.
      • [CARDS-56462] Removed confusing message "Presentment and Presentment reversal has been matched" if the Dispute Assistant module is not used.
      • I1611016818 [CARDS-56436] Fixed CAB condition processing for IRD calculation. Previously CABs were loaded by the MPE Import pipe in SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB. Now the MPE Import pipe doesn't load/update SIC Groups with classifier code MC_CAB and the IRD Calculation process gets CAB directly from the MPE_IP0075T1 table. To see the MCC-CAB relation, use the menu items "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. IRD Configuration\MC MCC CAB Groups" or "OpenWay\MasterCard Fee Prediction\MC MCC CAB Groups".
      • I1701109043 [CARDS-56360] Fixed rounding of "BASE_RATE" and "FX_MARKUP_PCT" tag values in DCC Info Inquire documents when default DCC conversion mode "IPS" is used.
      • I1708067216, I1710023006, I1801126919 [CARDS-56400] Corrected processing of timeout reversals with unexpected transaction id (ps_ref_number).
      • I1712053530 [CARDS-56461] Corrected behaviour. Now DEV, MPD, VPD, UPD, APD, and JPD tag values are always inherited to a financial document from a matched authorisation.
      • I1712288846 [CARDS-56343] Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation requests. An authorisation will no longer be rejected if two similar Warning messages occurred.
      • I1801043828 [CARDS-56349] Corrected how the reversal entries of adjustment documents are shown in the "Merchant Statement Standing Order Entry Details" report when only the fee from adjustment is included in the statement. Fixed the optional ACQ_PAYMENT functionality which prepares data for external merchant statements.
      • I1801086398 [CARDS-56431] Changed the "Select Case" form for moving an object to another case: the "Contract" field has been removed, case selection is performed by case identifier in a lookup selection dialog.
      • [CARDS-56117] Supported hardcoded classifier "ABU" for saving a contract's "ABU" attribute. ABU (Automatic Billing Updater) functionality requires a separate license.
      • [CARDS-56178] Implemented inheritance of the Business application identifier (BAI) for a reversal/adjustment document from the original document.
      • [CARDS-56376] Added MEAL_VOUCHER_IND and NON_RELOADABLE_PREPAID_SW fields to the MPE_IP0040T1 table according to MasterCard release 18.Q2 articles AN 1037 and AN 1092.
      • [CARDS-56401] Supported new "C58" and "C59" PDS0043 (payment type indicator) values in clearing files, pursuant to MasterCard AN 1069.
      • [CARDS-56407] Created new tables MPE_IP0048T1 and MPE_IP0050T1.
      • [PMPIPES-64] Added validation for Chip Scheme Parameter values. If the value does not correspond to the defined format, a warning message will be stored in the Process Log. Pipe operation will be interrupted.
    • 03.45.30.48
      • CARDS-55861 [NSPK interface] Added a new DEFAULT_USAGE pipe parameter to define the bin_table.usage field for NSPK (MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI) ranges and VISA/MC ranges not corresponding to the appropriate original IPS bin range. NSPK MPE Import.
      • CARDS-55465 [Host2Host interface] Fixed menu item "OpenWay\WAY4 UFX Interchange\File Management\UFX Reset Outward File Counter". Changed counter name.
      • CARDS-56313 [Statistical Reports] Corrected splitting by currency in the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report in accordance with AMEX specification requirements. If the P_FX_CUR parameter is left empty, the "Billings by Industry", "Account Balances", and "Interest Rates" sections are grouped by card contract currency whereas before they were grouped by settlement currency.
      • I1706200311, I1709199952 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-54930] Corrected IPM Outward Processing behaviour: to avoid rejects for 2nd Presentments and Arbitration Chargebacks when previous incoming message contains incorrect fields, fields and PDS from the original document (1st presentment) are used for inheritance when generating an outgoing message.
      • I1712227712 [Bill payments] [CARDS-56335] Added creation of a historical record in sy_handbook table when IssFeeCode is updated with a ProvidePaymentReceiverDetailsRequest.
      • CARDS-56249 [VISA interface] Added field CP01 TCR7 MC/AMEX Discover Data Codes pursuant to Apr18-795(3.17) Changes to the Enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File.
      • CARDS-56273 [Dispute assistant] Added the "Added Objects" tab for the "Activities" tab in the "CM.DSP.Case.form.xml" form of the Dispute Assistant R2 module.
      • [CARDS-55567] Implemented extended logging of backdated processing results. Classifier and balance differences after backdated processing can be logged based on the STORNO_LOG_OBJECTS global parameter. The parameter value is a list of required object types delimited by commas: C - classifiers (default value), B - balances. To log both classifiers and balances C,B should be set as the parameter value.
      • [CARDS-56146] Enhanced determination of the IPS Member Identifier (Member_ID) for account contracts (statistical contract groups for account contracts). Now Member_ID is calculated as Member_ID of the card contracts subordinate to the account contract while before Member_ID was calculated based on the interchange routing settings. Supported an optional IPS Member Identifier set up for reporting purposes: - The ability to define Acquiring/Issuing Member ID by IPS. - The ability to aggregate reporting data that belong to different financial institutions under the same Member ID. - The ability to report financial institution data with the different Member IDs by Issuing BINs. Added the new menu item OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Payment Scheme Identification. For more details, please refer to the OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf, OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf, OW_HOME\manuals\language\AMEX_statistical_reports\AMEX_statistical_reports.pdf.
      • [CARDS-56303] Added the ability to configure several "free" contract relation types with different codes. To specify that a contract relation is "free", the FREE_RELATION tag should be specified in the "Posting Scheme" field. Old behaviour for relations with the FREE_RELATION code has been preserved.
      • [CARDS-56250] Fixed incorrect document reprocessing after replication to HA solution primary node when request and reversal was received in wrong order.
      • [CARDS-56292] Fixed the fatal error occurring when a long instalment plan was saved to a document addendum.
      • [CARDS-56305] Fixed the error message ORA-06502 when reading the INT_GROUP tag from the "Template Details" field
      • [CARDS-56309] Added the ability for documents from "Hotel", "Airline" and "Car rental" SIC groups to be excluded from consideration as multi-clearing/multi-authorisation transactions by setting the global parameter MULTI_AUTH_STRICT=Y (default value is "N"). In this case, if a transaction is not specified as multi-clearing it will be considered as a normal transaction, with no additional processing for multi-capture/multi-authorisations. The AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL parameter will be used to define the possible difference between an authorisation and financial presentment for total funds unblocking instead of the AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT parameter used for multiple mode transactions.
      • NET-109 [CARDS-56314] Corrected the output of grouped interests in the Balance Prediction functionality.
      • [CARDS-56203] Checked filling BAI in Account Funding Transactions (AFT). Added the "TU" value for BAI in AFT documents with SIC_CODE=6051. [VISA REL v.2] Apr18-746 (2.3) Global Mandates for Account Funding Transactions.
    • 03.45.30.45
      • CARDS-55929 [Data preparation and card personalization] Added new categorised parameters to the "MCHIP 4 Generic with PayPass" and "MCHIP Advance Generic CVR 1.x" Chip Scheme templates.
      • CARDS-55702 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: supported export of closed (Lost/Stolen) cards.
      • CARDS-56158 [Statistical Reports] Corrected calculation of "Interest Rates" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • [CARDS-56169] Excluded use of a bank account contract as a case contract when a new case for a document is created in a domain with the "Acquiring" category.
      • [CARDS-56194] Changed the algorithm for populating the CSOF tag. Now CSOF is populated with the "02" (or "05" for transfers to Visa from the card of another IPS) value for Money Transfers transactions if the source of funds is not defined in the BIN table.
      • I1711303675 [CARDS-56191] Corrected related contract definition for standing order when Contract Spc is specified.
      • [DBK-2410] WAY4 Cards upgrade in High Availability solutions no longer requires recreation of a secondary node. The new upgrade procedure for HA solutions is supported only if the current version is 03.44. Upgrade from version 03.43 to 03.45 should be done the old way.
      • [DBK-3369] Fixed the error "A record has been changed without creating a doc" on Primary.
      • I1712122265 [DBK-3363] Fixed issue: now Housekeeping deletes Addendum Doc data related to expired Doc.
    • 03.45.30.44
      • CARDS-53800 [Dispute assistant] Enhanced dispute documents matching. When a duplicate dispute document is processed, the DSP_DUPL=Y tag is set in the document. Matching of reclassified chargebacks will check the mandatory reason code change, and can be turned off for different payment systems using the global parameter DSP_RECLASSIFIED_CBKS_% with the "N" value, where % is the channel code. A document with the DSP_DUPL=Y tag will initiate a separate case in Dispute Assistant.
      • CARDS-56118 [SEPA interface] Added check for SOURCE MEMBER ID and TARGET CODE to SEPA Customer to bank export. If these fields are null, an error message is written in the process log and the document is skipped.
      • I1711138961 [Data preparation and card personalization] [CARDS-55913] Added Issuer Script for updating C5 tag value to "NSPC MIR Generic" Chip Scheme Template.
      • [CARDS-53860] Corrected processing of credit transactions for cards with CBS accounts in TS. AuthCode is now also filled for Auth Advice.
      • [CARDS-53988] Fixed processing of RC on IRouter. Negative RC Usage is now processed at the end of transaction processing.
      • [CARDS-55865] Added analysis of the "On Us" transaction property when calculating "Number of Active cards" in the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.
      • [CARDS-56129] Corrected a flat fee calculation for the "Payment Holidays" action if the current plan has overdue portions.
      • [CARDS-56135] Excluded balance duplicates in the "Account Balances" section of the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • [CARDS-56164] Added closing of related card contracts (except Applet-Contracts) when the base contract is closed.
      • I1711290412 [CARDS-55791] Increased the number of digits (from 30 to 32) in the "Reference Number" field of the GL Transfer table to avoid uniqueness collisions.
      • I1712116966 [CARDS-56170] Fixed incorrect CBS Stand-in processing of several independent authorization requests received within a timeout interval.
      • I1712183916 [CARDS-56115] Changed sub-case creation when moving a document from one financial case to another. Now it calls the activity to create a new sub-case for the document for the target case if there is no such sub-case for the source case. Otherwise, the sub-case will be re-subordinated for the target case.
      • [DBK-3275] Deleted Metainformation menu from Copy Configuration folder. Same menu items could be reached at OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\!!! STAFF ONLY !!!\Metainformation
    • 03.45.30.43
      • CARDS-55639 [Acquiring authorisation] Added a new parameter, CONVERT_ACQ_BIN_CH. The parameter can be set for a financial institution or globally. The parameter redefines the value of field N 32 (Acquiring Institution ID) of an ISO message received through a channel for interaction with an external system. The value of the CONVERT_ACQ_BIN_CH parameter is set as a list of channels for which routing is defined according to the OUR_MEMBER_ID field of the BIN_TABLE table. If the parameter is not set, routing is performed according to the value of the CONVERT_ACQ_BIN global parameter.
      • CARDS-52705 [Scheduler] Restored Scheduler Standard Menu Items. They are now put in "OpenWay\WAY4 Scheduler - Cards\Standard Menu Items".
      • CARDS-55968 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export 1) Modified period ID calculation: if the PERIOD_ID_FORMAT pipe parameter is set to "L", current period ID equals the last day of the previous period for all record types. 2) Added the new pipe parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT with the default value "N". If this parameter is set to "Y", verify that duplicate T4 Cardholder records are disabled.
      • CARDS-55073 [Issuing] Disabled the SET_CREDIT_LIMIT_MODE global parameter.
      • CARDS-56090 [VISA interface] Added a new parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT for the VISA VCF Export pipe. Valid values are "Y" and "N" (default). If this parameter is set to "Y", verification of T4 Cardholder records duplication is disabled.
      • [UFX-484] Changed type of W4T_Officer/GroupIDT from W4D_Code to W4D_Name in OfficerApplications.
      • [CARDS-56076] Fixed No Data Found error for Interest by Credit for Sibling Orders processing.
      • [CARDS-56101] Corrected wrong activation date calculation for recurrent templates after editing.
      • [DBK-3320] Added logging of copy_dt (new column in 3.46.30+ and COPY_DT tag in action_details in previous versions) and inst_id, dbms_specific, sid, serial_number in si_conn_src values (3.46.30+ only) to si_log_dst table.
      • [DBK-3325] Added the ability to eliminate high concurrency for sw_node_action when TS switches between nodes.
      • [DBK-3332] Added a new global parameter, DM_ID_CACHE_LEN. This parameter defines the size of cache of dm_record.id values. The default value is 20. Increase this value if row lock contention on num_seq_range occurs during high volume of inserting into dm_record.
      • [DBK-3021] Migrated DB Manager to a new PowerBuilder version.
      • I1710042561 [DBK-3192] Fixed issue with VISA BaseII/MasterCard IPM/AMEX GNS Inward: now all uncritical format errors are not logged in Process Log.
    • 03.45.30.41
      • CARDS-55758 [Product inspector] Fixed an issue with the Product Inspector's "test script import" pipe that required UI elements and graphic objects when the pipe was running under Scheduler on *nix OS in silent mode (pipe parameter SILENT="Y").
      • CARDS-55889 [Product inspector] Fixed transaction condition attributes mapping between values in the file and in the destination database during test scripts import.
      • CARDS-55899 [Issuing] Added a form to set "DateFrom" and "DateTo" parameters as the first subitem to the standard menu item (OWS.Processing Status Report), which calls the Processing Status Report report (ROOT.OpenWay.Full.Daily Procedures.Processing Status Report).
      • CARDS-55967 [VISA interface] Corrected currency conversion when calculating the "Payments Received" field value in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report and the "Interest Rates" field value in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • I1701130003 [Statistical Reports] [CARDS-55936] Corrected calculation of "Balance loaded onto cards during the quarter" value in the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now it is not multiplied by number of related contracts.
      • CARDS-54916 [Host2Host interface] Added a description of the USE_DOC_DATA; tag to the standard system manual "Documents".
      • CARDS-55960 [MasterCard interface] Switched the MasterCard CDF Export pipe to CDF3 Schema Version 17.01.00.00.
      • [CARDS-55999] Supported new DE22.7 value "7" ("Credential-on-file") processing.
      • [CARDS-56002] Fixed the "Invalid value of numeric left-padded field F315_Reason_Code" error caused by incorrect processing of a reason code for non-VCR documents. Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.dll, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll, Visa Base II Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll.
      • [CARDS-56003] Added grants to update the file_record table in the pipes Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing and VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.
      • [CARDS-56004] Fixed the "Could Not Get MANDATORY Field" error and removed incorrect caching from SQL queries in VISA pipes: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.dll, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll, Visa Base II Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.dll, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.dll.
      • [CARDS-55885] Improved the conditions for detecting the VCR documents by the first digits of their Reason Codes. Fixed an issue of encoding and decoding the VCR-specific "Dispute Condition" field in TC33.TCR1 and TCx5-x7.TCR4 messages.
      • [CARDS-55912] Added a check of the additional global parameter DEBUG_LEVEL value before outputting debug messages to the process log in VISA and Affiliated BASE II outward pipes. Now all debug messages are written to the process log only if DEBUG_LEVEL ="DEBUG" or DEBUG_LEVEL ="ALL". Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing.cpp, Affiliated BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp, Visa Base II Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Marked Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII ONUS Outward Processing.cpp, VISA BASEII Prepared Outward Processing.cpp
      • [DBK-3310] Added logging of copy_dt (new column in 3.46.30+ and COPY_DT tag in action_details in previous versions) and inst_id, dbms_specific, sid, serial_number in si_conn_src values (3.46.30+ only) to si_log_dst table.
      • [DBK-3300] Added additional logging for high DELAY_MS value exception messages in TS Log.
      • [DBK-3308] Corrected export of Datamart configuration (MP Payment Scheme Identification table).
      • [CARDS-55728] Supported Enhanced Value and Product Graduation MasterCard ALM programs.
      • [CARDS-55732] Added a new parameter, CONVERT_ACQ_BIN_CH. The parameter can be set for a financial institution or globally. The parameter redefines the value of field N 32 (Acquiring Institution ID) of an ISO message received through a channel for interaction with an external system. The value of the CONVERT_ACQ_BIN_CH parameter is set as a list of channels for which routing is defined according to the OUR_MEMBER_ID field of the BIN_TABLE table. If the parameter is not set, routing is performed according to the value of the CONVERT_ACQ_BIN global parameter.
      • [CARDS-55900] Supported the INTEREST_DELAY parameter on the financial institution level. Use the INTEREST_DELAY tag with the "Y" or N" values in financial institution special parameters.
      • [CARDS-55782] Corrected the condition for creating notification messages about authorization request processing results. Now they can be generated not only for card contracts.
      • [CARDS-55799] Added routing IDT propagation for contract subordinate tables on contract approve if routing IDT is changed.
      • [CARDS-55919] Corrected client and parent contract status check when creating a contract manually or using Advanced Application R2. When the client or parent contract has an invalid status, contract approve will fail with an error.
      • [CARDS-56006] Corrected macrotransaction posting date for reversal documents when automatic backdated processing is enabled for a financial institution and transaction subtype but disabled for the card product.
      • I1711089440 [CARDS-55897] Fixed an issue with CM_USER table export using "export.bat" script.
      • I1711138024 [CARDS-55916] Corrected behaviour: now a reversal message is forwarded to the next member even when the response for processing the primary message has not yet been received.
      • I1711286506 [CARDS-56011] Added a new process that is started in the Process Log when the "Recalc Additional Balances" procedure (OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts -> Recalc Additional Balances) is executed.
      • [CARDS-55802] [MIR REL] 2018.1 B-20: NSPK MPE Import. Supported import of new file field BILCURRENCY_CODE. This field is stored in the CH_BILL_CURR tag in bin_table. To override this value, a new pipe parameter, CHANGE_CURR = "YYYXXX" can be used, where "YYY" is the currency code from the file and "XXX" is the currency code to store in the database.
      • [CARDS-55885] Improved the conditions for detecting the VCR documents by the first digits of their Reason Codes. Fixed an issue of encoding and decoding the VCR-specific "Dispute Condition" field in TC33.TCR1 and TCx5-x7.TCR4 messages.
      • [CARDS-55999] Supported new DE22.7 value "7" ("Credential-on-file") processing.
    • 03.45.30.39
      • CARDS-55807 [VISA interface] VISA Acquirer Capture Import: supported import of Multiple Clearing Sequence Number and Multiple Clearing Count into the CLR_SEQ_NUM and CLR_SEQ_COUNT tags.
      • [CARDS-55177] Visa Base II Outward: fixed "Authorization Code contains wrong characters in doc" error when exporting documents with an authorization code that contains the "q" character.
      • [CARDS-55827] Supported the ability to store data from PDS1013 in a document when using MasterCard IPM Inward Processing pipe.
      • [CARDS-55632] Supported a new algorithm for applying interest rate on Due Date. See the account template attribute INT_RESET_DATE definition.
      • [CARDS-55790] Added device name (WSP_DEVNAME), device ID (WSP_DEVID) and last four digits of mobile phone number (WSP_L4DIG) saving in the database as token parameters on MDES / VTS enrolment.
      • [CARDS-53774] Fixed balance amount calculation for Balance Type with BY_CURR tag specified in Standing Order.
      • [CARDS-55864] Eliminated the possibility of deadlocks in bank contract accounts when backdated processing is done in parallel.
      • [CARDS-55880] Changed behaviour. Now Customer Profile Handbook checks that the filtering item code exists. An error message will be returned if this code does not exist in the filtering handbook.
      • I1711038051 [CARDS-55878] Fixed incorrect fleet target fee resulting from the end-of-month fee recalculation procedure for a document chain with two adjustments.
      • I1711236209 [CARDS-55890] Corrected getting default values for report fields in MasterCard report "Location Administration Tool (LAT)" (OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Reports\ATM Location). If the proper parameter value is not set in the device contract, default values from sy_handbook (with filter: group_code="MC_LAT_ATM") are used. Refer to OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_ATM_Location_Report.pdf for details.
      • [CARDS-55827] Supported the ability to store data from PDS1013 in a document when using MasterCard IPM Inward Processing pipe.
    • 03.45.30.38
      • CARDS-55810 [Issuing authorisation] Added a new button, [Chain Log], to the "Stored Messages" form (menu: \OpenWay\Full\Online Monitoring\Logical Channels & SAF) The button opens a form showing ComsLog records related to the corresponding document chain.
      • [DBK-3271] Fixed periodical switching HA services on and off in Autoswitchover.
      • [CARDS-55817] Fixed an issue related to POS Terminal cycle reconciliation when the cycle counter was renewed.
      • [CARDS-55825] Fixed issue. Now generation of GL corrections for misc fee macrotransactions in backdated processing is based on target fee amount. If the correction macrotransaction has the same fee amount and equal GL traces, no GL corrections will be generated even if transaction amounts are different.
      • [CARDS-55030] Changed P2P Money Transfer Account Funding and Original Credit Transactions Jurisdiction rules according to Oct17 VISA Release. Transactions between cards issued in a list of EU countries will be processed as domestic transactions.
      • [CARDS-55723] Supported multiple Tariff Segments loading by MPE Import. Affected pipes: com.openwaygroup.pipe.mc.mpe_import.jar.
      • [CARDS-55784] Added the P2P_ONUS tag to money transfer documents if both the Payer's and Recipient's cards in a transaction are OnUs.
    • 03.45.30.37
      • CARDS-55742 [Host2Host interface] Fixed "ORA-06502" error when "USE_EXT_FILE_COUNTER" IC Document Export pipe parameter has the "Y" value.
      • CARDS-54729 [Fee Prediction] Modified VISA RA configuration and interchange tariffs for Bulgaria according to VISA bulletin on 22 July 2017.
      • CARDS-55734 [Fee Prediction] Modified the interchange tariffs for Belgium according to MasterCard announcement 1151 on October 17, 2017.
      • [DBK-3023] Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.
      • [CARDS-54959] Supported FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT mode for custom fees. Other values of the FROM_AUTH tag are not supported. If the blocked Fee Amount currency differs from the posting Fee Amount currency, conversion is made according to custom fee Service rules.
      • [CARDS-55162] Fixed duplicated line item document rows (if multiple macrotransactions were created) in statement reports.
      • [CARDS-55387] Restored processing of cases when a reversal transaction message is received before the authorization request. Added limit on the period for stopping attempts to search for reversals preceding the corresponding request. By default the search is performed within 24 hours. This period can be redefined with the global parameter UNM_AUTH_REV_FLASHBACK_DAYS.
      • [CARDS-55443] Corrected generation of the chain identifier for an instalment plan converted from a transaction in previous cycles if another plan was created and closed for the same transaction.
      • [CARDS-55501] Fixed an issue when ABU messages were wrongly selected and sent to IPS online by Transaction Switch DBFileUpdate.
      • [CARDS-55727] Deleted some obsolete objects to prevent undesirable use of unsupported functionality. This has been done for future compatibility with the new Contract Parameter approach.
      • [CARDS-55733] Fixed an issue with the "TOKEN" transaction attribute missing for affiliate transactions according to the bin_table settings.
      • [CARDS-55749] Added clearing of internal state for backdated processing on fatal error. Prevented incorrect processing of successive documents when automatic backdated processing of one of them resulted in a fatal error during mass document processing.
      • I1608222937 [CARDS-52329] For reports: XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf improved counting of cards reissued with different PANs.
      • I1608314406 [CARDS-54939] Improved performance of XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • I1709148207 [CARDS-55495] Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report - supported a new section, "Co-Brand / Affinity Program Data". This block is hidden by default and can be shown by the parameter P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM. Added new parameters: P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM P_ATTR_BIN P_COBRAND_TRANS_TYPES Added the COBRAND_PROGRAM configuration group PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM and new BIN statistic attributes
      • I1710257336 [CARDS-55494] Fixed incorrect system behaviour: when using the "Duplicate" action in the Service screen, the amendment reference for the new record was not updated.
      • I1710259099 [CARDS-55431] Fixed issue. Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.
      • [CARDS-55466] Added IPS MCX (Multicaixa). Added "MCX" channels with the "N" character and "Our MCX Cards" with the "n" character.
      • [CARDS-55740] Increased the length of the fields DOC.REASON_CODE, DSP_REASON.CODE, REASON_CODE.CODE, REASON_ACTION.TGT_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_TYPE.REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.INW_REASON_CODE, DISPUTE_ITEM.REASON_CODE, CM_CASE_DOC.REASON_CODE from 4 to 32 symbols.
    • 03.45.30.36
      • CARDS-48909 [Issuing] Removed the [Cr Log Flds] button from the "OpenWay\Full\Online Monitoring\Online Docs\ -> Online Message" form. Log records are still available in "Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Emergency Report\Online Log - Not Safe" and "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Interchange\All Docs Not Safe -> Online Log" forms.
      • CARDS-55704 [Fee Prediction] Modified MasterCard interchange tariffs for Luxembourg according to MasterCard announcement AN 1112 on 10 September 2017.
      • I1711030543, I1711172189 [VISA interface] [CARDS-55721] Added the configuration to calculate VISA Reimbursement Attribute for Ukraine.
      • [CARDS-55551] Added the ability to take an instalment fee amount from a custom fee. The tag SERVICE_FEE=<list of fee codes> should be added to instalment fee special parameters. If the fee should be taken from a contra service, the additional tag CONTRA_SERVICE should be also set. Only an instalment fee with a flat fee calculation scheme can be based on a service, however it can be of any fee category (ordinary fee, merchant fee, extra fee and so on).
      • [CARDS-55708] Added additional check of amnd_state in document accept process to prevent situations when documents selected for processing have been deleted in a parallel session.
      • [CARDS-55711] Added the possibility to create ContractAddInfo or ClientAddInfo application section with the ActionType defined in the application type.
      • [CARDS-55722] Corrected "For Export" field filling in GL Traces created during backdated processing if the original GL trace was also created by backdated processing.
      • I1707289866 [CARDS-55300] DA R2: Fixed reversal processing for No Such Card case. Now reversals will be added under the case. If a reversal is not matched with the first presentment, a new case will be created.
      • I1709072151, I1711087480 [CARDS-55725] Excluded the possibility to route an authorization document to the source channel.
      • I1711137893 [CARDS-55724] Fixed the calculation algorithm for the PS_TRN_NAME statistic attribute in all statistics reports. The algorithm uses the document's source and target channel codes to define a transaction Payment Scheme. Added the priority to choose a channel code for calculation: On-Us channels have the highest priority, then Affiliated channels are taken into account, and other channels have the lowest priority in the algorithm. Without such prioritization, the PS_TRN_NAME attribute could have an incorrect value for transactions processed in the channels other than On-Us and Affiliated channels.
      • PRIOR-67 [CARDS-55710] Disabled sensitive data storage for EMV cards.
    • 03.45.30.35
      • CARDS-54551 [Core] A new parameter "P_LIAB_TOP_SQL" has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement.rdf" report. The length is varchar2(4096). The default value for this parameter is "select a.id from client c, acnt_contract a where c.amnd_state = 'A' and a.client__id = c.id and a.amnd_state = 'A' and a.liab_contract is null and a.acnt_contract__oid is null". The new parameter allows the report to be run in batch mode together with the P_LIAB_CAT_LIST parameter.
      • CARDS-55418 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of "SIC Code" and "Merchant Specific Code" fields in TRA file. Now if SIC code has a value between 3000 and 3999, it is put in the "Merchant Specific Code" field, otherwise in the "SIC Code" field.
      • CARDS-55614 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: fixed processing of the "CustomIdentifierType" field defined in the ADD_FIELDS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTION_5000 pipe parameter. The "CustomIdentifierType" field was erroneously filled with the "CustomIdentifier" custom tag value instead of the "CustomIdentifierType" custom tag value. Also fixed "CustomIdentifier" field processing - it is cut if length is greater than allowed by the format.
      • CARDS-55628 [MasterCard interface] Fixed the customized fields processing for MasterCard CDF Export process. If a customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters had [null] value, non-customized value was used for export. Now standard value is used only when there is no customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters. Otherwise, a customized value is used even if it has [null] value.
      • I1709148207 [VISA interface] [CARDS-55495] Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report - supported a new section, "Co-Brand / Affinity Program Data". This block is hidden by default and can be shown by the parameter P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM. Added new parameters: P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM P_ATTR_BIN P_COBRAND_TRANS_TYPES Added the COBRAND_PROGRAM configuration group PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM and new BIN statistic attributes
      • [CARDS-55110] Increased doc.ps_ref_number field length to 255 characters.
      • [CARDS-55164] Resolved an issue with the Delinquent Outstanding section in the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" reports when they do not contain data for account contracts having both the Credit and Charge card contracts attached.
      • [CARDS-55584] Fixed Declined authorisation message processing to avoid situations when increment of an authorisation code counter lead to an exception on a non-home node of a WAY4 HA Distributed Processing solution.
      • [CARDS-55613] Restored default behaviour for charging regular fees. Documents for regular fees are not created now for contracts with Invalid contract statuses.
      • [CARDS-55666] Changed usage change amount definition on financial document posting when USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=F. If no account for the contract exists in the transaction currency, the settlement amount will be used for usage.
      • I1708020600 [CARDS-55665] Fixed issue. Now "When Available" and "When Credit" misc fee documents amendment fields will be refreshed before posting to prevent untimely housekeeping.
      • I1711139617 [CARDS-55559] Increased the size of the copied account name in an account template to 200 symbols when adding a settlement currency (in the "FX Scheme" screen).
      • [DBK-3242] Fixed insufficient grants for WAY4 HA autoswitchover monitoring.
    • 03.45.30.34
      • CARDS-54959 [Core] Supported FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT mode for custom fees. Other values of the FROM_AUTH tag are not supported. If the blocked Fee Amount currency differs from the posting Fee Amount currency, conversion is made according to custom fee Service rules.
      • CARDS-54956 [Application management] Fixed an issue occurring on the Product Inspector WAY4 Manager screen when the "Application" button is pressed.
      • CARDS-55114 [VISA interface] Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report. Now "Number of Statements Mailed" and "Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges" are gathered only for card categories with the parent value of card programme = "CREDIT" (DWD_CARD_CATEGORY classifier values with the "Parent value"="CREDIT") and multiplied on billing cycles number. Added new parameters: - P_FILTER_11 - P_FILTER_12
      • CARDS-55162 [Fleet cards] Fixed duplicated line item document rows (if multiple macrotransactions were created) in statement reports.
      • CARDS-55387 [Issuing authorisation] Restored processing of cases when a reversal transaction message is received before the authorization request. Added limit on the period for stopping attempts to search for reversals preceding the corresponding request. By default the search is performed within 24 hours. This period can be redefined with the global parameter UNM_AUTH_REV_FLASHBACK_DAYS.
      • CARDS-55433 [Diners Club interface] Changed the behaviour of the BAL file fields marked as "Information provided on the statement date only" in the DCI IPSE manual that are now exported only if the "Record Type" field value is "B".
      • CARDS-55443 [Instalment management] Corrected generation of the chain identifier for an instalment plan converted from a transaction in previous cycles if another plan was created and closed for the same transaction.

      • CARDS-55471 [AMEX interface] Added a new parameter to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: P_GROUP_CHANNELS, varchar2(255), the default value is " 'X','Y','x','y' ". The parameter is used for transaction filtering in the "Discount Business Summary" and "POS Billing Detail By Industry" sections.
      • CARDS-55501 [MasterCard interface] Fixed an issue when ABU messages were wrongly selected and sent to IPS online by Transaction Switch DBFileUpdate.
      • CARDS-55510 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing of settlement incoming messages for financial advices as "Iss Ichng Detail Loyalty For Cardholder CR Inc". Now such messages without the DE-026 field are loaded as "Iss Ichng Detail CH Payment Inc" type.
      • CARDS-55534 [VISA interface] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business: fixed amount balance available calculation algorithm in the "Prepaid cards" section, line "Balance available/remaining at end of quarter". Now: if there are several Prepaid cards related to the same accounting contract in a main-sub hierarchy, its account balance will be included in the report only once. Before: it used to be multiplied by the number of cards.
      • CARDS-55540 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed "Transaction Amount" field filling in TRA file (added sign).
      • CARDS-55569 [VISA interface] Fixed issue in the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now the value "Of which are only Contact" in the "Card Issuance" block is calculated as "Number of issued Chip cards" minus "Of which are only Contactless" and "Of which are Contact and Contactless".
      • I1608314406 [Statistical Reports] [CARDS-54939] Improved performance of XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • I1710257336 [Core] [CARDS-55494] Fixed incorrect system behaviour: when using the "Duplicate" action in the Service screen, the amendment reference for the new record was not updated.
      • I1710259099 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-55431] Fixed issue. Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.
      • CARDS-54236 [NSPK interface] Added installation and configuration manuals (issuing and acquiring modules) for the MIR Loyalty Program.
      • CARDS-54636 [Diners Club interface] Implemented loading of historical data. Three new parameters have been added to the pipes com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.clearing_import.jar and com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing: - HISTORY_MODE=Y/N (the default value is "N") - pipe's mode of operation. If HISTORY_MODE=Y, data from an incoming file are loaded without addendums and with outward status="History" . - HIST_ARN_LIST - ARN filter (list of ARN with commas as delimiters) for historical documents. The parameter only works if HISTORY_MODE=Y. If the ARN of a processed document is included in this list, the document is downloaded. If HIST_ARN_LIST is empty and HISTORY_MODE =Y, all documents from the incoming file are downloaded as historical documents. - HISTORY_POSTING=Y/N (the default value is "N"). If HISTORY_POSTING=Y, an attempt to post a downloadable document is made.
      • CARDS-54996 [VISA interface] Added the new pipe parameter TEST_MODE=Y (valid values: "Y"/"N"(default)) to enable the test mode for debugging uploaded data in VCF Export.
      • CARDS-55435 [Fee Prediction] Modified IRD configuration according to DAILY MPE files from 14.10.17 to 04.11.17.
      • CARDS-55466 [Core] Added IPS MCX (Multicaixa). Added "MCX" channels with the "N" character and "Our MCX Cards" with the "n" character.
      • [CARDS-55512] Set the default parameter FILL_TID=Y for the AMEX GNS Outward pipe.
      • [CARDS-55005] FeeMin, FeeMax tariff attributes has been supported for fleet cards fee calculation process. Only applicable to fees defined as transaction price percent.
      • [CARDS-55450] Supported a new tag, CPID_SPC, to search for Money Transfer contracts using a specific target_spc. The contract number that is found will be returned in the CPID_PAN tag.
      • [CARDS-54486] Fixed system behaviour for balance type with history mode: after using backdated processing functionality, MAX amount counter calculation has been corrected.
      • [CARDS-54539] Corrected system behaviour for balance type with history mode = Billing when saving history records if billing falls on the second day of the year and the first day is a holiday.
      • [CARDS-55324] Fixed fleet clearing documents transaction amount validation rounding issue.
      • [CARDS-55436] Fixed WAY4Web client context data synchronisation process problem which could lead to deadlocks in documents posting process.
      • [CARDS-55507] Corrected processing of authorization requests in SMS mode if a reversal message was received earlier.
      • [CARDS-55511] Corrected processing of financial online messages. They are now received without restriction by category.
      • [CARDS-55547] DA R2. Fixed function to check Fraud Counter. Now this is performed only for Issuing contracts.
      • I1711105367 [CARDS-55526] Fixed incorrect system behaviour: cases when the Parent Pack was removed from a Service Package, service_approved records under the Service Package were not created when reapproving the Service Package.
      • [DBK-3193] Fixed incorrect determining of new routing in switching between HA nodes.
      • [DBK-3230] Activating services in a node is always properly replicated to another nodes
      • I1710136911 [CARDS-55432] Fixed temporary behaviour of the VISA SMS Outward pipe, when DE65 (SRN) was inherited for 2Prs from 1Prs (this could be necessary for initial NSPK connection). Now DE65 (SRN) for 2Prs is inherited from Chbk by default. For legacy behaviour, the new SRN_FROM_PRS = Y pipe parameter must be set.

      • I1710122282 [Transaction management] [CARDS-55304] Changed conditions for the "Message" link in the "Mess To Mbr Incoming" form and the "Errors" link in the "Doc - Grid" form: messages with an empty Object Type are no longer displayed.
      • CARDS-55259 [Security & key management] Updated document: key size requirement has been changed (112 bits for 3DES, 128 bits for AES, and least 2048 bits for RSA algorithm).
      • CARDS-54735 [UnionPay interface] Replaced "CUP Inward Processing.dll" with a new java pipe, "com.openwaygroup.pipe.cup.inward_processing.jar". Removed the pipe parameters CHANNEL, CHANGE_CURR_IN, and EXT_CURR_EXP. Supported loading of Intra-currency Settlement Block File.
      • CARDS-55263 [VISA interface] Renamed "Number of Active Cards" field to "Number of Active Cards (at least one transaction)" in "Card Issuance" section of XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report and added new "Number of Active Cards (at least one Contactless transaction)" field.
      • I1710103490 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-55295] NSPK Inward Processing: supported file import using several connections to the database. To use this functionality, specify the required number of connections in the new N_OF_PARALLEL_THREADS pipe parameter.
      • [CARDS-55311] Added the ability to configure last instalment portion threshold for instalments with portion amount specified. A threshold tariff code should be specified as the value of LAST_PORTION_THRESHOLD tag in the instalment scheme's special parameters. The tariff value can be configured as an amount or as a percentage of portion amount. If the last portion (or several last portions) amount is less than the threshold amount, these last portions will not be created and the remaining amount will be added to the previous portion.
      • [CARDS-55276] Fixed an issue with applying the appropriate interchange rules (VISA RA calculation when the additional global parameter VISA_CALC_RA is set to "Y"). Now if no domestic (intra-country) interchange rules exist, the system finds another rule (i.e. regional interchange rule).
      • [CARDS-55279] Corrected the algorithm for determining the need to redirect an advice message to the core banking system when its processing finished with rejection.
      • [CARDS-55283] Optimised Customer Profile handbook to reduce execution time.
      • [CARDS-55308] Corrected reversal fraud prevention validation condition to avoid rejection of payment reversals.
      • [CARDS-55312] Changed constant data for the mVisa request according to VISA requirements.
      • [CARDS-55316] Added a new action, "Refresh Product List" to the forms "Acq Main Contract.srd", "Iss Main Contract.srd", and "Iss Main Contract - Corp.srd". This action makes it possible to refresh the list of allowed products for the current contract, if contract has the approval status "No"
      • [CARDS-55355] Eliminated the ability to generate an authorisation code value unsuitable to VISA restrictions.
      • [CARDS-55388] Corrected Advanced Application R2 for contract counterparty creation by a predefined application type to avoid "Counterparty is not found" errors.
      • I1708081991 [CARDS-55285] Corrected filling number of documents for an item when posting a zero entry (e.g. when the total amount of all documents is 0). Zero documents number led to closing of zero due instead of creating a due transfer even if the ALLOW_ZERO_DUE tag was configured.
      • I1708301443 [CARDS-54853] Fixed calculation of W4Web grants in officer groups using local variables.
      • I1710116985 [CARDS-55265] Fixed macrotransactions duplication error in acquiring documents. The error occurs if a reversal document was processed simultaneously with the posting procedure.
      • I1710242617 [CARDS-55320] Corrected behaviour of the global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER. For the default value of the additional global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER=N, GL_TRACE/GL_TRANSFER records are not created now when debit and credit accounts are equal. Accounts are equal when their account numbers, gl_numbers and account templates match. Previously only account numbers and account templates were compared.
      • WFCKF-2870 WFCKF-2843 [CARDS-54958] Corrected re-processing of documents transferred from a secondary node of the HA solution to improve repeating values of the auth_seq_n field in contract records affected by the document.
      • [CARDS-55203] Updated VISA SMS: when posting a Fee Collections document, the system adds now the NETWORK_ID tag with proper value "0004" or "0002" to the document add_info field. The value is then used to fill in F63.1.
      • I1710180238 [CARDS-55290] Modified VISA BASEII Inward Processing (pipe): now the original notification code from an FRS message type "MC" is stored in an FRS document (safe_doc.details).
      • [DBK-3009] Fixed issue: now transactions uncommitted at the time of the "prepare" action are populated into an attached node.
      • [DBK-3167] Fixed problem with Configuration Inspector which did not allow insertion of records into configuration tables after running "OpenWay\Copy Configuration\Copy Configuration Import Screen" -> [Data]-> [Import merged data] on WAY4 03.45.30.

      • CARDS-53712 [Diners Club interface] Supported export of DCI Card Product Submission file for different DCI Releases. Version number filled from DCI_RELEASE global parameter.

      • CARDS-55081 [Fee Prediction] Modified interchange tariffs according to MasterCard Bulgaria bulletin No.1 on 7 February 2017.
      • CARDS-55113 [Diners Club interface] Removed CARD_CONTRACT_TYPE pipe parameter as deprecated.
      • CARDS-55129 [MasterCard interface] Updated IRD configuration files based on FULL MPE (Release 17Q4).
      • CARDS-55250 [MasterCard interface] Removed obsolete "Finance Charges and Fees" section from XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • I1704129157 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-52876] DCI MPE (Sys Ops XML File) Import: Supported loading Product Id, Account Funding Source and Product Category fields in BIN Table. Added DCI products to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).
      • I1706056034 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-55256] VISA Fee Prediction: Modified VISA domestic commercial interchange tariffs in Italy according to VISA bulletin on 1 June 2017.
      • I1710037703 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-55175] Modified VISA interchange tariff for domestic ATM Cash Disbursement transactions in Bulgaria according to VISA bulletin on 24 August 2017.
      • [CARDS-54214] The acquiring processing procedure creates a new ACQ_NL tag in the doc add_info field if Card Stop List validation is passed successfully.
      • [CARDS-54787] Added the INTP2P tag to the add_info field of B2C, C2C and Credit money transfer transaction documents.
      • [CARDS-54917] Output into the process log of data attributes were used for TPPS card status calculation has been added.
      • [CARDS-55143] Added the ability to keep properties (e.g. amount) of an event-based fee in backdated processing. The STORNO_FEE_ACTION=REAPPLY tag should be configured in the special parameters field of the event type.
      • [CARDS-55159] Improved masking for e-mail in TAR messages. Mask format is n##e@g#####.com.
      • [CARDS-55222] Included markup fee in principal amount when creating an instalment plan for a transaction.
      • [CARDS-55227] Added the ability to count a document's amount as a reversal in contract balances.
      • [CARDS-54484] Modified the money transfer transactions PTID and RPBA tags analysis algorithm. The USE_PTID_IN_P2P global parameter is no longer used. The PTID tag value is used for processing documents when the target card is a MasterCard card. The RPBA tag is used for VISA and other international payment systems.
      • [CARDS-54698] Changed processing of POS Environment field (TCR1 pos 168): for recurring transactions the value is "R", for installments - "I".
      • [CARDS-54979] Added amendment information refresh on approve of Products, Service Packs and Account Schemes linked with a template record (Product Template, Parent Pack, Parent Scheme).
      • [CARDS-54989] Added a new global parameter, CREDIT_REPEAT_PENDING for processing repeated credit messages from a secondary node. To increase available funds, the parameter value must be set to "Y". The default value is "N".
      • [CARDS-55079] Corrected transit rejected message processing by IRouter to avoid to inserting unnecessary credit_history records.
      • [CARDS-55085] Corrected instalment plan recalculation on billing change when interest capitalization is used and interest for an additional first period shift has not yet been paid or capitalized.
      • [CARDS-55111] Corrected Oracle hint for API acnt_api.LEAVE_LAST_N_RECORDS().
      • [CARDS-55115] Resolved performance issue on due processing during backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-55139] Fixed issue. A multi-currency pricing document is now declined if the conversion service is not allowed in the DCC contract or IPS contract.
      • [CARDS-55142] Fixed the error message ORA-06502 "Numeric or value error: character string buffer too small" for ageing account templates, when the "Template Details" field contains more than 255 symbols.
      • [CARDS-55152] Fixed error when macrotransactions were duplicated for acquiring documents. The error occurred when a "PostAuth" document was processed simultaneously with the posting procedure.
      • I1709067810 [CARDS-55097] Restored the initial the behaviour of cards_reports.GET_ACC_GL_BAL() API. Now it returns GL turnover amounts from gl_transfer without the order_status filter.
      • I1709071752 [CARDS-55179] Fixed appearance of retail line item documents in the "Posted" state but without any m_transactions linked to them.
      • I1709135169 [CARDS-55245] DA R2: Fixed document "Requirement" field filling for MasterCard Fulfillment - Fee Collection. Now DA sets "Requirement" to "ER1" instead of "1".
      • I1709204499, I1709299082 [CARDS-55117] Corrected partial approval amount calculation to avoid reject when the request currency is more expensive than the card account currency.
      • I1709297428 [CARDS-55104] Fixed repeat message processing when a CBS response to an original request has not yet been received.
      • I1710057271 [CARDS-55095] Corrected calculation of the date range for display in standard forms when limiter parameters are modified by a tariff.
      • I1710096925 [CARDS-55076] Changed the ARN calculation algorithm. To avoid "Incorrect Date in ARN (yDDD) : [7281], must not be less than trans_date" error, the transaction date is used to calculate ARN for the MIR interface. When the posting date is larger than the transaction date by 5 or more days, the posting date is used. For other payment system interfaces (MasterCard, Visa, AMEX) the transaction date is always used for ARN calculation.
      • I1710098485 [CARDS-55125] MasterCard IRD Calculation. Fixed IRD PT definition: added condition for requirement "The card cannot be a contactless card".
      • I1710100883, I1710100829 [CARDS-55210] DA R2. Fixed Outgoing Fee Collection processing: added setting tag OUR_CARD in the add_info field of the doc table.
      • I1710135034 [CARDS-55135] Corrected handling of transit financial advice when the message target is maintained in the same processing center.
      • I1710135034 [CARDS-55198] Corrected handling of transit financial advice on NetServer when the message target is maintained in the same processing center.
      • I1710173941 [CARDS-55199] Fixed issue. Now in "Balance Prediction" functionality, interest that has already been paid is excluded from the resulting amount for prediction on the current cycle date.
      • I1710194662 [CARDS-55224] Corrected incorrect routing search for incoming documents if ROUTE_BY_FORWARDING_MEMBER_FOR_CHANNELS global parameter is set.
      • [CARDS-54515] VAU/MABU: Added workflow to correct sent or rejected Issuer messages.
      • [CARDS-54538] Created requests for sending information on cards reissued or activated to VAU/MABU IPS services.
      • [CARDS-55007] Supported DCC operations on authorization confirmation for "Single Auth – Single Compl" terminal mode.
      • [CARDS-55082] Now during the document processing procedure on the acquiring side, the error message "Invalid capture currency" is generated for Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) transactions only if DCC Financial document POI Currency differs from preauthorization transaction currency.
      • [CARDS-55197] Added the SEND_CN and DEST_CN tags to the MoneyTransfers document add_info attribute with the values of the 3-letter country code for the corresponding cards.
      • I1709041130 [CARDS-54857] Created new statistical reports "NSPK Cards, Part 1 (Cards and BIN)", ''NSPK Cards, Part 2 (Cards and Territory)" required by NSPK Bulletin 37.2017.
      • [CARDS-55190] Old RBS. Documents Import, Old RBS. Payments Import, Old RBS. Transaction Slips Import. Added pipe parameter DAYS_BETWEEN. This is the max number of days between File Creation Date and current date. Old files will be rejected.
      • I1710137253 [CARDS-55184] IPM Inward Processing: fixed error when processing file with reconciliation message which contains "000" currency code.
      • [DBK-3011] Added support of filling dm_record_lf collections with SingleSql mode. See more details in the manuals.
      • [DBK-3078] Removed restriction which prevents assigning a Scheduler Job to a day of month greater than 28.
      • [DBK-3108] Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.
      • [DBK-3131] Excluded personal tariffs from Configuration Inspector export in ALL and ALL_BY_DATE modes. Personal tariffs are already skipped if collected as child objects of tariff domains.
      • [DBK-3132] Skipped INSTITUTION parameter value and no error is shown during export of Datamart configuration by Configuration Inspector
      • [CARDS-55177] Visa Base II Outward: fixed "Authorization Code contains wrong characters in doc" error when exporting documents with an authorization code that contains the "q" character.

    • 03.45.30.27
      • CARDS-54662 [Core] Added a new parameter, "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(3). The default value is "Y". This is an internal technical parameter for DB Manager/WAY4 Manager/WAY4 Web client. Added a new parameter, "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Cardholder_Contract_Statement", "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(1). The default value is "Y". The parameter makes it possible to change the ability to read report parameter values from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table . The "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" and "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" parameters work as a pair. Only if both parameters are "Y" and the "P_CONNID" parameter is not null, report parameter values will be read from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table.

      • CARDS-55009 [UnionPay interface] CUP Audit Trailer Import. added the ability to disable creation of settlement documents for Fee Collections (FCP file) by setting the third position of the LOAD_STL parameter to "N".
      • I1710025092, I1710056161 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-55020] NSPK MPE Import: fixed performance issue when loading bin ranges for VISA (binv files). Changed default value for the "SEARCH_AS_SUB" pipe parameter from "N" to "Y". It allows new detailed VISA BIN token ranges to be imported more correctly. To restore old behaviour, the "SEARCH_AS_SUB"="N" pipe parameter must be set.

      • CARDS-55069 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added pipe parameter PERIOD_ID_FORMAT. Valid values: F, L. F (default value) - period ID is calculated from the beginning of the current billing period. L - period ID is calculated from the end of the previous billing period.

      • [CARDS-54474] Implemented flexible redefinition of Effective Contract for Balance Type posting.
      • [CARDS-54602] Added the ability to calculate interest with "Int By Credit" mode for limit normalization between sibling contracts in multi-currency products. The target account template used in a sibling standing order should have the "Activate Int by Credit" value in the "Calc Int Mode" field. Multi-currency products require separate licenses. Please contact OpenWay Support for more details.
      • [CARDS-54813] Modify TD package, to allow return additional scheme parameters as DATE_FROM, DATE_TO
      • [CARDS-54833] A new custom procedure, CUST_INSTL_AUTO_ER has been added. In this procedure, the default order for automatic early repayment of instalment plans can be redefined.
      • [CARDS-54859] Added saving tokenization data to a document's "Add Info" field for rejected enrolment messages.
      • [CARDS-54095] AMEX GNS Demographics Processing: Removed checking rule that Merchant Id (Service Establishment Number) must be unique among Demographics messages.
      • [CARDS-54841] Removed delimiters from response to tkn_activation transaction when there is only one phone number.
      • [CARDS-54890] Fixed processing of replicated documents created by first transaction for newly produced plastic.
      • [CARDS-54902] Enhanced filling of the "E2.CB" tag. Now, it is always returned in the bertlv data for a Mastercard authorisation request from a terminal capable of processing an instalment even if no instalment simulation was done. Together with the "E2.D6" tag, they form the correct answer for a terminal capable of processing an instalment.
      • [CARDS-54905] Supported Activation Code Notification (ACN) transactions without token.
      • [CARDS-54932] Fixed the instalment simulation behaviour for authorisation request if no instalment plans were simulated due to configuration issues: a warning message is created for a document and an instalment simulation answer is registered in the bertlv tags E2.CB and E2.D6 for a payment without instalments.
      • [CARDS-54986] Fixed IRD 47 definition for Europe Region. MasterCard IRD Calculation.
      • I1708020600 [CARDS-54968] "When available" and "when credit" documents amendment fields will be refreshed before posting to prevent untimely housekeeping.
      • I1709203155 [CARDS-54967] Allowed reversal of operations on different POS devices if the same Merchant ID (Card Acceptor ID) value is defined for both device contracts. The device contracts can belong to different contract hierarchy trees.
      • I1709216051 [CARDS-54938] Restored ability to fill several links (client, contract, consumer) in one authentication scheme record.
      • [CARDS-54094] AMEX GNS Demographics Export/Response Import: implemented a new response matching method with the "Transport Data" field. This method is now the default because Merchant Id (Service Establishment Number) used before as a matching key can be non-unique.
      • [CARDS-54891] Changed VISA OCT reversal processing. OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA SMS" are rejected with Return Code "12" and Posting Status "Under Workflow". OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA" are not sent in the online phase and should be sent in clearing.
      • I1702080176 [CARDS-54790] Added display of VISA FRS Reject/Warning codes. These codes are saved in the SAFE_DOC.detail field. Format: RC1=<code 1>;RC2=<code2>;

Contract status codes should be configured in the ABU_CONTR_CLOSED_CODES global parameter (can be configured for a financial institution) to trigger information sending when the appropriate status is set. Information is only sent for contracts that have the ABU=Y tag configured in the contract subtype.

      • [CARDS-52554] Corrected Process Messages for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type. They no longer mention WAY4 Datamart. Starting from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30, the POINT_TYPE tag in the mp_consist_type.add_info field is expected to differentiate consistency points used by WAY4 Datamart (POINT_TYPE tag with the "DM" value) and those used by WAY4 Cards (POINT_TYPE tag has the "C" value). For WAY4 Cards version 03.44.30, mention of WAY4 Datamart has been excluded for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type.
      • [CARDS-54643] 1. BAI C07 support has been implemented for Account-to-Person Credit money requests when the debited Account (CPID) cannot be routed in our system (an eWallet number, for instance). 2. The ALLOWED_MTRANSF_METH global parameter is no longer used. Please contact Customer Support for details.
      • [CARDS-54707] Due normalization during Intelligent Backdated Processing has been corrected for cases when Item Due was closed after loan repayment.
      • [CARDS-54710] Transit authorization reversal processing has been fixed. Previously reversals were rejected with RC 91 - "Autonomus mode disabled".
      • [CARDS-54718] Reapplication of Instalment Event Fee with "Instalment Start Date" posting date shift mode has been corrected on subsequent backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-54720] Transaction Processing. Now the attributes CARD (if no NO_CARD attribute) and CARDHOLDER (if no NO_CARDHOLDER attribute) are added to the transaction attribute list if the MPOS attribute is present .
      • [CARDS-54739] Backdated processing of liability contract hierarchy has been corrected when some contracts are opened on the processing date and others were opened earlier. Now the "Contract Billing not found" message does not occur in such cases.
      • [CARDS-54750] MasterCard IRD Configuration loading from MPE. Fixed checking of Full MPE IRD Configuration presence when loading Daily MPE files.
      • [CARDS-54788] Generation of unnecessary transfers during instalment early repayment has been corrected when instalment limit decrease on payment is used.
      • [CARDS-54792] Order of reapplying events with duration type = "Billing" has been corrected in backdated payment processing.
      • I1703235650 [CARDS-53980] Recalculation of due amounts in Intelligent Backdated Processing is corrected when REFRESH_DUE configuration is used.
      • I1706238241 [CARDS-54542] Extended PAN mask format with Card Category [:C] for variables (like %CONTRACT_NUMBER[:NXM]%): %CONTRACT_NUMBER:NXM[:K][:C]%, where: <N> - number of visible digits at the beginning of the number. <X> - filler symbol for the hidden part of the number. <M> - number of visible digits at the end of the number. <K> - number of filler symbols; this parameter is not mandatory. <C> - contract category code; only contract numbers belonging to this category will be masked. By default, these are card contracts. The possible values are: "C" - card contracts; "B" - bank contracts; "A" - account contracts and "M" - device contracts; this is not a mandatory parameter, "C" is the default value. Contract Number for card contracts (with PAN) will always be masked, even if "contract category code" does not contain "C".
      • I1709135528 [CARDS-54734] When a transit authorization and financial presentment have different transaction types, the transaction direction is additionally checked. Documents are not matched if the direction differs. The funds unblock procedure is no longer called for a transit authorization document if direction is the same.
      • WFCKF-2733 [DBK-3038] Fixed activating services on both nodes at the same time after double switching. Set Available, Set Unavailable, Migrate Service, Restore Default actions are now allowed only after In-Flight time after previous switch-over.
    • 03.45.30.18
      • CARDS-54576 [Fee Prediction] The Fee Prediction configuration has been added to support VISA Bahrain Domestic IRF.
      • CARDS-54704 [VISA interface] The label for the ADD_INFO field has been changed to "Add Info" in the "Reply Doc Part" form opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Pt Cbk/Rpr".
      • I1708302783 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-54684] MC MPE Import: Now pipe doesn't load MPE table IP0017T1 (currency). Currency table must be updated manually.
      • CARDS-54675 [MasterCard interface] Added the pipe parameter LINE_TERMINATOR for MC Rates Import. By default LINE_TERMINATOR=0D0A.
      • CARDS-54686 [Core] Currency Table: Exponent for Chilean Peso and Uganda Shilling has been changed from 2 to 0 in the standard configuration.
      • [CARDS-54618] Added a new shift mode, "Instalment Start Date" to define the posting date for an Instalment Event Fee. When a transaction from a previous billing cycle is converted to an instalment (using the backdated processing module), an Instalment Event Fee with the specified shift mode is processed with a posting date equal to the current banking date, not the date of the original transaction.
      • [CARDS-54673] The issue when a declined transaction on a secondary node was blocking money on the primary node has been fixed.
      • [CARDS-54678] Due normalization in backdated processing has been corrected.
      • [CARDS-54681] NSPK Outward. Fixed DE22.5 filling.
      • [CARDS-54687] A check for empty macrotransaction currency has been added to API function api.PUT_MTR. If the currency is empty, a fatal error with the message 'Currency can not be empty' will be generated.
      • [CARDS-54688] Backdated processing start date is now always shifted to the previous working day before a holiday, according to the business calendar, even if the global parameter STORNO_SKIP_HOLIDAYS=N is set.
      • [CARDS-54695] Now due macrotransactions processed using a standing order are linked to a standing order document only for acquiring contracts. For issuing contracts, due macrotransactions are not linked and item_due records are not closed as it interferes with backdated processing.
      • I1708286309 [CARDS-54597] Fixed ORA-29532 exception ("java call terminated by uncaught java exception") when running commands in ATM Console.
      • WFCKF-2740 [CARDS-54689] Fixed issue with distributed processing replication of AuthCheck documents.
    • 03.45.30.16
      • CARDS-52181 [Acquiring] The DCC_CONTRACT tag is checked during Nostro contract approve; it should be the same for Main and Sub Nostro contracts. When searching for the DCC_CONTRACT tag in Nostro contracts, the tag is first searched for in the Sub Nostro contract, then in the Main Nostro contract, and then on the Nostro Account Scheme. Earlier, the DCC_CONTRACT tag value in the Main Nostro contract was not considered.
      • CARDS-54556 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed "Establishment Country" field filling.
      • CARDS-54598 [Diners Club interface] DCI. Restored menu item OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing OLD.
      • CARDS-54609 [VISA interface] VISA BIN Table Import (pipe) : fixed performance issue.
      • CARDS-54644 [Dispute assistant] Dispute Assistant R2: Added menu "ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Setup" for access to Case Management setup.
      • I1708219196 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-54566] WAY4Manager form for Memo Messages have been synchronized with DBM form.
      • CARDS-51857 [Risk management] Created a new report, Credits_Issued_By_Merchant.rdf. The report is run from OpenWay\MC Statistics Reports\Risk Reports\Credits Issued By Merchant.
