      • CARDS-54369 [MasterCard interface] Recommendations about "AN 1021" requirements have been specified in the "Configuring WAY4™ According to MasterCard Requirements (October 2017)" document.
      • [DBK-3019] Fixed Incorrect Transaction Switch delay time with replication loop related exceptions.
      • [CARDS-54578] Fixed problem with RC 464 "More than one card found" error during PIN Delivery.
      • [CARDS-54232] VISA VCR: Removed Reason Codes 10.X and 11.X for Representment.
      • [CARDS-54550] Enhanced due normalization for accounts with Due Type = "Contract Due" when the calculated date is a holiday according to the business calendar defined in the Account Scheme or Financial Institution, and when every calendar day is opened with the Contract Daily Updates process. In this case, Due normalization will be performed on the first working day after the holidays according to this business calendar. For due normalization, it is not recommended to use Functional Dates which may be a holiday. It is recommended to shift the resulting date to a working day.
      • [CARDS-54604] Now adding consistency points after manual editing consistency types (and thus producing new historical records in mp_consist_type) works correctly.
      • [CARDS-54608] Fixed chip data processing when authorization and information requests (i.e. ministatement) are received on different nodes of a distributed processing solution within a short time gap.
      • [CARDS-54613] VISA VCR: Added VCR Reason Codes to VISA SMS channel.
      • [CARDS-54619] Fixed error which can lead to "ORA-06502: PL/SQL: numeric or value error: NULL index table key value" exception in authentication message processing.
      • [CARDS-54626] During the Financial Institution Init Settings (Copy) process, references to products are restored after copying all the products.
      • [CARDS-54633] Fixed an issue with fleet transactions report related to documents with empty doc__orig__id field value (Standing Orders). Additional conditions have been added to exclude such document records.
      • I1608314406 [CARDS-54562] Enhanced calculation of VISA_MEMBER_ID, AMEX_MEMBER_ID, MC_MEMBER_ID statistical attributes in order to correct transactions fetching of certain IPS in XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf reports.
      • I1708046078 [CARDS-54637] Updated ATM Retail contract copy procedure ("Multiple" action button) to copy ATM Retail links for both ATM and POS device categories.
      • I1708303819 [CARDS-54590] Fixed incorrect Usage Limiter processing when a product configuration uses one service package for related contracts with different currencies.
      • I1709019529 [CARDS-54579] Fixed trace messages processing issue in Case Management.
      • WFCKF-2658 [CARDS-54568] Fixed incorrect processing of replicated documents created on an HA distributed processing secondary node by a repeat SMS request.
      • WFCKF-2687,WFCKF-2707(DUP) [CARDS-54603] Fixed incorrect reprocessing of replicated documents for PIN change on HA primary node.
      • WFCKF-2713,WFCKF-2714(DUP) [CARDS-54617] Fixed incorrect reprocessing of declined documents after replication from HA secondary node.
      • [DBK-3012] IPM Inward Processing. Removed DE55 format error messages from Process Log.
      • [PMPIPES-52] Added the ability to support different values for tags 9F0E, 9F0D, 9F0F on contact and contactless interfaces for MIR Contactless
      • [CARDS-54465] Safe Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of the "Chargeback Indicator" field for "Acquirer Loss" and "Issuer Loss" records.
      • [CARDS-54559] Visa BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): additional format check for "Authorization Code" field has been implemented.
    • 03.45.30.14
      • I1708161315 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-54530] DCI Outward: Fixed duplicate batch trailer export.
      • CARDS-54409 [Security & key management] Renamed "WAY4 PCI DSS Implementation Guide" document to "WAY4 PA-DSS Implementation Guide". The document has been supplemented by the following requirements: prohibit automatic creation of Heap Dump; encryption of the connection from the client browser to the IIS web server; hide wsruntime debugging information; mandatory setup of application authorization using client certificates.
      • CARDS-53641 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe) : added the "COMMIT_INTERVAL" parameter to manage commit interval.
      • CARDS-54443 [VISA interface] Implemented service to export Initial Data load files and subsequent Update files from issuer to VAU.
      • CARDS-54481 [VISA interface] Added support of new Initial and Update Data Load Response files import for Visa Account Updater service.
      • CARDS-54494 [MasterCard interface] Added support of new "Account Change Data File" (R274) file export for MasterCard "Automatic Billing Updater" service.
      • CARDS-54495 [MasterCard interface] Added support of new "Account Change Confirmation File "(T275) file import for MasterCard "Automatic Billing Updater" service.
      • CARDS-54500 [Fee Prediction] VISA RA configuration has been modified for Intra-AP region.
      • CARDS-54515 [VISA interface] VAU/MABU: Added workflow to correct sent or rejected Issuer messages.
      • I1706010066 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-54489] MasterCard Services. Added service packages "STD-STD MC SPC - MasterCard MoneySend for Commercial Product Forbidden" and "STD-STD MC SPC - MasterCard MoneySend for Small Business Card Allowed" to meet requirements of Global Operations Bulletin No. 8 on 1 August 2016 article "Reminder of Revised Standards for MoneySend Payment Transaction Support for Small Business Card Issuers". To update MasterCard service package configuration use <OW_HOME>\db\datax\config\MC_IRD_CFG_SP_CC.txt.
      • [CARDS-54201] A new instalment limit type, "Total Principal Amount", has been added. The limit amount used depends on the total principal amount (without interest and fees) of active instalment plans. A limit is only restored when the plan is totally paid or closed.
      • [CARDS-54468] Fixed issue when payment transactions with PTID=C04 were processed as MasterCard MoneySend transactions.
      • [CARDS-54482] When an instalment plan is created with interest capitalization and specified portion amount, the calculated tenor is rounded to the nearest integer, instead of rounding up as done in other cases.
      • [CARDS-54501] Fixed the algorithm for custom non-group transaction condition code processing. Previously the code had been trimmed to 4 digits.
      • [CARDS-54512] Fixed error in processing of prefix "##" for authentication method parameter pattern which can lead to empty result value.
      • [CARDS-54546] Added the global parameter DETECT_FIN_PRESENTMENT_EARLIER_AUTH_ADVICE for incoming authorisation advice processing. This parameter's "N" value deactivates additional searching for previously processed financial advices.
      • I1701094565 [CARDS-52846] Improved performance of Quarterly IPS Reporting by caching statistic attribute values when the report runs. The improvement affects Issuing and Acquiring reports for AmEx, MasterCard and Visa.
      • WFCKF-2637 [CARDS-54518] Declined transactions on secondary now increment the version number of the main contract.
      • [CARDS-53952] Modified Mastercard report "Location Administration Tool (LAT)" (OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Reports\ATM Location) for quarterly reporting starting in October 2017.
      • [CARDS-54531] DA R2: Added use of Trusted Amount in amount pre-calculation for a final chargeback if the first chargeback is for the full transaction amount.
      • [DBK-2833] Added support of FPE Encryption algorithm in Offline Obfuscator. Use the new additional global parameter OBFUSCATION_ALGORITHM with possible values TRANSPARENT (by default) - the old algorithm, and FPE - FPE encryption.
      • [DBK-2974] WAY4Web layout import pipe behaviour has changed: existing wx_scheme layouts are NOT deleted by default now.
      • [DBK-3012] IPM Inward Processing. Removed DE55 format error messages from Process Log.
      • [CARDS-54523] IPM ONUS Outward Processing (pipe): added support for PDS0207 ("Wallet Identifier").
      • [PMPIPES-56] Pm_Parms in the 'Not Ready' state will be skipped from processing by the "PM RSA ICC Keys Pre Generator" pipe with the corresponding warning message in the Process Log.
    • 03.45.30.13
      • CARDS-52890 [Host2Host interface] IC Documents Export: added a new pipe parameter, "USE_EXT_FILE_COUNTER". When the "Y" value is set (default value is "N"), a sequence generated by the DB is used for file numbering.
      • CARDS-53696 [Bill payments] Supported OTP_SMS templates per CP service.
      • CARDS-49686 [Transaction management] The WAY4Manager form "GL Transfer No Edit.dataform.xml" now displays the "Extracted" value instead of the code "E" for the GL Entry status field.
      • CARDS-53101 [SEPA interface] Fixed Ultimate Creditor / Ultimate Debtor data export for sepa_customer_to_bank_export pipe.
      • CARDS-53777 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Interface: Added the OUT_ST=Y; tag to the "CH Payment" and "CH Payment Rev" message types.
      • CARDS-53989 [Housekeeping] Removed the unused report in the Reporting.Spending Reports form (OpenWay\Corporate Reporting\Corporate Reports\Spending Reports). Removed the "OWS.Corporate Reporting.Spending.Exceptions Report" menu item. Removed the Exceptions.rdf report template.
      • CARDS-54184 [Product inspector] Fixed incorrect behaviour of the "Test Script Import" pipe when Standard Journals were imported even if the corresponding Test Scripts were not chosen for import. Now if Test Scripts are skipped by import, Standard Journals will be skipped as well.
      • CARDS-54300 [Fleet cards] IC Documents Import/Export (pipes) : fixed error "Document with id xx not our document or wrong Message Sequence Number." when exporting the response for a batch document which was imported in DETAIL_DOC=Y mode.
      • CARDS-54313 [Transaction management] Notification Credit Item is converted into a financial document with CH Payment transaction type if the corresponding financial document could not be found and FF_SRC_CODE is present in document info.
      • CARDS-54336 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): fixed duplicating erroneous second export of T4 record when a cardholder belongs to more than one company.
      • CARDS-54358 [Host2Host interface] UFX Documents Import (pipe): if FROM_TRANSIT=Y pipe parameter is set but "Originator\TransitId" element is absent then doc.source_member is filled with "Originator\MemberId" element value.
      • CARDS-54463 [VISA interface] VISA RA configuration has been fixed for Slovakia. MCC qualification criteria has been changed for VISA domestic (intra-Slovakian transactions) manual cash transactions.
      • I1707104415 [Acquiring] [CARDS-54457] Implemented the ability to set parameter P_DATE_FROM; P_DATE_TO; P_ZIP_CODE; P_REPTYPE; P_SQL_TRACE; P_F_I; P_ID values directly for the "Merchant Standing Orders Details" report. If these parameters are not set, values from local_constants will be used.
      • I1708094567 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-54400] IC Documents Export (pipe): fixed the sign of the amount in the "Billing" element for "H2H" mode and when the "USE_MTRANSACTION"="Y" parameter is set. Now only a positive amount will be exported.
      • I1708224441 [Acquiring] [CARDS-54464] Implemented the ability to set parameter P_DATE_FROM; P_DATE_TO; P_ZIP_CODE; P_REPTYPE; P_SQL_TRACE; P_F_I; P_ID values directly for the "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" report. If these parameters are not set, values from local_constants will be used.
      • CARDS-53459 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1001, AN1025, AN1032. Added new reject messsage codes: 2835, 2837, 2838, 2839, 2698, 2469.
      • CARDS-53460 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN 1002. SIC with code 3300 renamed from "3300 PEACH AVIATION LIMITED" to "3300 AZUL AIR".
      • CARDS-53642 [NSPK interface] NSPK MIR: Added product TKN (MIR Token).
      • CARDS-53808 [MasterCard interface] Areas: "South Sudan" (code SSD) is included in "MC: Middle East, Africa (E)" area.
      • CARDS-53853 [JCB interface] JCB: Added menu items "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Outward Rejected" and "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Rejects".
      • CARDS-54107 [VISA interface] VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes. Changed description for reason code 0150 to "Recovered card handling fees or rewards and ATM BI acquiring direct fee returns". Also revised all Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.
      • CARDS-54266 [Diners Club interface] DCI MPE Import, CPF Acquirer Import. Supported DCI Card Products codes C and D in default value for pipe parameters PRODUCT2AFS_MAP and PRODUCT2PTI_MAP.
      • CARDS-54308 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): G2C MIR Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "MIR_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter value. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by the Document Processing procedure if necessary.
      • CARDS-54375 [Host2Host interface] IC Documents Import (pipe) : supported import of NSPK MIR Loyalty transactions.
      • CARDS-54413 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export. Fixed filling "Information Products File Name" field in the Control file.
      • I1704204444 [Core] [CARDS-53062] A new message channel with "Z" code has been registered for BELKART payment system and a message channel with "z" code has been registered for Our BELKART Cards. BELKART has been added to the Standard Handbook PAYMENT_SYSTEM list. BELKART card products have been added to the IPS product list.
      • I1705247555, I1708094368, I1707184590 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-54327] Modified IRD configuration for all regions according to MPE files until 2017-08-07.
      • [CARDS-54304] AMEX GNS Inward: Fixed filling posting status for Reject File documents.
      • I1707259086 [UFX-424] Fixed an issue that could lead to removal of the "Last Name" field instead of the "Company Name" field while importing advanced application R2.
      • [CARDS-53816] B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.
      • [CARDS-54224] B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.
      • [CARDS-54332] Added support for mVISA QR Code generation.
      • [CARDS-52825] Added funds transfer transaction for core banking system (payments with IBAN can be sent to the CBS interface).
      • [CARDS-53732] In a multiple relation configuration, if no relation is specified in an authorization document, the default contract will be chosen even if the global parameter SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT is set to 'N'.
      • [CARDS-53755] A new custom procedure, CUST_EXTRA_LIM_NORM_TOP, has been implemented to redefine the top contract for extra limit normalization.
      • [CARDS-54051] A new variable has been added for client message notifications: USG_EVENT_DETAILS:<TagCode>[:DateFormat]% Returns tag values from usage_action.EVENT_DETAILS. TagCode is mandatory and indicates tag name. DateFormat is optional and indicates the date format in a message if the tag value contains a date. Default date format for the tag is "YYYY-MM-DD"
      • [CARDS-54217] Calculated contract parameters can now be used for Quarterly calculations.
      • [CARDS-54261] The AUTO_ER_KEEP contract parameter can now be used to configure keeping either the tenor or portion amount in instalment plan recalculation when billing date is changed. If the contract parameter is not configured, behaviour depends on the INST_RENEW_RATES global parameter. If INST_RENEW_RATES=Y, tenor is kept; in other cases, portion amount is kept.
      • [CARDS-54275] Extended information has been added to balance inquiries for multi-currency cards. The amount returned for 01 balance in authorization requests for multi-currency cards includes amounts in all currencies.
      • [CARDS-54302] Fee calculation from transaction date is supported for instalments created by a service. To enable calculation from transaction date, the INST_FROM_TRANS_DATE tag should be set in service details or in the transaction subtype. If the billing cycle with the transaction date is already closed when document posting is performed, plan dates will depend on the instalment scheme's "Dates mode". If dates mode is billing-based, plan dates will be calculated starting from the current billing cycle. If dates mode is transaction-based, the dates will be based on transaction date and if no plan shift is configured, the first portion may be created with overdue status.
      • [CARDS-54365] The ability to configure different invoice events for manual and automatic instalment plan closure / partial and full early repayment has been added. The IS_MANUAL tag with "Y" or "N" values can be configured in the invoice_event "Add Condition" field; in this case, the invoice event will only be triggered if instalment action is either manual or automatic, respectively.
      • [CARDS-54366] Fee charging options can now be selected when manually closing an instalment plan. The INST_ADV_FEE_WAIVE_ON_CLOSE global parameter has been enhanced with two new values: "A" - Charge unbilled fees for the whole plan, and "1" - Charge unbilled fees for one portion.
      • [CARDS-54432] A new tag, "SEND_CHAIN_REV_ERR;", in device type configuration has been supported. This tag can be used to indicate an incorrect sequence of documents received from a merchant. If the "SEND_CHAIN_REV_ERR;" tag is specified in device_type and a Preauthorization Reversal is received after processing a Sales Completion, it will be rejected with Response Code 95.
      • [CARDS-54452] Added the ability to set the AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD parameter on the financial institution level.
      • [CARDS-50683] Fixed an issue in which clients remained not approved after running contract hierarchy approval in structures with top liability and sub-liability contracts. Clients for all subordinate contracts are checked when approving a contract.
      • [CARDS-51641] Added the [Saved Limits] link to the "Acnt Balance" form. It allows saved limits to be viewed for balance types without History mode and with the USAGE=BALANCE; parameter in the "Posting Details" field.
      • [CARDS-53799] Corrected the status of the link for a card related to an account when the card was reissued as Lost or Stolen.
      • [CARDS-53936] Authentication services domain parameters are now read through the cache now to avoid performance issues.
      • [CARDS-54043] Changed how the activity checks user competence. For dispute cases, an activity for which a document is not specified checks user competence against the maximum absolute amount among the active financial documents attached to the case, not against the summary of document amounts as for financial cases. This amount is calculated by the entries for the case contract accounts, not for the document target contract.
      • [CARDS-54212] Implemented specific card debit transfers license validation for the following transaction application codes: C07, C52, AA, PP.
      • [CARDS-54245] Incorrect Response Code 85 on TAR / TER for products without the MDES_TYPE tag has been changed to 05.
      • [CARDS-54246] DA R2. Fixed duplicate call procedure to calculate amounts for secondary documents if they are opened to edit several times.
      • [CARDS-54249] Added a new check in the Product approve procedure. Now all accounting contracts for a multi-currency Product should have a default priority specified. If the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y is set in the top Product, accounting sub-products should have the SIBLING_PRIORITY tag filled.
      • [CARDS-54254] Corrected recalculation of Instalment plans during backdated processing. The INST_PLAN_IDT field of a recalculated plan will be the same as that of the original instalment plan.
      • [CARDS-54255] Backward document replication (document reprocessing) now updates the Application Transaction Counter (ATC) value for declined authorizations.
      • [CARDS-54268] Added consideration of more scenarios for sequences for receiving financial and authorization messages to avoid unnecessary holds on cardholder funds which could occur if a financial document arrived earlier than an authorization. Improved processing performance.
      • [CARDS-54287] Ageing reclassification behaviour has been enhanced. Threshold amount "WAIVED_PD" can now be compared according to the following rule: account balance less than or equal to "WAIVED_PD" amount. By default, account balance should be less than "WAIVED_PD". To use the comparison rule "less than or equal to", set the parameter "WAIVED_PD_MODE" to "<=" on the financial institution level, or in additional Global Parameters.
      • [CARDS-54298] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Added check of "Active" records to all selects from MPE tables.
      • [CARDS-54310] CARDS-53799 has been redesigned. Relations with invalid cards are excluded from the "Related Cards" screen form.
      • [CARDS-54319] Redesigned the algorithm for defining a hierarchy of applications for loading into one plastic. Now a hierarchy of applications with different expiry dates and sequence numbers can be joined in one plastic.
      • [CARDS-54325] Corrected filling document is_authorisation field for transit reversals
      • [CARDS-54341] Changed how the "RBS Number" and "MemberID" fields are filled in Advanced Application R2 for contract modification. Field values are now inherited from the parent contract if they are empty.
      • [CARDS-54343] Implemented merchants stop list check for OnUs cards Acquiring processing stage.
      • [CARDS-54352] Corrected interest calculation during balance prediction procedure when both grouped interest and projected interest calculations are used in product configuration.
      • [CARDS-54357] The amount of an unused instalment limit for posting to accounts is now calculated without the amount used by inactive instalment plans. The available instalment limit for plan creation still takes inactive plans into account. If an instalment plan created on authorization should not affect posted instalment limits, INST_AUTH_ACTION=CREATE_INACTIVE should be configured in the service or using the global parameter.
      • [CARDS-54359] Matching of simulated instalment plans will now depend on the INST_VER tag of a financial document (E2.CF bertlv tag). If the tag value is MC_INST, MasterCard specification for instalment plan mandatory fields for matching will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_INF_RATE, INST_FEE, EFF_RATE, INST_TYPE. In other cases, OpenWay notation for mandatory fields will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_AMNT, INST_TOTAL.
      • [CARDS-54360] SIOM: fixed finding Issuer Member ID when creating an ONUS SIOM document for an Affiliated Bank's card.
      • [CARDS-54372] Corrected the "Last Updated" field value for the PAYMENT type invoices during test script run in the Product Inspector: now emulated banking date is set instead of the system date.
      • [CARDS-54393] Dispute Assistant R2: Fixed wrong bank balance and representment amount calculation on acquirer side when there is a first presentment reversal before chargeback.
      • [CARDS-54406] NSPK SIOM Inward: fixed linking incoming documents to incorrect SIOM documents.
      • [CARDS-54415] Fixed the calculation algorithm for a value of funds available for early repayment that is shown during the "Early Repayment" actions. Now balance types configuration in global parameters or in account scheme is considered.
      • [CARDS-54417] Added new statistic attributes "Contract Group: AMEX Card Brand" (AMEX_BRAND), "Contract Group: MC Card Brand" (MC_BRAND), "Contract Group: VISA Card Brand" (VISA_BRAND) to enhance statistics gathering on transactions performed on account contract level data if a client's account contract can have several valid cards (card contracts) for different payment systems. In this case, the new MC_BRAND or VISA_BRAND values should be set for the P_ATTR_PS_CONTRACT_NAME parameter for the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Busines" reports, respectively. No changes in report parameter settings are required to support current report behaviour.
      • [CARDS-54419] MDES: Changed RC to "00" for Tokenization Event Notification messages with Tokenization Event Indicator = 8.
      • [CARDS-54426] When a financial presentment is created by online processes and the PREAUTH_ID tag is present, a check for duplicate presentments is skipped on this document accept. For partial shipments, documents created by the online module are not checked for duplication.
      • [CARDS-54437] When every day including holidays is opened in WAY4 and documents are posted on holidays, backdated processing should not skip holidays when contract state is recalculated. To ensure this, the global parameter STORNO_SKIP_HOLIDAYS=N should be set (can be set for a financial institution). When the parameter's value is 'Y' (default value), backdated processing skips holidays and does not perform CDU or any other actions with contracts on holidays.
      • [CARDS-54439] A new global parameter, FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE has been added to regulate behaviour of entry posting by transaction date (when FROM_TRANS_DATE configuration is used in services/transaction subtypes) for secondary documents. If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'Y' (default behaviour) a secondary document's entries will be created with their own transaction date ('Sec Trans Date" document field). If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'N', entries will be created with the original document transaction date ("Trans Date" document field).
      • [CARDS-54448] Supported a timezone configuration when processing the instalment event fees.
      • [CARDS-54456] Corrected tenor calculation for instalments with fee capitalization.
      • [CARDS-54469] Transaction Conditions: Changed defaults for tokenized base TC to corresponding non-tokenized TC.
      • I1602048068 [CARDS-54200] Fixed Source and Target in transaction type "Notif Prs Payment Item".
      • I1610077363,I1702062338 [CARDS-54159] Enhanced the "Lost Authorizations" form to show authorizations with the "Inactive" posting status that remain active due to partial financial clearing. The currently blocked amount is now shown as a separate column.
      • I1705264265 [CARDS-54295] Fixed first cycle history initialization for balance types with History Mode = "Billing (After Close)" and "Billing (Before closing)". Corrected system behaviour when saving history records if billing falls on the first day of year.
      • I1706056360 [CARDS-53789] Added new modes, SERVICE_TGT and SERVICE_SRC that allow services to be inherited for source or target only, unlike the SERVICE mode which can be configured in the FROM_AUTH tag to inherit services from an authorization document for both source and target.
      • I1707055765 [CARDS-54206] Fixed an issue with calculating (predicting) an amount for Partial Second Presentment to prevent an empty result in the amount fields. The calculation algorithm has not been changed.
      • I1707179843 [CARDS-54270] FPLP: Fixed Batch Approve result processing. Now Warnings are not processed as errors during FPLP process. Added tracing for FPLP.
      • I1707313211 [CARDS-54296] The Currency field of usage limiter templates with adaptive algorithms for calculating amount thresholds must be filled in. A usage limiter's Currency field value is saved every time the limiter is updated.
      • I1707314157 [CARDS-54433] Fixed string buffer overflow in API - acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0.
      • I1708033522 [CARDS-54471] Now "When Available" and "When Credit" transactions for bank accounting contracts are processed without funds blocking. Consequently, if a target contract is closed and as a result redefined by a dispute contract, funds will not be blocked.
      • I1708045371 [CARDS-54423] Fixed "ORA-06502: numeric or value error: character string buffer too small" exception during notification message generation during the posting process when %IF% and %THEN% message constructions are converted into values greater than 255 symbols.
      • WFCKF-2636, WFCKF-2637, WFCKF-2710(DUP) [CARDS-54449] Local/remote versions were not updated for chip authorization documents rejected on a secondary node of the WAY4 Distributed Processing solution.
      • [CARDS-53995] MIR tokenization is supported.
      • [CARDS-54329] Transaction Attributes. Added the SBT_EMV attribute (Signature by CVM Results).
      • [CARDS-54335] Transaction Attributes. Added normalization rule: for CAT4 with no AUTHENTICATED attribute, the NO_AUTH attribute is added.
      • [DBK-2736] Added an alternative way to clone Primary node through export/import as well as full copy.
      • [DBK-2831] Card number and personal data are obfuscated using format preserving encryption algorithms compliant with NIST.
      • [DBK-2900] Fixed W4W grants incorrect behaviour (to exclude situations when access to a component is denied, but it is visible in the UI).
      • [DBK-2939] Transaction Switch will now repeat operations on primary node that failed due to "Replication Loop" data inconsistency.
      • [CARDS-54425] VISA BASE II Outward Processing: fixed filling reserved "Interface Trace Number" field (TCR1 pos. 118-123).
      • [CARDS-53425] VISA BASEII Inward Processing: supported import of new TC33 BASE II Dispute Financial Status Advice messages.
      • [CARDS-54307] VISA BASEII Inward Processing, Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing (pipes): Original Credit Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "VISA_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter and "Fast Funds Indicator" field in an incoming transaction. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by DataBase if necessary.
      • [DBK-2831] Card number and personal data are obfuscated using format preserving encryption algorithms compliant with NIST.
      • [CARDS-54299] MasterCard Inward Processing. Rollbacked issue CARDS-52613. Changed CH Payment transaction processing if Fast Funds option is used (the value of the global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS is Y).
      • [CARDS-54316] MasterCard Inward: If pipe parameter USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION=N, Cardholder Payment transactions will not be converted to Notifications (Fast Funds mode).
    • 03.45.30.04
      • CARDS-52434 [VISA interface] Corrected calculation of POS and ATM (include Chip and Contactless devices) in the "Which are EMV compliant" field (EMV compliance is the ability to accept EMV (Chip) cards) of the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report.
      • CARDS-54177 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for Interregional, LAC, AP and MEA regions.
      • CARDS-54202 [VISA interface] Interchange tariffs have been modified for the CEMEA region.
      • I1706151492 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-54192] Modified VISA RA configuration for the EU region.
      • I1706209234 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-54014] Corrected behaviour: now the DEV tag value will only affect PBT Status if defined on the Device Type override level.
      • CARDS-54136 [MasterCard interface] Supported MasterCard Automatic Billing Updater (MABU) functionality for Acquirers.
      • CARDS-54137 [VISA interface] Supported VISA Account Updater (VAU) functionality for Acquirers.
      • CARDS-53549 [VISA interface] VISA Release Oct17-522 CEMEA Mandatory 8.2.1: interchange reimbursement fees (IRF) for staged digital wallet transactions in Russia have been supported.
      • CARDS-54191 [Fee Prediction] Commercial domestic interchange fees have been updated in Romania according to VISA Business News on 9 March 2017.
      • CARDS-54195 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 Global AN 1038: the new product code MWP has been added to Payment Product.
      • CARDS-54204 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface: "VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File" and "VISA Loading SMS Acknowledgments" pipes now support database currency overrides. The "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.
      • [DBK-2847] Supported real-time displaying of critical services status on DB Replication Console. See DB Replication Console documentation for additional information.
      • [DBK-2914] Added the ability to not deactivate reserve services at the same time as the main service with the global parameter SW_UCHK_DEACTIVATE_RESERVE=N.
      • [DBK-2822] Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.
      • [DBK-2912] Fixed SQL error on saving tables with CLOB or BLOB columns.
      • [DBK-2916] Scheduler R1 end-of-life announcement: Support of Scheduler R1 will be terminated starting from 03.46.30.00!
      • [CARDS-54185] AMEX GNS Inward: Fixed reject document fields filling.
      • [CARDS-54321] AMEX GNS Inward. Changed order of rejects processing in financial mode by changing the menu subitem in the menu item OpenWay\AMEX GNS\AMEX. Daily Procedures\AMEX. Inward Processing\AMEX GNS Inward Processing. Now personal rejects are processed before file reject.
      • [CARDS-54115] AMEX Inward/Outward (Release 17.2): Supported Icelandic Krona and Uganda Shilling Currency Decimalization Change by using database overrides. The additional global parameter AMEX_RELEASE must be set to 17.2.
      • [CARDS-53024] The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad: -%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N indicating sibling order transaction. -%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.
      • [CARDS-54122] VISA SMS: Fixed problem with checking duplicate technical Adjustments which are sent through Transaction Switch.
      • [CARDS-54139] Multiple Capture mode checking for devices has been added.
      • [CARDS-54144] Corrected an issue with filling in the "INST_FDATE" and "INST_FAMNT" tags when capitalization is used. Now the capitalization portions are skipped and data from the first real portion are used.
      • [CARDS-54145] Suppressed sending the corresponding message to the IPS when completion of a PIN change attempt is unsuccessful.
      • [CARDS-54160] MasterCard IRD Calculation. Supported setting conditions by DE40 (Service Code) and DE22 (Point Of Service Data Code) in one scope.
      • [CARDS-54161] A Transit Reversal or Adjustment message will sent to a target member even if the message contains different data from the original message, if the target channel is not included in the list defined by the global parameter AUTH_REV.REJ_FRAUD_FOR. Forwarded document will contain the 'SUSP_REV_FRAUD;' tag in the add_info field.
      • [CARDS-54197] DA R2: Fixed invalid case amounts when a Credit Reversal is processed.
      • I1707121917 [CARDS-54188] Corrected matching of a financial document with a transit authorization when WAY4 is used as the sponsor for both acquirer and issuer.
      • I1707171415 [CARDS-54190] Resolved issue with empty case status when two "New Activity" windows are opened and processed.
      • I1707247431 [CARDS-54180] Adjustment and Reversal financial documents that exceed the presentment amount are now posted to a dispute account with "Decline Service" posting status.
      • I1707312971 [CARDS-54205] Corrected contract identifier calculation for putting a document in the apply queue after replication from an HA solution secondary node.
      • [CARDS-53819] Currency overrides are supported in the standard form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table.
      • [CARDS-54087] If the parameter AUTH_REQ_TOKEN_CHECK is set to "Y" or is not set (the default value is "Y"), its value can be changed in a financial institution or contract subtype. If the parameter contains a comma-separated list of token service providers, no checking for these providers will be performed. If the list of service providers is empty, checking for all service providers is disabled (prohibited).
      • [CARDS-54129] IRouter stored procedures: Added ownership property for NextChannel in ON_US_CH tag of NextAddData parameter. Values are Own(Y)/Affiliated(A)/Foreign(N).
      • [CARDS-54148] VISA: Added subregion CISSEE according to Release 17.4 article Oct17-600 (8.2.2).
      • [PMPIPES-57] Added support of QAUC parameter during SSAD calculation.
      • [CARDS-54125] [UPI REL] Oct17 2.6: supported database currency overrides. The "CUP_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
      • [CARDS-54133] UPI Inward: Revised Dual Message Settlement File Reject Codes. Added filling Reason Code in reject documents.
      • [CARDS-54120] [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface (clearing): supported database currencies overrides. "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.
      • I1707037614 [CARDS-53871] IPM Inward Processing: fixed "Length = [1] data elements is out of Allowed Range = [3-3] for Variable Length Field 407" error.
      • [CARDS-53467] [MC REL] 17.Q4 - AN 1034. MCInterface (clearing): supported database currency overrides. The "MC_RELEASE"="17.Q4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
    • 03.45.30.00
      • CARDS-53898 [Acquiring authorisation] mVISA payments are supported. Merchants can receive mVISA payments for their accounts, issuer applications can read QR codes for payments and send transactions to a network.
      • CARDS-52112 [SEPA interface] "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Bank Divisions", "OpenWay\SEPA\Issuing Mandate Input & Update" and "OpenWay\SEPA\Acquiring Mandate Input & Update" menus now make it possible to set up Ultimate Creditor and Ultimate Debtor data.
      • CARDS-52539 [Issuing authorisation] Payment with IBAN routing has been added. Now payment can be routed to different CBS interfaces with IBAN only.
      • CARDS-53585 [Data preparation and card personalization] The menu item "OpenWay\EMV Smart Cards\Card Production\RSA ICC keys PRE-generation\RSA ICC keys PRE-generation" has been updated to show new ICC key pregeneration form.
      • CARDS-53998 [Data preparation and card personalization] Views V_PREGEN_KEY_TOTALS and V_PERGEN_KEYS_SETUP have been added to work with pre-generated keys.
      • I1705054882 [Acquiring] [CARDS-53869] Added additional fields to the opt_acq_payment table to track when a statement record was created and when its processing started. A sub-process is created under the object task process for every payment processed.
      • CARDS-53556 [SEPA interface] SEPA Customer-To-Bank export: creditor address data is exported for SEPA Credit Transfer.
      • CARDS-53927 [AMEX interface] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business: merchant contract filtering has been corrected.
      • CARDS-53990 [AMEX interface] AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring report: format for new amount fields in the "Discount Business" section has been corrected.
      • CARDS-54071 [NSPK interface] NSPK MPE Import (pipe): fixed filling country code for MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI BIN table import.
      • CARDS-54099 [Diners Club interface] DCI Card Product File Import. Fixed Detail Cycle Range Record processing.
      • CARDS-54110 [Diners Club interface] "BIN Table - All" and "BIN Table" forms. Now the "Data Source" field is synchronized with the "Data Source" domain.
      • I1609198831 [Case management] [CARDS-51029] The amnd-history record was not created when the document was released for housekeeping
      • I1704129756 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-54082] Optimized WAY4Manager Customer Support Screen to decrease tab opening time.
      • I1705170227 [Statistical Reports] [CARDS-53896] New parameters have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: - P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. - P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 and P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 have been added for filtering transactions. The default value for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 is "trans.chain_type in ('U')"; for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 it is "1=2". - P_HIDE_REPOST. The default value is "Y". Used to hide reversal and repost operations. - P_FX_RATE. The default value is empty. - P_FX_DATE. The default value is empty. - P_FX_CURR. The default value is empty. New sections have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: - Discount Business Summary - POS Billing Detail By Industry
      • CARDS-53781 [Case management] In the Case_Management_Configuration.pdf document, a chapter has been added that contains information about global parameters, including the CM_<DomainCat>_AUTOCREATE_USER parameter. Information about this parameter has also been added to the Global_Parameters.pdf document.
      • CARDS-54089 [Data preparation and card personalization] Global ICC Key Pools have been supported in the PIN Management module.
      • CARDS-54090 [Data preparation and card personalization] Support for working with different Perso Bureaus has been introduced in the PIN Management module.
      • CARDS-54243 [Money transfers] Business to Card transaction licenses have been added. Please contact Customer Support for configuration if you use these transactions.
      • CARDS-53926 [JCB interface] [JCB Release 17.2] BIT54 is inherited now in chargebacks. No additional action is required.
      • CARDS-53973 [VISA interface] Supported changes to the enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File. Added new fields and new values and changed existing fields to existing TCR records. Implemented Money Transfer Data processing for original credit transactions(OCTs)
      • CARDS-54003 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-10 NSPK Clearing Interfaces (pipes): supported new cash-to-card transaction processing.
      • CARDS-54018 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-12 : supported "B" value for PDS0165.1 field.
      • CARDS-54073 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct17-588 has been supported. Updating personalization data of tokens in 3730 message has been added.
      • [CARDS-48517] Views V_PREGEN_KEY_TOTALS and V_PERGEN_KEYS_SETUP have been added to work with pre-generated keys.
      • [CARDS-50183] Tariff Structure and Data Import: Added the parameter DATE_CHECK_MODE=ANY_DATE to the standard menu item for VISA and MasterCard.
      • [CARDS-52816] New features in balance prediction (Late Payment and interest in ToPay amount).
      • [CARDS-53554] Advanced Applications R2 can skip Product status verification during contract application approval if the new global parameter APPL_ALLOW_NOT_READY is set to "Y". Application accept will check this status anyway.
      • [CARDS-53575] Special type of fee - Merchant Fee with amortization is supported for instalment plans. The fee is configured in fees for an instalment scheme. Invoices for merchant fee are not included in portion amount and total plan amount, they could not be paid (never become Open). Invoice events should be configured with one of two new amount types, Merchant Fee or Total Merchant Fee. The source document contract can be used to get a tariff for an instalment scheme and instalment scheme fee - the USE_CONTRA_TRF tag should be set in the instalment scheme or specific fee for the instalment scheme
      • [CARDS-53600] Added functions containing standard DWD_CARD_BRAND and DWD_CARD_CTEGORY mapping logic to the DWH_MAPPING package.
      • [CARDS-53622] Added "DB Date" field reflecting the record creation system time to the "GL Trace" table to enable multiple Datamart data loading.
      • [CARDS-53830] Re-ageing (WAIVED_PD tag) can now be used for Current Due accounts. The corresponding balance type should be marked with the WAIVED_PD tag. See documentation for details.
      • [CARDS-53831] Correct standing orders processing for terminal contracts with same Terminal ID in different financial institutions is supported. If this duplication exists in the client configuration, the global parameter ALLOW_DUPL_TERMINAL_ID should be set to "Y". In this case, standing order documents for device contracts will be filled with additional contract search attributes: Merchant ID, Member ID and Spc Scheme for source, Member ID and Spc Scheme for target.
      • [CARDS-53845] A new instalment payment scheme, "Fees First" has been introduced. In this scheme, the entire fee amount is planned in first portions, principal payment is planned after the entire fee has paid. Only fees that are not interest-based (Annual Fee, Flat Fee, Portion Fee) can be used with the Fees First payment scheme, early repayments are not allowed.
      • [CARDS-53849] Interbranch Fee Order can now be used for Misc documents created by usages. The tag FEE_INTERBRANCH=ORDER; should be used in Misc service details. See details in Documentation.
      • [CARDS-53872] Information about interest fees has been added to Balance Prediction Log.
      • [CARDS-53876] Added the ability to mark multi-currency Products with the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y. The tag should be specified in the top Product of a hierarchy. When the tag is set, additional checks will be performed when approving Products and contracts. Multi-currency Products require a separate license. Contact OpenWay Support for more details.
      • I1701238826 [CARDS-53843] Information about interest fees has been added to Balance Prediction Log.
      • [CARDS-50683] Fixed an issue in which clients remained not approved after running contract hierarchy approval in structures with top liability and sub-liability contracts. Clients for all subordinate contracts are checked when approving a contract.
      • [CARDS-52709] Analysis of the interest_delay field has been added to interest calculation for the current CYCLE.
      • [CARDS-53187] The document processing procedure has been improved to support Sales Completion documents matching by shipment identifier (stored in the document add_info field as a value of the PACKAGE_ID tag) for Multiple Capture (Split Shipment) transactions for aggregators.
      • [CARDS-53409] If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not be created.
      • [CARDS-53412] ORA-01403: fixed no data found exception that occurred during MoneySend Reversal Request.
      • [CARDS-53670] Updated the discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option. A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.
      • [CARDS-53685] Corrected secondary online messages routing when online and clearing channels are different.
      • [CARDS-53693] Corrected fee amount calculation for authorizations when an additional fee is taken by a limiter.
      • [CARDS-53703] Fixed usage limiter redefinition when a contract is moved to another Product.
      • [CARDS-53710] Masked document tags containing sensitive data when viewing them through the [All Tags] link. Custom tags can be configured to be masked in the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\System Utilities\Tagged Data Objects".
      • [CARDS-53716] Remove checking duration type for Events with the CLS code.
      • [CARDS-53733] Corrected the process for converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an instalment. Now transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.
      • [CARDS-53736] A new global parameter AUTH_SKIP_TAGS_INHERIT has been added. This parameter makes it possible to skip inheritance of special tags from an authorization to a financial document; these tags should be listed in the parameter value. The online tags ACQ_USG,ONLINE and OPID are always skipped.
      • [CARDS-53741] Fixed an error in P2P check operation.
      • [CARDS-53763] Corrected the algorithm for calculating the amount to check limits on online standing order processing: the transaction currency is used instead of contract currency.
      • [CARDS-53768] UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed determination of processing code.
      • [CARDS-53780] Removed the CARDHOLDER transaction attribute from the <<All Contactless (Group)>> group transaction condition. Transaction Processing.
      • [CARDS-53788] Corrected process information message for deactivated or absent token.
      • [CARDS-53800] Enhanced dispute documents matching. When a duplicate dispute document is processed, the DSP_DUPL=Y tag is set in the document. Matching of reclassified chargebacks will check the mandatory reason code change, and can be turned off for different payment systems using the global parameter DSP_RECLASSIFIED_CBKS_% with the "N" value, where % is the channel code. A document with the DSP_DUPL=Y tag will initiate a separate case in Dispute Assistant.
      • [CARDS-53809] Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.
      • [CARDS-53822] Tokens for Incontrol requests aren't checked as MDES/VDEP tokens.
      • [CARDS-53823] Corrected fee processing when closing an instalment plan if a flat fee is used.
      • [CARDS-53826] Calculation of maximum fee amount with the MAX_FEE tag has been enhanced. Calculation of minimum fee amount with the MIN_FEE tag has been added.
      • [CARDS-53839] Fixed issue. Now the "Client Template Details" form in the "Customer Profile\Operations" menu shows sensitive attributes as masked and non-editable. To comply with PA-DSS requirements, a service attribute which can contain PAN should inherit its value from a sensitive dynamic handbook parameter or be directly marked as sensitive by the SENSITIVE=Y tag in the Additional Data field.
      • [CARDS-53842] For deleted records from sic_group_tree and area_tree tables, history records have been added.
      • [CARDS-53866] Intelligent backdated processing now supports instalment event fees recalculation during the correction process.
      • [CARDS-53897] Split Shipment reversal documents are sent to the payment system. The CLR_SEQ_NUM value is copied from the Advice parent document.
      • [CARDS-53918] Original document tags are now not skipped on instalment plan recalculation.
      • [CARDS-53919] It is not recommended to use the same fee type for Instalment Event Fees and other Misc Fees as this may affect reversal processing.
      • [CARDS-53948] Fixed error in VISA OCT reversal document processing. Added a new check on VISA SMS channel when OCT reversal occurs. Previously, a check of the VISA SMS channel was not performed.
      • [CARDS-53983] Instalment Payment holidays portion amount calculation has been corrected for the "Keep Tenor" option.
      • [CARDS-53994] Validation of contract functional dates Late Payment Date (LP_DATE) and Full Payment Date (FP_DATE) has been enhanced for Set and Recalculate operations. The new value of these dates should be equal to or less than the contract's Next Billing Date + 1 day if the previous value met this condition. When Late Payment Date or Full Payment Date equals Next Billing Date + 1, it means that the LP event or FP event will proceed right before Billing.
      • [CARDS-54005] Fixed issue: now an empty record in the Contract/Client Extra Info application section is not processed and doesn't cause an error if this section is not mandatory.
      • [CARDS-54015] Account renumeration is skipped during reversal processing contract initialization.
      • [CARDS-54016] For domains with the ATTACH SUBS tag, only subdomains with the same category will be attached.
      • [CARDS-54033] To attach a contract with a non-unique contract number to a test script, the BNK=<FI bank code> tag should be specified in the test step. Contract search will be performed in the specified financial institution.
      • [CARDS-54039] Fixed an issue with inheritance of the Trans_Country, Trans_State, Trans_City, Trans_Details, Merchant_Id, Sic_Code attributes from the main transaction document to line item documents.
      • [CARDS-54060] If changes in the "Embossing" field group were made for a client, the changes are inherited to the client's contracts during the "Check" activity. If parameters were redefined earlier in a contract, the new values are not inherited to these contracts.
      • [CARDS-54066] Now the system does not search for transit authorization documents during financial document processing if the document was created in SMS mode (the initial authorization document was converted to financial during issuing authorization processing). If no transit authorizations are created at all due to system configuration, the global parameter SKIP_TRANSIT_AUTH_SEARCH with the "Y" value can be set to omit transit authorization search.
      • [CARDS-54097] A new custom procedure, CUST_RECALC_BILLING has been added for custom actions after changing the billing date for the main contract.
      • [CARDS-54100] Corrected processing of applet-related card data records when marking a card contract for production and selecting the record for incoming messages.
      • [CARDS-54116] Backdated processing has been corrected so that contract state is not automatically recalculated for financial advice documents with the current date created in SMS mode.
      • [CARDS-54126] When approving a personal tariff, Tariff Start Date will be checked by the date of the contract's financial institution.
      • I1603095080 [CARDS-54062] Added transaction type category check when matching secondary financial documents. Only documents with the same category will be matched in the chain.
      • I1701125638 [CARDS-53582] Resolved issue: Now dispute documents with fee return can be processed even if the original document's services have been deleted by Housekeeping. If the FEE_RETURN=ALL option is configured, a fee will be returned; in other cases, a document will be processed without fee return.
      • I1704219382 [CARDS-53378] Added new API trans_api.GET_MTR_AMOUNT_EXT()
      • I1704281513 [CARDS-53814] Supplementary order processing has been enhanced.
      • I1705221304 [CARDS-53272] IPS Products. Updated according to last NSPK specification.
      • I1706022663 [CARDS-53682] NSPK MPE Loading: fixed situation when not all issuer records for one MasterCard range are copied to NSPK BIN group.
      • I1706056722 [CARDS-53767] Fixed adjustment amounts rounding issue in the end of month fee recalculation procedure.
      • I1706068798 [CARDS-53661] When searching for a Source Service for interbranch macrotransactions, processing of the global parameter "IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY" has been added. If the parameter value is "Y", the country will be analyzed on the Target side. The default value of the global parameter "IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY" is "N".
      • I1706072562 [CARDS-53673] Corrected calculation of previous card expiry date in unmarking procedure.
      • I1706133880 [CARDS-54098] Fixed issue. Now the posting process doesn't recalculate document parameters like ARN for rejected secondary documents that have been sent again.
      • I1706151932 [CARDS-53649] Corrected processing of IPS STIP authorisation advices so that funds are not held when an online message is received after a clearing file.
      • I1706200082 [CARDS-53694] Changed temporary variable declaration to avoid overflow.
      • I1706209234 [CARDS-54014] Corrected behaviour: now the DEV tag value will only affect PBT Status if defined on the Device Type override level.
      • I1706260734 [CARDS-54119] To consolidate positive and negative Due Amounts from several Due Items for an acquiring product's accounts, the REFRESH_DUE tag should be set in the corresponding account templates. This tag should not be used for templates involved in per-transaction Merchant Payment Statements. By default, Due Amounts are never consolidated into one Due Normalization for acquiring products.
      • I1706274643 [CARDS-53891] Fixed balance update algorithm to not update a balance if the account is closed.
      • I1706305190 [CARDS-53937] Transit authorizations created by IRouter and rejected with negative RC aren't increasing usage limiter counters now.
      • [CARDS-49061] NSPK Inward, Affiliated Base II interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.
      • [CARDS-50856] Deactivated, Suspended, Active and Inactive statuses for tokens have been added. Processing logic for the token parameter F_ENABLED has been changed. See documentation for details.
      • [CARDS-53426] [VISA REL] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. "Authorization Source Code" field in outgoing BASE II presentments is filled according to new rules described in the article. The global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set. From VISA release 17.4 and later, the global parameter VISA_PRC_TA will become obsolete.
      • [CARDS-53427] [VISA REL] Oct17-517 Global Optional 4.2. Implemented changes to allow issuers to receive a new data element "recipient name" in BASE II clearing records for OCT transactions. This field is stored in the "RPNA" tag.
      • [CARDS-53461] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1002. MPE Import: Supported changes in IP0053T1.
      • [CARDS-53713] DCI: Supported loading and processing Card Product File for Acquirer.
      • [CARDS-53714] Added the ability to specify the AUTH_TOKEN_ANSW tag in Service details.
      • [CARDS-53715] If contract_subtype.add_parms contains the WSP_ADD_PERS_DATA_B64 tag, the tag value will be sent to the response for a token creation request as "Additional Personalization Data". The tag value must contain data in base64 format.
      • [CARDS-53819] Currency overrides are supported in the standard form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table.
      • [CARDS-53863] [MC REL] 17.Q4 AN 1002 - Miscellaneous Core Systems Updates: update message for Tokenization event notification has been added.
      • [CARDS-53928] [JCB Release 17.2] changed BIT 22.5 filling according to new documentation. The "JCB_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to enable this functionality.
      • [CARDS-54031] [VISA REL v.2] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. Field "Authorization Source Code" in outgoing BII presentments is filled according to new rules, described in article. Global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set.
      • [CARDS-54114] [VISA REL] Oct17-558 Global Optional 4.3. VISA Outward Processing (pipe): for transactions with TAVV, but without CAVV, the "7" value is exported in the "Mail/Phone/Electronic Commerce and Payment Indicator" field.
      • I1703295760 [CARDS-54055] Changed behaviour: when the EXTR_CHANNEL tag is defined in a contract subtype, a transaction can be routed to external systems.
      • [PMPIPES-57] Added support of QAUC parameter during SSAD calculation.
      • I1704246960 [CARDS-54064] Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing (pipe) : Fixed "Illegal BaseII message length" error when exporting transaction with incomplete "AI" addendum.
      • I1705165707 [CARDS-53868] VISA Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of currency messages if scale factor is more than 9.
      • I1707067331 [CARDS-53986] Affiliated BII Outward Processing: fixed "Message Format Failed" error.
      • [CARDS-53972] [VISA REL] Oct17-513 Global Mandatory 2.14, VISA BASEII Inward Processing (pipe): new "PAYMENT ACCOUNT REFERENCE" field is stored in the database field "safe_doc.details" if it is present in an incoming TC40 message.
      • I1703314633 [WM-3049] MessageBox menu item step has been switched to OPW message formatting protocol.
      • I1704039532 [WM-3064] Master-details interface behaviour has been fixed: master selection change causes correct details view content update.
      • I1706133104 [WM-3066] [Design/Open data form] context popup menu action is no longer available for modal forms.
      • I1706209051 [WM-3063] Cyclic behaviour has been restored for the tree search tool: if the search is over downwards/upwards it is immediately restarted from top down/bottom up.
      • [CARDS-53579] JCB Outward Processing.dll (pipe) : fixed size of letters for filling "Merchant Name" and "City Name" fields.
      • I1705100654 [CARDS-53824] IPM Inward Processing (pipe) added grant on select from vec_history.
      • I1705263934 [CARDS-53784] IPM Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing when DE43.2 contains incorrect symbols.
      • [CARDS-53568] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1025. MasterCard Inward/Outward: Added PDS0004 to message layout without special processing. Removed Program Registration ID (PDS0043) value C67 from list of MoneySend Program Registration IDs.
      • [DBK-2658] WAY4 Cards upgrade cannot be started if any critical services are not active.
      • [DBK-2822] Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.
      • [DBK-2836] Corrected work of functions SUBTRACT_LIST_ITEMS_D, ADD_LIST_ITEMS_D in sy_convert package with delimiters other than ";".
      • [DBK-2839] Added deallocate unused extents of an archived table after failed "Single Sql/Custom Save" Housekeeping step.
      • [DBK-2840] Support of parallel dml has been added for Custom Sql Step.
      • [DBK-2855] Services are not activated on primary after setting Partial Secondary unavailable.
      • [DBK-2888] Some static tables were not populated with the new change version during Deferred Apply.
      • [CARDS-53805] The necessary privilege to execute CARDS_PIPES package procedures has been added for RBS. Payments Import pipe.
    • 03.45.29.20
      • CARDS-53577 [Acquiring authorisation] Split Shipment functionality (for Card-Not-Present transactions) has been supported on DeviceH2H channel. Intended for use for merchants that ship purchases at different times and/or from different distribution centres after a single authorization for the whole amount.
      • CARDS-53449 [Application management] Advanced Application R2 forms for contract and client classifiers have been extended by the "Date From", "Date To" and "Comment" fields.
      • CARDS-53583 [AMEX interface] Unnecessary grouping by MCC has been excluded for the "POS Terminal Statistics" and "ATM Statistics" sections of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report.
      • CARDS-53679 [Notifications] Added a new variable for client message notification: %USG_LIM_ACTIVE:<Usage_Code>%, which returns varchar2(1). The variable returns the current status of a usage limiter with <Usage_Code>.
      • I111106223 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-29382] A new parameter has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" report: P_HIDE_FEE_CONDITION, varchar(4000). The default value is "1=2". The parameter only works if P_SHOW_CUSTOM_FEE=Y. Use the parameter to hide fee amounts (convert fee amount to zero) in the transactions section.
      • CARDS-51921 [Core] For OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types, the "Delete" action has been enhanced with additional checks before removal.
      • CARDS-53700 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard PIN PVV Offset Export. Added sorting by ID.
      • CARDS-53759 [MasterCard interface] The XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business and XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business reports now show account balances in the "Delinquent Outstanding" section at the end of the last reporting period day.
      • CARDS-53794 [Case management] It is no longer necessary to register the "Case Management" menu for the clerk user group to allow clerk users to perform an activity in "Dispute Assistant CM" and other Case Management operation screens.
      • CARDS-53807 [VISA interface] XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business and XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business reports include contracts with date_expire on first day of report period.
      • I1705113768 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-53779] Supported Misc Fee data export in plain and UFX file formats for bank branches.
      • I1707037614 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53871] IPM Inward Processing: fixed "Length = [1] data elements is out of Allowed Range = [3-3] for Variable Length Field 407" error.
      • CARDS-52807 [Security & key management] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "Encryption and Protected Protocols for Data Transmission" has been changed. Added a warning that when the TLS 1.2 protocol is used, encryption using the RC4 algorithm must be disabled.
      • CARDS-53785 [DB kernel] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Disk Encryption section has been added (disk encryption is used when there is no Oracle Advanced Security option).
      • CARDS-53916 [Health Monitoring] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Health Monitoring section has been added.
      • CARDS-53188 [MasterCard interface] Deactivated tokens have been excluded from MAX_TOKENS count.
      • CARDS-53198 [Diners Club interface] DCI MPE Import. Supported loading acquirer member ids to BIN table from Geocodes section of DCI Network Configuration xml file.
      • CARDS-53336 [JCB interface] JCB: Added message codes ("RjP-----","RJP-----","RmP-----","RmR-----") for reject processing.
      • CARDS-53376 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-10: supported new PDS2175. It is used to export/import Card Acceptor URL containing Cyrillic characters. "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.2" global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
      • CARDS-53597 [CB Gate] Added a default value (1000) for the commit_interval parameter of the cb_gate_balance_load pipe.
      • CARDS-53705 [UnionPay interface] Union Pay Audit Trailer Import. Supported loading Exceptional Processing Credit Adjustments and settlement for them.
      • CARDS-53712 [Diners Club interface] Supported export of DCI Card Product Submission file for different DCI Releases. Version number filled from DCI_RELEASE global parameter.
      • CARDS-53769 [Diners Club interface] Supported processing DCI Card Production Confirmation file and storing information from this file in the process log.
      • CARDS-53771 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward (pipe): added the ability to charge a cardholder using Cardholder Billing Amount (BIT 6) instead of Reconciliation Amount (BIT 5). "ACP_<memberid>"="Y" new pipe parameter must be set to use this functionality for a specific member.
      • [CARDS-52816] New features in balance prediction (Late Payment and interest in ToPay amount).
      • [CARDS-53554] Advanced Applications R2 can skip Product status verification during contract application approval if the new global parameter APPL_ALLOW_NOT_READY is set to "Y". Application accept will check this status anyway.
      • [CARDS-53575] Special type of fee - Merchant Fee with amortization is supported for instalment plans. The fee is configured in fees for an instalment scheme. Invoices for merchant fee are not included in portion amount and total plan amount, they could not be paid (never become Open). Invoice events should be configured with one of two new amount types, Merchant Fee or Total Merchant Fee. The source document contract can be used to get a tariff for an instalment scheme and instalment scheme fee - the USE_CONTRA_TRF tag should be set in the instalment scheme or specific fee for the instalment scheme
      • [CARDS-53600] Added functions containing standard DWD_CARD_BRAND and DWD_CARD_CTEGORY mapping logic to the DWH_MAPPING package.
      • [CARDS-53622] Added "DB Date" field reflecting the record creation system time to the "GL Trace" table to enable multiple Datamart data loading.
      • [CARDS-53803] Correct standing orders processing for terminal contracts with same Terminal ID in different financial institutions is supported. If this duplication exists in the client configuration, the global parameter ALLOW_DUPL_TERMINAL_ID should be set to "Y". In this case, standing order documents for device contracts will be filled with additional contract search attributes: Merchant ID, Member ID and Spc Scheme for source, Member ID and Spc Scheme for target.
      • [CARDS-53830] Re-ageing (WAIVED_PD tag) can now be used for Current Due accounts. The corresponding balance type should be marked with the WAIVED_PD tag. See documentation for details.
      • [CARDS-53847] Added the ability to mark multi-currency Products with the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y. The tag should be specified in the top Product of a hierarchy. When the tag is set, additional checks will be performed when approving Products and contracts. Multi-currency Products require a separate license. Contact OpenWay Support for more details.
      • [CARDS-53849] Interbranch Fee Order can now be used for Misc documents created by usages. The tag FEE_INTERBRANCH=ORDER; should be used in Misc service details. See details in Documentation.
      • [CARDS-50683] Fixed an issue in which clients remained not approved after running contract hierarchy approval in structures with top liability and sub-liability contracts. Clients for all subordinate contracts are checked when approving a contract.
      • [CARDS-53412] ORA-01403: fixed no data found exception that occurred during MoneySend Reversal Request.
      • [CARDS-53670] Updated the discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option. A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.
      • [CARDS-53685] Corrected secondary online messages routing when online and clearing channels are different.
      • [CARDS-53693] Corrected fee amount calculation for authorizations when an additional fee is taken by a limiter.
      • [CARDS-53710] Masked document tags containing sensitive data when viewing them through the [All Tags] link. Custom tags can be configured to be masked in the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\System Utilities\Tagged Data Objects".
      • [CARDS-53716] Remove checking duration type for Events with the CLS code.
      • [CARDS-53733] Corrected the process for converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an instalment. Now transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.
      • [CARDS-53736] A new global parameter AUTH_SKIP_TAGS_INHERIT has been added. This parameter makes it possible to skip inheritance of special tags from an authorization to a financial document; these tags should be listed in the parameter value. The online tags ACQ_USG,ONLINE and OPID are always skipped.
      • [CARDS-53741] Fixed an error in P2P check operation.
      • [CARDS-53763] Corrected the algorithm for calculating the amount to check limits on online standing order processing: the transaction currency is used instead of contract currency.
      • [CARDS-53768] UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed determination of processing code.
      • [CARDS-53780] Removed the CARDHOLDER transaction attribute from the <<All Contactless (Group)>> group transaction condition. Transaction Processing.
      • [CARDS-53788] Corrected process information message for deactivated or absent token.
      • [CARDS-53809] Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.
      • [CARDS-53822] Tokens for Incontrol requests aren't checked as MDES/VDEP tokens.
      • [CARDS-53826] Calculation of maximum fee amount with the MAX_FEE tag has been enhanced. Calculation of minimum fee amount with the MIN_FEE tag has been added.
      • [CARDS-53839] Fixed issue. Now the "Client Template Details" form in the "Customer Profile\Operations" menu shows sensitive attributes as masked and non-editable. To comply with PA-DSS requirements, a service attribute which can contain PAN should inherit its value from a sensitive dynamic handbook parameter or be directly marked as sensitive by the SENSITIVE=Y tag in the Additional Data field.
      • [CARDS-53866] Intelligent backdated processing now supports instalment event fees recalculation during the correction process.
      • I1701125638 [CARDS-53582] Resolved issue: Now dispute documents with fee return can be processed even if the original document's services have been deleted by Housekeeping. If the FEE_RETURN=ALL option is configured, a fee will be returned; in other cases, a document will be processed without fee return.
      • I1704281513 [CARDS-53814] Supplementary order processing has been enhanced.
      • I1706022663 [CARDS-53682] NSPK MPE Loading: fixed situation when not all issuer records for one MasterCard range are copied to NSPK BIN group.
      • I1706056722 [CARDS-53767] Fixed adjustment amounts rounding issue in the end of month fee recalculation procedure.
      • I1706068798 [CARDS-53661] When searching for a Source Service for interbranch macrotransactions, processing of the global parameter "IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY" has been added. If the parameter value is "Y", the country will be analyzed on the Target side. The default value of the global parameter "IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY" is "N".
      • I1706072562 [CARDS-53673] Corrected calculation of previous card expiry date in unmarking procedure.
      • I1706151932 [CARDS-53649] Corrected processing of IPS STIP authorisation advices so that funds are not held when an online message is received after a clearing file.
      • I1706200082 [CARDS-53694] Changed temporary variable declaration to avoid overflow.
      • I1706274643 [CARDS-53891] Fixed balance update algorithm to not update a balance if the account is closed.
      • [CARDS-49061] NSPK Inward, Affiliated Base II interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.
      • [CARDS-50856] Deactivated, Suspended, Active and Inactive statuses for tokens have been added. Processing logic for the token parameter F_ENABLED has been changed. See documentation for details.
      • [CARDS-53426] [VISA REL] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. "Authorization Source Code" field in outgoing BASE II presentments is filled according to new rules described in the article. The global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set. From VISA release 17.4 and later, the global parameter VISA_PRC_TA will become obsolete.
      • [CARDS-53427] [VISA REL] Oct17-517 Global Optional 4.2. Implemented changes to allow issuers to receive a new data element "recipient name" in BASE II clearing records for OCT transactions. This field is stored in the "RPNA" tag.
      • [CARDS-53461] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1002. MPE Import: Supported changes in IP0053T1.
      • [CARDS-53713] DCI: Supported loading and processing Card Product File for Acquirer.
      • [CARDS-53714] Added the ability to specify the AUTH_TOKEN_ANSW tag in Service details.
      • [CARDS-53715] If contract_subtype.add_parms contains the WSP_ADD_PERS_DATA_B64 tag, the tag value will be sent to the response for a token creation request as "Additional Personalization Data". The tag value must contain data in base64 format.
      • [CARDS-52680] VISA BASE II Prepared Outward Processing. Additional check of pipe parameters has been implemented - now the pipe checks correctness of the "FILTER" parameter.
      • I1705248633 [CARDS-53731] VISA Outward: "Merchant State/Province Code" field is filled with spaces for non US/CA Merchant Country transactions.
      • [CARDS-49061] NSPK Inward, Affiliated Base II interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.
      • [CARDS-53427] [VISA REL] Oct17-517 Global Optional 4.2. Implemented changes to allow issuers to receive a new data element "recipient name" in BASE II clearing records for OCT transactions. This field is stored in the "RPNA" tag.
      • [UFX-404] Added a configuration parameter for WAY4 Gate in the stmt-config section of the way4cadapter service configuration for including a reversed transaction in an additional statement.
      • I1704055962, I1704055907 [WM-3035] Menu Item editor has been fixed: <parameter> inclusions can be used in Parameters and Name fields.
      • [DBK-2658] WAY4 Cards upgrade cannot be started if any critical services are not active.
      • [DBK-2822] Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.
