      • [DBK-2839] Added deallocate unused extents of an archived table after failed "Single Sql/Custom Save" Housekeeping step.
      • [DBK-2840] Support of parallel dml has been added for Custom Sql Step.
    • 03.45.29.16
      • CARDS-52529 [Transaction management] Enhanced inheritance of document tags, transaction conditions and attributes to a financial presentment from an authorization document. In addition to inheritance for documents from our devices, attributes are inherited for our issuing documents and sponsor for acquirer documents. Sponsor document inheritance can be turned off by using the COND_INH_FOR_AFF global parameter where "Y" allows attribute inheritance and "N" disables it. The document tag with same values can also be used.
      • CARDS-54106 [Acquiring authorisation] Acquiring for transport merchants is supported: authorizations can be deferred and aggregated for cost reduction, special stop lists for merchants calculated. For details please contact your business representatives.
      • CARDS-51891 [Data preparation and card personalization] All pregenerated ICC keys will now be stored in separate tables.
      • CARDS-52904 [Core] A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() - with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available. - with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeAllCreditHistory and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns only records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available.
      • CARDS-53280 [Product management] A Parent Pack link will be redefined from a history record if the Service Pack has not been approved yet.
      • CARDS-53456 [Application management] "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Appl Type" now allows the TARIFF_CODE_EXT tag to be used in Tariff sections for setting a tariff code.
      • CARDS-53475 [Application management] The "Custom Parms" new button has been added to the "Contract Preferred" form (OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Cardholder Input & Update by Applications) to pack/unpack the "Custom Parms" tagged field. A section with the "Preferred" object type is supported for applications created manually according to the application types.
      • CARDS-53501 [Product management] A new Event type with the "CLS_UNIQUE" code is used to set a classifier with a future date and empty "Date To" in WAY4Web. This prevents the situation when Single events are stored in the usage action table in Posted status forever. For each financial institution that has an Event type with the "CLS" code and duration=Single, a new Event type with the "CLS_UNIQUE" code will be added during the upgrade process.
      • CARDS-53515 [Core] Existing records in the VISIBLE_CLASSIFIER_TYPES handbook are marked as "Customer Service Workbench" records. New records can now be created indicating their relation to Customer or Merchant workbenches.
      • CARDS-53551 [Instalment management] The ability to configure an instalment fee to waive all not opened fee invoices on full early repayment has been added. To enable this mode, the WAIVE_ON_FER tag should be specified in special parameters for the fee in the instalment scheme.
      • CARDS-53554 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 can skip Product status verification during contract application approval if the new global parameter APPL_ALLOW_NOT_READY is set to "Y". Application accept will check this status anyway.
      • CARDS-53564 [Instalment management] The INST_PLAN_ID tag is set in documents created for invoice event fees. Additional tags can be inherited from an instalment plan into a document created by an invoice event or invoice event fee. The list of tags should be configured in the INST_EVENT_INHERIT_TAGS global parameter (can be specified for a financial institution).
      • CARDS-53270 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import. Supported creating settlement documents for Fee Collection/ Funds Disbursements (FCP file).
      • CARDS-53476 [Host2Host interface] Removed unnecessary transaction amount validation for transit authorization reversals.
      • CARDS-53548 [Transaction management] Card Expire information will not be inherited from an authorization if it is already filled in the financial document.
      • CARDS-53558 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed filling of "transaction date" field for incoming S2 documents.
      • CARDS-53571 [Money transfers] Corrected behaviour: credited card channel license is only analyzed to determine if _DOM/_INT suffixes must be added to source_fee_code value.
      • CARDS-53572 [Transaction management] Filling of merchant information for Batch Header documents added on document accept.
      • I1502035325 [Core] [CARDS-53566] "Service Approved" form for WAY4 Manager has been fixed.
      • I1512231114 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53570] Fixed an issue with filling in the "Trans Date" field for Reimbursements. Now the database system date is used for the "Trans Date" field and can be redefined when using the Product Inspector.
      • I1705098865 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53521] AMEX DAF Import: Fixed filling counters in acknowledgement file.
      • I1705264283 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-53576] IC Documents Import (pipe): removed incorrect check of DocRefSet/DRN element length.
      • I1705301217 [Issuing] [CARDS-53533] Improved processing of Application for usage limiter deletion. Fixed issue with incorrect processing when Usage Template was closed and Usage Template Approved remains active.
      • I1706021774 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-53513] Union Pay Outward: Fixed problem with selecting documents for wrong channel.
      • I1706057036 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53523] Generation of the "Trace stack overflow" error message during the document processing procedure has been fixed for transactions processed in WAY4 Cards by Interchange Payment System exchange rates (for example, Dynamic Currency Conversion transactions) if Trace message logging was switched on.
      • I1706069710 [Money transfers] [CARDS-53514] Money transfers Sender Data made optional for OnUs and Domestic transactions for CUP cards.
      • CARDS-53510 [JCB interface] JCB Outward Processing, JCB ISO Outward processing (pipes): added the ability to set up start sequence numbers for outgoing file numbering. If needed, the new "START_FILE_SEQ" pipe parameter must be set with the desired number.
      • CARDS-53517 [Diners Club interface] Supported service to export DCI Card Product Submission file (format version 00162).
      • CARDS-53567 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added new "GET_CARDS_HINT", "GET_CARDS_IDS_HINT", "GET_CARDHOLDERS_HINT" pipe parameters to define Oracle hints for appropriate query optimization. If parameters are set, values must contain the entire hint including comment symbols, for example GET_CARDS_HINT=/*+cardinality(card 20)*/
      • CARDS-53569 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN 1038. IPS Product Definition: Added the "MasterCard World Prepaid" product with the MCW Product Idt code and MWP Licensed Product Idt code.
    • 03.45.29.15
      • CARDS-50183 [MasterCard interface] Tariff Structure and Data Import: Added the parameter DATE_CHECK_MODE=ANY_DATE to the standard menu item for VISA and MasterCard.
      • CARDS-53248 [Acquiring authorisation] The ability to decline transactions in the second phase when CVV was not checked has been added. The CVC2R tag with the values 'N', 'P', 'U' or 'S' transferred from the controller implements this functionality. The global parameter CHECK_CVV_ON_ISS switches on this functionality. If the parameter is empty, these transactions are successful. If it contains an error number, this error is transferred to the controller and the document is rejected.
      • CARDS-53407 [Application management] Added a new menu "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Imported & Loaded XML Applications Management" that makes it possible to open unposted applications loaded from XML files or online XML requests with all details and manage them.
      • CARDS-53433 [Core] In API acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with call mode AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin added a filter: API returns records from credit_history with service_class from list: Balance Inquiry, Top Up, Online Payment, External Payment, Online Statement, Verification, Additional Online Service.
      • CARDS-53470 [Core] A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth, AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllWithNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history which did not change balances and/or an account's Amount Available.
      • CARDS-53471 [Fleet cards] Fleet transactions reposting by selection has been implemented in the OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Documents Troubleshooting\Documents - Repost by Selection form.
      • CARDS-52131 [VISA interface] Information about Prepaid Cards has been added to the "Card Issuance" section in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53178 [Product management] Classifier domain functionality has been reduced for future compatibility with the new Product-based domain approach.
      • CARDS-53481 [Reversal management] Intelligent Backdated Processing functionality has been improved to correct balance history entry amounts for advice and reversal transactions when a balance type is specified in a custom fee service with an empty Fee Type reference.
      • CARDS-53484 [Dispute assistant] Dispute Assistant v2: Suppressed Automatic Final Write-Off for zero summary balances.
      • I1705099074 [CB Gate] [CARDS-53246] Fixed incorrect processing of CBGate balance loading when the last transaction linked to the balance was delivered to CBS by SAF.
      • I1705221109 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-53488] Fixed COMS_LOG parsing in database. Fixed error "ERROR in Buffer Packed Data. Field Request Failed. 3 4" occurring when parsing pay_gate messages (using the "Cr.Log Flds" button in the form opened with the menu item "Online Log Not Safe" OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Emergency Reports\Online Log - Not Safe).
      • I1705264583 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53495] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed ARN calculating for multiple adjustments.
      • I1705026998, I1705127863, I1705153646, I1702208472, I1705297867 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53441] NSPK Bin Table Import (pipe): if NSPK BIN range for VISA/MC is not found and smaller (fully included in NSPK range) VISA/MC BIN ranges exist, these VISA/MC ranges are copied to the appropriate NSPK BIN Group. To avoid copying and restore the old behaviour, the new "COPY_SUBRANGES"="N" pipe parameter must be set.
      • I1706018366 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53473] VISA SMS: Fixed case when Transaction Switch sends duplicate Reversals.
    • 03.45.29.14
      • CARDS-51850 [Bill payments] It is now possible to clear the ServiceComment and License fields of a PaymentType using mBilling request.
      • CARDS-52015 [Bill payments] Biller Management: ATM Retail contracts are now created with consideration of the requested channel.
      • CARDS-52038 [Customer service workbench] A new CLIENT_ADDRESSES view has been created to show all addresses for a client and its contracts. The old CLIENT_ADDRESS_DATA view should be replaced in all customizations and Web Services. It will be removed in future versions.
      • CARDS-52866 [SEPA interface] If a SEPA Customer-To-Bank Export process fails with a validation error message, it is now logged in Process Message with "Error" type.
      • CARDS-53171 [Application management] Supported work with applications for a multi-level contract hierarchy with different clients in application types. One application can contain several client sections and each client section can have its own subsections for addresses, classifiers, etc. If the client section is not mandatory, verification of client data is supported - at least one of the identifiers must be specified: reg_number, client_number, social_number, itn. When empty, the application sub-tree is ignored. The client section can also be the top one in the application for the contract: ObjectFor = Contract - the case of new client creation with its contract as a sub-contract for the specified one. In both cases, application type is required to have a contract section under such a client section at the next level with ActionType = Add.
      • CARDS-53329 [VISA interface] VISA Prepared Outward Processing: supported "single authorization multiple capture" specific for the "VISA Outward Files Completing" procedure. If the "MULTI_CLR"="Y" parameter is set, multiclearing messages will be sorted and exported in separate batches/files.
      • CARDS-53351 [SEPA interface] SEPA. Added the menu item OpenWay\SEPA\SEPA. File Management\SEPA Outgoing Pending Files
      • CARDS-53359 [Tariff management] Forms and actions for managing Product Tariff Campaigns have been implemented. A separate license is required. A manual for Product Tariff Campaigns has been created: [loyalty\loyalty_discounts\Tariff_Campaign.pdf].
      • CARDS-53361 [Bill payments] Device contracts in invalid statuses are now ignored when creating ATM Retail.
      • CARDS-53369 [Application management] Supported uniqueness of client individual taxpayer number (ITN field). It's only checked if the field is not empty and the global parameter "UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_ITN" for the financial institution is not set to "N" (No). The default parameter value is "Y" (Yes) and ITN uniqueness is checked.
      • CARDS-53374 [Product management] REASON_DETAILS field size has been increased from 255 to 3900 symbols in the STANDING_ORDER and DOC tables.
      • CARDS-53399 [Fleet cards] A new ability for reposting fleet documents has been implemented. Now the process can match goods using an internal goods codes stored in the item document instead of a terminal goods code. The Doc - Brief form [->Repost] button has been renamed to [->Edit] for Fleet documents. A new [->Repost] button has been added to start the new reposting process.
      • I1612121917 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51820] "No Check" Auth scenario has been removed from forms as obsolete. The additional global parameter ENABLE_NO_CHECK is no longer supported.
      • I1703038914, I1705100344 [Authentication management] [CARDS-53096] Authentication domain option added: ACCESS_LOG=N to suppress unwanted process log messages on authentication result. NB: audit log records will be present anyway.
      • CARDS-49993 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): fixed PDS-0306 (File Message Counts) verification - rejected messages are excluded from the value for comparison.
      • CARDS-51300 [Transaction management] Import of historic acquiring transactions has been fixed to support source contract custom search by Merchant ID (if the terminal ID is not present in WAY4). This functionality is only used during migration from legacy platforms to WAY4.
      • CARDS-51494 [Core] Excessive processing of unmatched usage limiters in document posting is skipped if this has already been done by the authorization module.
      • CARDS-51859 [CB Gate] Fixed reversal message routing to core banking system for utility payments.
      • CARDS-51867 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now PDS158 sf4 (IRD) for a second presentment is inherited from the presentment, not from the chargeback.
      • CARDS-51883 [Acquiring authorisation] Supported P2P merchant initiated transactions (MIT).
      • CARDS-51904 [Notifications] In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report added calculation of values for %VAR% variables if they are set in the P_MESSAGECODE_P parameter.
      • CARDS-52055 [Diners Club interface] DCI Clearing Import: Supported value M = "Mobile POS" which is valid for the Terminal Type field since Release 15.2.
      • CARDS-52208 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed filling Send Member Id field in Funds Disbursement Outward transactions.
      • CARDS-52278 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect redefinition of message settlement date on IRouter authorisation.
      • CARDS-52302 [Tariff management] Corrected loyalty action limit restriction if bonus service is configured for another contract using the CONTRACT_FOR tag.
      • CARDS-52320 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed incorrect creation of settlement documents with zero amount.
      • CARDS-52331 [Diners Club interface] DCI Clearing Import: Supported loading files with long (more than 32 symbols) names.
      • CARDS-52352 [Core] BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.
      • CARDS-52353 [Product management] Corrected behaviour: now the process OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Renew All For Institution correctly approves Service Packages with additional packs: first all additional packs, then main packages.
      • CARDS-52361 [Instalment management] Corrected information portion status in an instalment plan after "Change Instalment Terms".
      • CARDS-52365 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed rejected Interchange Message processing.
      • CARDS-52411 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Outward Processing (pipe): fixed T1 F9 field filling.
      • CARDS-52448 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard PVV/PIN Export: Fixed record selection to satisfy "Full file replace" mode.
      • CARDS-52471 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): fixed "status was changed from Close to Open" error when using custom card status (F333 in ADD_FIELDS_T3 pipe parameter).
      • CARDS-52475 [Reversal management] In the Reversal Management module, correction of "Behavior Type" changes has been fixed when changes were done at correction start date.
      • CARDS-52489 [VISA interface] The default value of the P_CEMEA parameter in the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report has been changed, the new value is "Y".
      • CARDS-52492 [Bill payments] Corrected visibility of payment type properties. Payment type properties created via mBilling request are now visible.
      • CARDS-52496 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Fixed situation when incoming Presentment Reversals/Adjustments and MasterCard Fee Collection secondary documents were not linked to the corresponding cases.
      • CARDS-52508 [VISA interface] Fixed card_brand condition in the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report.
      • CARDS-52538 [VISA interface] For the "DWH_CONF" configuration group (OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Configuration Groups), a new value has been added for the "DWD_CARD_CATEGORY" classifier - "Deferred Debit" (DEFERRED_DEBIT) for a separate card category.
      • CARDS-52547 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect selection of message code for Core banking system. IRouter.
      • CARDS-52573 [WAY4 Web] 1.Application processing error in Delete Usage action has been fixed. 2. Application processing of tagged fields has been restored.
      • CARDS-52606 [MasterCard interface] XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Merchants" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts. Calculation of the following rows has been updated: - Number of Mastercard Merchants - Number of new Merchants added this quarter - Number of Merchants lost this quarter
      • CARDS-52609 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf" report: 1. Changed the default value of the P_V_PAY_BRAND_NAME parameter from "V PAY" to "V_V". 2. Supported the ability to configure additional groups in SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Merchant Category Group Data" and "Contactless" sections. 3. Added new parameter P_SIC_GROUP_CNTCLS_CLASS_TYPE for configuring data groups in the "Contactless" section. 3. Excluded "V PAY" transactions from the "Merchant Category Group Data" section when P_CEMEA = 'N'.
      • CARDS-52662 [Core] Reversal transactions have been excluded from the XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf report.
      • CARDS-52668 [Accounting] Interest calculation has been enhanced for Interest Scheme -360 and interest calculation on the 31st day of the month.
      • CARDS-52675 [Reversal management] Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual reversal management actions using DB Manager.

      • CARDS-52714 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Added trimming tag values for PDS0670.

      • CARDS-52735 [Acquiring authorisation] Fixed an error with printing or displaying an incorrect final fee amount on transactions with the issuer's or acquirer's fees.
      • CARDS-52752 [Issuing authorisation] When a PIN is changed after marking a card for reproduction but before receiving a reproduction results file, the new PIN value is also written to the new plastic record.
      • CARDS-52762 [CB Gate] Fixed BerTLV buffers parsing in Application Interface.
      • CARDS-52766 [Core] Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-52774 [Application management] Client AddOrUpdate Application R2 checks the existence of a client in accordance with the additional global parameters UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_NUMBER and UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_REG_NUMBER.

      • CARDS-52899 [Acquiring authorisation] Optimized the query to select the main document for processing post authorization operations for P2P transactions.
      • CARDS-52915 [Authentication management] The "OFFICER" scope has been added to validation conditions for an authentication scheme linked to a consumer record.

      • CARDS-53106 [Core] Temporary Credit Limits now are closed in the order in which they were opened.

      • CARDS-53300 [Notifications] For number variables (like %TRANS_AMOUNT%, %SUM(...)%) by default, if the format is not declared in the variable, use the formatting style (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Client Classifiers\Formatting Styles) with the "default" code.
      • CARDS-53358 [NSPK interface] Fixed the inability to receive authorization requests from one IPS member to another when both members are served in the same processing centre but direct interbranch routing between them is blocked. Please check external services configuration to share the source channel for correct authorization processing where <ChannelCode> is a source channel: * for Transaction Switch users, external adapter contains "special_processing_options sourceChannelID=<ChannelCode>" * for NetServer users, external channel contains <MODULE TYPE="NETWORK"> section with <PARAMETER NAME="SOURCE_CHANNEL_ID" VALUE="<ChannelCode>"/> The case is directly related to situations when a message received from IPS channel will be routed back to the same channel.
      • CARDS-53362 [Money transfers] Changed behaviour: pursuant to VISA requirements, the CPNA tag is no longer filled in with the "Visa Money Transfer" string for domestic money transfers if the correct value was not found.

      • I1701112611 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51790] A new parameter has been added to the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS - varchar(4000) with the default value "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" for customising the "is_on_us" flag. Checks by group_channel have been replaced by card_brand analysis (... card_brand like 'V_%' ...) for supporting affiliated transactions.
      • I1701112611 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52396] A new parameter has been added to the "MC Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. The default value has been changed for the P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 - checks by group_channel are extended by analysis of card_brand for support of affiliated transactions - " trans.chain_type in ('U') and target.card_brand like 'E_%' ".
      • I1701227932 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52611] The algorithm for matching Retrieval Request and First Presentment documents has been improved for cases when a secondary document had been already processed and had changed the First Presentment posting status to "InActive".

      • I1702225223 [Automated routines] [CARDS-52304] The Approve procedure can be be called for sub-products. If the main product is not ready, Approve will be executed for the entire hierarchy; if the main product is ready, only the sub-product will be approved. A new form has been added, OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products (No Hierarchy), for viewing all products without hierarchy.

      • I1703024740 [Core] [CARDS-52378] Standing order amount calculation has been fixed for cases when an order's posting date is earlier than the current banking date, and when the order's minimum and maximum amount currency differs from the account currency.
      • I1703025952 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52595] IRD PE configuration has been modified for Interregional and Intra-LAC region transactions.
      • I1703038675 [Risk management] [CARDS-52383] Incorrect processing of several usage limiters with the same limiter type for one transaction is no longer possible.
      • I1703076703 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52318] Truncated address city field to 32 symbols when filling device parameters.
      • I1703138261 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52801] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now documents with an invalid Approval Code will be suspended. MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward: Now if a document has an invalid Approval Code, this Approval Code won't be exported.
      • I1703144988 [Accounting] [CARDS-52447] Modified generation of codes for Misc fees in the menu "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Transaction Dictionary" when the global parameter FULL_TRANS_CODES=Y.
      • I1703145086 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52516] Changed Target Member Id filling in DA v2. Now Target Member Id is not pre-filled in a created Fee Collection. It is filled during routing search.
      • I1703160402 [Product inspector] [CARDS-52474] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with the same codes that already exist in the destination WAY4Cards system. Previously, all test script steps already present in the destination database were deleted, which led to links being lost in comparing script results with the standard ones. This behaviour cannot be restored. In the first step of the import procedure, all the existing test steps in the database are marked with the new status "Obsolete". In the second step, the system checks if the step number exists in the file being imported. If not, the step in the database is kept with the "Obsolete" status, otherwise the step gets a status and inherits other parameters from the file being imported. When a Product Inspector script is run, a step with the "Obsolete" status behaves the same way as a step with the "Skip" status.
      • I1703201358 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52738] If device_parms.device_location value is used as the source of the CPNA tag and the value consists of one word only, the tag value will be calculated as two device_parms.device_location values separated by a space character.
      • I1703209597 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-52654] Pipe RBS. Transactions Export (Batching): Fixed generation of duplicate empty files for a future date.
      • I1703241228 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-53397] Fixed the error "Not a current doc" when sorting P2P documents.
      • I1703249728 [Application management] [CARDS-52849] Resolved issue with missing base relation for a new non-product based related contract during accept of an advanced application R2.
      • I1703276453 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52630] Fixed an error which prevented posting of original and reversal transactions occurring in different batches.
      • I1703287643 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52613] MasterCard IPM Inward: Now MoneySend transactions are converted to Notifications (by the additional global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS=Y) only for programs (PDS0043) C07, C52, C53, C54, C55, C56, C57 and C67.

      • I1705317060 [Core] [CARDS-53408] Intermediate commits have been added to contract subtype and contract type check processes. The commit interval can be configured using process parameters. The default commit interval is 100 records.

      • CARDS-51488 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of ONUS/Affiliated fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-51490 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of unsuccessful authorization fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-51495 [Core] Reports XLS_CB_f250_1.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf: - Added count of contactless cards, transactions and devices. - Supported consolidated report for all financial organization branches. - Supported counting of cards with only 2 groups: debit/credit.
      • CARDS-51649 [VISA interface] For the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report: - added a new block "MERCHANT ACQUIRING TOTAL" with sums of regional volumes. - calculation of "Sales - of which Electron" subsection in the transaction section has been supported. - the sections "No. of terminals installed at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals installed at merchants" have been renamed to "No. of terminals active at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals active at merchants". These sections contain information about terminals on which at least one transaction was made during the report period.
      • CARDS-51856 [Risk management] Created a new risk report "Exceeded Total Credit/Refund Transact. Nmbr to Total Purchase Transact. Nmbr Ratio" (OpenWay\Acquiring\Merchant Risk Management\Risk Reports - Acquiring Single). It is necessary to set the TOTCRDRTRANSNUMRATIO risk scheme parameter (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Acquiring Products\Device Risk Schemes) - Total Credit/Refund Transact. Nmbr to Total Purchase Transact. Nmbr Ratio. Only device contracts for which the ratio of the Credit/Refund transactions to the total number of purchase transactions in a period exceeds the TOTCRDRTRANSNUMRATIO parameter value set in the risk scheme will be included in the report. Only Credit (Trans Type IDT=0616) and Retail (Trans Type IDT=0515) transactions will be analysed when generating the report.
      • CARDS-51857 [Risk management] Created a new report, Credits_Issued_By_Merchant.rdf. The report is run from OpenWay\MC Statistics Reports\Risk Reports\Credits Issued By Merchant.
      • CARDS-51864 [Risk management] Added a new report, MC_Acquiring_Fraud_Basis_Points.rdf, and statistic attributes (OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Statistic Attributes (custom)) for its support: Trans classifier: Device Type Transaction (PS_TRN_DEVICE_TYPE) Trans classifier: Fraud Type (PS_TRN_FRAUD_TYPE) Trans classifier: Card Present (PS_TRN_IS_CARD_PRESENT), Trans classifier: Mastercard MO/TO/Ecomm Transaction (PS_TRN_MC_MOTOECOMM)
      • CARDS-51892 [Acquiring authorisation] Voice Authorization Screen application is compatible with Oracle 12c.
      • CARDS-51909 [VISA interface] Card metadata element in Check Eligibility Response has been set for Visa tokenization transactions.
      • CARDS-52180 [Issuing authorisation] Primary account number source and Device type fields have been added under authentication scheme.
      • CARDS-52188 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: additional customization points have been added.
      • CARDS-52189 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" parameter to define the first symbols of accounts for special processing. Default value is "CH".
      • CARDS-52190 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added "REPORT_TO_LINK_T10" and "PARENT_LINK_T10" parameters which make it possible to override "REPORT_TO_LINK" and "PARENT_LINK" parameters for T10 records. Added "TWO_LEVEL_STRUCTURE"="Y"/"N"(default) parameter. If "Y" it is allowed to set the parent link for card directly to a corporate contract.
      • CARDS-52198 [Issuing authorisation] Final tokenization decision tag has been added to TNK_ACTIVATION message.
      • CARDS-52209 [Fee Prediction] Modified IC tariffs and RA configuration for all regions in accordance with VISA release requirement: 2.8 Changes to Private Label Transfer Pricing.
      • CARDS-52210 [JCB interface] JCB Rel Apr 17: supported IIN file format changes.
      • CARDS-52223 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified according to VISA release article: Apr17-335 2.9 Changes to Visa Gold International Interchange Reimbursement Fees for Japan Issuers.
      • CARDS-52234 [VISA interface] VISA Fee Prediction: Added Fee Program Areas for Visa Gold purchase and credit voucher transactions for Japan issuers.
      • CARDS-52236 [VISA interface] RA configuration has been modified for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).
      • CARDS-52239 [VISA interface] VISA Release Apr17-341: Added SIC Group "Global B2B Virtual Payments Fee Program" with code VISA_GL_B2B.
      • CARDS-52252 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified according to VISA release article: Apr17-341 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product.
      • CARDS-52267 [MasterCard interface] Modified IRD configuration for interregional interchange programs in accordance with MasterCard release item: Global 521 - New Consumer Prepaid Product Code.
      • CARDS-52286 [Data preparation and card personalization] Export of SecureCode AAV Validation Key from CAVV_A and CAVV_B in MC OBKM pipe supported.
      • CARDS-52321 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture file Import: added JCB specific for further export ECI (PDE3009) to JCB.
      • CARDS-52343 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added the "FIN_TRANS_SPLIT" parameter which allows a fee transaction to be exported separately from the main transaction. Added the "ADD_FIELDS_T5_FEE" parameter to redefine T5 record fields for fee transactions. Added the "FIN_ADD_FIELD" parameter for customizing transactions select.
      • CARDS-52344 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added "PAN_LENGTH_19" pipe parameter which allows account number fields with a length of 19 digits to be exported. Leading zeroes are added if necessary.
      • CARDS-52345 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added "T1_FOR_T5" = Y/N(default) pipe parameter which allows export of T1 records when T5 records exist even if the billing period is not being closed.
      • CARDS-52346 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): additional customization points for T1 Last Payment Amount ( F292 ) and T1 Last Payment Date (F308 ) have been added.
      • CARDS-52360 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MCBS Import: Supported new format according to Global Operations Bulletin No. 2 - 1 February 2017.
      • CARDS-52373 [VISA interface] VISA Prepare Outward Files (procedure): added the "COMMIT_BY" parameter to control intermediate commits. Possible values: BATCH/FILE/PROCESS(default).
      • CARDS-52375 [VISA interface] A new section "Configuring a New Product B2B Virtual Payments Program" has been added to the 2017_04_VISA_Requirements.pdf document.
      • CARDS-52386 [Acquiring] Additional tags BASE_RATE and FX_MARKUP_PCT are supported for DCC Info Inquiry documents.
      • CARDS-52387 [Fee Prediction] RA configuration and IC tariffs have been modified for the Czech Republic according to Visa Business News (AI06374,AI06367).
      • CARDS-52394 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-340 2.1 Processing Requirements for Staged Digital Wallet Transactions. TCR3 record type "CR" is exported for SDWO transactions if this transaction doesn't contain industry specific TCR3.
      • CARDS-52399 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward Processing (pipe): improved DE4 and DE49 function for dispute transactions. If a document's reconciliation currency does not match the 1st presentment currency, the document's transaction amount/currency will be exported instead.
      • CARDS-52409 [Acquiring authorisation] Voice Authorization Screen is functional.
      • CARDS-52412 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added customization points.
      • CARDS-52431 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : improved export of transactions which do not have a document.
      • CARDS-52472 [MasterCard interface] Modified IRD configuration for Lebanon in accordance with MasterCard release 17Q2: MEA 323 - Introduction of Contactless IRD Structure in Lebanon.
      • CARDS-52545 [AMEX interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:AMEX GNS Outward Processing.cpp).
      • CARDS-52651 [VISA interface] Added Message Channels "Q" and "q" for IPS Mercury. Added Mercury Premium and Mercury Non-Premium products to IPS Products.
      • CARDS-52757 [UnionPay interface] UPI Fee Prediction: Added finding FeeProgram for intra-country transactions.
      • CARDS-52832 [JCB interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:JCB. Outward Processing.cpp).
      • CARDS-52896 [MasterCard interface] Prepared MasterCard IRD configuration based on FULL MPE (Release 17Q2).
      • CARDS-53083 [WAY4 Web] Password complexity requirements can now be added as parameters for WAY4Web user authentication scheme.
      • CARDS-53379 [JCB interface] JCB ISO. Added the "OWS.Accept Clearing" subitem to the menu item "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing".
      • I1702212586 [JCB interface] [CARDS-52413] JCB Interface fixed format (pipes): supported contactless PEM.
      • I1703091921 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52543] Modified RA configuration and IC tariffs for Ireland according to VISA requirements published on 2 March 2017.
      • I1704129157 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-52876] DCI MPE (Sys Ops XML File) Import: Supported loading Product Id, Account Funding Source and Product Category fields in BIN Table. Added DCI products to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).
    • 03.45.29.13
      • CARDS-52308 [Datamart] In WAY4 Datamart version 03.45.10, new FI Group Load functionality for performing several loads to Datamart (ETLs) for one banking date has been supported. The fi_load_group tag should be put in f_i.special_parms to configure financial institution groups to be loaded during a certain ETL. The mp_fi_load_group table and forms for filling in the fi_load_group tag in f_i.special_parms has been added from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30.
      • CARDS-52379 [Fleet cards] Supported new Fleet BERTLV request tags: EA.FFXX.DB - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DC - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DD - Total item discount for client calculated by third-party device.
      • CARDS-53017 [Product management] For Transaction Types (TRANS_TYPE table) added Trans_Code unique check: - in "Transaction Types" and "Transactions - All" forms with the button Actions... -> Check All - in Message Dictionary generation with the menu OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Generate Message Dictionary.
      • CARDS-53282 [Core] Unused CUST_GL_TRANSFER procedure has been dropped
      • CARDS-53296 [Fleet cards] New tags have been added to Fleet BERTLV response message: EA.FFXX.D6 - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D7 - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D8 - Total item discount for client calculated by issuer.
      • CARDS-53156 [AMEX interface] IPS Products. Added AMEX products.
      • CARDS-53195 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export. Fixed Billing File records generation.
      • CARDS-53226 [Reversal management] Generation of corrections in intelligent backdated processing has been improved. When a liability tree is processed, corrections will be generated for transfers between Main/Sub trees in the liability hierarchy. Additionally corrections can now be generated for transfers to not amount available accounts, this feature can be enabled by setting the STORNO_NOT_AMAV_CORRECTIONS global parameter to "Y".
      • CARDS-53244 [Case management] Added a "Currency" column which reflects the currency of "Amount" and "Fee" fields to the "All Docs" tab in Case Management screens.
      • CARDS-53283 [Core] Each ITEM_DUE is now processed separately in Acquiring products configuration. Previously, using a Due Type other then Value Days Due could cause a collapse of several ITEM_DUE with different signs, leading to incorrect information in Merchant Statement reports.
      • CARDS-53291 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed the inability to redefine the PARTIAL_APPROVAL_ENABLE property in Services or transaction subtypes.
      • CARDS-53334 [NSPK interface] NSPK Processing (pipes): fixed incorrect processing for PDS-0176 and PDS-0190 for AMEX.
      • I1704037380 [Core] [CARDS-53331] If the "Current Grace Date" is requested via the bal_log.CURRENT_GRACE_DATE function, the system returns the value of the contract date "Full Payment Date" (FP_DATE, stored in ACNT_LOG.trg_date_5). To override the returned value for the bal_log.CURRENT_GRACE_DATE function, store the required value in the trg_date_4 field of the ACNT_LOG table.
      • I1704189347 [Core] [CARDS-52998] Fixed double fee charging in issuing contracts for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT is used in basic transaction service setup) when the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.
      • I1705221304 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53272] IPS Products. Updated according to last NSPK specification.
      • CARDS-53277 [NSPK interface] Affiliated BII Outward Processing (pipe) : supported export of NSPK G2C Credit transactions.
    • 03.45.29.12
      • CARDS-53239 [Acquiring authorisation] The document processing procedure creates and fills CLR_SEQ_COUNT (multiple clearing count) and CLR_SEQ_NUM (multiple clearing sequence number) tags in Sales Completion documents for Multiple Capture transactions on own acquiring side.
      • CARDS-52562 [VISA interface] New sy_conf_group_rec records automatically created during opt_classify.CLASSIFY_CARD_BRANDS() execution are now marked with the AUTO=Y; tag in the add_info field.
      • CARDS-52937 [Issuing authorisation] Added the ability to set the "SKIP_AUTH_EVNT;" tag in the ServiceInfo field of the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Merchant Device Setup\Additional Online Services -> [Full Info]" to suppress standard notification event generation.
      • CARDS-53201 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added the ability to redefine card numbers for some accounts on export for mixed company structure. The prefixes of these accounts must be listed in the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" pipe parameter value, separated by commas. The new pipe parameter, "CUST_GET_CARD_NUMBER" must contain an SQL expression which returns the redefined card number value.
      • CARDS-53235 [Customer/account management] Authorization requests for cards with multiple relations will be rejected if no contract exists with the specified relation and the SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT global parameter is set to 'N'. Authorization advices and financial presentments will be processed for the default relation contract.
      • CARDS-53243 [Case management] Changed the "CM.Operations.All Docs" form in the "CM Risk Management" and "Dispute Assistant" menu items. Removed the [TARGET_AMOUNT] and [TARGET_AMOUNT_FEE] computed fields. Added a new link [Srvc/Fee] to view all financial flows from all macrotransactions.
      • CARDS-53254 [NSPK interface] Changed default SQL values for analyzing parent Service Packs for the P_CAN_DISPENSE_CASH and P_CAN_ACCEPT_CASH parameters in the "XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices" report.
      • I1610288767 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-53236] The ALLOW_REV_IN_TREE global parameter can be redefined for merchant contracts and financial institutions (see the standard manual "Acquiring Module User Manual").
      • CARDS-49243 [VISA interface] An equal condition is used to count the number of accounts in the "Total Outstanding" line of the "Aged Analysis of Total Outstanding" section, and "Number of Accounts" line of the "Card Issuance" section in the "QMR VISA Statistics Issuing" report.
      • CARDS-52827 [Accounting] Supported configuration of the "Cardholder_Account_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports using Date Schemes.
      • CARDS-52991 [DB manager] DDDW domain with name "tariff_group__l" has been renamed to "tariff_group__lf". DBManager does not support work with non-unique codes of tariff types.
      • CARDS-53163 [DB manager] Fixed inability to add elements to several Exception Lists (OpenWay\Risk Based Assessment\Exception lists) without reopening the sub-form.
      • CARDS-53193 [Transaction management] Correct funds unblocking is supported for multiple financial presentments and multiple authorizations in different currencies for one transaction chain. In this case, the new pending amount is calculated as the difference between all authorizations pending (without fees) and the financial presentment settlement amount converted into the contract currency. Then it is accumulated under the first matched authorization. The pending value for the initial authorization is stored in the document add_info tags BLK_BASE, BLK_FEE, BLK_CURR.
      • CARDS-53238 [VISA interface] Th P_ORDER_AGED_ANALYSIS parameter has been deleted from the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53251 [Issuing authorisation] Changed behaviour: now processing of authorization documents with service class Transaction, Online Payment or External Payment will change a contract's counter for authorization code generation independently of the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter value.
      • CARDS-53278 [Product inspector] The mechanism that gathers and generates information for tags used when running Product Inspector scripts has been fixed. To activate the mechanism, the global parameter PI_COLLECT_TAGS should be set to "Y". In this case, information is stored in process message with the message type "X". The parameter is switched off by default (value "N").
      • I1704041217 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53192] MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward. The pipe no longer fills DE93.
      • I1704187095 [Product management] [CARDS-53269] Usage limiter's end date calculation has been enhanced for usage limiters with Period Type = Billing for sub-contracts.
      • I1704265122 [Data preparation and card personalization] [CARDS-53279] DF32, DF33, DF34, DF36, DF3A tags definition added to Chip Scheme Parameters Usability.
      • CARDS-51624 [Dispute assistant] MasterCard Transaction Management. A warning message and opening a "CHBK_FRAUD_COUNTER" Event have be added for cases when the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded. DA v2. Create Chargeback activity can't be performed if the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded.
      • CARDS-53149 [Diners Club interface] DCI Merchant Management. Supported DCI International Merchant Registration.
      • CARDS-53265 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward. Supported empty chargeback gross settlement amount for certification.
      • CARDS-53268 [JCB interface] JCB Outward: for all chip read transactions the "C" value is exported in 22.7 subfield.
    • 03.45.29.11
      • CARDS-52569 [Acquiring authorisation] mVISA: Merchant data have been added to outward parameter in tagged format for merchant card credit request response.
      • CARDS-52590 [Product management] New forms to view and edit client and contract parameters have been implemented. Menu item "OpenWay\Issuing\Customer Support\Contract Parameters".
      • CARDS-52715 [Data preparation and card personalization] TRACK1_DDF and TRACK2_DDF default values have been added for UPI/CUP cards.
      • CARDS-53024 [Customer/account management] The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad: -%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N indicating sibling order transaction. -%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.
      • CARDS-53097 [Transaction management] A document's posting date is used instead of transaction date to calculate ARN.
      • CARDS-53117 [Transaction management] Filling Invoice Party Name for Direct Credit from the RCEIVR_NAME document tag has been supported.
      • CARDS-53123 [Product inspector] Check of RC and document status for the "set credit limit" Product Inspector step has been added.
      • CARDS-53130 [Bill payments] Changed layout of add_info_* tags for biller contracts.
      • CARDS-53141 [Datamart] The Consistency Types form for ETL to Datamart has now an editable option for loading by financial institution groups.
      • CARDS-53166 [Reversal management] Events processing during the correction process has been enhanced to support proper event information loading into Datamart. The start local date and end local date of an event record will now be set as the current banking date if the event was posted or closed during the correction process.
      • CARDS-53203 [Core] The SEND_REVERSE tag can now be set in a document to allow a reversal to be sent to the payment system before an advice has been sent.
      • I1704120504 [Application management] [CARDS-53120] Changed behaviour when online requests based on Advanced Applications R2 for urgent operations such as contract status change, contract event posting, classifier setting, PIN attempts clearing are accepted in NoWF mode and cannot be performed immediately due to contract unavailability on the node (Response Code 2288) or a Deadlock (Response Code 2270), the application will be declined and a warning message will be returned as an error. Behaviour for non-urgent operations, offline application accept and workflow application processing hasn't been changed. In this case, applications will be processed by the next automatic accept process.
      • CARDS-46540 [Product management] Due normalization has been improved for Issuing accounts with Due Types: Payment Due, Long Payment Due, Contract Due, Fixed Day Due. If several due items with the same Due Date exist for an account, then only one Due transfer will be performed for the total Due Amount.
      • CARDS-48323 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for Spain.
      • CARDS-51938 [Risk management] Excluded technical operations from Risk Rule usage limiter processing. Technical operations are operations where transaction type and service class are not filled.
      • CARDS-52269 [Notifications] If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not created.
      • CARDS-52323 [Invoice management] Fixed error when cross-balance macrotransactions created by a standing order were not linked to the document.
      • CARDS-52384 [Core] A new API has been added, acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT_EXT. The API extends acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT with the ClientCategory input parameter. Both APIs acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT(_EXT) now have different RetCode/RetMsg error values: 1/Client not found 2/Too many Clients were found 3/Client number conversion error 100/Internal error ORA-xxxxxx For the old acnt_api.SEARCH_CLIENT API, search results have changed. If more than one client was found, the API returns null as ClientID and an error in RetCode.
      • CARDS-52808 [WAY4 Web] In WAY4 Web added check of client privileges to access uploaded files and merchant tree contracts.
      • CARDS-52860 [Statistical Reports] The "Account Balances" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report has been corrected: - Corrected calculation of 'Credit Outstanding Balance Total' and 'Current Credit Outstanding Balance' amount when the P_MIRROR_OVD parameter value is 'Y'. - Changed row order to fit AMEX specification requirements. - Delinquency group's rows are shown with zero values if there are no corresponding data.
      • CARDS-52966 [NSPK interface] The menu branch "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR. Details" (with all menu items) and menu items "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Notification Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Acknowledgement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Results (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Submission Report (briefly)" have been moved to "OpenWay\MIR\MIR. Reports\" menu branch.
      • CARDS-52983 [DB kernel] Fixed the possibility of infinite loop on BER-TLV tag parsing.
      • CARDS-52989 [VISA interface] VISA BII Outward Processing: fixed creating and sending card-related Fee Collection/Funds Disbursement transactions.
      • CARDS-52990 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect processing of new authentication data elements for schemes that were created before authentication type modification.
      • CARDS-52997 [Product management] FX_RATE tag calculation has been fixed for DCC Info Inquire documents, when DCC_FX_MODE=CR, and IPS currency differs from Merchant and CH currency.
      • CARDS-53012 [Issuing] In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report, default values are calculated for the P_FORALLCURR, P_LANGUAGE, and P_AMOUNTS_SIGN parameters even if the P_CONNID parameter is not set.
      • CARDS-53020 [Diners Club interface] DCI DXS Inward Processing. Fixed NullPointerException in case of transactions with addendums without date fields.
      • CARDS-53036 [Core] Behaviour of the FIRST_BILLING and MIN_BILLING=C tags has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-53039 [Core] Problem when no changes occurred after using the "Change" button in the "Attached Tariff Domains" form has been fixed.
      • CARDS-53077 [Distributed processing] Fixed chip card requests processing on a High Availability primary node after authorization processing was switched to a secondary node.
      • CARDS-53086 [Mobile banking] Resolved the issue with empty invoice details with special characters in Mobile Banking.
      • CARDS-53095 [NSPK interface] NSPK Interface: posting date is used instead of transaction date to calculate ARN.
      • CARDS-53107 [Money transfers] Routing search is performed either by member_id if filled, or by PAN.
      • CARDS-53113 [Instalment management] Fixed parsing of the "E2.E1 BERTLV" tag that contains an instalment interest rate.
      • CARDS-53164 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed TOKEN_BIN tag filling in BIN Table.
      • CARDS-53167 [Money transfers] Changed population of the CSOF tag (Source of Funds) for Money Transfers to a Visa card from the card of another IPS according to Visa requirements. Now the "06" value is returned for Credit accounts, and the "05" value is returned for Debit/deposit access accounts.
      • CARDS-53169 [Product management] spac.RESET_INTEREST has been enhanced for custom cases, when Interest Rate should be changed from the Billing cycle start date after holidays, if Interest Rate should be changed in a custom procedure after a new billing cycle starts.
      • CARDS-53170 [Tariff management] Service limit tariffs with preference based on Issuer country (Area) can now be used for source services.
      • CARDS-53177 [AMEX interface] Merchant Management: Fixed processing of incomplete operations.
      • CARDS-53182 [Tariff management] To apply a Tax Tariff according to its own Date From instead of an Interest Tariff apply mode's From Billing Start, set the tag TAX_APPLY_MODE=OWN; in the Tax Tariff apply rules.
      • CARDS-53185 [Application management] Resolved issue: now Advanced Applications R1 for AuthMethod modification does not take into account closed authentication schemes.
      • CARDS-53210 [Distributed processing] Removed unexpected call of document reprocessing when routing a message in the Distributed Processing solution.
      • CARDS-53211 [AMEX interface] Date_Expire and Card_Expire contract dates are now considered in calculation of the "Account Balance" section of the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53214 [Transaction management] Fixed incorrect filling of source and target number fields for chargeback documents if the message contains EMV cryptogram data.
      • CARDS-53216 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed "Settlement Data doesn't contain settlement amounts" error.
      • CARDS-53218 [Product management] Changed the value displayed in the "Total Due" field in the "ROOT\OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service" form. Previously, the field showed the current due amount. Now the total due amount is displayed.
      • CARDS-53221 [Issuing authorisation] Decreased possibility of deadlock when several authorization requests for one card are received at the same time.
      • I1612096107 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-52844] IC Document Export: fixed "An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x1a) was found" error when exporting a document containing special characters. Invalid symbols are replaced with the "?" character in an outgoing file.
      • I1703281144 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53100] DA v2: Added checking that data in the document add_info field is properly terminated with a semicolon for documents that are manually edited. If not, a semicolon will be added to the end of the add_info field.
      • I1704101944; I1704113625 [Accounting] [CARDS-53090] The menu "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Generate Message Dictionary" shows errors if TRANS_TYPE checks failed.
      • I1704121197 [Core] [CARDS-52967] Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created on February 28 of any non-leap year has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.
      • I1704134961 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52826] Downgraded transaction MasterCard attributes in a financial confirmation are inherited from the preauthorization document.
      • I1704173799 [Issuing] [CARDS-53010] Added a new parameter, P_HINT_Q5, varchar2(255), to the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report. The default value is "/*+rule*/". The parameter makes it possible to change the hint instruction for Q_5 query used for selecting acnt_contracts.
      • I1705038641 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-53109] Eliminated the possibility for incorrect rejection of reversal for a partial approved request due to a different transaction amount.
      • I1705088151 [VISA interface] [CARDS-53212] VISA BASE II Outward (pipe) : fixed incorrect inheritance for second export of 1st presentment.
      • I1705098865 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53158] AMEX DAF Import. Fixed rare error due to checking unhandled messages.
      • I1705101042 [DB kernel] [CARDS-53222] Fixed event messages display in the "Messages" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types).
      • I1705154150 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53184] MasterCard PVV Offset Export. Fixed error if no data to export.
      • CARDS-53176 [Web banking] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Lifestyle Banking section has been updated (information about play.id and %padss.application.mode=prod has been added).
      • CARDS-51958 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): supported new G2C transaction processing.
      • CARDS-52972 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Pipe switched to CDF3 Schema Version 16.01.00.00.
      • CARDS-53064 [Diners Club interface] DCI Issuer Detail File Import. Supported creating clearing documents. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Issuer Detail File Inward Processing is used to load issuer clearing and settlements. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing has been removed.
      • CARDS-53067 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward Processing. Added Addendum Type Code to Message Code in Original Doc table to differentiate transactions with Deferred Payment Plan addendum.
      • CARDS-53131 [VISA interface] VISA BII Inward Processing: supported custom processing for TCRD records. If a TCRD record is present in an incoming transaction, it can be processed by the CUST_INS_DOC procedure.
      • ICFEE- 107 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52986] RA configuration has been modified for fallback transactions in Europe.
    • 03.45.29.10
      • CARDS-52784 [Product management] Added a new global parameter CHECK_OPEN_APPL_CASE. The parameter with the "Y" value checks open application cases for a contract when the CLOSE_IF_EMPTY event tag checks open cases for the contract. The default value is "N".
      • CARDS-53001 [Core] New data have been added for gathering CMS statistics: - in the "CONTRACT_GROUP" group added new tags: "IS_RELATED" and "REL_TYPE". - added a new group, "REL_TYPES".
      • CARDS-53044 [Instalment management] Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.
      • CARDS-53023 [Transaction management] Fixed matching of a transit authorization with a financial presentment from an external channel on the sponsor side.
      • CARDS-53031 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected CHANGE_PIN processing on IRouter for combo-cards
      • I1704211939 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53054] PS Ref Number equality is no longer mandatory for matching an authorization with a financial presentment, it is only used to define priority if several authorizations are found.
      • I1704245616 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-53038] IRD criteria of contactless transactions have been revised in the MEA region according to the MasterCard Interchange manual.
      • I1704264344 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52981] When searching for an authorization document for a financial presentment by RRN, no time period limitations are applied. In other search cases, the period is extended to 10 days.
      • I1705030725 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53058] When an authorization and financial presentment have different transaction types, the transaction direction is additionally checked. If the direction differs, documents are not matched.
      • CARDS-53004 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the allow_multiple_user_sessions parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53005 [Security & key management] Interactive channels API: a requirement for the value of the csrf_protection parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "true" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53006 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement to not disclose private IP addresses has been added in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53007 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement for the value of the session_expiry_sec parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "300" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53008 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the debug_enabled parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53009 [WAY4 Web] WAY4 Web: a requirement for the value of the EnableDeveloperInfo parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53033 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1005.
      • CARDS-53040 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1004.
      • CARDS-53047 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 701 as a chip code for AMEX.
    • 03.45.20.01
      • CARDS-53201 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added the ability to redefine card numbers for some accounts on export for mixed company structure. The prefixes of these accounts must be listed in the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" pipe parameter value, separated by commas. The new pipe parameter, "CUST_GET_CARD_NUMBER" must contain an SQL expression which returns the redefined card number value.
      • CARDS-53195 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export. Fixed Billing File records generation.
      • CARDS-53226 [Reversal management] Generation of corrections in intelligent backdated processing has been improved. When a liability tree is processed, corrections will be generated for transfers between Main/Sub trees in the liability hierarchy. Additionally corrections can now be generated for transfers to not amount available accounts, this feature can be enabled by setting the STORNO_NOT_AMAV_CORRECTIONS global parameter to "Y".
      • CARDS-53238 [VISA interface] Th P_ORDER_AGED_ANALYSIS parameter has been deleted from the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53270 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import. Supported creating settlement documents for Fee Collection/ Funds Disbursements (FCP file).
      • CARDS-53283 [Core] Each ITEM_DUE is now processed separately in Acquiring products configuration. Previously, using a Due Type other then Value Days Due could cause a collapse of several ITEM_DUE with different signs, leading to incorrect information in Merchant Statement reports.
      • CARDS-53291 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed the inability to redefine the PARTIAL_APPROVAL_ENABLE property in Services or transaction subtypes.
      • CARDS-53334 [NSPK interface] NSPK Processing (pipes): fixed incorrect processing for PDS-0176 and PDS-0190 for AMEX.
      • I1704187095 [Product management] [CARDS-53269] Usage limiter's end date calculation has been enhanced for usage limiters with Period Type = Billing for sub-contracts.
      • I1705221304 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53272] IPS Products. Updated according to last NSPK specification.
      • CARDS-51624 [Dispute assistant] MasterCard Transaction Management. A warning message and opening a "CHBK_FRAUD_COUNTER" Event have be added for cases when the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded. DA v2. Create Chargeback activity can't be performed if the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded.
      • CARDS-53265 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward. Supported empty chargeback gross settlement amount for certification.
      • CARDS-53268 [JCB interface] JCB Outward: for all chip read transactions the "C" value is exported in 22.7 subfield.
      • CARDS-53277 [NSPK interface] Affiliated BII Outward Processing (pipe) : supported export of NSPK G2C Credit transactions.
    • 03.45.19.20
      • CARDS-53014 [Issuing authorisation] An online credit repeat message will not increase the amount available when it is received on an HA solution secondary node.
      • CARDS-46540 [Product management] Due normalization has been improved for Issuing accounts with Due Types: Payment Due, Long Payment Due, Contract Due, Fixed Day Due. If several due items with the same Due Date exist for an account, then only one Due transfer will be performed for the total Due Amount.
      • CARDS-49243 [VISA interface] An equal condition is used to count the number of accounts in the "Total Outstanding" line of the "Aged Analysis of Total Outstanding" section, and "Number of Accounts" line of the "Card Issuance" section in the "QMR VISA Statistics Issuing" report.
      • CARDS-52827 [Accounting] Supported configuration of the "Cardholder_Account_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports using Date Schemes.
      • CARDS-53163 [DB manager] Fixed inability to add elements to several Exception Lists (OpenWay\Risk Based Assessment\Exception lists) without reopening the sub-form.
      • CARDS-53167 [Money transfers] Changed population of the CSOF tag (Source of Funds) for Money Transfers to a Visa card from the card of another IPS according to Visa requirements. Now the "06" value is returned for Credit accounts, and the "05" value is returned for Debit/deposit access accounts.
      • CARDS-53170 [Tariff management] Service limit tariffs with preference based on Issuer country (Area) can now be used for source services.
      • CARDS-53177 [AMEX interface] Merchant Management: Fixed processing of incomplete operations.
      • CARDS-53182 [Tariff management] To apply a Tax Tariff according to its own Date From instead of an Interest Tariff apply mode's From Billing Start, set the tag TAX_APPLY_MODE=OWN; in the Tax Tariff apply rules.
      • CARDS-53193 [Transaction management] Correct funds unblocking is supported for multiple financial presentments and multiple authorizations in different currencies for one transaction chain. In this case, the new pending amount is calculated as the difference between all authorizations pending (without fees) and the financial presentment settlement amount converted into the contract currency. Then it is accumulated under the first matched authorization. The pending value for the initial authorization is stored in the document add_info tags BLK_BASE, BLK_FEE, BLK_CURR.
      • CARDS-53205 [Diners Club interface] Supported General order category to retrieve data for Merchant Registration. DCI Russia Merchant Management.
      • CARDS-53210 [Distributed processing] Removed unexpected call of document reprocessing when routing a message in the Distributed Processing solution.
      • CARDS-53211 [AMEX interface] Date_Expire and Card_Expire contract dates are now considered in calculation of the "Account Balance" section of the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53214 [Transaction management] Fixed incorrect filling of source and target number fields for chargeback documents if the message contains EMV cryptogram data.
      • CARDS-53216 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed "Settlement Data doesn't contain settlement amounts" error.
      • CARDS-53218 [Product management] Changed the value displayed in the "Total Due" field in the "ROOT\OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service" form. Previously, the field showed the current due amount. Now the total due amount is displayed.
      • CARDS-53221 [Issuing authorisation] Decreased possibility of deadlock when several authorization requests for one card are received at the same time.
      • CARDS-53251 [Issuing authorisation] Changed behaviour: now processing of authorization documents with service class Transaction, Online Payment or External Payment will change a contract's counter for authorization code generation independently of the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter value.
      • I1704041217 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53192] MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward. The pipe no longer fills DE93.
      • I1705088151 [VISA interface] [CARDS-53212] VISA BASE II Outward (pipe) : fixed incorrect inheritance for second export of 1st presentment.
      • I1705099074 [CB Gate] [CARDS-53246] Fixed incorrect processing of CBGate balance loading when the last transaction linked to the balance was delivered to CBS by SAF.
      • I1705101042 [DB kernel] [CARDS-53222] Fixed event messages display in the "Messages" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types).
      • I1705154150 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53184] MasterCard PVV Offset Export. Fixed error if no data to export.
      • CARDS-53176 [Web banking] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Lifestyle Banking section has been updated (information about play.id and %padss.application.mode=prod has been added).
      • CARDS-53149 [Diners Club interface] DCI Merchant Management. Supported DCI International Merchant Registration.
    • 03.45.19.17
      • CARDS-53053 [Instalment management] Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.
      • CARDS-52860 [Statistical Reports] The "Account Balances" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report has been corrected: - Corrected calculation of 'Credit Outstanding Balance Total' and 'Current Credit Outstanding Balance' amount when the P_MIRROR_OVD parameter value is 'Y'. - Changed row order to fit AMEX specification requirements. - Delinquency group's rows are shown with zero values if there are no corresponding data.
      • CARDS-53107 [Money transfers] Routing search is performed either by member_id if filled, or by PAN.
      • CARDS-53113 [Instalment management] Fixed parsing of the "E2.E1 BERTLV" tag that contains an instalment interest rate.
      • CARDS-53164 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed TOKEN_BIN tag filling in BIN Table.
      • CARDS-53169 [Product management] spac.RESET_INTEREST has been enhanced for custom cases, when Interest Rate should be changed from the Billing cycle start date after holidays, if Interest Rate should be changed in a custom procedure after a new billing cycle starts.
      • I1703022929 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52560] MasterCard Transaction Processing: Added message codes for Retrieval Request Reversal.
      • I1704101944; I1704113625 [Accounting] [CARDS-53090] The menu "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Generate Message Dictionary" shows errors if TRANS_TYPE checks failed.
      • I1705038641 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-53109] Eliminated the possibility for incorrect rejection of reversal for a partial approved request due to a different transaction amount.
      • I1705098865 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53158] AMEX DAF Import. Fixed rare error due to checking unhandled messages.
      • CARDS-53064 [Diners Club interface] DCI Issuer Detail File Import. Supported creating clearing documents. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Issuer Detail File Inward Processing is used to load issuer clearing and settlements. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing has been removed.
      • CARDS-53131 [VISA interface] VISA BII Inward Processing: supported custom processing for TCRD records. If a TCRD record is present in an incoming transaction, it can be processed by the CUST_INS_DOC procedure.
    • 03.45.19.16
      • CARDS-48323 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for Spain.
      • CARDS-53031 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected CHANGE_PIN processing on IRouter for combo-cards
      • CARDS-53036 [Core] Behaviour of the FIRST_BILLING and MIN_BILLING=C tags has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-53039 [Core] Problem when no changes occurred after using the "Change" button in the "Attached Tariff Domains" form has been fixed.
      • CARDS-53077 [Distributed processing] Fixed chip card requests processing on a High Availability primary node after authorization processing was switched to a secondary node.
      • CARDS-53086 [Mobile banking] Resolved the issue with empty invoice details with special characters in Mobile Banking.
      • CARDS-53095 [NSPK interface] NSPK Interface: posting date is used instead of transaction date to calculate ARN.
      • I1703281144 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53100] DA v2: Added checking that data in the document add_info field is properly terminated with a semicolon for documents that are manually edited. If not, a semicolon will be added to the end of the add_info field.
      • I1704211939 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53054] PS Ref Number equality is no longer mandatory for matching an authorization with a financial presentment, it is only used to define priority if several authorizations are found.
      • I1704245616 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-53038] IRD criteria of contactless transactions have been revised in the MEA region according to the MasterCard Interchange manual.
      • I1704264344 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52981] When searching for an authorization document for a financial presentment by RRN, no time period limitations are applied. In other search cases, the period is extended to 10 days.
      • I1705030725 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53058] When an authorization and financial presentment have different transaction types, the transaction direction is additionally checked. If the direction differs, documents are not matched.
      • CARDS-53004 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the allow_multiple_user_sessions parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53005 [Security & key management] Interactive channels API: a requirement for the value of the csrf_protection parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "true" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53006 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement to not disclose private IP addresses has been added in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53007 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement for the value of the session_expiry_sec parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "300" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53008 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the debug_enabled parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53009 [WAY4 Web] WAY4 Web: a requirement for the value of the EnableDeveloperInfo parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-51958 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): supported new G2C transaction processing.
      • CARDS-52972 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Pipe switched to CDF3 Schema Version 16.01.00.00.
      • CARDS-53033 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1005.
      • CARDS-53040 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1004.
      • CARDS-53047 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 701 as a chip code for AMEX.
      • CARDS-53067 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward Processing. Added Addendum Type Code to Message Code in Original Doc table to differentiate transactions with Deferred Payment Plan addendum.
    • 03.45.19.15
      • CARDS-52073 [Instalment management] New menu "OpenWay\Partner Management" has been added to create and manage partner contracts.
      • CARDS-52728 [Statistical Reports] Added grouping of totals by regions in the "BILLINGS & FEES" section of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • CARDS-52795 [Automated routines] The Standard Evening Contract Daily Update process has been renamed from "Contr Daily Update2" to "Contr Daily Update Evening". In the Upgrade procedure, process parameters are automatically updated for "Contr Daily Update Evening" in the form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Process Parameters.
      • CARDS-52931 [POS management] Now we store local transaction date time received from "Device H2H" to Document transaction Date.
      • CARDS-52944 [Product management] Product Min/Max/Default credit limit amounts can be specified by threshold tariffs.
      • CARDS-52973 [Issuing] The U_PBT_BY_TOKEN=N parameter should be added to disable unlocking renewed plastic by authorisations initiated by a token.
