      • CARDS-52269 [Notifications] If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not created.
      • CARDS-52323 [Invoice management] Fixed error when cross-balance macrotransactions created by a standing order were not linked to the document.
      • CARDS-52662 [Core] Reversal transactions have been excluded from the XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf report.
      • CARDS-52749 [Product inspector] Fixed generation of the message "I Temporary credit limit closed" during the "Close Temporary Limit" Product Inspector step. Also, it is not necessary to set the "CLOSE_CR_LIMIT" value for the "Action Code" field to close the Temporary Limit.
      • CARDS-52808 [WAY4 Web] In WAY4 Web added check of client privileges to access uploaded files and merchant tree contracts.
      • CARDS-52939 [Dispute assistant] Dispute Assistant v2. Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain.
      • CARDS-52942 [Dispute assistant] Fixed posting of secondary documents, now when an optional document is reversed, the previous document status is not restored.
      • CARDS-52966 [NSPK interface] The menu branch "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR. Details" (with all menu items) and menu items "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Notification Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Acknowledgement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Results (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Submission Report (briefly)" have been moved to "OpenWay\MIR\MIR. Reports\" menu branch.
      • CARDS-52983 [DB kernel] Fixed the possibility of infinite loop on BER-TLV tag parsing.
      • CARDS-52989 [VISA interface] VISA BII Outward Processing: fixed creating and sending card-related Fee Collection/Funds Disbursement transactions.
      • CARDS-52990 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect processing of new authentication data elements for schemes that were created before authentication type modification.
      • CARDS-52997 [Product management] FX_RATE tag calculation has been fixed for DCC Info Inquire documents, when DCC_FX_MODE=CR, and IPS currency differs from Merchant and CH currency.
      • CARDS-53012 [Issuing] In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report, default values are calculated for the P_FORALLCURR, P_LANGUAGE, and P_AMOUNTS_SIGN parameters even if the P_CONNID parameter is not set.
      • CARDS-53020 [Diners Club interface] DCI DXS Inward Processing. Fixed NullPointerException in case of transactions with addendums without date fields.
      • CARDS-53023 [Transaction management] Fixed matching of a transit authorization with a financial presentment from an external channel on the sponsor side.
      • I1612096107 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-52844] IC Document Export: fixed "An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x1a) was found" error when exporting a document containing special characters. Invalid symbols are replaced with the "?" character in an outgoing file.
      • I1702270914 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-52869] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed export of last adjustment, which reverses transaction completely.
      • I1704076451 [Notifications] [CARDS-52945] When an attempt is made to open a MTR_FIN_REVERSE Event, a check is made of whether an Event with the "AUTH_T_R" or "AUTH_P_R" code was opened earlier. If one of these Events was opened, the Event with the "MTR_FIN_REVERSE" code will not be opened.
      • I1704121197 [Core] [CARDS-52967] Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created on February 28 of any non-leap year has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.
      • I1704134961 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52826] Downgraded transaction MasterCard attributes in a financial confirmation are inherited from the preauthorization document.
      • I1704173799 [Issuing] [CARDS-53010] Added a new parameter, P_HINT_Q5, varchar2(255), to the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report. The default value is "/*+rule*/". The parameter makes it possible to change the hint instruction for Q_5 query used for selecting acnt_contracts.
      • I1704174163 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52971] Fixed reversed advice macrotransaction status if reversal is processed for a transaction that has not been posted and the value of the global parameter POST_REVERSED_MTR is 'N'.
      • I1704189347 [Core] [CARDS-52998] Fixed double fee charging in issuing contracts for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT is used in basic transaction service setup) when the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.
      • I1704245840 [Tariff management] [CARDS-52943] The "No data found" exception error has been fixed during Advanced Application R1 file processing for Personal Usage Activation, in case of Limit Tariff in usage template.
      • CARDS-51805 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MPE Import: Supported loading new MPE tables IP0105T1 and IP0106T1 and new fields in IP0040T1 and IP0041T1 according to Global 566 in MasterCard Release 17.Q2.
      • CARDS-52936 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward Processing. Supported the ability to transfer data from PDS1000, PDS1001, PDS1003, PDS1004, PDS1005, PDS1006, PDS1012, PDS1014 to document.
      • ICFEE- 107 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52986] RA configuration has been modified for fallback transactions in Europe.
    • 03.45.19.14
      • CARDS-52781 [Application management] Added a new field, "WF Operation" to "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Workflow Configuration\Activities" to define application workflow status after performing an activity: "To Closed" or "To Open". For a standard strategy it's recommended to set this field to "To Closed" for "Accept" and "Decline" activities and to "To Open" for "Approve" and "Capture and Edit Application" activities. "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Close Posted Applications" allows workflow to be closed for all posted and declined applications when the workflow configuration is changed.
      • CARDS-52834 [Reversal management] The ability has been added to properly recalculate contract state with correction documents for fees and interest in intelligent backdated processing. Correction transaction types should be marked using the STORNO_DELAY tag with the "Y" value if a fee is posted in Contracts Daily Update with the preceding date and "N" if a fee is posted in Contracts Daily Update with the current date.
      • CARDS-52841 [Issuing authorisation] Added the "Authentication Domains" and "Authentication Types" forms to the menu branch "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products" and the "Authentication for cards" form to "OpenWay\Issuing\Contracts Input & Update".
      • CARDS-52890 [Host2Host interface] IC Documents Export: added a new pipe parameter, "USE_EXT_FILE_COUNTER". When the "Y" value is set (default value is "N"), a sequence generated by the DB is used for file numbering.
      • CARDS-52897 [Case management] Added Scheduled and Deadline Dates configuration verification into Case Management Activity approval process.
      • CARDS-52908 [Application management] The "Tariff Role" field has been added to Advanced Application R2 monitoring forms.
      • CARDS-52921 VISA/MasterCard: The following menu items have been deleted: - "OpenWay\VISA\VISA. Daily Procedures\VISA. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\OLD Remove Visa Inactive BIN's" - "OpenWay\VISA\VISA. Daily Procedures\VISA. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\OLD VISA Domestic BIN Split" - "OpenWay\VISA\VISA. Daily Procedures\VISA. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\OLD Load VISA & PLUS BIN Table" - "OpenWay\VISA\VISA. Daily Procedures\VISA. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\VISA. Special\OLD Load VISA & PLUS BIN Table (Keep Old Groups)" - "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Daily Procedures\MC. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\OLD Load MPE Daily Files" - "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Daily Procedures\MC. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\OLD Load MPE Daily Files with Conversion" - "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Daily Procedures\MC. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\MC. Full Replacement\OLD Load MPE BIN Table" - "OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Daily Procedures\MC. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\MC. Full Replacement\OLD Load MPE Replacement Files"
      • I1612082576 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52928] VISA BASEII Outward Processing (pipe): changed the logic for filling the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168). Now the default value of the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is "Y" instead of "N". If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "Y", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) will be filled with doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE field, if doc.TARGET_FEE_CODE is null, this field will be filled automatically by the pipe itself. Please review VISA services settings or if Fee Prediction is used, set up WAY4 according to the "VISA_RA_Configuration" manual. If the REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE parameter is set to "N", the "Reimbursement Attribute" field (TCx5 TCR 0 pos 168) is always calculated by the pipe itself. If the latter behaviour is needed, the parameter REIMB_ATTR_FROM_SERVICE = "N" should be set in the pipe.
      • CARDS-52027 [Transaction management] A financial document will not be matched with an authorization that has a different "PS Reference Number".
      • CARDS-52395 [Transaction management] Functionality missing in 03.44 for linking a financial document to a matched preauthorization document has been restored. If a financial document received in back-office from an OnUs source, is matched with a preauthorization document during the document processing procedure, the preauthorization document's identifier is stored in the financial document's add_info field as the value of the "PREAUTH_ID" tag. System identifiers that a document was received from an OnUs source when at least one of the following conditions is met: 1. A document Source Channel is indicated with the parameter IsOnUs=Yes or IsOnUs=null in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Message Channels". 2. A document Source Member Id value is null or is marked in the BIN Table with the "CAN_BE_ONUS;" tag or the value is registered as "Acq BIN" in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Bank Acquiring Parameters" used for own acquiring configuration, or a financial institution is registered for this Member ID value in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Financial Institutions".
      • CARDS-52868 [Transaction management] Fixed funds unblocking in the case of multiple authorizations with multiple presentments.
      • CARDS-52871 [Acquiring authorisation] Fixed an error with matching recurring transactions
      • CARDS-52893 [Core] New tags MIN_BAL_TYPE_SIGN/MAX_BAL_TYPE_SIGN have been supported for use together with MIN_BAL_TYPE/MAX_BAL_TYPE and LIMIT_AMOUNT tags.
      • CARDS-52899 [Acquiring authorisation] Optimized the query to select the main document for processing post authorization operations for P2P transactions.
      • CARDS-52909 [Core] The extra letter "E" has been removed from combined error messages.
      • CARDS-52915 [Authentication management] The "OFFICER" scope has been added to validation conditions for an authentication scheme linked to a consumer record.
      • CARDS-52926 [Product management] Product approval has been changed, "Product Renew Mode" form has been added.
      • CARDS-52934 [Transaction management] Fixed error on adjustment document posting if the original authorization was deleted by the Housekeeping process.
      • I1611299904 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51699] Added transfer destination identification type to the procedure for creating a document by a payment order to allow the use of other contract identifiers in addition to PAN.
      • I1704121217, I1704192844 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52867] Optimised the procedure for posting macrotransactions for reversal and adjustment documents if the value of the additional global parameter PATCH_REVERSE_INTEREST is set to "Y".
      • I1704135142 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52903] A financial document will not be matched with an authorization of a different transaction type even if the reference numbers are the same.
      • I1704192981. Wrong IC for new visa B2B Virtual Payments (ICFEE-178) [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52895] Modified RA configuration for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).
      • I1704206572 [Core] [CARDS-52902] Fixed excessive creation of subcontracts on contract approve when a sub-product is configured with "# of contracts" greater than zero and filled relation fields.
      • I1704207687 [Core] [CARDS-52889] Performance of the Renew Account Scheme Changes procedure has been improved when the system validates the payment priority algorithm for an upper limit template.
      • I1704243534 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52916] Fixed "No Data Found" error during authorisation processing if contr_subtype.bin_record is invalid.
      • CARDS-52785 [Data preparation and card personalization] Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "List of Third-Party Software Used, System Services and Protocols Used" has been changed. Added a warning that the mod_security component is an essential part of the application with regard to security.
      • CARDS-52786 [Issuing] Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "Specifying Sensitive Data" has been changed. Added a warning that the system cannot function normally without the PVV and Encrypted PIN fields.
      • CARDS-52807 [Security & key management] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "Encryption and Protected Protocols for Data Transmission" has been changed. Added a warning that when the TLS 1.2 protocol is used, encryption using the RC4 algorithm must be disabled.
      • CARDS-52884 [Security & key management] Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". Full review for PA DSS 3.2 compliance (03.42.3.x, 03.43.3.x, 03.44.3.x).
      • CARDS-52896 [MasterCard interface] Prepared MasterCard IRD configuration based on FULL MPE (Release 17Q2).
      • I1704129157 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-52876] DCI MPE (Sys Ops XML File) Import: Supported loading Product Id, Account Funding Source and Product Category fields in BIN Table. Added DCI products to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).
    • 03.45.19.13
      • CARDS-52806 [Issuing] "MIR" Contactless cards issuing is supported in WAY4.
      • CARDS-52634 [Core] Added a new menu item, "OpenWay\Full\Daily Procedures\Consistency Points". In the standard configuration it makes it possible to trace calls of the standard "Close GL Entries" process. This is important as all GL entries generated on the previous banking day after closing GL will be registered in "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\GL\GL Trace Exceptions". In configurations with the Datamart interface this menu item will also show Datamart-related consistency points.
      • CARDS-52782 [Issuing authorisation] "Credit_History.closed" field value is now equal to sysdate for declined authorization documents.
      • CARDS-52825 [Issuing authorisation] Added funds transfer transaction for core banking system (payments with IBAN can be sent to the CBS interface).
      • CARDS-52836 [Authentication management] Authentication schemes are now created with consideration of the SCOPE parameter value.
      • CARDS-52843 [e-Commerce acquiring] Added index for TD_DOC table.
      • CARDS-52858 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected Message Type codes for authorisation check messages for the Transaction Switch IRouter service.
      • I1603049137 [Issuing] [CARDS-52810] Added the tags DF1A "MCA Cnt1 Ctrl Contact", DF1E "MCA Cnt2 Ctrl C-less", DF1D "MCA Cnt2 Ctrl Contact", and DF1B "MCA Cnt1 Ctrl C-less" to the chip scheme template "MCHIP Advance Generic CVR 1.x".
      • CARDS-52041 [Core] Additional validation has been added for NSPK report parameters in "Financial Institutions" .
      • CARDS-52609 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf" report: 1. Changed the default value of the P_V_PAY_BRAND_NAME parameter from "V PAY" to "V_V". 2. Supported the ability to configure additional groups in SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Merchant Category Group Data" and "Contactless" sections. 3. Added new parameter P_SIC_GROUP_CNTCLS_CLASS_TYPE for configuring data groups in the "Contactless" section. 3. Excluded "V PAY" transactions from the "Merchant Category Group Data" section when P_CEMEA = 'N'.
      • CARDS-52722 [Datamart] The following menu items have been renamed: OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Lock DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Lock Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Release DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Release Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Lock DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Lock Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Release DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Release Datamart Mapping The OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface menu branch is only provided to customers with the corresponding license. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact changes" section for more details.
      • CARDS-52803 [Transaction management] A new global parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL has been added. The new parameter is used for all transactions except those with hotel, car rental or airline MCC codes, for which the existing parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT is used. This parameter can set the maximum difference between authorization and financial presentment amounts as a percentage. If the difference is below this value, the whole blocked amount will be unblocked, otherwise only the financial amount will be unblocked.
      • CARDS-52809 [Transaction management] Fixed funds unblocking when multiple presentments for one authorization are posted in an order different from accept order.
      • CARDS-52815 [Core] Fixed lengthy execution of the approve process for related acquiring contracts.
      • CARDS-52818 [Acquiring] The OpenWay\Acquiring\Terminal Suspicious Keys menu has been deleted. The same form exists in the OpenWay\Acquiring\Device Keys Usage Monitor menu.
      • CARDS-52821 [CB Gate] Fixed incorrect document posting status when the fee is waived by the CBS.
      • CARDS-52824 [Risk management] Restored the ability to recalculate usage limiter counters for acquiring. Testing - Usage Recalculation.
      • CARDS-52833 [Transaction management] Fixed definition of terminal category to search for target dispute contract in posting history documents.
      • CARDS-52848 [Issuing] Fixed use of the P_IS_IMPERSONAL parameter for the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.
      • CARDS-52877 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect chip request processing on a High Availability secondary node when the response contains empty issuer script.
      • I1701174900 [Data preparation and card personalization] [CARDS-52797] Corrected behaviour when the system wasn't able to upload DF3C and DF3D tags to a personalization file.
      • I1701241115 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52853] Optimized search for authorization documents when multiple authorizations are allowed.
      • I1703076137 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52813] Updated license validation for C2C to an affiliated channel. Affiliate OnUs transactions will not require IPS license setup. The correct routing configuration is as follows: Affiliate should be specified as card BIN Group Channel and the BIN Table channel should indicate IPS.
      • I1703249728 [Application management] [CARDS-52849] Resolved issue with missing base relation for a new non-product based related contract during accept of an advanced application R2.
      • I1704055286 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-52802] In the customer service "CSS.Client" form, which can be called from OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service -> [Client], the "Service Group" field from the contract has been replaced with the "Service Group" field from the client.
      • I1704188903 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52865] Fixed incorrect matching between Authorization and Financial documents that have the same Transaction Amount and no PS Ref Number reference specified, from merchants who support multiple authorization processing.
      • I1704204444 [Issuing] [CARDS-52880] Fixed definition of IPS Product for MasterCard subtypes.
      • I1703036213 [Security & key management] [CARDS-52262] Changed incorrect reference to nscipher.exe to the correct <APP_SERVER>\appserver\bin\tools\nscipher.exe in "PA DSS Implementation Guide".
      • CARDS-51488 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of ONUS/Affiliated fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-51490 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of unsuccessful authorization fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-51892 [Acquiring authorisation] Voice Authorization Screen application is compatible with Oracle 12c.
      • CARDS-52545 [AMEX interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:AMEX GNS Outward Processing.cpp).
      • CARDS-52832 [JCB interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:JCB. Outward Processing.cpp).
    • 03.45.19.12
      • WFCKF-3469 [High availability] [CARDS-51788] Fixed differences between synched ACCOUNT table in Primary and Secondary nodes.
      • CARDS-50351 [NSPK interface] CH Payment Trans Type: Changed subtypes for "Our MIR Cards" and "MIR Cards". Now the "Fee Algorithm Options" field contains "SIC=6536;PTID_C06=6012;ACQ_ONLINE=Y;".
      • CARDS-52536 [Core] The "Liab Category" field has been made available for editing in the Device Contract form. On contract Approve, if the value in the "Liab Category" field from the Product and the value from the current contract are different, the corresponding message with the text "Switch Liability Category to <>" will be generated in the Process Log for this contract.
      • CARDS-52732 [Reversal management] Due tolerance configuration is now supported in backdated payment processing in the Reversal Management module. Maximum tolerance supported period is 10 days. In common cases it is recommended to use backdated payments instead of due tolerance setup.
      • CARDS-52752 [Issuing authorisation] When a PIN is changed after marking a card for reproduction but before receiving a reproduction results file, the new PIN value is also written to the new plastic record.
      • CARDS-52762 [CB Gate] Fixed BerTLV buffers parsing in Application Interface.
      • CARDS-52766 [Core] Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-52768 [Transaction management] Document Processing has been fixed to support matching between Financial and Auhtorization/Transit Authorization documents received from different sources.
      • CARDS-52771 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed frequent rereading of ADD_GLOBAL_PARMS on authorisation.
      • CARDS-52774 [Application management] Client AddOrUpdate Application R2 checks the existence of a client in accordance with the additional global parameters UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_NUMBER and UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_REG_NUMBER.
      • CARDS-52798 [Fee Prediction] UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed the channel in the OpenWay\UPI Fee Prediction\UPI IRF Criteria form.
      • CARDS-52800 [VISA interface] Optimized getCardHolderVerificationMethodsReq query for VDEP.
      • I1610179670 [Core] [CARDS-50722] Added reset of environment variables (global parameters, cached data when posting events, contracts, etc.) when a session is initialized.
      • I1702105338 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52777] Fixed creation of duplicate Retail Reimbursements in DA R2: For write-off of a dispute case with a presentment for "No Such Card", if a reimbursement (in this case, write-off of the presentment) is created manually, it won't be created automatically by the standard dispute case write-off procedure.
      • I1702160876, I1704098675 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52727] Fixed Member Id definition for online routing. The change affects instances which route online messages by Member Id on NetServer/Transaction Switch.
      • I1702210692 [Application management] [CARDS-52621] Fixed issue: now Advanced Application R2 to change the client for a contract doesn't inherit the client type from the new client if it belongs to another financial institution.
      • I1703138261 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52801] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now documents with an invalid Approval Code will be suspended. MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward: Now if a document has an invalid Approval Code, this Approval Code won't be exported.
      • I1703201358 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52738] If device_parms.device_location value is used as the source of the CPNA tag and the value consists of one word only, the tag value will be calculated as two device_parms.device_location values separated by a space character.
      • I1704041647 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52697] Replaced incompatible Oracle JDBC driver library (used for Voice Authorisation) with WAY4 Cards bundled JDBC driver.
      • I1704109597 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52737] Feature implemented by CARDS-50877 has been revoked (financial document inherits MCC from authorisation on DirectP2P transactions) and previous behaviour has been restored.
      • I1704120003 [Notifications] [CARDS-52793] The language defined in "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Global Constants" or for an Officer is no longer used for SMS messages.
      • CARDS-52757 [UnionPay interface] UPI Fee Prediction: Added finding FeeProgram for intra-country transactions.
    • 03.45.19.11
      • CARDS-50515 [Tariff management] On code level supported uniqueness for tariffs by the "Tariff Code" and "Tariff Role" fields.
      • CARDS-52402 [Case management] Added the ability to search for cases by Contract Number in all case lists in the "Operations" menu for all Case Management categories.
      • CARDS-52558 [Acquiring authorisation] By default, the posting date after the cut-off time on a device is set to the next working day based on the default calendar. A new feature has been added to redefine the calendar type: the "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" parameter defines a special type of acquiring calendar (Full - Configuration Setup - Main Tables - Calendar Types). If the parameter "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" is not set, the default calendar will be used. This feature is available only if the "ENABLES_SHIFT_DAY" global parameter is set.
      • CARDS-52561 [Datamart] Drop-down list sources have been modified for Payment scheme identification (Payment scheme list) and Payment scheme member BINs (Card category code) forms.
      • CARDS-52572 [Distributed processing] Processing of replicated authorization repeat documents has been enhanced to improve synchronization of contract balances on both nodes in a High Availability Distributed Processing solution.
      • CARDS-52671 [Issuing authorisation] Added the ability to redefine LOCKED_CARD_RC for a financial institution. The actual value should be assigned by the LOCKED_CARD_RC=<RC>; tag in the special_parms field of the corresponding F_I table record.
      • CARDS-52702 [Notifications] Added a new variable, %BILLING_BALANCE%, for messages about billing balances. This variable can be used in client message setup for SMS Banking.
      • CARDS-52733 [Instalment management] The ability to postpone the first payment for an instalment plan up to a certain date has been added. This date should be specified as the value of the SHIFT_DATE tag in document tags, instalment scheme special parameters, or instalment tariff special parameters in YYMMDD format. The first payment will be scheduled according to instalment scheme date configuration but not earlier than the specified date.
      • CARDS-52448 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard PVV/PIN Export: Fixed record selection to satisfy "Full file replace" mode.
      • CARDS-52656 [Statistical Reports] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report for Visa Europe region (P_CEMEA=N) supported split of transactions into groups: "Immediate Debit" and "Credit & deferred Debit". Please refer to Chapter 1 "General Settings", "Card Category Classification" paragraph of the OW_HOME\manuals\language\VISA_statistical_reports\Quarterly_Operating_Certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf manual for configuration details.
      • CARDS-52658 [MasterCard interface] Bug fixed (incorrect status input Request).
      • CARDS-52668 [Accounting] Interest calculation has been enhanced for Interest Scheme -360 and interest calculation on the 31st day of the month.
      • CARDS-52675 [Reversal management] Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual reversal management actions using DB Manager.
      • CARDS-52686 [Instalment management] Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual instalment actions using DB Manager.
      • CARDS-52692 [Transaction management] Document processing behaviour when secondary documents had a higher priority in the financial documents matching procedure than original documents has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52701 [Application management] The ability to activate users has been added to the form "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Workflow Configuration\User Management\Users".
      • CARDS-52704 [Distributed processing] Restored menu entry OpenWay\Distributed Processing\Configuration Setup\Primary Node Routing Check
      • CARDS-52707 [Fee Prediction] The RewardsBusiness product has been added in RA configuration for Interregional jurisdiction.
      • CARDS-52709 [Product management] Analysis of the interest_delay field has been added to interest calculation for the current CYCLE.
      • CARDS-52714 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Added trimming tag values for PDS0670.
      • CARDS-52729 [Case management] Issue when a document was not added to an existing Financial case for the same contract has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52735 [Acquiring authorisation] Fixed an error with printing or displaying an incorrect final fee amount on transactions with the issuer's or acquirer's fees.
      • I1611102688 [Tariff management] [CARDS-52306] Added check of "Value Days" field length for "Service Value Days" tariff.
      • I1701227932 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52611] The algorithm for matching Retrieval Request and First Presentment documents has been improved for cases when a secondary document had been already processed and had changed the First Presentment posting status to "InActive".
      • I1703209597 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-52654] Pipe RBS. Transactions Export (Batching): Fixed generation of duplicate empty files for a future date.
      • I1703276453 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52630] Fixed an error which prevented posting of original and reversal transactions occurring in different batches.
      • I1704076220 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52730] Change PIN procedure has been corrected to avoid the possibility of falling into an infinite loop.
      • I1704088231 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52726] Fixed matching of authorization and financial documents when they have different source channels or source members.

      • CARDS-52684 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added Service Packs "STD-STD MC BSA Sk Sk Intra-Country Slovakia Acq" and "STD-STD MC BSA Sk Sk Intra-Country Maestro Slovakia Acq".
    • 03.45.19.10
      • CARDS-51064 [Reversal management] Liability contract hierarchy is supported in reversal management. To allow intelligent backdated processing for a contract with liability subcontracts, the STORNO_LIAB tag should be set in its product; in this case, the whole liability tree will be recalculated.
      • CARDS-52586 [Issuing authorisation] Supported inheritance of currency conversion rate from an authorisation check document into the corresponding advice if the advice is received less than 24 hours after the check request.
      • CARDS-52601 [Data preparation and card personalization] Data standard configuration for MIR contactless cards was updated.
      • CARDS-52265 [VISA interface] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Member and Merchant Data" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts.       • CARDS-52510 [Data preparation and card personalization] BF09 format has been changed in Chip Scheme Template "NSPC MIR Generic" for MIR Contactless support.
      • CARDS-52597 [Datamart] Added Datamart-related menu items OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\FI Load Groups\FI Load Groups (list of FI groups and their consistency points) and OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\FI Load Groups\Set DM Load Group for FI (set FI group for FI).
      • CARDS-52653 [Data preparation and card personalization] The CHCVV option is supported for all CVV encoding methods.
      • CARDS-51986 [Core] Fixed bug that caused an "Account Scheme" to be approved even if it had not changed (if the "Account Scheme" uses accounts for which the "Send Debit To" or "Send Credit To" field in the account type is not null).
      • CARDS-52352 [Core] BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.
      • CARDS-52528 [Core] Creation of transit macrotransactions has been fixed for 3-level financial institution hierarchies and the global parameter NEW_INTERBRANCH_ROUTING=Y.
      • CARDS-52538 [VISA interface] For the "DWH_CONF" configuration group (OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Configuration Groups), a new value has been added for the "DWD_CARD_CATEGORY" classifier - "Deferred Debit" (DEFERRED_DEBIT) for a separate card category.
      • CARDS-52556 [Case management] The Case Management activity "Create sub case" also stores an activity comment as a new case description when an application sub-case is created.
      • CARDS-52564 [VISA interface] In opt_classify.CLASSIFY_DWD_CARD_CATEGORY() added checks of "amnd_state" for appl_product records.
      • CARDS-52573 [WAY4 Web] 1.Application processing error in Delete Usage action has been fixed. 2. Application processing of tagged fields has been restored.
      • CARDS-52602 [Distributed processing] Fixed error an occurring on Authentication Server with the Distributed Processing configuration.
      • CARDS-52606 [MasterCard interface] XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Merchants" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts. Calculation of the following rows has been updated: - Number of Mastercard Merchants - Number of new Merchants added this quarter - Number of Merchants lost this quarter
      • CARDS-52619 [Dispute assistant] The "Dispute Assistant" menu has been renamed to "Dispute Assistant R1 OBSOLETE". The "Dispute Assistant CM"/"CM Dispute Assistant" menu has been renamed to "Dispute Assistant R2".

      • CARDS-51649 [VISA interface] For the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report: - added a new block "MERCHANT ACQUIRING TOTAL" with sums of regional volumes. - calculation of "Sales - of which Electron" subsection in the transaction section has been supported. - the sections "No. of terminals installed at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals installed at merchants" have been renamed to "No. of terminals active at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals active at merchants". These sections contain information about terminals on which at least one transaction was made during the report period.

      • I1704076451 [Notifications] [CARDS-52945] When an attempt is made to open a MTR_FIN_REVERSE Event, a check is made of whether an Event with the "AUTH_T_R" or "AUTH_P_R" code was opened earlier. If one of these Events was opened, the Event with the "MTR_FIN_REVERSE" code will not be opened.

The section "List of Third-Party Software Used, System Services and Protocols Used" has been changed. Added a warning that the mod_security component is an essential part of the application with regard to security.
      • CARDS-52786 [Issuing] Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "Specifying Sensitive Data" has been changed. Added a warning that the system cannot function normally without the PVV and Encrypted PIN fields.
      • CARDS-52807 [Security & key management] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "Encryption and Protected Protocols for Data Transmission" has been changed. Added a warning that when the TLS 1.2 protocol is used, encryption using the RC4 algorithm must be disabled.

      • CARDS-52936 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward Processing. Supported the ability to transfer data from PDS1000, PDS1001, PDS1003, PDS1004, PDS1005, PDS1006, PDS1012, PDS1014 to document.
    • 03.45.09.32
      • CARDS-52027 [Transaction management] A financial document will not be matched with an authorization that has a different "PS Reference Number".
      • CARDS-52395 [Transaction management] Functionality missing in 03.44 for linking a financial document to a matched preauthorization document has been restored. If a financial document received in back-office from an OnUs source, is matched with a preauthorization document during the document processing procedure, the preauthorization document's identifier is stored in the financial document's add_info field as the value of the "PREAUTH_ID" tag. System identifiers that a document was received from an OnUs source when at least one of the following conditions is met: 1. A document Source Channel is indicated with the parameter IsOnUs=Yes or IsOnUs=null in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Message Channels". 2. A document Source Member Id value is null or is marked in the BIN Table with the "CAN_BE_ONUS;" tag or the value is registered as "Acq BIN" in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Bank Acquiring Parameters" used for own acquiring configuration, or a financial institution is registered for this Member ID value in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Financial Institutions".
      • CARDS-52868 [Transaction management] Fixed funds unblocking in the case of multiple authorizations with multiple presentments.
      • CARDS-52893 [Core] New tags MIN_BAL_TYPE_SIGN/MAX_BAL_TYPE_SIGN have been supported for use together with MIN_BAL_TYPE/MAX_BAL_TYPE and LIMIT_AMOUNT tags.
      • CARDS-52915 [Authentication management] The "OFFICER" scope has been added to validation conditions for an authentication scheme linked to a consumer record.
      • I1704121217, I1704192844 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52867] Optimised the procedure for posting macrotransactions for reversal and adjustment documents if the value of the additional global parameter PATCH_REVERSE_INTEREST is set to "Y".
      • I1704135142 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52903] A financial document will not be matched with an authorization of a different transaction type even if the reference numbers are the same.
      • I1704192981. Wrong IC for new visa B2B Virtual Payments (ICFEE-178) [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52895] Modified RA configuration for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).
      • I1704206572 [Core] [CARDS-52902] Fixed excessive creation of subcontracts on contract approve when a sub-product is configured with "# of contracts" greater than zero and filled relation fields.
      • I1704207687 [Core] [CARDS-52889] Performance of the Renew Account Scheme Changes procedure has been improved when the system validates the payment priority algorithm for an upper limit template.
      • I1704243534 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52916] Fixed "No Data Found" error during authorisation processing if contr_subtype.bin_record is invalid.
      • CARDS-52896 [MasterCard interface] Prepared MasterCard IRD configuration based on FULL MPE (Release 17Q2).
      • I1704129157 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-52876] DCI MPE (Sys Ops XML File) Import: Supported loading Product Id, Account Funding Source and Product Category fields in BIN Table. Added DCI products to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).
    • 03.45.09.30
      • CARDS-52041 [Core] Additional validation has been added for NSPK report parameters in "Financial Institutions" .
      • CARDS-52609 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf" report: 1. Changed the default value of the P_V_PAY_BRAND_NAME parameter from "V PAY" to "V_V". 2. Supported the ability to configure additional groups in SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Merchant Category Group Data" and "Contactless" sections. 3. Added new parameter P_SIC_GROUP_CNTCLS_CLASS_TYPE for configuring data groups in the "Contactless" section. 3. Excluded "V PAY" transactions from the "Merchant Category Group Data" section when P_CEMEA = 'N'.
      • CARDS-52722 [Datamart] The following menu items have been renamed: OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Lock DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Lock Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Release DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Products Mapping Step by Step\Release Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Lock DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Lock Datamart Mapping OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Release DWH Mapping -> OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Objects mapping\Account Mapping Step by Step\Release Datamart Mapping The OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface menu branch is only provided to customers with the corresponding license. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact changes" section for more details.

      • CARDS-52877 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect chip request processing on a High Availability secondary node when the response contains empty issuer script.

      • I1703201358 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52738] If device_parms.device_location value is used as the source of the CPNA tag and the value consists of one word only, the tag value will be calculated as two device_parms.device_location values separated by a space character.
      • I1703249728 [Application management] [CARDS-52849] Resolved issue with missing base relation for a new non-product based related contract during accept of an advanced application R2.
      • I1704188903 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52865] Fixed incorrect matching between Authorization and Financial documents that have the same Transaction Amount and no PS Ref Number reference specified, from merchants who support multiple authorization processing.

    • 03.45.09.28
      • CARDS-52536 [Core] The "Liab Category" field has been made available for editing in the Device Contract form. On contract Approve, if the value in the "Liab Category" field from the Product and the value from the current contract are different, the corresponding message with the text "Switch Liability Category to <>" will be generated in the Process Log for this contract.
      • CARDS-52704 [Distributed processing] Restored menu entry OpenWay\Distributed Processing\Configuration Setup\Primary Node Routing Check
      • CARDS-52729 [Case management] Issue when a document was not added to an existing Financial case for the same contract has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52732 [Reversal management] Due tolerance configuration is now supported in backdated payment processing in the Reversal Management module. Maximum tolerance supported period is 10 days. In common cases it is recommended to use backdated payments instead of due tolerance setup.
      • CARDS-52735 [Acquiring authorisation] Fixed an error with printing or displaying an incorrect final fee amount on transactions with the issuer's or acquirer's fees.
      • CARDS-52752 [Issuing authorisation] When a PIN is changed after marking a card for reproduction but before receiving a reproduction results file, the new PIN value is also written to the new plastic record.
      • CARDS-52762 [CB Gate] Fixed BerTLV buffers parsing in Application Interface.
      • CARDS-52766 [Core] Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-52768 [Transaction management] Document Processing has been fixed to support matching between Financial and Auhtorization/Transit Authorization documents received from different sources.
      • CARDS-52771 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed frequent rereading of ADD_GLOBAL_PARMS on authorisation.
      • CARDS-52774 [Application management] Client AddOrUpdate Application R2 checks the existence of a client in accordance with the additional global parameters UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_NUMBER and UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_REG_NUMBER.
      • CARDS-52798 [Fee Prediction] UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed the channel in the OpenWay\UPI Fee Prediction\UPI IRF Criteria form.
      • CARDS-52800 [VISA interface] Optimized getCardHolderVerificationMethodsReq query for VDEP.
      • CARDS-52803 [Transaction management] A new global parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL has been added. The new parameter is used for all transactions except those with hotel, car rental or airline MCC codes, for which the existing parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT is used. This parameter can set the maximum difference between authorization and financial presentment amounts as a percentage. If the difference is below this value, the whole blocked amount will be unblocked, otherwise only the financial amount will be unblocked.
      • CARDS-52809 [Transaction management] Fixed funds unblocking when multiple presentments for one authorization are posted in an order different from accept order.
      • CARDS-52815 [Core] Fixed lengthy execution of the approve process for related acquiring contracts.
      • CARDS-52821 [CB Gate] Fixed incorrect document posting status when the fee is waived by the CBS.
      • CARDS-52824 [Risk management] Restored the ability to recalculate usage limiter counters for acquiring. Testing - Usage Recalculation.
      • CARDS-52833 [Transaction management] Fixed definition of terminal category to search for target dispute contract in posting history documents.
      • I1610179670 [Core] [CARDS-50722] Added reset of environment variables (global parameters, cached data when posting events, contracts, etc.) when a session is initialized.
      • I1611102688 [Tariff management] [CARDS-52306] Added check of "Value Days" field length for "Service Value Days" tariff.
      • I1702105338 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52777] Fixed creation of duplicate Retail Reimbursements in DA R2: For write-off of a dispute case with a presentment for "No Such Card", if a reimbursement (in this case, write-off of the presentment) is created manually, it won't be created automatically by the standard dispute case write-off procedure.
      • I1702160876, I1704098675 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52727] Fixed Member Id definition for online routing. The change affects instances which route online messages by Member Id on NetServer/Transaction Switch.
      • I1703138261 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52801] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now documents with an invalid Approval Code will be suspended. MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward: Now if a document has an invalid Approval Code, this Approval Code won't be exported.
      • I1704076220 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52730] Change PIN procedure has been corrected to avoid the possibility of falling into an infinite loop.
      • I1704088231 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52726] Fixed matching of authorization and financial documents when they have different source channels or source members.

      • CARDS-52039 [Core] Balance type recalculation for liability contract hierarchy has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52352 [Core] BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.
      • CARDS-52534 [Issuing authorisation] IRouter authorisation procedures have been corrected to suppress mistaken error messages.

      • CARDS-51649 [VISA interface] For the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report: - added a new block "MERCHANT ACQUIRING TOTAL" with sums of regional volumes. - calculation of "Sales - of which Electron" subsection in the transaction section has been supported. - the sections "No. of terminals installed at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals installed at merchants" have been renamed to "No. of terminals active at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals active at merchants". These sections contain information about terminals on which at least one transaction was made during the report period.
      • CARDS-51856 [Risk management] Created a new risk report "Exceeded Total Credit/Refund Transact. Nmbr to Total Purchase Transact. Nmbr Ratio" (OpenWay\Acquiring\Merchant Risk Management\Risk Reports - Acquiring Single). It is necessary to set the TOTCRDRTRANSNUMRATIO risk scheme parameter (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Acquiring Products\Device Risk Schemes) - Total Credit/Refund Transact. Nmbr to Total Purchase Transact. Nmbr Ratio. Only device contracts for which the ratio of the Credit/Refund transactions to the total number of purchase transactions in a period exceeds the TOTCRDRTRANSNUMRATIO parameter value set in the risk scheme will be included in the report. Only Credit (Trans Type IDT=0616) and Retail (Trans Type IDT=0515) transactions will be analysed when generating the report.
      • CARDS-51857 [Risk management] Created a new report, Credits_Issued_By_Merchant.rdf. The report is run from OpenWay\MC Statistics Reports\Risk Reports\Credits Issued By Merchant.
      • CARDS-51864 [Risk management] Added a new report, MC_Acquiring_Fraud_Basis_Points.rdf, and statistic attributes (OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Statistic Attributes (custom)) for its support: Trans classifier: Device Type Transaction (PS_TRN_DEVICE_TYPE) Trans classifier: Fraud Type (PS_TRN_FRAUD_TYPE) Trans classifier: Card Present (PS_TRN_IS_CARD_PRESENT), Trans classifier: Mastercard MO/TO/Ecomm Transaction (PS_TRN_MC_MOTOECOMM)

      • CARDS-51885 [DB kernel] Chip card data processing has been optimised for partitioned storage.
      • CARDS-52181 [Acquiring] The DCC_CONTRACT tag is checked during Nostro contract approve; it should be the same for Main and Sub Nostro contracts. When searching for the DCC_CONTRACT tag in Nostro contracts, the tag is first searched for in the Sub Nostro contract, then in the Main Nostro contract, and then on the Nostro Account Scheme. Earlier, the DCC_CONTRACT tag value in the Main Nostro contract was not considered.
      • CARDS-52268 [Acquiring] The WAY4 Help System has been updated with in accordance with changes in the Client_messages.pdf and Acquiring_module.pdf documents.

      • CARDS-52492 [Bill payments] Corrected visibility of payment type properties. Payment type properties created via mBilling request are now visible.
      • CARDS-52496 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Fixed situation when incoming Presentment Reversals/Adjustments and MasterCard Fee Collection secondary documents were not linked to the corresponding cases.
      • CARDS-52508 [VISA interface] Fixed card_brand condition in the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report.
      • I1609086162 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52526] DA v2. Fixed Reimbursement Transaction Amount processing if a reimbursement is created manually.
      • I1702061012 [Core] [CARDS-52491] Character buffer overflow error message generation when approving Service Packages with long name values has been fixed.
      • I1703144988 [Accounting] [CARDS-52447] Modified generation of codes for Misc fees in the menu "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Transaction Dictionary" when the global parameter FULL_TRANS_CODES=Y.
      • I1703145086 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52516] Changed Target Member Id filling in DA v2. Now Target Member Id is not pre-filled in a created Fee Collection. It is filled during routing search.
      • I1703160402 [Product inspector] [CARDS-52474] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with the same codes that already exist in the destination WAY4Cards system. Previously, all test script steps already present in the destination database were deleted, which led to links being lost in comparing script results with the standard ones. This behaviour cannot be restored. In the first step of the import procedure, all the existing test steps in the database are marked with the new status "Obsolete". In the second step, the system checks if the step number exists in the file being imported. If not, the step in the database is kept with the "Obsolete" status, otherwise the step gets a status and inherits other parameters from the file being imported. When a Product Inspector script is run, a step with the "Obsolete" status behaves the same way as a step with the "Skip" status.
      • I1703174475 [Product management] [CARDS-52501] Unnecessary generation of "Invalid product changes" error message during Contracts Daily Update procedure has been fixed for contracts that do not have a product.
      • I1703175143 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52525] "CM Dispute Assistant" menu item distribution process has been fixed. Now it is uploaded to customers who have a license for Dispute Assistant functionality.
      • I403199808 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52506] Restored the original conditions (that were used before DA v2 was developed) to call DA v1.
      • CARDS-52286 [Data preparation and card personalization] Export of SecureCode AAV Validation Key from CAVV_A and CAVV_B in MC OBKM pipe supported.
      • CARDS-52341 [Dispute assistant] Added a new field EXT_CASE_IDT to all cases in Case Management Dispute Assistant. The field stores the IPS case identifier (e.g. VROL Case Number for VISA). The field can be filled during manual creation of a dispute case or later in the dispute case screen.
      • CARDS-52360 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MCBS Import: Supported new format according to Global Operations Bulletin No. 2 - 1 February 2017.
      • CARDS-52375 [VISA interface] A new section "Configuring a New Product B2B Virtual Payments Program" has been added to the 2017_04_VISA_Requirements.pdf document.
      • CARDS-52394 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-340 2.1 Processing Requirements for Staged Digital Wallet Transactions. TCR3 record type "CR" is exported for SDWO transactions if this transaction doesn't contain industry specific TCR3.

If there is no "default code" the standard date mask "YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS" is used.

ORA-06512: at "OWS.AUTH", line 3054
      • CARDS-52315 [Application management] In Advanced Applications R2, application accept has been downgraded to approve in secondary nodes for NoWorkflow mode if such behaviour is not refused by the global parameter APPL_NON_SAFE_ON_SECONDARY=DECLINE.

      • CARDS-52214 [Data preparation and card personalization] Changed Guice configuration in "Cryptogram Validation" pipe.
      • CARDS-52320 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed incorrect creation of settlement documents with zero amount.
      • CARDS-52331 [Diners Club interface] DCI Clearing Import: Supported loading files with long (more than 32 symbols) names.
      • CARDS-52353 [Product management] Corrected behaviour: now the process OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Renew All For Institution correctly approves Service Packages with additional packs: first all additional packs, then main packages.
      • CARDS-52361 [Instalment management] Corrected information portion status in an instalment plan after "Change Instalment Terms".
      • I1611249741 [Core] [CARDS-52334] FX rate definition for multicurrency limit normalization has been fixed according to corresponding Posting Date.
      • I1702080846 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52354] DA v2. Fixed settlement amount calculation for credit Second Presentments.
      • I1702157314 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52313] When validating a contract subtype, the BIN record is checked even if it is already filled.
      • I1702211917 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52359] VISA Inward Processing: fixed doc.target_member_id filling for incoming Fee Collection with empty Destination BIN field and filled Account Number.
      • I1702238064 [Security & key management] [CARDS-52336] Added support for selecting root directory as SOURCE_DIR parameter in "PM RSA EMV Key Management".
      • I1703076703 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52318] Truncated address city field to 32 symbols when filling device parameters.
      • CARDS-52137 [Data preparation and card personalization] Export MasterCard PayPass MagStripe CVC3 Validation Key suppored in MC OBKM pipe.
      • CARDS-52223 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified according to VISA release article: Apr17-335 2.9 Changes to Visa Gold International Interchange Reimbursement Fees for Japan Issuers.
      • CARDS-52252 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified according to VISA release article: Apr17-341 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product.
      • CARDS-52321 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture file Import: added JCB specific for further export ECI (PDE3009) to JCB.
      • CARDS-52343 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added the "FIN_TRANS_SPLIT" parameter which allows a fee transaction to be exported separately from the main transaction. Added the "ADD_FIELDS_T5_FEE" parameter to redefine T5 record fields for fee transactions. Added the "FIN_ADD_FIELD" parameter for customizing transactions select.
      • CARDS-52344 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added "PAN_LENGTH_19" pipe parameter which allows account number fields with a length of 19 digits to be exported. Leading zeroes are added if necessary.
      • CARDS-52345 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added "T1_FOR_T5" = Y/N(default) pipe parameter which allows export of T1 records when T5 records exist even if the billing period is not being closed.
      • CARDS-52346 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): additional customization points for T1 Last Payment Amount ( F292 ) and T1 Last Payment Date (F308 ) have been added.
    • 03.45.09.14
      • CARDS-50086 [Notifications] Added new variables %FDT_<DT_CODE>:[date format]% and %PAST_DUE_DATE:[deliquency group]:[date format]% for messages about contract dates. These variables can be used in client message setup for SMS Banking.
      • CARDS-50541 [Core] Renamed the "ConfGroup" button to "Mapping" in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\User Classifiers".
      • CARDS-52237 [VISA interface] A new classifier "ACQ_LEVEL_MARKER" with the "ACQ_MERCHANTS" value has been added to the "OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Configuration Groups" menu for the "DWH_CONF" group.
      • CARDS-52280 [Issuing] The internal procedure for creating a duplicate contract no longer "forces" approval of the contract if it was duplicated because it is linked with another contract, for example, in the case of combo-cards.
      • CARDS-52290 [Issuing] Added ability to enter INHERIT_LOST_CARD_EXPIRE=Y; in card subtype properties.
      • CARDS-52299 [Issuing authorisation] VDEP (Visa Digital Enablement Program) service API, including token creation and additional VDEP token information checking on authorization operations has been implemented.
      • CARDS-52309 [Acquiring authorisation] Obsolete menu branch "InterSystem controller" has been removed from the standard OpenWay\Acquiring\ menu.
      • CARDS-52310 [Product management] Copying a product to an existing product in another financial institution will not invalidate the parent product if only sub-products are changed. After copying, it is only necessary to approve sub-products, the version of the parent product and unaffected sub-products does not change.
      • CARDS-52302 [Tariff management] Corrected loyalty action limit restriction if bonus service is configured for another contract using the CONTRACT_FOR tag.
      • I1612046735 [Core] [CARDS-52303] For the "test script import" pipe, search for a CLIENT_TYPE value for the APPL_CLIENT.CLT tag has been modified, now only financial institution is checked.
      • I1701270697 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52291] Fixed incorrect currency conversion rate use in issuer authorization after return from Stand-in.
      • I1702208476 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52312] Added a new response type, "Transaction Confirmed", to "Safe Doc" forms.
      • I1702225223 [Automated routines] [CARDS-52304] The Approve procedure can be be called for sub-products. If the main product is not ready, Approve will be executed for the entire hierarchy; if the main product is ready, only the sub-product will be approved. A new form has been added, OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products (No Hierarchy), for viewing all products without hierarchy.
      • CARDS-51495 [Core] Reports XLS_CB_f250_1.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf: - Added count of contactless cards, transactions and devices. - Supported consolidated report for all financial organization branches. - Supported counting of cards with only 2 groups: debit/credit.
      • CARDS-51959 [NSPK interface] Added the ability to validate a cardholder's date of birth together with other security values. See documentation for details.
    • 03.45.09.13
      • CARDS-51408 [Customer/account management] In the "Contract_Analytic_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports an option has been added to show purchases made using loyalty bonuses in the separate section.
      • CARDS-52225 [Product inspector] A new action, "Set Billing Day", which allows the contract billing date to be changed, has been added for contracts in Product Inspector. The value should be specified in the "Action Code" field and can be in the range from 1 to 31.
      • CARDS-52257 [Product management] "Instead orders" processing have been enhanced: sorting by the "priority" have been added.
      • I1612121917 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51820] "No Check" Auth scenario has been removed from forms as obsolete. The additional global parameter ENABLE_NO_CHECK is no longer supported.
      • CARDS-51883 [Acquiring authorisation] Supported P2P merchant initiated transactions (MIT).
      • CARDS-52170 [Instalment management] Corrected instalment plan recalculation when fee capitalization is used.
      • CARDS-52263 [Customer/account management] Standard CUST_STATE_STR_TO_LOG procedure has been changed: duplication of records during contract balance prediction logging has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52278 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect redefinition of message settlement date on IRouter authorisation.
      • I1701316576 [Third-party batch interface] [CARDS-52274] RBS. Outward Processing: Added logging amounts: Total Amount from DB, Total File Amount, Total Source Amount.
      • I1702080962 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52242] VISA Inward Processing pipe: fixed "Acq Conv Rate Fee Detail Out" generation for 2nd presentments.
      • I1702174295 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-52110] NSPK Inward Processing pipe: fixed incorrect message code (S2IIF1X1, S2III1X1) generation.
      • I1702211917 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52244] VISA Inward Processing: fixed doc.target_member_id filling for incoming Fee Collection with empty Destination BIN field.
      • I1702225414:ISMP 2075322 : MC International CBK are all rejected since MC Release 16.2 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52243] DA v1: Restored channel M (MasterCard International Channel) processing. Only for DA v1!!!
      • I1703010503 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52272] Modified RA configuration for Denmark. The DK_VPAY_ECOM fee descriptor has been withdrawn.
      • CARDS-52210 [JCB interface] JCB Rel Apr 17: supported IIN file format changes.
      • CARDS-52236 [VISA interface] RA configuration has been modified for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).
      • CARDS-52239 [VISA interface] VISA Release Apr17-341: Added SIC Group "Global B2B Virtual Payments Fee Program" with code VISA_GL_B2B.
      • CARDS-52267 [MasterCard interface] Modified IRD configuration for interregional interchange programs in accordance with MasterCard release item: Global 521 - New Consumer Prepaid Product Code.
    • 03.45.09.12
      • CARDS-52115 [Acquiring authorisation] The closing operation has been added to e-commerce chains.
      • CARDS-52118 [Acquiring authorisation] An e-commerce chain will be closed automatically when the period MULT_CAPT_PERIOD from the authorization date is over. MULT_CAPT_PERIOD is set as a tag in Device_type.Emv_Conf_File.
      • CARDS-51493 [Core] New actions to recalculate contract functional dates have been added to the CSS screen OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service -> [Contr.Dates] form.
      • CARDS-52064 [Application management] "Device Parm Ctrl" and "Merchant Management" additional info types are now supported in Advanced Applications R2 for contract additional information.
      • CARDS-52112 [SEPA interface] "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Bank Divisions", "OpenWay\SEPA\Issuing Mandate Input & Update" and "OpenWay\SEPA\Acquiring Mandate Input & Update" menus now make it possible to set up Ultimate Creditor and Ultimate Debtor data.
      • CARDS-52116 [SEPA interface] SEPA Customer to Bank Export: Changed criterion to select invoice party for Ultimate Creditor (UltmtCdtr) data element; now data with party type "UC" (Ultimate Creditor) is exported, earlier data with party type "BF" (Beneficiary) was used to populate this data element. See also CARDS-52112.
      • CARDS-52124 [Instalment management] Instalments with "Monthly Interest" configuration have been simplified. The "Next Working Day" and "Previous Working Day" values are converted into a single value, "Split Interest". The split invoice effective date will no longer be shifted. At the end of the month, the dates of transfers generated by fee invoice opening will depend on the contract's Accounting Scheme EOM configuration.
      • CARDS-52187 [Product inspector] Generation of unique transaction chain value stored in the PERS_NAME_REC document tag has been added to Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-52197 [Issuing authorisation] Data from field 112 have been parsed on Purchase token operation.
      • CARDS-52226 [Accounting] Supported the "P_DATE_FROM", "P_DATE_TO", "P_F_I", and "P_SQL_TRACE" parameters in the "Trial Balance" and "Trial_Balance" reports.
      • I1610257970 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52219] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Member and Merchant Data" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts. Calculation of the following rows has been updated: Number of Merchants: of which are acquiring MOTO transactions of which are acquiring E-Commerce transactions
      • CARDS-51674 [Tariff management] Contract parameters with "Location of Current Value = TARIFF" configuration can be used now in Standing Orders and Event Types as tag values to redefine fixed amounts/counters with tariff data values.
      • CARDS-51954 [Product management] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiter additional actions (charging a fee or opening an Event, for example) when a document is declined.
      • CARDS-52055 [Diners Club interface] DCI Clearing Import: Supported value M = "Mobile POS" which is valid for the Terminal Type field since Release 15.2.
      • CARDS-52208 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed filling Send Member Id field in Funds Disbursement Outward transactions.
      • CARDS-52229 [Transaction management] Conditions for the "Message" link in the ROOT\OpenWay\MasterCard\MC\ File Management\MC Message To Member form and the "Errors" link in the OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Doc - General Form\All Docs form have been changed: filtering by the Object Type field has been added.
      • I1702213736:B: Visa Croatia: wrong region defined between EEA card & Croatia merchant (ICFEE-164) [VISA interface] [CARDS-52171] VISA Country Table. Now the direct area for Croatia is VISA: European Economic Area Sub-region. Manual Action! No impact on transaction processing.
      • CARDS-51360 [Issuing] Pan reference identifier, Token reference identifier and Token requestor identifier have been added as document and authentication scheme tags.
      • CARDS-51484 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM Processing: supported SIOM processing for Acquirer transactions.
      • CARDS-52166 [Issuing authorisation] Tokenization correlation identifier and device type for MDES transactions have been added to doc.add_info.
      • CARDS-52167 [Issuing] Consumer's Activation Method Preference for MDES transactions has been added to doc.add_info.
      • CARDS-52169 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced TC33 Acquirer Capture import pipe: "Total Authorization Amount" field is stored in the document for further export.
      • CARDS-52180 [Issuing authorisation] Primary account number source and Device type fields have been added under authentication scheme.
      • CARDS-52188 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: additional customization points have been added.
      • CARDS-52189 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" parameter to define the first symbols of accounts for special processing. Default value is "CH".
      • CARDS-52190 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added "REPORT_TO_LINK_T10" and "PARENT_LINK_T10" parameters which make it possible to override "REPORT_TO_LINK" and "PARENT_LINK" parameters for T10 records. Added "TWO_LEVEL_STRUCTURE"="Y"/"N"(default) parameter. If "Y" it is allowed to set the parent link for card directly to a corporate contract.
      • CARDS-52198 [Issuing authorisation] Final tokenization decision tag has been added to TNK_ACTIVATION message.
      • CARDS-52209 [Fee Prediction] Modified IC tariffs and RA configuration for all regions in accordance with VISA release requirement: 2.8 Changes to Private Label Transfer Pricing.
      • CARDS-52234 [VISA interface] VISA Fee Prediction: Added Fee Program Areas for Visa Gold purchase and credit voucher transactions for Japan issuers.
