      • I1611068909 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-51671] IC tariffs have been modified for Ireland in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 22, 2 November 2016.
    • 03.45.09.11
      • CARDS-51138 [Product inspector] When a contract is created or attached with same IDT as another contract in a Product Inspector test script, a numerical suffix will be added to its IDT to stop duplicate IDTs from appearing in the Product Inspector log.
      • CARDS-51755 [Instalment management] An instalment fee configured as a "Portion fee" will now be taken in the full amount for one portion on full early repayment. On partial repayment no fee is taken.
      • CARDS-51888 [Datamart] A new form, "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been created for the new table, mp_ps_member_bin; a link to "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been added to the "Mp Payment Scheme Identification" form.
      • CARDS-52129 [Product management] A new value, "Year", has been added to limiter period types for usage limiter templates.
      • CARDS-52132 [Product management] The "Usage Template Details" form has been redesigned.
      • CARDS-52158 [Core] The KEEP_CONTRACT_ID tag is set in a Misc Service (Service Details) or transaction subtype (Fee Algorithm). When a Misc document is created, the contract identifier is specified in add_info.
      • CARDS-51716 [High availability] Fixed behaviour. All error and warning messages that are inserted while processing rejected authorizations transferred from Secondary to Primary get the "Error Info" and "Warning Info" message types. If the original authorization was successful in Secondary, the message type remains "Error" or "Warning".
      • CARDS-52022 [Risk management] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with the SingleSliding period type when the limiter's period was not defined for a particular contract with an application or manually. Without this additional determination, the limiter is not analyzed.
      • CARDS-52093 [Authentication management] Fixed "Failed to calculate DP routing, use default routing" warning for Authentication Server Context operations.
      • CARDS-52111 [Distributed processing] Fixed incorrect authorisation document replication processing which led to inconsistency of data between primary and secondary nodes.
      • CARDS-52133 [Instalment management] Instalment Event = "Plan Closed", according to which an Instalment Event Fee is charged is no longer generated when an instalment plan in preview or inactive status is closed.
      • CARDS-52142 [Issuing authorisation] Error using three delimiters ('|') instead of two when answering TAR messages during MDES transactions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52152 [Product management] The "Attachment" value has been removed from the "For contracts" list of available values for Service Packages. Additional Service Packages should be used for ATTACHMENT services.
      • CARDS-52153 [Automated routines] Filter for standard Timezone Contract Daily Update (CDU) menu items has been changed; now the liab_category field is used instead of liab_contract.
      • CARDS-52154 [Authentication management] User must change password if it was reset by admin and parameter DEF_PW_CHANGE is set to Y.
      • CARDS-52155 [Case management] Fixed issue. Now in Product Inspector test scripts, the case domain set in the "Set Domain" step is not used for cases created by an event.
      • CARDS-52160 [Datamart] Description of mp_etl_parm for parameter with value_type = 'GATHER' and scope 'STAT' in mp_etl_parm has been changed.
      • CARDS-52164 [Core] Display of balance amounts after performing the balance prediction procedure has been corrected in WAY4 Web. Cache clearing has been added.
      • I1702196631 [Product management] [CARDS-52141] Fixed amount calculation for standing orders with the BY_BATCH tag; now zero amount orders are not recalculated based on account balance.
      • CARDS-52048 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: Supported processing of a duplicate secondary document if is matched with an original document.
      • CARDS-52080 [Issuing authorisation] The TAR response code for VISA authorizations has been changed from 5 to the real response code of the transaction.
      • CARDS-52084 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Added the ability to customize the StatusCode field for the CorporateInformation_4000 and AccountInformation_4300 aggregates.
      • CARDS-52104 [Issuing authorisation] VDEP Active account management velocity checking result and Device identifier tags have been added to document.
      • CARDS-52123 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.
      • I1612120086 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51705] In the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report, added new parameter P_CEMEA for grouping "Acquirer Data" and "MOTO (Mail and Telephone Order) Data" sections by regional tiers.
      • I1702196591 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52157] Interchange tariffs have been modified for Belgium in accordance with VISA requirements published on February 16, 2017.
    • 03.45.09.10
      • CARDS-51659 [Product inspector] A new menu for Datamart loading testing is supported, OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-51948 [Instalment management] Special instalment options can be configured for our card transactions made on a partner's devices acquired in different banks. Partner is identified by a pair of Member ID and Merchant IDs which should be configured in the Instalment Partners handbook. Special configuration of a service is also required.
      • CARDS-51950 [Core] Partner management registration forms have been developed.
      • CARDS-51207 [Core] New actions for balance recalculation, that can be initiated using the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts" have been added: Balance Turnover Initialization for Contract and Balance Turnover Initialization for Product.
      • CARDS-51584 [Distributed processing] Contract state check on contract daily update loop is supported for Distributed Processing configuration.
      • CARDS-51887 [Application management] Supported creation of COMBO_Cards by applications.
      • CARDS-51990 [Product management] OpenWay\Full\CMS Stat\Create Statistics menu item has been enhanced. Now it will connect a new group "PRODUCT_GROUP" that contains key elements of product configuration scope.
      • CARDS-52013 [VISA interface] A new parameter (FI) has been added for package opt_classify functions (used for statistics reports). The CLASSIFY_DWD_CARD_CATEGORY() and PACKAGED_MAPPING() parameters will be used by regression tests.
      • CARDS-52018 [Issuing authorisation] Tokenization activation code stored under a document has been masked.
      • CARDS-52049 [Product management] The CURRENT_CYCLE tag is supported for all Functional Dates.
      • CARDS-52075 [Customer/account management] "Currency", "Available", "Blocked", "Credit limit" fields have been added to the "OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service-> [Related] form.
      • CARDS-52083 [Instalment management] Added the ability to perform early repayment of an instalment transaction. The Service should be configured with the INVOICE_ACTION=EARLY_REPAYMENT tag in service details. The document's additional data field can contain the INST_PLAN_IDT tag with the idt of the instalment plan for which early repayment is being performed. If no tag is present in the document, all instalment plans will be paid one by one in the order of creation. Early repayment keep mode can be specified using the INST_ER_KEEP tag with the values "T" - keep tenor, "P" - keep portion amount.
      • CARDS-52085 [Housekeeping] In order to make housekeeping for Cases - relations between CM_CASE_ACTIV and CM_CASE_OBJ are switched off for the Housekeeping process in the standard Housekeeping setting. "Import Standard Settings" must be performed after upgrade.
      • I1503163267 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52030] Added the ability to log missing ATC values to a document's additional information. A new global parameter, LOG_MISSING_ATC_TO_DOC=Y activates this feature.
      • CARDS-50195 [VISA interface] In the "Outgoing Files Logic.srd", "Outgoing Files Resp.srd", and "Outgoing Files.srd" forms, the "Sended By" label has been changed to "Sent by". In the "Incoming Files Logic.srd" and "Incoming Files.srd" forms, the "Received By" label has been changed to "Received by".
      • CARDS-51518 [Core] Balance Turnover initialization with Liability Sub contracts is supported.
      • CARDS-51774 [Issuing authorisation] Error in formatting activation methods in TKN_VERIFICATION messages has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51876 [Core] Increased performance for the menu "OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Quarterly Contract Groups Update".
      • CARDS-51924 [VISA interface] The menu item "Re-classify Card Products with DWD_CARD_CATEGORY" used for statistics reports now supports product mapping for "DEFERRED_DEBIT" and "CHARGE" card category values.
      • CARDS-51930 [Issuing authorisation] Error in TKN_VERIFICATION method has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51941 [Issuing authorisation] Error in BERTLV data format in retail MDES transactions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52003 [Product inspector] A new log mode, INVOICE_FULL is supported in Product Inspector. In this mode, all invoice and instalment fields are logged and compared. To use the new mode, set LOG_MODE=INVOICE_FULL in step, script or launch details.
      • CARDS-52010 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export, DCI Outward Processing: Fixed AirLine Addendum Flight Number field processing.
      • CARDS-52023 [Acquiring] Typo in the "Device Configuration Item Type" form has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52050 [Issuing] Fixed full scan in ROOT.OpenWay.Customer Service.Customer Service -> Related.
      • CARDS-52054 [Product inspector] Fixed processing of general daily standing orders when running test scripts. Now general orders will be processed for the current contract's main contract, as in production.
      • CARDS-52074 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect inheritance of the return code from an original document when a repeat message is received.
      • I1610314143 [Case management] [CARDS-52065] Optimized "Contract" tab performance in the Case Details screen.
      • I1701242013 [Housekeeping] [CARDS-51955] Housekeeping now also deletes rows from td_auth_sch table with amnd_state not equal to 'A'.
      • I1702139241 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52045] The error "Incoming TransCondition does not correspond to TransAttributes" is interpreted as a warning in acquiring.
      • CARDS-51869 [VISA interface] TKN_ACTIVATION and TKN_VERIFICATION requests are connected with Lifecycle identifier. TKN_VERIFICATION and TKN_ACTIVATION_CODE requests are connected with Token reference identifier.
      • CARDS-51909 [VISA interface] Card metadata element in Check Eligibility Response has been set for Visa tokenization transactions.
      • CARDS-51933 [Issuing authorisation] Supported configuration of "Product Configuration ID" as contract subtype tag for MDES / VTS.
      • CARDS-52026 [UnionPay interface] Application Transaction Counter validation has been enhanced for deferred authorisations. When an unexpected value is received, a warning is written for the authorisation process.
      • CARDS-52046 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File Import pipe: added filling doc.settlement_amount and currency with Original Price Amount and Original Price Currency Code values from incoming file for DCC transactions.
      • CARDS-52069 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified for the Czech Republic in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 1, 2017.

      • CARDS-51897 [VISA interface] VISA BII Outward: supported grouping multiple clearing messages: such messages with the same transaction identifier are in sequence and in the same batch.

      • CARDS-52018 [Issuing authorisation] Tokenization activation code stored under a document has been masked.

      • CARDS-51941 [Issuing authorisation] Error in BERTLV data format in retail MDES transactions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51952 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed document processing without doc original id.
      • CARDS-51970 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed "Pair Sequence Number" field filling for PairData files.
      • CARDS-52003 [Product inspector] A new log mode, INVOICE_FULL is supported in Product Inspector. In this mode, all invoice and instalment fields are logged and compared. To use the new mode, set LOG_MODE=INVOICE_FULL in step, script or launch details.
      • CARDS-52010 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export, DCI Outward Processing: Fixed AirLine Addendum Flight Number field processing.
      • CARDS-52023 [Acquiring] Typo in the "Device Configuration Item Type" form has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51360 [Issuing] Pan reference identifier, Token reference identifier and Token requestor identifier have been added as document and authentication scheme tags.
      • CARDS-51869 [VISA interface] TKN_ACTIVATION and TKN_VERIFICATION requests are connected with Lifecycle identifier. TKN_VERIFICATION and TKN_ACTIVATION_CODE requests are connected with Token reference identifier.
      • CARDS-51909 [VISA interface] Card metadata element in Check Eligibility Response has been set for Visa tokenization transactions.
      • CARDS-51933 [Issuing authorisation] Supported configuration of "Product Configuration ID" as contract subtype tag for MDES / VTS.
      • CARDS-52026 [UnionPay interface] Application Transaction Counter validation has been enhanced for deferred authorisations. When an unexpected value is received, a warning is written for the authorisation process.
    • 03.44.99.19
      • CARDS-51365 [Data preparation and card personalization] Amex Express Pay supported in Data Preparation.
      • CARDS-51963 [Customer/account management] Added a new procedure cust_cms_stat() for gathering custom statistical information in the gather CMS statistics process.
      • CARDS-51966 [Product inspector] The "OpenWay\Product Inspector\Test Data Clearing\" menu group has been renamed to "OpenWay\Product Inspector\Test Data Maintenance\". Added a new menu item, "OpenWay\Product Inspector\Test Data Maintenance\Gather Tables Statistics" for gathering table (UT_TEST, UT_TEST_MSG, TEST_SCHEME, TEST_STEP) statistics.
      • CARDS-51968 [Product management] OpenWay\Full\CMS Stat\Create Statistics menu item has been enhanced. Now it will connect a new group "PRODUCT_GROUP" that contains key elements of product configuration scope.
      • CARDS-51973 [Customer/account management] Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" and "Merchant Contract Statement" reports for using these reports with Way4Web.
      • CARDS-51976 [Core] SRC_FX_TRF/TGT_FX_TRF tags are now always written into macrotransaction additional information, when the corresponding FX tariffs were used for macrotransaction Source/Target amount calculation accordingly.
      • CARDS-51710 [Core] The BILLING_DAY contract parameter has now the highest priority for calculating Billing Date for Monthly billing.
      • CARDS-51839 [Core] Validation for billing interval type in Account Scheme and in Date Scheme has been added.
      • CARDS-51868 [Distributed processing] Fixed incorrect document applying in an HA solution primary node when original processing did not modify static data.
      • CARDS-51926 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed file name processing.
      • CARDS-51928 [VISA interface] Corrected PVV data format in 0302 message for VISA.
      • CARDS-51960 [Transaction management] Country Table: Revised record for Madagascar. Code (3 bytes) must be "MDG", Code (2 bytes) must be "MG", Code (Numeric) must be "450", Curr Name must be "MALAGASY ARIARY", Curr Code must be "MGA", N Curr Code must be "969". No impact on transaction processing.
      • CARDS-51965 [Instalment management] Instalment fee code is now taken from an Instalment Scheme even if the fee rate is passed in document tags. Previous system behaviour was to use "FEE" as a fee code value regardless of Instalment Scheme settings.
      • CARDS-51981 [Core] Problem with setting version attribute and INT_TRF tag for an Accounting Scheme has been corrected in situations when there are no contracts and normalization orders for this scheme.
      • CARDS-51983 [Host2Host interface] TMID value is inherited from the original document when a secondary document is posted in routing transit authorisation messages.
      • I1701163750 [Money transfers] [CARDS-51967] Changed BIN routing search for P2P transactions from cards to accounts.
      • I1701242974 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51980] Corrected contract status check - no reversals are allowed for a closed contract even if there is a valid contract status with code 14.
      • I1702012564 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51961] MasterCard MPE Import: excluded the IP0036T1 table from checking for presence.
      • CARDS-51896 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Supported separate transaction fees export by the FIN_TRANS_SPLIT pipe parameter.
      • CARDS-51915 [Diners Club interface] DCI Outward Processing: Supported Acquirer Clearing File Format changes for Release 17.1. No impact for current pipe behaviour.
      • CARDS-51916 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing. Supported Issuer Clearing File Format release 17.1 changes.
      • CARDS-51982 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward: Added loading PDS0059 in document tag WSP_REQ_ID.
    • 03.44.99.18
      • CARDS-51370 [Issuing] New chip scheme template with contactless limits added: "AEIPS Generic with Express Pay". Issuer Scripts adding postponed until the exact AEIPS specification version becomes known.
      • CARDS-43148 [Customer/account management] Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details.rdf" report for using the report with Way4Web.
      • CARDS-51920 [Dispute assistant] Set the "Final Write-Off Amounts" amount type group for the "Create Final Write-Off" activity.
      • CARDS-51922 [Acquiring] Liab Contract link has been added to the OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Bank Accounting Contracts form.
      • CARDS-51929 [Acquiring] "Service Card PIN Management" and "Service Card Send / Receive Production Batches" links have been added to the "OpenWay\Acquiring" menu branch.
      • CARDS-51689 [Core] MIN_BILLING parameter default behaviour has been changed.
      • CARDS-51725 [Core] To copy a Billing Date from the top contract to Sub-liab contracts when the Billing Date is recalculated for the top contract, the tag value RECALC_BILLING=COPY_TO_LIAB_SUBS; should be used.
      • CARDS-51904 [Notifications] In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report added calculation of values for %VAR% variables if they are set in the P_MESSAGECODE_P parameter.
      • CARDS-51921 [Core] For OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types, the "Delete" action has been enhanced with additional checks before removal.
      • I1701271032 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51919] Changing Interest Tariff Apply Mode without changing interest rates has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-51765 [DB kernel] Updated Main Technical Requirements: minimum hardware requirements for running Reports software have been updated to 2 CPU, 4 Gb RAM. A new manual, system/ows_OracleReports12Setup.html has been added.
      • CARDS-51800 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward/Outward: Added PDS0047 (Trade Payment Option) to message layouts. No special processing.
    • 03.44.99.17
      • CARDS-51866 [Acquiring authorisation] Single authorization - Multiple capture has been supported.
      • I1511236778 [Core] [CARDS-51787] When removing a contract that was created by mistake (OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Issuing Contracts Remove), its account numbers will be cleared for proper housekeeping.
      • CARDS-51873 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Now we don't set the settlement amount for outgoing-like documents.
      • CARDS-51878 [Product management]
      • CARDS-51894 [Fee Prediction] MasterCard IRD configuration has been modified for Europe region: transaction condition "All Face To Face (Group)" has been replaced by "All Cardholder, Card (Group)" for IRD S2.
      • I1612046735 [Product inspector] [CARDS-51874] For the "test script import" pipe, added searching of CLIENT_TYPE values for the APPL_CLIENT.CLT tag with the additional condition "F_I=? and CCAT=?".
      • I1701112611 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51790] A new parameter has been added to the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS - varchar(4000) with the default value "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" for customising the "is_on_us" flag. Checks by group_channel have been replaced by card_brand analysis (... card_brand like 'V_%' ...) for supporting affiliated transactions.
      • CARDS-51898 [Acquiring authorisation] Application dependent advanced routing (AID 84/4F based) is supported.
      • CARDS-51757 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.
      • CARDS-51831 [VISA interface] VISA Outward: export of TCR3 record for AFT transactions is supported.
    • 03.44.99.16
      • CARDS-51847 [Issuing] Added the ability to define transaction conditions to unlock a new plastic and other conditions to close the previous one. See documentation for details or contact Customer Support.
      • CARDS-51204 [Core] New forms Acnt Balance History Turnover.srd have been added to show account balance turnover for calculated contract parameters.
      • CARDS-51472 [Case management] The "Period Condition" field in the Strategy Rule screen has been renamed to "Rule Process Condition" with 2 possible values: 'Always' and 'Excess Count In Period'. The listbox for the "Rule Category" field has been extended by the 'On Scan Case' value.
      • CARDS-51577 [Case management] "Last Activity Name" field has been added to "Open Cases" screens in Case Management menus.
      • CARDS-51828 [e-Commerce issuing] Added the ability to enter several comma-separated values for the HB_CODE and HB_PARM tags. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-51850 [Bill payments] It is now possible to clear the ServiceComment and License fields of a PaymentType using mBilling request.
      • CARDS-51851 [Issuing authorisation] Added support for external management of transaction value date by sending the Posting Date parameter in IssFundsTransfer, IssPaymentFromContract, IssPaymentToContract web services when working in SMS mode. Requires the appropriate version of W4W.
      • CARDS-51853 [Product management] The ability to limit a custom fee amount has been added - MAX_FEE. The predefined codes SRCF, SRCT, SRCA, TGTF, TGTT, and TGTA can be used as values of the MAX_FEE_FROM tag to take the limiting amount from the base macrotransaction.
      • CARDS-48158 [Host2Host interface] If acquirer parameters are not found by member ID, a search is made for default acquirer parameters by the "default" member id.
      • CARDS-51783 [Transaction management] Matching procedure for Transit (Affiliated) Authorization and Financial documents has been fixed in cases when a transaction from an Affiliated Acquirer is addressed to an Issuer located on the same WAY4 host as the Affiliated Acquirer through connection to Payment Systems because there is no direct settlement (no interbranch routing setup) between such Affiliated Acquirer and Issuer Institutions. In such configuration WAY4 system logs two pairs of authorization and financial documents (from Affiliated Acquirer to Payment System and from Payment System to own Issuer).
      • CARDS-51824 [MasterCard interface] IPS Products: Removed duplicated records for MasterCard.
      • CARDS-51825 [AMEX interface] AMEX FSF Export: Supported empty Approval Code and empty batches won't be exported now.
      • CARDS-51826 [Fleet cards] Displayed "Discount Amount" value sign has been changed for authorization documents.
      • CARDS-51827 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed outgoing transaction processing and CHANGE_CURR pipe parameter processing.
      • CARDS-51829 [Reversal management] Corrected filling history of latest operations in backdated processing.
      • CARDS-51836 [Tariff management] Optimized load of personal tariffs for large contract hierarchies.
      • CARDS-51859 [CB Gate] Fixed reversal message routing to core banking system for utility payments.
      • CARDS-51865 [ATM management] The correct value is passed in the TRN_PHASE21_V3 procedure DocTransAttr parameter.
      • CARDS-51867 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now PDS158 sf4 (IRD) for a second presentment is inherited from the presentment, not from the chargeback.
      • I1407093543 [VISA interface] [CARDS-43531] VISA BASEII Inw History Processing: removed duplicate check for History Out files without header TC90.
      • I1610186701 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50947] MasterCard SAFE: Suppported Fraud Negative Reporting Record Reject processing.
      • I1612133268 [Product management] [CARDS-51818] Fixed approval of a child service pack if it was copied from another financial institution's pack and contains additional packs.
      • CARDS-51456 [Acquiring authorisation] Merchant initiated transactions (MIT) have been aligned.
      • CARDS-51808 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-390 2.14 : supported new "Token Requestor ID" field in "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in the incoming transaction it is stored in the "WSP_REQ_ID" tag of the document.
      • CARDS-51823 [UnionPay interface] UPI Bin Table Import: Added the CDV_ALGORITHM pipe parameter. By default this parameter is null.
    • 03.44.99.15
      • CARDS-49883 [Distributed processing] Added support of running authorisations in the secondary and back-office in the primary at the same time.
      • CARDS-51434 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward ONUS: fixed PDS-0025.2 filling for reversals. A reversal will be exported only after receiving the appropriate [1644-685] (Financial Position) message for the original transaction.
      • CARDS-51451 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: added Member ID to error message when getting Member parameters.
      • CARDS-51780 [Authentication management] Fixed incorrect processing of long values for parameters of the procedure used by Authentication Server when the High Availability solution is not used.
      • I1701111004 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51791] Corrected processing of repeat messages for partial approved requests.
      • CARDS-51594 [NSPK interface] [NSPK REL] 17.1 B-02. NSPK Outward Processing will not export "1740-781" and "1740-782" messages if "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.1" global parameter is set.

      • CARDS-51784 [VISA interface] VISA BII ONUS Outward Processing: added new "PAN_FROM_TKN" parameter, if set to 'Y' and the "D_TKN" tag is not null, the "D_TKN" tag value will be exported in TCR0 pos 05-23 Account Number field instead of the "doc.TARGET_NUMBER" value.
    • 03.44.99.14
      • CARDS-50363 [Datamart] Added a new configuration group with the "LIMIT" code (OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Configuration Groups) for all classifiers related to DWF_CONTRACT_LIMIT mapping.
      • CARDS-50719 [Issuing authorisation] Issuer scripts creation is supported for cards permanently working in a secondary node.
      • CARDS-51721 [Tariff management] A new Tariff Role, "Conversion" has been supported to define FX Rate markup. These tariffs are used in multi-currency acquiring Products to support an acquirer conversion margin over the bank's internal or external FX rates and merchant reimbursement in a currency other than the transaction settlement currency.
      • CARDS-51756 [Product management] The ability to customize contract state information gathered during contract balance prediction on future date has been added.
      • CARDS-51763 [Money transfers] Fleet documents UI DB API. If the "Fee description" field is empty, it will be filled in with the text "0.00 (Currency)".

The "WS Users & Grants" menu branch has been moved from OpenWay\System\DB Administrator Utilities to these new menu branches; the linked menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\WS Users & Grants has been removed. For more details, see the section "Client Upgrade Notes on Impact changes".
      • CARDS-48740 [POS management] Final advice is supported for P2P transactions.

      • CARDS-51673 [Fee Prediction] MasterCard MPE Import. Supported loading amount restriction from MPE for a particular IRD by tag in the configuration. Now the configuration supports loading amount restriction for Spain IRD 75 and 85 for retail transactions.
      • CARDS-51676 [CB Gate] Utility Payment message routing to bank system rule selection algorithm has been corrected.
      • CARDS-51683 [Product management] Usage_Limiters_Css.current_status value now considers the state of Contract Classifiers, as before. When the condition is false, the value is "S" (Service Deactivated).
      • CARDS-51701 [Core] Additional checks have been added to Client Type: client type code and name should be unique within one financial institution.
      • CARDS-51734 [VISA interface] VISA Outward Processing: fixed "POS Terminal Capability" field filling when terminal capabilities are unknown.

      • CARDS-50996 [Transaction management] The "TOKEN" transaction attribute has been set for acquiring transactions according to bin_table settings.

      • CARDS-51637 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-376 4.5: supported new "Payment Account Reference" field in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in an incoming transaction it is stored in the "PAR" tag in the document.

VISA BASE II Outward pipe: supported export of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC05 TCR1 pos 133-157) from the "PURCH_ID" tag.

    • 03.44.99.10
      • CARDS-49605 [VISA interface] Card Member ID is sent to the controller depending on Target ONUS criteria: if the Target channel is not ONUS, send_member_id, otherwise target_member_id.
      • CARDS-49861 [Fleet cards] Implemented database API for user interface Fleet document screens.
      • CARDS-51648 [Tariff management] Calculation of service fees depending on different tariffs for portions of one transaction amount has been implemented.
      • CARDS-51001 [Issuing authorisation] It is possible to create Tokens in Stand-In mode.
      • CARDS-51097 [Tariff management] Tariff personalization forms have been enhanced. A separate form, "Tariff By Contract" that can be viewed at OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf shows contract tariffs that are available for personalization and makes it possible to personalize the product/template tariff or to restore the default value. Personalization can be performed by defining new tariff values, all other data is copied from the template/global tariff with the same "Tariff Code Ext" value.
      • CARDS-51205 [Core] Trace information for calculated contract parameters calculation has been added.
      • CARDS-51411 [Instalment management] Added the ability to process instalment daily interest accrual. To enable the feature, instalment fee codes that need daily interest accrual should be specified in the INST_DAILY_INTEREST_CODES global parameter (can be redefined in the financial institution), and invoice events to make financial transfers should be configured.
      • CARDS-51477 [Core] The same Result Event can now be a trigger for any change of classifier value.
      • CARDS-51511 [Instalment management] Instalment plan recalculation is now automatically called when contract Billing Date or Due Date is changed.
      • CARDS-51521 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2: is is now possible to activate a Preview instalment plan and to cancel early repayment.
      • CARDS-51540 [Product management] It is now possible to call a notification event several days before a regular fee is charged.
      • CARDS-51553 [Product management] Ability to use some client attributes as contract parameters without their registration has been implemented. For example CLIENT.COMPANY_NAME or CLIENT.AGE can now be used as IF_PARM tag values.
      • CARDS-51578 [Case management] The "Delete File" button to delete a case object has been added to the "Files" tab of the case details screen.
      • CARDS-51604 [Instalment management] Simulated instalment plan save mode has been added. Plans can be saved in full mode ("F" - default), partial ("P"), minimum ("M"), or not saved at all ("N"). Save mode is determined by the INST_SIM_SAVE global parameter which can be redefined by the same tag in Service special parameters.
      • CARDS-51642 [Core] The ("Custom" = "?") value has been added for Charge Event and Event Order domains for use in Fee Types and Standing Orders forms.
      • I1504289193, I1505264242 [Core] [CARDS-51640] The "Active Tariffs" form in OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf has been enhanced. Tariffs specified in the account scheme, account templates, services, standing orders and date schemes are shown with the "Yes" value in the "Used In Cfg" field of the form.
      • I1510305116 [Product inspector] [CARDS-48831] Product Inspector: Supported creation of Final (Second) Chargeback for Dispute Assistant v2.
      • I1611302204 [Automated routines] [CARDS-51502] The error message "Invalid contract hierarchy" will appear during the Contracts Daily Update procedure and contract closure process to avoid an infinite loop when a contract is linked to itself as the parent contract.
      • I1612147610 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51483] The "Duplicate with Data" activity is now available for tariff subdomains. The result of "Duplicate with Data" is that all "Is Ready" status tariff data values are duplicated in the same "Is Ready" status.
      • CARDS-50923 [Acquiring] Default acquiring product configurations have been added to the standard configuration.
      • CARDS-51277 [Core] Mirroring to Classifier for contract parameters with "Location of Current Vvalue" = Client configuration has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51435 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect "PIN change" processing on TS IRouter when request to an external system is required.
      • CARDS-51449 [Product inspector] Added sorting by ID for application action logging in PI test results.
      • CARDS-51452 [High availability] Added deferred authorisation processing to financial document accept procedure.
      • CARDS-51486 [Tariff management] Additional validation for global tariff data input has been added. When "Start Date" is not specified, the ability to set the tariff from the current banking date will be validated. When it is prohibited, the error message "Tariff Start Date Missing" will be returned.
      • CARDS-51487 [Acquiring] For the "Merchant Contract Statement" report, parameter values (P_DATE_FROM; P_DATE_TO; P_ZIP_CODE; P_REPTYPE; P_SQL_TRACE; P_F_I; P_ID) can be set directly without local_constants. If these parameters are not set, values from local_constants will be used.
      • CARDS-51489 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export. Enhanced customization.
      • CARDS-51492 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 702 for AMEX.
      • CARDS-51496 [Transaction management] Now we collect multiple authorizations for one presentment only if ps_ref_number (TREF) are equal.
      • CARDS-51504 [Core] A new form, Acnt Saved Limits.srd has been added to show MIN/MAX values for balances with the SAVE_LIMITS tag.
      • CARDS-51517 [Customer/account management] Amounts for reversal and adjustment operations in report "Cardholder Account Statement" have now been changed: amounts of these operations are similar to the amounts of Cardholder Contract Statement report.
      • CARDS-51530 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File: fixed doc.MERCHANT_ID filling. This field is filled only from the TCR1 record of the file being imported.
      • CARDS-51533 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM Outward: fixed Oracle grants for Clerk role.
      • CARDS-51535 [Core] Changing of hardcoded balances for contracts has been optimised.
      • CARDS-51549 [WAY4 Web] Duplication of Response Code in Voice Authorisation Response messages has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51563 [Money transfers] Ability to change the CUP Channel name letter has been implemented.
      • CARDS-51569 [Transaction management] Non tariff-dependent conditions for usage limiters with tariffs are checked before tariff search to minimize database load.
      • CARDS-51571 [Core] Fixed calculation of the "PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME" statistic parameter.
      • CARDS-51572 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed ARN recalculation for Adjustments, when an Adjustment has the same date as original transaction.
      • CARDS-51579 [JCB interface] JCB Variable Outward: fixed ARN field 31 subfield 2 filling. Now it matches PDE3901.2. Removed DE14 filling for non ICC transactions.
      • CARDS-51580 [AMEX interface] Fixed calculation of the "Account Balance" section in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • CARDS-51586 [Host2Host interface] IRouter: Removed unnecessary incorrect PIN tries processing in routing contract.
      • CARDS-51592 [Notifications] Processing of the default Service (with id=0) for correct representation of "%SERVICE$..." variables has been added.
      • CARDS-51629 [Core] The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.
      • CARDS-51647 [Invoice management] Overdue substate restore procedure has been fixed for invoice payment reject.
      • I1509142952 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-51531] IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import. The "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter has been added to IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import pipes, making it possible to exclude export/import of the specified tags from/to doc.add_info.
      • I1611104436 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51596] Increased the precision of reading FX rates for macrotransactions to 12 digits for use in screen forms and reports.
      • I1611117990 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51595] Fixed fee collection processing if both source and target BINs have the CAN_BE_ONUS tag.
      • I1611305517 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51501] Interchange tariffs have been modified for EU (Intra-Western) in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Manual.
      • I1611305656 [Product inspector] [CARDS-51348] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with codes that already exist: a UI dialog is displayed to confirm the script update. If script update is chosen, all the existing test steps will be deleted and the new one rewritten. This dialog window appears only if the pipe's SILENT mode parameter is switched off.
      • I1612200174 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51505] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now we don't send DE54 Cashback amount in chargebacks.
      • I1612293501 [High availability] [CARDS-51620] Incorrect PostingStatus values are no longer assigned to documents moved from a secondary HA node when deferred processing takes these records in a different order than the original one.
      • CARDS-51481 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward (variable): added the "EXT_CURR_EXP" parameter for changing the currency exponent on transaction export.
      • CARDS-51561 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 594: Supported loading the Payment Account Reference field of an ADDR message to the document tag PAR.
      • CARDS-51576 [Fee Prediction] RA configuration has been modified for Great Britain and the Czech Republic.
      • CARDS-51581 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Supported merging documents for Financial Adjustment Records.
      • CARDS-51631 [VISA interface] IPS Product Definition: Changed name for VISA product "X" from "Reserved" to "B2B Virtual Payments".
      • CARDS-51658 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard NSPK Outward: From 28.02.2017, the pipe will fill PDS0765 for MoneySend Payment Transactions.
      • I1511020079 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-49191] AMEX: supported functionality to reverse outgoing AMEX GFSG files.
      • I1612198860 [Money transfers] [CARDS-51583] P2P data validation rules required for IPS channels will also be validated for affiliate channels if the card BIN group channel is defined as an IPS channel.
      • ID901121006 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-51526] AMEX GNS Inward and Outward: Supported Contactless and Wallet transactions.

    DB Kernel

    • 03.45.29.18
      • [DBK-2822] Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.
    • 03.45.29.17
      • [DBK-2658] WAY4 Cards upgrade cannot be started if any critical services are not active.
      • I1704055962, I1704055907 [WM-3035] Menu Item editor has been fixed: <parameter> inclusions can be used in Parameters and Name fields.
    • 03.45.29.16
      • DBK-2708 [High availability] DB HA service statuses and node availability are now replicated across all HA nodes by DB Connection Pool of Transaction Switch in addition to WAY4 Replication. This functionality can be activated/deactivated by a Transaction Switch parameter. Please consult the setup manual of the appropriate High Availability solution. The corresponding Transaction Switch version should be installed; please contact Customer Support.
      • DBK-2785 [Configuration inspector] Corrected merging of MP_ETL_PARM table records using Configuration Inspector: now the records are identified by scope and value_type fields, not only scope
    • 03.45.29.15
      • DBK-2704 [High availability] Improved "Kill all processes" DB Replication console operation for stopping all WAY4 replication processes correctly.
    • 03.45.29.14
      • DBK-2594 [High availability] Automated SI_LOG* data cleaning in order to support Oracle Standard Edition.
    • 03.45.29.13
      • DBK-2634 [Configuration inspector] Introduced new parameter PRESERVE_ID in OpenWay\Copy Configuration\Copy Configuration Export Screen "Parm List" form for internal purposes. For all configuration exports created by users it should be set to "N" (default value). Setting this parameter to "Y" should always be approved by the vendor as it may lead to incorrect configuration merging in target system. It is strongly recommended to verify additionally if a file should be imported in target system if it contains setup with the parameter value "Y".
      • DBK-2658 [High availability] WAY4 Cards upgrade cannot be started if any critical services are not active.
      • I1704191220 [DB kernel] [DBK-2741] Eliminated TX index contention in the DM_RECORD table by introducing hash partitioning for the PK_DM_RECORD index. To get the index rebuilt, the DM_RECORD table has to be redefined using the WAY4 Redefinition tool.
      • I1705030523 [DB kernel] [DBK-2733] Eliminated cluster waits on selecting from SY_HANDBOOK.
      • DBK-2354 [Configuration inspector] Set of fields and tables exported and merged by configuration inspector not depends on Institution parameter anymore (is it filled or not). This could cause issues on importing configuration data exported on previous versions.
      • DBK-2728 [High availability] Added more debug information in process_mess when an exception occurs in the WAY4 Replication Copy process.
      • DBK-2729 [High availability] Eliminated large latency in WAY4R when 'unique constraint violated'.
    • 03.45.29.12
      • DBK-2657 [High availability] Supported real-time displaying of critical services status on DB Replication Console. See DB Replication Console documentation for additional information.
    • 03.45.29.11
      • DBK-2692 [Distributed processing] The ability has been added to migrate HA services between nodes in force mode.
      • DBK-2649 [High availability] Secondary node detach process cannot be started if all data has not been synchronized to the Primary node.
      • DBK-2697 [WAY4 Web] Checking W4Web components privileges has been changes. See manuals.
      • DBK-2712 [High availability] Added an additional check during synch process start to check that the node is attached.
      • DBK-2090 [High availability] Fixed WAY4R latency calculation if the time was out of synch in the source and the destination node.
      • DBK-2644 [DB kernel] All java classes running within Oracle JVM will be recompiled in order to avoid internal Oracle JVM exceptions.
      • DBK-2719 Fixed: HA support for SAF in TS.
    • 03.45.19.20
      • DBK-2719 Fixed: HA support for SAF in TS.
    • 03.45.19.17
      • DBK-2644 [DB kernel] All java classes running within Oracle JVM will be recompiled in order to avoid internal Oracle JVM exceptions.
    • 03.45.19.16
      • DBK-2090 [High availability] Fixed WAY4R latency calculation if the time was out of synch in the source and the destination node.
    • 03.45.19.15
      • DBK-1766 [Distributed processing] Eliminated deadlocks in W4R.Apply sy_proc_aux.
      • DBK-1945 [DB kernel] Fixed TRACEFILE_IDENTIFIER process parameter. It now works correctly with parallel jobs.
      • DBK-2624 [High availability] "Upgrade the Online1 Node" procedure now requires using Forced switch, as described in section "Emergency Mode" for HA-Switch Solution.
    • 03.45.19.14
      • DBK-2672 [Distributed processing] Fixed high concurrency on synch_proc_instance_log while running High Availability deferred apply with a lot of parallel threads.
      • DBK-2676 [Distributed processing] Error when High Availability service was not always switched to active nodes after in-flight time has been fixed.
    • 03.45.19.13
      • DBK-2650 [Configuration inspector] Import of merged data has been optimized. A record is updated in a single expression, not by one field at a time. For unchanged parent records, "Is Ready" status update is done once when loading subordinate records.
      • DBK-2668 [High availability] Update grants for WAY4R console user no longer hangs if WAY4R is running.
    • 03.45.19.11
      • DBK-2604 [High availability] Fixed issue when a High-Availability service returned to an active state at the secondary node after the node became unavailable.
      • DBK-2605 [Distributed processing] Fixed issue when operations with services other than default failed before the in-flight time.
    • 03.45.19.10
      • DBK-2592 [High availability] Fixed incorrect HA services switching when WAY4R has a big latency.
    • 03.45.09.32
      • DBK-2672 [Distributed processing] Fixed high concurrency on synch_proc_instance_log while running High Availability deferred apply with a lot of parallel threads.
      • DBK-2676 [Distributed processing] Error when High Availability service was not always switched to active nodes after in-flight time has been fixed.
    • 03.45.09.28
      • DBK-2650 [Configuration inspector] Import of merged data has been optimized. A record is updated in a single expression, not by one field at a time. For unchanged parent records, "Is Ready" status update is done once when loading subordinate records.
    • 03.45.09.24
      • DBK-2604 [High availability] Fixed issue when a High-Availability service returned to an active state at the secondary node after the node became unavailable.
      • DBK-2605 [Distributed processing] Fixed issue when operations with services other than default failed before the in-flight time.
    • 03.45.09.23
      • DBK-2337 [High availability] Added action 'Restore defaults' for recovering from state when a service is active on both nodes
      • DBK-2592 [High availability] Fixed incorrect HA services switching when WAY4R has a big latency.
    • 03.45.09.20
      • DBK-2505 Upgrading tm tables which are often used in urgent HotFix performance tuning has been improved
      • DBK-2556 [Health Monitoring] "Node availability" status supported.
      • I1702039456 [Configuration inspector] [DBK-2558] Fixed error during export of FX Scheme configuration by Configuration Inspector.
    • 03.45.09.16
      • DBK-2303 [High availability] Special technical one-node services with the name of the node code are created for use as a default service for modules which are connected to only one node of an HA solution.
      • DBK-2550 [Health Monitoring] Only processes that can be activated in the current node are monitored.
    • 03.45.09.15
      • DBK-2532 [Distributed processing] Added logging of forced deferred apply actions to process_mess.
      • DBK-2539 [Datamart] Excluded tables with predefined name prefix "two or three letters, two underscore symbols" from checksum calculation.
      • I1705286645 [High availability] [DBK-2552] Password verify function is supported for "Recreate Links" in HA console.
    • 03.45.09.14
      • DBK-1512 [DB migration] Fixed Redefinition tool GUI.
      • I1612280158 [Housekeeping] [DBK-2533] Included "Date To" in Housekeeping reports. All data between "Date From" 0 hours 0 minutes and "Date To" 23 hours 59 minutes 59 seconds will be shown.
    • 03.45.09.12
      • DBK-2466 [DB kernel] Fixed bug in which parallel jobs were removed when a node of Oracle RAC that was used to start jobs was stopped. Now the jobs can be automatically restarted on another node of Oracle RAC if an appropriate service is configured.
    • 03.45.09.11
      • DBK-2429 [Configuration inspector] Fixed long value trimming on configuration export.
    • 03.45.09.10
      • DBK-2491 [High availability] Eliminated differences in num_seq_range between nodes.
    • 03.44.99.24
      • DBK-2429 [Configuration inspector] Fixed long value trimming on configuration export.
    • 03.44.99.19
      • DBK-2457 [Offline obfuscator] Added support of obfuscating latin-1 characters.
      • DBK-2476 [Configuration inspector] Added automatic filtering by Record State for Datamart dimensions on configuration export.
      • DBK-2479 [Configuration inspector] Configuration inspector now informs officers of warnings the occurred during data creation, merge and import.
      • DBK-2442 [DB manager] Fixed misspelling in the "Terminate Jobs" action name in the "Process Log" form.
    • 03.44.99.16
      • DBK-2305 [Housekeeping] Added support of two new modes for the "Save" action: Single Sql which uses insert with append and nologging in the corresponding table and Custom mode which allows building custom Save procedures.
      • DBK-2455 [WAY4 Web] Pipes for import/export of W4W custom layouts have been added.
      • DBK-2461 [Configuration inspector] Added the ability to transfer Sy. Configuration mapping for Datamart dimension tables.
    • 03.44.99.13
      • DBK-2433 [High availability] Copying officer privileges now processes only roles prefixed with OWS_Owner name (i.e. WAY4 roles) and ignores others (Oracle or custom roles, if any).
      • DBK-2438 [Fast track upgrade] For LOCK/UNLOCK/KILL_SESSION actions, the optional procedure Sys.OWS_ADMINISTER_USER no longer checks that the user account being processed has system privileges. Otherwise, it would not be able to manage the HSK Owner user. These privileges continue to be checked for other actions with user accounts. Note that this is an insignificant reduction in security in the new version of the procedure.
    • 03.44.99.10
      • DBK-2424 [Configuration inspector] Fixed importing records with default column values. Buffered messages mode is used for the import process to preserve the import log in the case of a fatal exception.
      • I1612278687 [DB kernel] [DBK-2428] Non-periodic parallel process now processes Suspend and Resume correctly.

    UFX Core

    • 2.2.17-0007
      • UFX-404 [SOA] Added a configuration parameter for WAY4 Gate in the stmt-config section of the way4cadapter service configuration for including a reversed transaction in an additional statement.
    • 2.2.17-0005
      • UFX-406 [SOA] Supported client search by ITN for UFX Information and Application requests.
    • 2.2.17-0002
      • UFX-407 [Application management] Fixed length of Application RegNumber and OrigAppNumber in UFX schema. They now have the same maximum length of 64 characters.
    • 2.2.17-0000
      • UFX-394 [Application management] Application loading with additional info types for "Device Parm Ctrl", "Device Parm to Doc" and "Merchant Management" (appl_info_type.for_whom='S', 'D','M') has been added for the ContractAddInfo object type in Application R2 and Information Requests.
    • 2.2.16-0015
      • I1704247540 [Application management] [UFX-401] Fixed processing of special *#N value for clearing the client base address fields in UFX Applications.
    • 2.2.16-0012
      • UFX-331 [Application management] Added SOA UFX support of the SocialNumber field in the ClientInfo section in Application Management. SocialNumber also can used in ClientIDT to identify a client.
      • UFX-393 [SOA] Added Storno Correction statement type in UFX Additional Statement on WAY4Gate.
    • 2.2.16-0011
      • UFX-383 [Application management] Added support of Area and AreaClassifierType fields in Preferred and Usage Applications R2 and information requests.
    • 2.2.16-0009
      • I1703173525 [SOA] [UFX-388] Fixed surcharge fee currency shown in UFX Statement. Transaction currency will be the same as surcharge currency.
      • I1703176786 [SOA] [UFX-398] Fixed processing of UFX billing payment operations on WAY4Gate in scenario when there is chip data in the UFX request, but no chip data in the authorization response from issuer (this is sometimes the case with MasterCard). Previously chip data from the request could be lost, now it is correctly processed and saved.
    • 2.2.16-0006
      • UFX-373 [Tariff management] Support of a new "Conversion" Tariff Role has been added to tariff import/export pipes.
      • UFX-386 [SOA] Changed UFX Information response generation so that a standing order without currency will no longer have an empty <Currency/> element returned.
    • 2.2.16-0005
      • UFX-278 [SOA]
    • 2.2.16-0003
      • UFX-371 [SOA] Added Instalment summary data to UFX additional statement for instalments.
      • I1702285837 [SOA] [UFX-391] SAF is now allowed for reversal messages generated when a P2P_DIRECT transfer fails.
    • 2.2.16-0001
      • UFX-325 [SOA] Enhanced formatting. UFX Response messages now contain amounts with formatted exponent depending on currency.
    • 2.2.15-0008
      • I1702285837 [SOA] [UFX-391] SAF is now allowed for reversal messages generated when a P2P_DIRECT transfer fails.
    • 2.2.15-0006
      • UFX-382 [Application management] Support of a new "Conversion" Tariff Role has been added to UFX Applications R2.
      • UFX-314 [Tariff management] Creation of file_info records has been fixed for the tariff_import pipe.
    • 2.2.15-0005
      • UFX-381 [SOA] Supported new "Conversion" Tariff Role in SOA UFX TariffData requests and Information requests.
    • 2.2.15-0003
      • UFX-380 [Application management] Officer Import without FileLabel works correctly. "OFFICER.IMPORT.RESPONSE" FileLabel has been added to response.
    • 2.2.15-0002
      • UFX-372 [SOA] Added InstalmentIDT (ID of the initial plan in a chain) to UFX additional statement response.
    • 2.2.14-0010
      • UFX-377 [SOA] Added filtration of auth methods by code for Information requests. The value of the "ContractAuthMethod" parameter may contain a list of comma-separated codes to filter. A filter to return only active (is_ready != 'C') auth methods has been added for Information requests.
    • 2.2.14-0008
      • UFX-370 [Tariff management] Corrected UFX schema for tariffs to allow simultaneous presence of TariffTypeExt with TariffCode or TariffCodeExt elements.
    • 2.2.14-0007
      • UFX-368 [SOA] There are no errors now if the amount is zero and DE049 field is empty or null.
    • 2.2.14-0006
      • UFX-367 [SOA] New optional elements Title and Suffix have been added in UFX format under W4C_Address/<Address>.
    • 2.2.14-0003
      • UFX-363 [Tariff management] The Tariff Import pipe now supports importing a subdomain without its parent domain.
      • UFX-359 [Application management] XML Applications Overall Response pipe behavior has been aligned with the manual: extension is padded with zeros to be exactly three digits long.

    WAY4 Manager

    • 1.45.69
      • I1703314633 [WAY4 manager] [WM-3049] MessageBox menu item step has been switched to OPW message formatting protocol.
    • 1.45.54
      • I1704055962, I1704055907 [WAY4 manager] [WM-3035] Menu Item editor has been fixed: <parameter> inclusions can be used in Parameters and Name fields.

      • WM-3037 [Remote access] Fixed error "Neither 'reports_directory' nor 'reports_home_directory' has been declared" in Remote Access client.
    • 1.45.15
      • WM-2982 [WAY4 manager] Dynamic (scripted) edit mask is supported both at Domain and Dataform Column (redefinition) levels.
